Name: 1770 House
Comment: Took out Saturday night - missed the ambiance of the dining room but the food quality, service, portions and presentation were excellent. Taking out again midweek!

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Everything about this restaurant is exquisite from the welcoming fireplace upon entering to the warmed milk served with tea and coffee. Attention to detail is unparalleled.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: My first time and really enjoyed it.  Excellent meal and service.  Great atmosphere - perfect Friday night spot after a long week. We will b back

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Lovely inn & restaurant, excellent service, very good food

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Great food, excellent service, and amazing atmosphere.  I will be returning

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Great meal and service!

Name: 1770 House
Comment: 1770 house consistently has the best food in East Hampton.  The ambiance is wonderful - quiet.  Some may say it's "stuffy" but I disagree. I always have a nice night out eating at 1770 House.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: We need to dine there more often   Worth the drive from Southampton

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Always excellent food and service.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Fantastic chef and cozy warm space.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: The 1770 House is the jewel box of east hampton .the tavern is chic and decorated beautifully comfortable with banquet seating and its  interesting looking at the historic foundation and fireplace.The menu is yummy and the music played  is also a bit of mellow rock and roll history   The lovely tranquil main dining room is quiet with tables spaced well to provide personal space.   Both the food and service in both is first rate. I've been many times and whether it's a regular night.  restaurant week or $17.70 night in the tavern, it's always a special night when we go to The 1770 House.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Every single thing on the menu was AMAZING! Pricey but highly recommended!

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Excellent food and great service! The restaurant never disappointed us whenever we went there for dinner. We highly recommend to all white have not tried this restaurant yet. Whatever you order, you will not be disappointed.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Always great food, service is excellent. Great cocktails. Love sitting downstairs in the tavern, very cozy.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: My wife and I love this place and make it an ANNUAL MUST during the winter time in the hamptons. We always end up having a drink by the fireplace and before/or/after a fantastic meal. Highly recommend this place for special occasions.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: The service was absolutely fantastic. The food was amazing as well.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Mid-winter overnight stay was spectacular! Inn and restaurant were outstanding and the staff couldn't have been more charming.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: The hostess wouldn’t seat us at a corner , private table because she said they were committed (room remained 90% empty for the hour we were there). Not her fault but she seated a loud, obnoxious party next to us. Not pleasant.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: No other restaurant in the Hamptons comes close to the atmosphere and food quality of the 1770 house.   There might be places that are 'hot" for a year or two or where you might see more famous people , but this who want fine food in a refined atmosphere go to the 1770 House.   Pricey on Friday and Sat night but the Sunday thru Thursday Prix Fixe is a terrific value.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: As usual, food was delicious, device was excellent, atmosphere was great and all personnel were warm, welcoming and professional.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: We loved our experience at 1770 house. The food was absolutely incredible, the decor was beautiful, and the wait staff were attentive and helpful. Highly recommend! We look forward to coming back again!

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Perfection, love this place!

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Food was great!

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Always an exceptional dinner here.  And this is one of the very few restaurants where you can have a conversation over dinner.  It's quiet enough to hear your friends.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: 1770 is one of my favorite restaurants on Long Island. We decided to stay at the inn the last minute and I am so happy we did. Great service and very clean. I highly really recommend it both the inn and restaurant. We will definitely be back.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: It was lively. Perfect 20th anniversary meal.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: The service was sporadic with one waiter & busboy for the dining room. My cocktail was a watered down run&tonic. The food was delicious.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: The Tavern menu and cooking is excellent, and in a delightful and cozy "old inn tavern" below-ground space from the Revolutionary War era.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Organic chicken, Brussels sprout salad and date cake: the best. The service is consistently impeccable.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Everything was perfect! Will visit again!

Name: 1770 House
Comment: A perfect restaurant, in terms of ambience, service drink, and food.Our servers were very knowledgeable and skilled  about the menu and gracious hospitality.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Always good . one of the best in the Hamptons you can even hear everyone at the table which is rare these days.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: We would go every few months but instead go every few years simply to see if things have changed with the food preparation. They have not.  The menu always tempts but the food is always under-flavored, (not just under-seasoned, which some dishes are), and yet the salad is always too salty.   Frustrating because we are strongly drawn to this elegant room, comforting yet sophisticated inn ambience, superb service, good wine choices, well-made drinks, lovely venue.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Absolutely loved the ambiance and charm of 1770. Waiter was very knowledgeable of food and wine recommendations. The food was amazing we will definitely return !

Name: 1770 House
Comment: I love the chicken cooked to perfection on its bed of delicate mushed potatoes the sticky dates cales is out of this world.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Our meal and service were both excellent

Name: 1770 House
Comment: 1770 House continues to be East Hamptons best restaurant....Creative menu, great service and a sensational value during restaurant week.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Best place in East Hampton. They are consistently lovely. The food was delicious a wonderful dinning experience. Recommend highly.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: Such a cozy place and wonderful staff! The food is delicious! They just need to have a heavier pour with wine. That’s my only suggestion.

Name: 1770 House
Comment: 1770 House was fabulous, as usual. Going there for Restaurant Week made it a tremendous bargain. I still would highly recommend it even when it is not Restaurant Week.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Words cannot describe the incredible dining experience we had at Arethusa al Tavolo. We were impressed from start to finish with service and food and will definitely go back for another fine dinner.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Food was AMAZING! I would 100% recommend it! The service was great also!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Exceptional experience!  A must experience for any foodie out there and for anyone who appreciates quality, locally produced food.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: My wife and I went out for our 26th Wedding Anniversary.  Everything was wonderful and we look forward to coming back.  They treat you like family.  We love this restaurant!Peter Cordeau

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Food was unique and beautifully presented BUT the restaurant was so dark that we had to use our cellphone flashlights to see the menu and although the food looked like pieces of art  the room was too dark to really appreciate it.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: This is our go to fine dining experience in Connecticut.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: This was our second time eating at Arethusa al Tavolo and it didn’t disappoint. Prices are average for fine dining but the food and service are outstanding which makes it completely worth it. Can’t wait to go back again!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Outstanding from beginning to end. Our favorite restaurant hands down! From the food to the service!!! Just absolutely incredible. Love our date nights at Arethusa Al Tavolo!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Wow! Usually the veggies play 2nd fiddle in the entree, not here, they were just as much a star of the meal as the rest of the dish. I know they grow their own vegetables on the their farm, but the preparation was fantastic. We are definitely going back.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Lovely destination restaurant...people travel from miles for good reason.  Suggest making your reservations well in advance.  Be sure to check out the Bakery across the street to bring a bit back home (and because you may not have room for dessert) also the Ice Creamery and Cheese shop next door...

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Always a great experience! Drinks, food, atmosphere are all top notch. Highly recommended!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Overall I would give a good rating. the service was excellent with there attention to detail . The menu was pretentious  and difficult to understand, too many things in each dish. Less is more would be my recommendation. The ambience is not great with the tables to close together and no evidence of sound abatement. It was noisy and difficult to carry on a conversation. How ever I did enjoy the dinner and would recommend to anyone who does not mind the negatives.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Superb as always

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Honestly, this has been the first dining experience I've had in a while where every single step of the meal was noteworthy. We sat down and both my father and husband (who were celebrating their birthdays) were presented with hand written birthday cards from the owner. The wine selection was perfect, the gluten free bread was dynamite. And every part of the meal was amazing. Nothing was wasted.  The dynamics of all of the flavors were flawless. Seriously. Incredible meal. Thank you.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: The food was really very good and we enjoyed it. Thanks also for the thoughtfulness as we celebrated our anniversary - the card and ice cream were unexpected so thanks again. Overall we had  great experience and will recommend this to friends too.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Always consistently excellent food and service! Thank you for a wonderful dining experience!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: This is such a FABULOUS restaurant and the food is delicious. We just picked the wrong night and got seated in the bar area. There were people standing next to our table pretty much the whole night. It was hard for the waitress to serve us it was so crowded. They did try and ask people to move they just kept coming back. I would definitely go back it is my favorite restaurant. I would just ask for a different table OR not go by a holiday ( Valentine's day).

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Wonderful valentine lunch.  Great service and delicious meal.  We so enjoyed our visit and would highly recommend having a special lunch or dinner.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Everything is always great. We feel like they treat us like family. Great food, service and never disappointed.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Outstanding service. Lovely atmosphere and exception all food

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Without exaggeration, this was the best dining experience I've had in a long time.  Everything about it was superb from the terrific quality and sophistication of the food through the excellent service and overall classy vibe of the place.  The prices are appropriate for a high-end restaurant - it's worth the money.  We will definitely be going back regularly.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: As always a great meal

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: This was hands down the best fine dinning experience I have had. It was so good that I feel I could have randomly been brought anything from the menu aI would love it all. Worth every mile of the drive from Simsbury.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Amazing all the way!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: The unique combinations on ingredients are put together to make the most amazing dishes you will ever eat!   Food and service is OUTSTANDING.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: This restaurant is a real gem. Everything about it is quality- food, service, ambience. The menu is diverse and creative. It all works to stimulate the senses and make each dish better than the sum of the parts. While the preparation is inventive it remains appealing without being over the top or too fussy. This is one of the best restaurants anywhere.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Outstanding.  Service was impeccable, food and drinks excellent and Robert made our dining experience very personal.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Another fabulous lunch! Service and food 2nd to none.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Fabulous, period.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: One word... WOW! This was by far the easiest & fastest review I’ve ever written. This place is special from the moment you enter. There is a palpable ‘pride’ in the restaurant for all the employees - they are part of a terrific experience and make the diners feel it. The maitre’d, Robert, was extremely attentive, but not intrusive throughout the meal. The servers knew what to recommend (this was our first visit), and the food was delivered quickly and steaming- perfect!Our entrees were the sea bass and chicken - could not have been more pleased with the choices. My feeling is that everything on the menu is superb! Before dinner, we traveled next door to the Arethusa Dairy and purchased a pint of their ice cream. They kept it frozen for us during dinner - a nice ‘service’.This is my favorite restaurant in Ct and we will be back for more visits! Bravo!!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Fabulous,wonderful,delicious.....EverytimeConsistent epic food and great service

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Outstanding! The food is an 11 on a scale of 1-10. Do not miss trying their ice cream. It is the best you’ll ever have.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: My family and I frequently dine at Arethusa al Tavolo and we always have a consistently wonderful time with delicious food and fantastic service!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Great cooking , menu , pace of thd meal and exceptional serviceA trademark of this restaurant.  The wine list is balanced and well thought out, the menu and cooking excellent ( and we are both lactose int),Great pleasure as always.Highly recommended AB

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Elegant setting with lovely service and very fine food. Just a little bit pricy for me with only compliments on our experience there.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Best food outside New York City hands down without a doubt at all!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: A very special place, I love the ambience, food is delicious and always good service, It is a bit of a drive for us, but worth it, Love it here.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Food was absolutely delicious! Kudos to the chef. Robert and Brandan were wonderful.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comment: Always delicious. Lovely staff.

Name: Atera
Comment: Excellent food, vibe, and ambiance!

Name: Atera
Comment: Perfection.

Name: Atera
Comment: A culinary temple. Each and every dish was a work of art. I loved the way each dish was explained. I look forward to returning. The only thing I would change is the music, it didn’t go with the experience.

Name: Atera
Comment: Food is good, not great. In my opinion the price is not justified.

Name: Atera
Comment: The whole experience was outstanding

Name: Atera
Comment: If someone asks us where to go for fine dining with New York vibe, this is the place. There is no similar restaurant anywhere in the world. Try their reserve pairing to make the experience even better.

Name: Atera
Comment: Wonderful in every way! Amazing food and great service.

Name: Atera
Comment: Absolutely amazing food and service in an intimate setting. I am vegetarian and they made me an entire special menu to accommodate my dietary restriction. A must go to!

Name: Atera
Comment: Always the best meal of our lives. Services is SPECTACULAR. chef and kitchen are truly phenomenal creating a menu that is nothing short of course after course of taste treat (especially given dietary restrictions). Staff is attentive but not bothersome. We look forward to dining at Atera every year. Special. Memorable and delicious.

Name: Atera
Comment: Great experience. Certainly recommend.

Name: Atera
Comment: OK. I'm not one for superlatives, but I have to say that my dinner at  Atera was the best dining experience one could ever hope for. From the minute you are greeted, until your departure 9 close to three hours later), you are pampered and fed like never before. It was our 25th anniversary, and every staff member knew about it, congratulated us (by name), and made our night feel so extra special. Once one of the amazing staff, David, found out that I was Grateful Dead fan, the music (which was played at the perfect volume) featured a wonderful set of Dead tunes. Now the food: in a word-- beyond. Seventeen courses. Not too stingy, not too much. Actually had to make room for the last two savory courses. (There's always room for dessert-- courses 16 and 17). I did the temperance drink pairing-- crazy inventive and fun (not a must, but if you have a few $ you don't mind spending, it adds a nice comic dimension to an otherwise very serious and very delicious tasting menu. Chef Ronny is on hand (and is very hands on) overseeing every detail.  He is 35, looks like he is 25, and cooks like he's been doing this forever. This is one restaurant experience you cannot miss. As an aside: We stayed over at 11Howard- a beautiful boutique hotel nearby. Had the 6pm Atera seating. Went to AIRE ancient baths after dinner (9-10:30pm)-- around the block-- for an amazing post-dinner spa experience. If you want to be a hero, treat your special someone to a night like this-- it won't be soon forgotten!Extra shout out to David at Atera-- thank you for a very special evening.

Name: Atera
Comment: exceptional meal .  All dishes were superbly presented and perfectly balanced.  I enjoyed all the savory dishes but the last few sweet ones were disappointing.

Name: Atera
Comment: Small seat restaurant. Two seatings a night. Good wine pairings. Nice food presentation.

Name: Atera
Comment: My husband and I were in NYC from Atlanta to celebrate his 50th birthday, and I surprised him with reservations at Atera.  The atmosphere is fantastic and the seating allowed for conversation with others if desired.  The tasting menu was absolutely sublime and the chefs and staff were engaging.  highly recommend getting the wine pairings as well.

Name: Atera
Comment: A memorable and just a great culinary experience.

Name: Atera
Comment: The food was incredible and the service was wonderful. My friend and I had a fantastic time.

Name: Atera
Comment: One of my favorite restaurants in the world

Name: Atera
Comment: As good a meal as I’ve eaten in New York.  Anywhere, in fact.  Wine accompaniment was superb.  Loved the soundtrack too (Metallica, Fine Young Cannibals, INXS, the Stones... ).

Name: Atera
Comment: Exceptional experience. The chef is an artist and you can feel his inspiration in his cuisine, which is quite rare.

Name: Atera
Comment: Phenomenal, artistic and joyful. It’s evident that every staff member loves what they do.

Name: Atera
Comment: Best restaurant in NYC

Name: Atera
Comment: Chef Ronny and his team have really brought Atera back to the spotlight in NYC.  Highly recommended for those that enjoy a wonderful evening with great hosts and even better food.

Name: Atera
Comment: Nice place for dinning

Name: Atera
Comment: While the food was spectacular, one of the waiters (older gentleman with a ponytail) verbally threatened me for dropping my napkin. “If you drop this napkin again me and you will have a problem and will need to resolve this outside”.  As you can imagine this completely ruined my night and I would never imagine that the service staff would speak to their patrons in that manner.  Despite the food, I will recommend to all my family and friends to stay away for the restaurant given my experience.

Name: Atera
Comment: Divine. The food was beautiful and the service was thoughtful and attentive. It was a true pleasure to watch the care, precision and mastery that went in to each tasting.

Name: Atera
Comment: Last time I had this fantastic of a gastronomical experience was at Noma, Copenhagen . Chef Emborg meticulously crafted each dish with attention to detail for taste, texture and presentation. Every course was a culinary delight.Hats off to the service crew & staff, bravo! Cheers to Chef, for a brilliant execution and the best evening of 2020, yet. Thank you

Name: Atera
Comment: I was rather disappointed with Atera.  The food was fine; it is Michelin star grade.  But the atmosphere was too uptight, the chef looked angry and unhappy and one of the Scot servers was rude.  I am not able to enjoy food in a tense ambiance and for the price I paid I expected the entire staff, starting with the chef, to have minimum charm.  Some dishes were rather heavy:  I wished I had seen more creativity rather than the usual suspects: caviar, uni, foie gras and truffle oil.  I enjoyed the opening cocktail, the dumpling and the passion fruit mochi.  I am a bit concerned by the level of cholesterol that comes as part of the entire tasting menu.  Sadly I will not be coming back, nor will I recommend Atera to others.  Good luck.

Name: Atera
Comment: It is truly a top restaurant and deserve three Michelin stars. Very creative delicious elegant artsy and pleasing menue.

Name: Atera
Comment: Always a joy! Exciting dishes, 5 star service, hard to beat this!

Name: Atera
Comment: Amazing meal with 16 courses that ranged from very good to amazing.  Service is perfect.  Love sitting at counter and watching the chefs prepare the courses.  Also enjoyed the music selections that play and keep the atmosphere pretty casual.

Name: Atera
Comment: They charged us 1,000 for a meal for two. We are not going back to this restaurant.

Name: Atera
Comment: Very unassuming location but lovely relaxed dining room with guests dressed from relaxed to smart casual. Special mention must go to Messrs Abbick and Manka at front of house who genuinely provided some of the best service I’ve ever experienced at any restaurant - the entire team is incredibly friendly and personable.The food was of a very high standard as you’d expect and immaculately presented. The team were happy to explain more about each dish and their passion for their work was evident. If you have the funds to go (it isn’t cheap, we saved months for it), enjoy food and you’re looking for a fine dining experience in NY, I’d happily recommend this place.

Name: Atera
Comment: this was an extraordinary experience. the entire time we were there was incredible. from the food, to the service even down to the music selection....it was all great. the chef is creative, the staff is attentive, the restaurant is intimate and comfortable. with only 14-18 dining at a time you are wanting for nothing. you do pay a price for all of this but it was all worth while!!!!

Name: Atera
Comment: Everyone made a birthday memorable and delicious

Name: Atera
Comment: Second visit to Atera. Still my favorite fine-dining restaurant in NYC. Just perfect!

Name: Atera
Comment: Atera was a highlight of my recent trip to New York. The food and ambience was amazing. Jordan who took care of us was a superstar. I was lucky enough to score 2 seats over the new year holidays at this super intimate place and the overall experience was definitely deserving of its 2 Michelin stars. Just go and be dazzled and oh, get at least one member of your dining party opt for the temperance pairing. Just do it! Xoxo

Name: Atera
Comment: PerfectEach course was impressive

Name: Atera
Comment: As a foodie and a 30-year hospitality professional, this experience was absolutely fascinating!  It felt a little "Eyes Wide Shut" when I first arrived; a very small, intimate dining area (there were only 17 guests for my seating), and the staff was completely silent in front of us to begin.  Service was flawless, and the team moved effortlessly among each other for 15 courses.  A great ballet, and amazing to watch.  The cuisine was creative and flavorful (think Kaluga caviar paired with a quenelle of pistachio gelato and IPA), but I can't honestly think of a single course that I would request again.  This show was all about the ceremony of the service and plate presentation.  I opted for the coursing paired with wine, and I enjoyed several varietals I'd never tried before; Bosco (blended with Vermentino) from Cinque Terre in Northern Italy, Mencia from Ribeira Sacra, Spain.

Name: Atera
Comment: One of the best fine dinning restaurants in NY, had an amazing night there.

Name: Atera
Comment: Atera is exceptional.   The food (about 17 courses!) was amazing.  Very creative, with combinations of food one might never consider yet they all blended beautifully.  The U-shaped table facing the chefs turned out to be a wonderful addition.  All the staff was very attentive, friendly and as interactive as you wanted them to be (or not!).   The service was noteworthy.  Everything you would expect from a Michelin 2 star...and more.   I have never been to a restaurant where so much attention was given to your personal comfort and interests, in addition to proper and timely serving and removal of food and drink.  I would highly, highly recommend Atera.  True, it is expensive, but given the amount and type of food, it was truly worth the money spent, as no expense was spared by the restaurant in the selection, preparation and delivery of the meal.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: My experience was great. Wife had a great time for her birthday.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Outstanding experience staff and food excellent.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Food and service fantastic as always!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Delicious food, outstanding service, and charming atmosphere. Looking forward to going back soon.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Food was amazing! Good service

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: We had an important high level business meeting with out of town guests. Barclay prime turned out to be the perfect location. Elegant and impressive with great food, but not too noisy. Impeccable service throughout the night.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Have to say....Not Good.  I have dined at top steakhouses across the US. This was suppose to be one of them according to reviews ,but unfortunately for me it wasn't even in my top 20.   Place was WAAAYY to dark number 1..never before have I had to use my phone flashlight to see the menu.  Waiter was not friendly...seemed he couldn't be bothered.  Saw him once throughout the night.  Took forever to take our order..had a helper who was a bit nicer, but not a super friendly personality.  Food was OK.  Nothing spectacular.  From carpaccio, tuna tartare, and lobster bisque soup....ehhh 5 out of 10. Had a Prime ribeye, was OK....not really seasoned that much.  Dining partner had a Prime Strip...Not Good.  Dessert was Ok having had the banana creme brûlée and coffee...Overall, not worth the $300.  Would not return or recommend.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: The food was amazing! Our server did a great job as well. No complaints and can’t wait to go back.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Best steakhouse in Philly period. Their Wagyu cuts are insane quality. Fully recommend the American Wagyu Ribeye paired with either a Filet or preferably the Bone-in strip.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Awesome place. Great food!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: The best meal I've ever had. Words can not describe the cheesesteak! I can not stop thinking about that indescribable sandwich. We also shared the seafood tower. Extremely fresh and so delicious.  Dover sole to die for and steak done to perfection. Wish I could eat here every day. Service and decor simply wonderful!.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Great as usual, can’t go wrong with anything to be honest. This was a classic Wagyu RibEye, Bone-In NY, Truffle Mac and Creamed Spinach for my wife’s bday! Doesn’t get better

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: The wait staff was outstanding in their service.  The fillet was delicious but the ribeye steak was tough and had quite a bit of grizzle or tendons

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: The filet and lamb were amazing!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Waited 3 years for this sandwich omg 😋. Worth the wait #phillycheesesteak #barclayprime #excellent

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: An overpriced restaurant with few redeeming features.  The waitress was about as snotty as one can be:  I order my meat well- done.  "You mean like a hockey puck."  While the salads were ok, the crab cakes were mediocre and overpriced.  The filet was equally mediocre, but to add a further insult, there was a $4 charge for A1 sauce.  Even though the charge was removed, the Gaul to  place this on the bill shows an utter disregard for the customer.  The baked potato and the martini were ok.Not worth another visit.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Everything was good, but having dined here several times over recent years, something seemed to be lacking to live up to the pomp and circumstance.  Service was off-pace (e.g. appetizers served before the earlier ordered cocktails arrived-which were rather average).  Steaks were good, but not off the chart good-not even the Waygu filet.  The sides were excellent-tater tots and truffle mac and cheese were as good as ever.  Deep dish cookie dessert was uninspired.  I’d return based on previous experiences, but not in a rush after this visit.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: The food was really good. Pleasant surprise with the carrots. The customer service was outstanding. The waiter was extremely personable. The waiter really made the evening special for my birthday.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Great food and service

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Amazing dinner ! Will def be back ! Everything from service time food was exceptional !!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Perfect meal, ambiance, service; no better restaurant in Philadelphia or beyond, in my opinion.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Amazing food and service.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: The food was delicious. Service was excellent, the staff were very friendly and helpful. We had a great dinner, will definitely visit again.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: It was fine but not for the price definitely not worth it.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: My partner loves the ribeye at the Palm and Knife and Fork (in AC). But he says the ribeye he had at BP is best he ever had. Says it was perfectly marbled and tender and flavorful. Charred on outside perfect juicy medium rare doneness on inside. We also enjoyed hamachi crudo and foie  gras starters. Cocktails good but not stellar and expensive. Didnt love brussel sprouts. not done enough but he liked them. loved banana creme brulee for dessert. Two glasses bordeaux good value

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: We had great food and the service was exceptional.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Everything was done at the highest level. From arrival to departure, everything and everyone was top notch. I highly recommend this as a special occasion restaurant.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Amazing food you get what You pay for. Drinks are a little pricy but overall awesome experience

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: A special birthday treat for dad.  Started off with cocktails and apps in the bar.  Service was a bit slow during happy hour, but it was friendly.  Our server Erin was helpful and friendly in the dining room.  Thank you for making a kid-friendly pasta dish for my 9-year-old.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Service was terrific. Everything prepared to perfection, from hot buttered brioche to dessert. We enjoyed NY strip, mushrooms, baked potato, lobster bisque - all of it outstanding. We were there for a date, but the rest of the dining room on a busy Thursday evening seemed to be exclusively business meetings (which makes sense since the prices will make you look twice if you are not expensing it!) Our server Jeff was knowledgeable about everything from whiskey to the restaurant’s history. Classic steakhouse with great seafood options as well!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: The caviar with a glass of champagne  was delicious!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: THE ONLY THING THAT KEEPS US FROM GIVING A 5 STAR RATING WAS THE BAR SERVICE.  AFTER WATCHING WAITER WALK BY TO OTHER TABLES FOR 15 MINUTES, I HAD TO ASK HOW TO GET A DRINK.  THE EXCUSE WAS THAT THEY THOUGHT I WAS WAITING FOR SOMEONE WHICH I WAS, BUT I WAS GOING TO WAIT WITH A DRINK WHICH I WAS NEVER OFFERED.  NOT UP TO BARCLAY PRINE STANDARDS.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Engagement - amazing service and food

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Food was amazing. Service was great. This was my second time back and I love it!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Overall, a very nice and unique restaurant. Perfect ambience for a special night out. However, it is very expensive and quite honestly, given the hype and reviews, the food was just average.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Delicious food, wonderful service. Best steak I've ever had.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: We loved the quiet, calm & comfortable ambiance of the dining room. Our server, Allison was attentive, professional & gave us great recommendations!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Great atmosphere and excellent service but the food was mediocre.

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Excellent!

Name: Barclay Prime
Comment: Amazing food. Amazing staff. Amazing experience.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: The food was great and the service was fantastic. A lovely candlelit place, great for a date or with a small group.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Amazing food. Definitely will be back

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Such a lovely restaurant. Service is fantastic and food is DELICIOUS! The pasta is amazing!!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: My waiter Michael was extremely helpful and gave several possibilities since it was my first time in this establishment. I had the scallops for the appetizer, which were amazing and the freshly made ink linguine with lobster with wild mushroom sauce which was complimented by a fine glass of white wine recommended by Michael. He actually brought me options, which I think helped to complete my meal.  It was a wonderful experience!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: My daughter has been raving about Barrique for a long time, my first time was amazing!  The food was incredible, the Scallops and Ragu are a must!Friendly staff, great atmosphere, can't wait to go back!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: This place redefines Italian Cuisine. Every time I come to LA is one of the places on my list. As a born and raised Italian living in the US for the last 40 years, It takes a ton. to impressed me, but this place, no matter what you are eating, is a notch above the rest.Consistency is another. key to their success. When you come to a place 10 times and it is always great. that says a lot.One not to miss!!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Amazing experience.  Great dishes.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: amazing food! Our waiter was informative and attentive.  We highly recommend this lovely, little, taste of Italy!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Fantastic as always!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Barrique was wonderful! It was a quaint, upscale, romantic dinner for two. Service was excellent across every staff member we encountered. The food was delicious and thoughtfully prepared. My favorite dish was the scallop starter. I felt everything was well priced for the quality and experience :]

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: AMAZING wow What a treat this place is the best! Truly!!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: What a beautiful experience to be out after being home for months. The food was amazing, the waiter super friendly and the ambiance romantic and wonderful. Highly recommended!!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: This was the most enjoyable evening!The service was excellent, the food fantastic!We cannot wait to go back and are fortunate to live only 15 min. away!!!!Birte

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Our first time dining out since the Pandemic and it was heaven! Everything was delicious and wonderful! We were very comfortable with the health and safety standards they had implemented. Most of the tables in this restaurant are outside but we set inside with some other diners (since outside was full) and felt very safe.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: A great spot for a delicious meal! the service was great, made us feel like they knew us. will definitely be back.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Always a great meal! We go regularly, and have never been disappointed.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Great food. Great service. Very romantic! I definitely recommend it.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: This meal was beyond amazing!! One of my top five meals in the last five years!! Can’t wait to go back!!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: First dining out in months...  Barrique never disappoints and tonight was not exception.  Happy to see them open and several other couples enjoying the evening.Staff wore masks & gloves and the spacing of tables was appropriate and safe.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Excellent quality, service and ambiance.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Great experience

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: I would put Barrique up there with any Italian in LA, they also have some specialty dishes that are very unique and can't find anywhere else.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: The people were very friendly and very pleasant. I liked the pasta in Al dente very deliciously.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Fillet mignon was on the dry, side.sea-bass was so-so.Nice servers.A bit overpriced.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Excellent service, delicious food, romantic ambiance. Took my boyfriend for his birthday dinner who is a major Italian foodie and he said its his favorite meal/restaurant in LA. Brought our own bottle of wine, for which our waiter researched and then suggested dishes that would pair well with our wine. Will return for any special event.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: We loved the food and ambiance.  The restaurant is charming and homey.  Excellent pastas.  Attentive service.  We will return.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: My boyfriend and I come here for both of our birthdays every year and we are never disappointed! From the mouth watering food to our favorite server Michael who is so sweet and always provides the best wine recommendations Barrique is easily our favorite restaurant in Santa Monica.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Delightful place—-food and service were amazing!  Fantastic wine list!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Best scallops and best filet ever.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Barrique is a hidden gem on main street Venice. The the ambiance is romantic and the food is great. It was very noisy however and the seating is quite close.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: My first time there and our family spends a lot of our time indulging in great meals. Went in for a blow dry today and was told to go to Barrique! Amazing meal, service and warm hospitality. We loved the prosciutto and burrata and beet pasta as an appetizer. The gentle flavor of the pasta was so delicious and did not make you feel heavy.  The prosciutto was perfect and the serving was so generous. I had the special lobster ravioli with black truffle in lobster bisque. It was as amazing as it sounds. I could not stop  till my husband gave me a piece of his rib eye. It was flavored perfectly with the sea salt that reminded me of Hawaiian sea salt (I’m born and raised on Maui) it was tender and tasted like wagyu. I left giggling and extremely happy. The meal was so incredible we had to call the restaurant to tell them and spoke to Tony who was so receptive and appreciative. Michael was our waiter and made the dining experience perfect. This is a gem of a restaurant! Our son Keanu has gone there and told us about it and now I know why he raves about it! We will be back!!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Truly wonderful dining experience!Food was amazing and the atmosphere relaxing but romantic.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Best appetizers, pasta, filet mignon!  We sat in the bottom floor next to the kitchen and enjoyed the delicious smells wafting throughout our dinner.  Service, ambience, everything was fantastic!

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Very friendly service, perfect dinner experience

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Our dinner was amazingly yummy! Our waiter was super attentive. It was an incredibly enjoyable evening from start to finish.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Best Italian restaurant in the area

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: We absolutely love this wonderful Italian restaurant for a romantic night out together. This was for Valentines and they kept their regular menu which we much preferred. The octopus starter, wild boar ragu pasta, and chocolate desert were all outstanding. And I lived in Italy for 8 years so I can truly say that! Definitely one of the best restaurants in the area.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Everything was great. Only critique was courses were rushed. Entries came out and we were still enjoying the appetizer. Same other tables around us

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: Food was good - not great - especially given the prices were on the higher side. We went on Valentine’s Day and, though the brothers-owners were very nice, we felt rushed. Table was tiny and barely accommodated our food, drinks and bottle of water. Outside is nice but upstairs looked even better in terms of ambience.

Name: Barrique Venice
Comment: I am a fussy restaurant goer and I was very pleased.  This was my first time going to Barrique.  I was very pleased.  It was a charming experience and the pasta was delicious.  An added bonus was their fabulous wine list.  I highly recommend it.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Order the bone in ribeye, it's the reason you came, it's amazing.Also, oysters are great and you cannot lose with the sides

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Bavetteâ€™s is by far my favorite restaurant.  We split oysters and shrimp which was very good.  Smoked salmon Caesar salad which was fabulous. Oh....-and the warm bread with amazing crust was divine.  Salmon dish slightly spiced was delicious. Loaded baked potato with diced bacon very tasty. Son in law had a steak that was very good and my daughter had chicken.  Everything was delicious.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Food lived up to the hype!!! But the plate that stole the show was the Brussel Sprouts!!! Never in my wildest dreams did I expect them to be this good! Highly recommend them!!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Amazing steakhouse in Chicago! Great for a date night or birthday dinner! Service was excellent and food was outstanding!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: I had been looking forward to my reservations for months.  It was a late night reservation due to availability.  We ordered an appetizer that was forgotten about until we reminded our server.  It was brought out moments before our entrÃ©e.  This put a damper on a highly anticipated date night for my husband's birthday.  The appetizer was later comped and service was good up until we had to flag down our server to get our dessert wrapped up to go.  Food was good but the service will not have me returning.  There are far better restaurants with top notch service for the price.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Best restaurant in the city consistently top notch

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Everything was great, service, food, ambiance. We had to book our reservation well in advance, but it lived up to the wait. Would recommend, and would go again.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Ambiance and food  were outstanding. Possibly the best steak dinner my wife and I have ever had.  We both had the filet . Cooked to perfection and melted in your mouth. We were celebrating my wife's birthday and I called ahead for reservations and table on the main floor. Great table but our server never mentioned the occasion to my wife. Would highly recommend for outstanding food,  terrific surroundings and memorable night.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Slow service and did not honor reservation time

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Best steakhouse in the city. And the seafood is amazing as well.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: The filet mignon was cooked to perfection .  The service from Klause was excellent. We highly recommend this romantic and fantastic place.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Best steak in Chicago.  Would definitely recommend to anyone!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: We were sat at a table towards the door last night. Very drafty when the door opened. Disappointing they did not do more to keep the doors from being open at same time.Food was very good. I thought the service was just average. Was expecting exceptional experience, was just pretty good

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Our waiter Ben was great, we didnâ€™t feel rushed. We sat downstairs in a booth and the music and atmosphere was nice . The bottle of wine we had paired beautifully with our steak .

Name: Bavette's
Comment: The best!!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Very enjoyable place to visit, the burger is a must!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: One of the best steaks in Chicago! Try bone marrow and ribeye, they are the must.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Steak had to be sent back twice and on the third time it was overcooked and tasted terrible. Huge disappointment but the waiter was very good and they were nice enough to remove my steak from the bill. Sides and apps were delicious. Very very dark restaurant.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: I try and get to Bavettes as often as possible - amazing place.  Had difficulty with my prior visit as I had an 8:00 PM reservation (Downstairs - Parlor) and they seated me at 9:20 PM so I was very upset.  This reservation would be my last if that happened again but they were perfect in everyway on this visit.  We sat downstairs (preferred space), waiter was awesome and the food is always the star here.  Bavette's has the best atmosphere in the city - we will be back!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Went to celebrate my daughterâ€™s birthday- the hostess acknowledged that and then no one after that mentioned her birthday. Somewhat of a bummer as several tables near us were served desserts with sparklers.  We were lucky that Erik finally made it back to our table to get a dessert order let alone send sparklers. Laid back is one thing but Erik takes it to an art form. Food was wonderful, back staff was on the ball, Erik seemed not to care

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Very good food, but not exceptional within this price range.  Terrific, friendly and timely service.  Good wine selection at reasonable prices.  Background music is too loud and interferes with conversation.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Waiting for a reservation without knowing how long the table is going to be, being told that it's 2mins which turns into 10mins is frustrating. Multiple times they got the order wrong and I've cooked better $70 Ribeyes at home

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Waited 40 minutes to be sat, and then were sat in the basement

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Food was good and service was very friendly but timing of food delivery was uneven. We ordered three steaks, all medium...one came out medium, another medium-well and a third well-done. All top quality beef but not as ordered. Sides large and good. We had a booth, which was great.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: The food was great and we enjoyed the atmosphere and music!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Food was excellent service and waiting time was right on schedule . Staff did a great job

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Took me several months to get a reservation but it was worth it. My wife and I went with my brother and his wife. For appetizers we ordered the steak tartare, shrimp cocktail and half dozen oysters. All were great. For steaks the bone in ribeye and the petite fillet. They were cooked perfectly with great flavor. For sides, the sweet potatoes, crab stuffed avocado salad, truffle mac and cheese and elote style corn. For me the elote style corn was the best but all were good. As for the wine, I highly recommend the Colombo Apertura Pinot Noir. One of the best wines I have had in a long time. No dessert unfortunately but if you see the amount of food we ordered you will understand why we passed.The ambiance of the place was also very cool. The music was great and the noise level was a little high but sitting in the booth we didn't have much difficulty hearing. There is a great bar area both upstairs and down. Only complaint is the restroom situation. They are single restrooms and there was at least one to two waiting in line. Not a big deal.Overall an excellent meal and great scene. Would love to go back so I better get to work trying to secure another reservation. People did walk in without a reservation and I overheard them being told hour thirty to an hour forty-five. Not that unusual for a high-end restaurant downtown but I prefer a reservation.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Amazing food and great service.  Definitely worth a trip to Bavette if you are going through Chicago.  YUM!!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: It was fabulous !!!! We love Bavettes ...It is our most favorite restaurant ever !!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Well executed food but the service left quite a bit to be desired.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Amazing service and food was outstanding.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Went to Bavette's for a date night and the food was really good! Only disappointment was the length of time we were there. We ended up being there for 3.5 hours due to the wait time on our steaks. Also, I ordered a bone-in filet cooked medium+ and it was pretty well-done except close to the bone. Still very flavorful though!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: We were there for my boyfriends surprise 30th! The staff went above and beyond to make this special surprise perfect!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: The first time I came to Bavette's we only had appetizers and side dishes--and it was amazing. I wanted to come back and get to experience one of the best steaks in Chicago. It definitely lived up to the hype and as always, the sides (specifically the wedge salad with their famous bacon and the garlic mashed potatoes) were fantastic as well. The ambiance makes you feel like you've stepped into a classic Chicago speakeasy, especially in the basement and the service was on point. Great spot to celebrate a special occasion.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Bavettes came highly recommended. First of all, it is quite dark in the dining room. The rest rooms are old and small. The bar area has a rather nice ambiance. There is an additional dining room in the "dungeon" which provides less noise and more privacy. The food is pricey and I would suffice it to say that you do not necessarily get your money's worth. The portions are relatively small. The filet mignon and lamb chops were average. However, the crab was excellent! The service is attentive. I think there are many other superior options for steaks, chops and seafood in the area.  We will not be returning to Bavettes anytime soon.

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Loved the food! Came out very fast. Service was amazing. Food was hot and seasoned just right. Will be back!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: So good! Their Mac and cheese with bacon ðŸ¤¤

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Amazing! Great experience!

Name: Bavette's
Comment: Wonderful anniversary dinner.  Impeccable service. Phenomenal food.  My favorite restaurant in Chicago,

Name: Bavette's
Comment: My wife and I had an excellent time.  The ambiance was amazing!  The music playing was sultry and seductive.  The food was great!!!! The service was outstanding!!!! I would recommend this restaurant to anyone!!! Perfect date night restaurant!!!

Name: Benu
Comment: Splendid, best quail I have ever had. The caviar with egg is extremely tasty.

Name: Benu
Comment: Wonderful evening of fine dining.

Name: Benu
Comment: We have been wanting to try Benu for years, so were excited to finally make a night of dining here.  The service was outstanding.  The timing of the dishes coming out was excellent and we found the servers to be professional and also very charming.  The food, though, fell a bit short of expectations for a 3-star restaurant.  Most of the starting tastes were delicious, but some of the main courses were not very good.  The xiao long bao and beef courses were excellent, but the soup was rather bland and the BBQ quail had an overwhelming smoke flavor that was unappealing.  After dining at Quince, Acquerello, and Manresa, we were disappointed in the food at Benu.  It was a good experience overall, but not really worth the price in comparison with similar class restaurants.

Name: Benu
Comment: Technicality wise it is at the highest caliber. Service was impeccable. Atmosphere is very calm and intricate. Personally, it felt amazing to see simple everyday Asian food presented in exquisite ways.Lots of praise for the Benu team

Name: Benu
Comment: Amazing from start to finish. The food, service and hospitality were unmatched.

Name: Benu
Comment: Loved every dish and service was superb

Name: Benu
Comment: Really great food. Some courses were out of this world, some courses were just really good but not worth the cost. All in all a great experience for a special occasion.

Name: Benu
Comment: One of The most amazing meals of my life. The food was perfect. And THE SERVICE: like a ballet! Also The Ambience, The Music. The beautiful Wine list! A Trip to San Francisco is only complete it if you visit Benu: The Food Cathedral!

Name: Benu
Comment: The food was exceptional

Name: Benu
Comment: The xiao long bao is an explosion of flavor - a truly amazing creation!  This alone made this a life experience.  Flawless!

Name: Benu
Comment: Food is good, no problemNeed a more comfortable chair to be honest.And need to increase the distance between tables defintely.

Name: Benu
Comment: Innovative and classic at the same time. What an experience!

Name: Benu
Comment: Absolutely excellent and attentive service of 3 Michelin star.   The food was wonderful.   Thank you

Name: Benu
Comment: it has actually improved from last time I was there, thought there was no room to move further, but I am wrong, they can do even better than better

Name: Benu
Comment: Every item of food was truly unique.  The explanation by the staff was very clear and welcome

Name: Benu
Comment: Amazing. We’ll be back!

Name: Benu
Comment: I’m still blown away by the culinary experience and Service. That the Benu team provides. The menu was beyond delightful. Loved the Asian influence and all the delicacies. Pictures speak for itself.

Name: Benu
Comment: Anniversary dinner!

Name: Benu
Comment: We went for our anniversary. Very beautiful dishes and tasty as well. I don’t like raw food so Benu is the right type of restaurant for me. Most of dishes are from China and Korea. If you like Asian food or want to try Asian food, then you will like it

Name: Benu
Comment: Worth it. It's a month of daycare/preschool for one kiddo. But I like good food/booze, so does my husband, and I appreciated the multicultural, equal gender reppin that night.

Name: Benu
Comment: Most incredible restaurant on the West Coast, worth every penny and the entire trip!

Name: Benu
Comment: Outstanding quality of food, drinks, presentation, and service.

Name: Benu
Comment: An upscale dining experience great for a date night.  The food and service were excellent, but be prepared to spend some serious money.

Name: Benu
Comment: Each dish looked like a masterpiece. The taste  of the food divine. The minimalist decor soothes the senses and awakens imagination. Excellent service.

Name: Benu
Comment: Repeat visit to this exceptional restaurant. Interesting dishes, wonderful presentation, excellent wine pairing. Overall, an extraordinary experience.

Name: Benu
Comment: A new found appreciation for ingredients I grew up with. A fascinating and well thought out twist on Korean and Chinese cuisine. One of the most perfect meals I’ve had. Every bite was a dream and the portions were perfect. Benu is an institution and a must visit if you’re in SF!

Name: Benu
Comment: My favourite dining experience to date. We went for our anniversary and the service was beyond impeccable. The flavours were inventive and yet still so delicious. Such a special dining experience!

Name: Benu
Comment: Each dish, brought one by one to the table at a comfortable rate, was amazing.  It felt like we were dining in our own home as there was continual interaction with the kindly, professional wait staff.  They were eager to answer questions and seemed to enjoy how much we were enjoying the experience.  I loved the presentation of each delicacy in a special bowl or on a plate made just for that offering.  The only flaw to our evening, one which was not under the control of the waitstaff was the loud talking from a nearby table of business people who could not have actually been eating, or at least not really savoring what was being brought to them.  The food itself was totally worth the price, which is admittedly not for the faint of heart.  You cannot get these dishes anywhere else and the ingredients are rare or difficult to source. The wine offerings were similarly stunning and so were the prices for wines by the glass, which added substantially to our final bill.  It was a special event for us, so we didn't mind the loud conversation nearby us nor the final bill-- we were prepared for that .  It was an epic evening.

Name: Benu
Comment: It’s really an amazing restaurant which deserved 3 stars Michelin

Name: Benu
Comment: Hands down the very best service you will ever receive, and the food was euphoric.

Name: Benu
Comment: Really enjoyed the meal.   Loved the Asian influences.

Name: Benu
Comment: have good service

Name: Benu
Comment: I have twice dined at Benu!! The cuisine and the staff are quite amazing! Also, I really appreciated that the tasting menu had quite a few new additions between my 1st visit and most recent visit!

Name: Benu
Comment: Great Meal as the last time. Great food and service from start to the desserts. Every time will be back to SF will visit Benu. All best for all team great job.

Name: Benu
Comment: Sublime restaurant experience.

Name: Benu
Comment: Delicious. Innovative flavor profiles, consistent and excellent execution, thoughtful and perfectly balanced wine pairingsThe service was knowledgeable, professionally enthusiastic, and unobtrusive. Loved our main wait person and the somm was excellent!

Name: Benu
Comment: Outstanding ! Never disappointed! The food is exquisite, innovative, yet with a respect to the spirit of traditional Chinese and Asian gastronomy. The staff is A+.

Name: Benu
Comment: Creative and delicious food in a wonderfully sedate setting.

Name: Benu
Comment: Pretentious & largely tasteless food served by smug, arrogant staff.

Name: Benu
Comment: Amazing place to have one of the best nights of your life! Special Mention to the wine pairing, it was simply perfect for the tasting menu, which is an artwork from Corey. My most sincerely congratulations for him! Every course was a tremendous experience of flavors and textures in another different level. Also the service was spectacular. Every person knows what they are talking about and they make you feel really nice during the whole experience. Really really happy for being there.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Where does one begin. My God, this place was top drawer all the way. Our server Mathew was incredible,  he asked,  he explained, he was attentive,  on a Saturday night no less w all the craziness that ensues on a busy night.  The food was off the charts,  the stuffed peppers and the Saffron crepe where just intense. The cocktails were beautifully orchestrated,  overall a great time and will certainly be returning when I get back to Raleigh.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Favorite restaurant in Raleigh, hands down. Really special new things to try, along with wonderful versions of classics. Seriously, incredible flavors, amazing atmosphere and design - love.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: My second time here and was pleased to bring along three others that had not been to Bida Manda before. It was the perfect experience. From the unique cocktails, amazing apps, tasty entrees and superior service.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Food was great!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: I was thrilled to finally be able to visit Bida Manda!  Due to its deserved popularity, short notice evening reservations are hard to come by, so lunch proved to be a great option.  I thoroughly enjoyed the pork belly soup.  It is unlike anything I've ever had.  For a soup, it is incredibly rich and filling.  The portion was so large that I had more than enough for lunch the next day.  Our server Sophia was so friendly and knowledgeable.  The only downside (and a small one for me) is that the table next to us was very very close.  I look forward to going back to Bida Manda and trying some of the other great menu options!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: The food was delicious! I'll definitely be coming back!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Amazing meal. The most flavorful dishes I have had. I recommend the papaya salad with duck.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: The Green Papaya salad with Lemongrass Chicken is absolutely delightful. Highly recommended.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We attended dinner at Bida Manda for our second anniversary. The staff was very friendly and the food was very good. They start by bringing out some complimentary shrimp chips, which were really pleasant. Our waiter recommended the lettuce wraps as an appetizer and they were hands down the best dish of the night... I’m not usually a lettuce wrap kind of guy either. We split the Manda Herb Salad with chicken and Tom Khem (short ribs and pork belly) and they balanced each other nicely. The short ribs were a little dry, but the gravy and fatty pork belly balanced them out well and they tasted delicious. The salad was really nicely balanced. The food is about $20 per entree, but we have enough leftovers for both of our lunches tomorrow, so the value is good for the price.After the waiter packed up our food, he brought us some complimentary macarons to celebrate our anniversary. They were the best macarons we’ve ever had, and I’ve been to Paris. To cleanse our palates at the end of the meal, they served us each a small shot of lemon juice, lime juice, and ginger, which was a great way to wrap up the wonderful experience. We’re moving soon, but if we’re ever in town again, we’ll be revisiting Bida Manda for sure.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Our server Savannah was fantastic, so was the food and drink. Always a great time!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Really delicious and great service.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Food took over an hour to come out. I had ordered a thai tea and it was not ready. They said it would be ready in 5-10 minutes. 20 minutes later they brought out a tea that was nothing like how it normally is. When the food came out it came out very spread out. over 15 minutes between when my food came out and when my guests did. I was very disappointed by this since I have had good experiences in the past and wanted to share with others but was very much let down.  Food was good unsure if I would bring friends for lunch session again.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Service was super; but too noisy, otherwise great!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Great place, great foodHad a great date time with hubby

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Love this place so of course I chose it for my birthday dinner with my best friends. The service is awesome and those waitresses are the nicest people ever! The appetizers are so delicious, it’s hard to save room for my main course but you have to try it all! My favorite is the lettuce wraps and chicken stirfry. Thank you for the desserts… So many wonderful choices and so delicious! Try the special margarita and you won’t regret it👍🏼

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Really good cocktail, strong and flavorful.  Nice atmosphere. Waiter was very nice and professional.  We had spring rolls, papaya salad with lemongrass chicken that could have been boring in bad hands but was extremely flavorful and delicious, and a short rib/pork belly dish that was delicious.  Can’t find any fault with this place.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Always delicious and fresh!!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: The pork belly soup is always great!! Very attentive service staff!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Interesting menu and tasty preparation of both cocktails and food.  One our our favorite restaurants in Raleigh.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Everything was fantastic. Our server was able to answer all of our questions about the menu and give suggestions. Everything we ordered was delicious. Made for a fantastic date night

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Exceptional food, service, and atmosphere!  Highly Recommend.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: The food was absolutely fantastic and the service was superb. Will most definitely come back.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Diana was a great server.  Very attentive and made sure our dietary needs were met and that our food was spectacular.  Our table was ready on time as per our reservation.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Fantastic as usual.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Will absolutely be back!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Beyond superb service. What makes this place good is how knowledgable the servers are on the food. All these questions they can answer so clearly and simply. The food quality is always superb. The ambiance was great.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: ALWAYS WONDERFUL! HAVE BEEN HERE MANY TIMES AND NEVER DISAPPOINTED.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We had an absolutely fabulous time. Ross was very attentive, informative and friendly, and the food was phenomenal! Bida never ceases to amaze!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: I had been looking forward to dinner at Bida Manda and I was not disappointed! Food and service were amazing and I would happily go back!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We thoroughly enjoyed Bida Manda! We started with the Lettuce cups and the Summer Rolls. Both were outstanding. I planned to have the Chicken Curry and at the last moment changed my mind and ordered the Green Papaya Salad with flat iron steak. I am so glad I did! The steak was perfectly cooked and the green papaya was crisp and refreshing. My dinning companion ordered the Basil Stir-fry with Tofu. She said it was the best she had ever had! The prices were good too.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Bida Manda became our favorite restaurant from our first visit. The staff and service are always top notch, the food never ever disappoints and the attention to detail in the entire experience is first class. We love this place so much.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We were sat early for our late reservation which was great! Our server was so sweet and very knowledgeable of each menu item. The food was amazing, each bite was better than the last!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: food was unique and delicious. Service was fantastic

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Delicious, quality food. We enjoyed the ramen, lettuce wraps, and spring roll very much. Our services was also wonderful.  Would highly recommend (make a reservation)!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Waiter was amazing and so helpful! Loved it!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Dinner was incredible! Our server was wonderful! The guests next to us were a bit loud and in a heated discussion but we still had a delicious dinner

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Always enjoy Bida Manda!  Original, special, tasty food and OUTSTANDING service!  Helps to book in advance.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Bida Manda is always a great choice for excellent food and service.  It was, of course, full at lunchtime but still got great service.  I had not been there for several years since the first year it opened.  I was a little disappointed at the lack of originality in the food  (quality was great) which seemed much like regular Vietnamese.  My memory was that the menu was more original and authentic with their mother's recipes.  Pad Tai, Pho and Spring Rolls are not what I expect from them.

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: It’s been essentially the same menu for years, and yet the meals never disappoint.  Absolutely love the rice wraps, curry, and sea bass.  The room is a little loud but not so much that we wouldn’t want to go back!  One of our favorite restaurants in the Raleigh/Cary area, and apparently we share the same feelings with a lot of other people!

Name: Bida Manda Restaurant and Bar
Comment: It was great! The food and atmosphere are amazing!

Name: Bones
Comment: I have been going to Bones for over 20 years and it never disappoints...best steakhouse in Atlanta!

Name: Bones
Comment: We went to Bones for a birthday dinner and they had the table decorated with “happy birthday” confetti. It was a nice surprise and the service was absolutely amazing! If we needed anything they took care of it instantly. It was our first time there and we will definitely be back!

Name: Bones
Comment: Always an awesome meal!

Name: Bones
Comment: Incredible food Great atmosphere Knowledgeable and professional staff All staff wore masks and felt safe.

Name: Bones
Comment: Great experience

Name: Bones
Comment: Our first visit to Bones and it was everything we expected and more.  We were celebrating our anniversary and the staff did a great job of recognizing that and taking great care of us.  All the food recommendations were spot on and we enjoyed two appetizers, soup, salad and shared the porterhouse steak.  Nice touch from the beginning with complimentary champagne until the end with a dessert treat.  Great overall job by an awesome restaurant!  Thank you!!

Name: Bones
Comment: Great food and the absolute best service!  Must try for Atlanta steakhouses!

Name: Bones
Comment: We had another delightful experience at Bones. Peirce was our server and he was very attentive and personable. Our meal was delicious. We are thankful Bones has Re-opened after Covid !

Name: Bones
Comment: This restaurant was great.. food was great.. waiter was great.

Name: Bones
Comment: ABSOLUTELY OUTSTANDING, always my go to for STEAKS , jus love love love BONES

Name: Bones
Comment: great food at wonderful service they treat you great

Name: Bones
Comment: Fantastic service.  Outstanding steaks. And the truffle mashed potatoes were DIVINE!  Thank you for a great evening.

Name: Bones
Comment: It was one of the best meals I have had in a longtime!!

Name: Bones
Comment: Incredible, as always! Bones never disappoints! Had a wonderful Father's Day family meal in a cozy private dining room - fabulous service and food! Such a treat! LOVE THIS PLACE!

Name: Bones
Comment: From beginning to end.. the service wonderful. Took my husband for father's day... He enjoyed every bit of it.

Name: Bones
Comment: Bones was fantastic from start to finish.  The seafood was excellent, both hot and cold, and the steaks were wonderful.  The A4 Japanese Wagyu was a highlight, along with the New York strip among the more budget friendly options.  The flourless chocolate cake was a particularly good dessert.You can’t go wrong here.  Highly recommend.

Name: Bones
Comment: After almost 40 years Bone's still doesn't disappoint. Service and food were both great. Bone's still has the best prepared steak in the US.

Name: Bones
Comment: Excellent food coupled with outstanding service makes for a dining experience that has not disappointed me in over 20 years. Bones is the go to restaurant in  the southeastern United States. They have no competitors that match ambiance, highly succulent food and service fit for royalty.

Name: Bones
Comment: Can’t go wrong here. Still as fine a steak place there is!

Name: Bones
Comment: Family was seated immediately upon arrival. Staff was warm and welcoming, yet very professional. Food was very good. Add on portion could be larger, but everything else is fine.

Name: Bones
Comment: Bones was outstanding.  It always is.  Service is always terrific and the food is sensational.  Whenever a family holiday comes along, we head for Bones.

Name: Bones
Comment: We were promptly seated. Servers were attentive, however there were a couple improperly wearing facial coverings. Recommend not placing entrees until ready. The server asked for our entree order stating the meal would be spaced, however the main entree arrived prior to the wine. The steaks were cooked perfectly and the corn pudding delicious. Would recommend Bones to anyone visiting Atlanta.

Name: Bones
Comment: Thanks for the great service!!! Food was great!My son says thanks for making his graduation dinner a meal to remember!

Name: Bones
Comment: Husband’s Birthday.

Name: Bones
Comment: We always come to Bones for special occasions, anniversary, birthdays, special visits etc. it is such a great experience!

Name: Bones
Comment: Waiter gave good suggestions and was as good as you would want. Anticipated our needs but not in the way. A nice birthday dessert was a complete surprise. Plan to go back soon. Good Covid distancing and safety measures taken by staff.

Name: Bones
Comment: Everyone was so accommodating for A birthday!

Name: Bones
Comment: Great food bisque was excellent as well as lamb chops

Name: Bones
Comment: Superb as always. The two month closure has not impacted in any way the superior food and service that are the hallmark of this establishment. It just gets better...

Name: Bones
Comment: Awesome service and outstanding steaks!!! Best in ATL!!

Name: Bones
Comment: Servers are extremely knowledgeable regarding the menu. Excellent bone-in filet! We'll be back!

Name: Bones
Comment: Have been here several times when in Atlanta. Service and food are always excellent. Probably my favorite place to eat.

Name: Bones
Comment: Wonderful as always. Food was the best ever with spectacular service.

Name: Bones
Comment: Always a terrific experience at Bones.  We go for special occasions (birthdays and anniversaries) and bring a nice bottle of wine, although their selection is extensive.  Service is impeccable too.

Name: Bones
Comment: We celebrate birthdays and anniversaries at Bones, and for the first time since the pandemic, were able to come for dinner.  It was as good, if not better than ever.  The Bones staff has managed to balance caution and attention to patron's safety without sacrificing Bones service or skimping out on some of the smaller things that make them so unique (like confetti on the table for a birthday!).  So happy they are open again - they will always be our favorite restaurant!

Name: Bones
Comment: Thank you for re-opening your dining room.  This is the only restaurant experience that my family has experienced without being reminded of empty tables and Covid restrictions. A professional restaurant like Bones can survive WELL.Thank You The Dobson family.

Name: Bones
Comment: Great service, great atmosphere and great food, still at the top of their game after 40+ years.

Name: Bones
Comment: Fantastic service, friendly environment, waiter was awesome. Gave us a special touch for my daughters 21st birthday.

Name: Bones
Comment: The standard by which every steakhouse anywhere should be judged. Bone’s always satisfies. They perfectly cook everything and the wine list offers a multitude of selection across varietals and budgets. If you haven’t been here yet, don’t tarry, make a reservation and enjoy what you’ve been missing.

Name: Bones
Comment: A wonderful experience every time.  Everyone has a way of making you feel special.  The food and wine speaks for itself.  Excellent! Best best of all worlds.

Name: BONDST
Comment: We were super happy with all the food (especially the tuna tarts & miso seabass) until the sushi arrived. You could feel that the fish was good but they simply did not know how to make proper sushi. There was way too much rice which was also over-cooked and the fish was not sliced thin enough. Also, the service was very bad. They walked around yawning and didn't even care to ask us how the food was.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Food was amazing. Staff was polite. Unfortunately, on a slow Saturday night (COVID-19 week), it took us almost 3 hours to get through appetizers, entrees, and dessert. Food came out verrrrrry slowly (there was only 2 of us). Otherwise, amazing and delicious experience!

Name: BONDST
Comment: Food was amazing and ambiance was nice-very dark so extremely hard to read menu.  Our service was so unkind.  She seemed to be doing us a favor by waiting on us and wasnt happy that we didnâ€™t order more food.  Even my daughters commented about her and they are quite  easygoing.  Would definitely go back.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Best restaurant in NYC.  Hands down.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Best sushi place I visited since my travel in Japan. I would call this Sushi nouveau- wonderful modern takes on classic sushi dishes with amazing presentation.

Name: BONDST
Comment: They were very accommodating for a large group , service was outstanding. I did expect the food to be better. Menu reads great just think a lack of execution on some of the items. We got a lot of apps to share and most of us felt the food was bland.

Name: BONDST
Comment: BONDST is one of my favorite restaurants in NYC. The restaurant is really nice and the food is amazing.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Amazing! Loved the entire experience.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Very disappointed in 8-course Omakasi  for a steep price of $150.  First course was a tiny oyster which was embarassing.  Last course before dessert was vegetable soup that was so bland it tasted like dishwater and everyone left it.  Poor value, only 3 or 3 items were excellent.  Very disappointing to say the least.

Name: BONDST
Comment: I always have a wonderful experience at Bond St. The food is consistently great! My favorite is the Chilean Sea Bass. I usually do a shared ordering experience so that everyone I bring can try that dish and it is always a favorite! This was my first dining experience in the upstairs dining area, it was nice.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Had a great time, good server, yummy sushi

Name: BONDST
Comment: Food is excellent!  Great vibe. Canâ€™t wait to go back.
