Name: BONDST
Comment: Always so delicious - food never disappoints!

Name: BONDST
Comment: Amazing food and ambiance

Name: BONDST
Comment: Bond Sushi is 5 star service from the moment you arrive to the moment you exit.  The food is exquisite and so very tasty.  The sushi is fresh and delicious.  The ambience is sexy and classy.  Highly recommend.

Name: BONDST
Comment: great service and very accommodating. Food was on point and the drinks are amazing

Name: BONDST
Comment: The service is impeccable and our meal was fantastic !

Name: BONDST
Comment: Excellent food!  Would recommend it to friends. Enjoyed going with my adult children.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Absolutely delicious as always - fresh, innovative dishes

Name: BONDST
Comment: Let me start by saying we ate here for Valentines day last year and that was probably the best meal i've ever experienced.  So, maybe it was high expectations, but we came again for Valentines last weekend and it was not the same.  The food was mostly pretty good, but certainly not great.  The things i described as wanting from the last time were far off from what the waiter recommended this time.  In general, it was a very disappointing meal.  don't get me wrong, i wouldn't say the food was bad, but for this level (and price) of restaurant, it needs to be great.  Last year i'd give it 5-stars, but this year only 2-stars.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Amazing ambiance and the food was to die for. Downstairs was hype and upstairs was elegant. I canâ€™t say enough good things about this place. We were treated so good. Loved the rose petals on the table for Valentineâ€™s Day. The little box they give you at the end with raspberry white chocolate almonds soo good too.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Waited 45 minutes between drinks, appetizers, and meal on valentines day. I will give them credit that they took apps off my bill, but that really wasnâ€™t acceptable and they acknowledged that. Overall, food was amazing but an awful experience and I wonâ€™t go back. This is my first review and for great food it shows how awful it was

Name: BONDST
Comment: Amazing food and amazing service! Booking again right now after I write this review!

Name: BONDST
Comment: This restaurant never disappoints.  Everything was perfect.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Amazing dinner, exceptional service and a night to remember!

Name: BONDST
Comment: It is really cold in the back room, otherwise love everything about BONDST

Name: BONDST
Comment: We had the 8 course tasting menu, delicious food, artistic presentation and good service.   We would definitely return to try the rest of the menu.

Name: BONDST
Comment: Not pressuring when ordering, gave us enough time to choose and advised us really well.

Name: BONDST
Comment: BONDST was overall a good experience. I think that the amount and quality of the sushi we had was not quite worth the price. I understand paying for the cool atmosphere but the sushi prices are just a bit high.

Name: BONDST
Comment: I love this restaurant. Every time I come itâ€™s just great ambience, great food, and amazing service. A little pricey so deserving of a special occasion but completely worth it!!

Name: BONDST
Comment: Best dish on the menu is by far the Tuna Tart but the overall experience just wasnâ€™t there for me.

Name: BONDST
Comment: really great food -- imaginative preparations of excellent ingredients with fabulous flavorsvery warm and attentive service jumpin scene with noise to go along, but lots of good feelings all around because all the patrons are so happy with their food and drink

Name: BONDST
Comment: Best sushi ever!

Name: BONDST
Comment: There are SO many features to BondSt that make it my #1 go-to sushi restaurant: the warm greeting, the atmosphere, the incredible staff, the delicious menu and of course, the fantastic cocktails.  Even though, I have been a faithful patron for over 8 years, I still am discovering items on the menu that I haven't had yet.  Case in point: the sundried tomato, avocado roll with garlic ponzu oil and green tea salt.....in a word, FABULOUS!!Chef Mark Spitzer is an absolute genius!  Two weeks ago, I 'discovered' the Sake 'Braised' Short Ribs with Miso Daikon, Roasted Fuji Apple and Red Shiso Sauce.I promise you that whatever you order at BondSt will bring you joy!!

Name: BONDST
Comment: Favorite spot

Name: BONDST
Comment: Best restaurant in nyc! I been saying this for 15 years!

Name: BONDST
Comment: Food is fab

Name: BONDST
Comment: Best bartender in nyc.  Tom Wycus

Name: BONDST
Comment: The food is creative but not matching the taste . We could use more friendly waiting staff . Not a memorable meal . We came to celebrate the Lunar New Year .

Name: BONDST
Comment: Those Big Eye Tuna Tarts are fantastic, the sushi was great, and the spicy shrimp appetizer were chronic

Name: Buccan
Comment: Buccan never disappoints... always the best 👍

Name: Buccan
Comment: Social distancing in place, we felt very comfortable! And the food, so delish, can’t wait to go back! They are offering menu items from their neighboring store, Imoto, so we were able to try their food as well! I can’t say enough good things, everything was perfect

Name: Buccan
Comment: Food there is always diverse and delicious! Servers seemed a little overwhelmed but who could blame them in times like these!

Name: Buccan
Comment: Incredible food. Tuna crisps. Burrata & Peaches. Short Rib Empanadas. California Roll. Sweet Corn Agnolotti. Pea Tortellini. Fresh Baked Cookies. Supplemented by copious amounts of vino. Highly recommend all dishes above — wait staff were friendly, attentive and accommodating. Will absolutely be back again.

Name: Buccan
Comment: I dont normally write reviews but this was one of the best meals we’ve ever had. Our waiter was amazing and the experience overall was great. Would highly suggest.

Name: Buccan
Comment: The hostess could be a little more respectful and kind. Condescending isn’t the best welcome into an establishment.

Name: Buccan
Comment: We loved this restaurant!! The food was amazing. The service was excellent. It was very special.

Name: Buccan
Comment: As usual, a great experience in every way.  Food, service, atmosphere were all outstanding.  It’s the only restaurant in the Covid era that we feel comfortable dining inside. Masks, gloves, cleanliness and social distancing procedures are all meticulously maintained.  They are an example all restaurants should follow.

Name: Buccan
Comment: It was our anniversary and Father’s Day. The receptionist read my note allowing us to come at 7 PM instead of 5:30 PM. My mother-in-law has dementia and it gave us more time to feed her before we had to leave our house. It was our first visit and it won’t be our last. The mixed drinks, appetizers and entrees were unique and delicious. It was our pleasure to eat at your fine establishment, thanks for a wonderful evening.

Name: Buccan
Comment: This place is a gem.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Amazing food and delicious cocktails, amazing service. Hands down my favorite restaurant on palm beach island. Even have had delicious takeout during covid.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Buccan is one of the safest restaurants I have been to during this pandemic.  They are awesome!!!  You will totally safe.  Everyone is wearing gloves and masks and the tables are more than 6' apart.  Not to mention the food is always amazing!!!

Name: Buccan
Comment: We absolutely loved our experience at Buccan. Great atmosphere and service, excellent food. The agnolotti stands out as particularly delicious, and the watermelon martinis were killer.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Spectacular. Food and service

Name: Buccan
Comment: Love it. Great food and atmosphere.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Amazing food and service! This is our favorite restaurant in Palm Beach!

Name: Buccan
Comment: Fantastic is always.  One of our favorite restaurants anywhere.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Enjoyed a nice dinner. Service was outstanding.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Another fantastic experience at Buccan.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Buccan was a pleasure as always! Spacing and cleanliness have been made paramount for the new normal and the menu is, as always, amazing!

Name: Buccan
Comment: Amazing! Everything was delicious.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Always amazing

Name: Buccan
Comment: They never disappoint! A very special dining experience an always go back for the steak tartare! Best I’ve ever had!!

Name: Buccan
Comment: Everything was outstanding, I have never been disappointed since I started dining here over 5 years ago.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Amazing food, great service and beautiful location

Name: Buccan
Comment: Food was spectacular. Service was also amazing. Not cheap but worth it

Name: Buccan
Comment: Excellent food and great service. Will return soon.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Great anniversary ! 3rd year in a row

Name: Buccan
Comment: Excellent food and drinks! Totally worth the drive!

Name: Buccan
Comment: Sushi was amaxing

Name: Buccan
Comment: everything was delicious,  except the waiter forgot 1/2 of my meal that was described on the menue.   would I go back?   YES !!    Hopefully when they are more organized.  I give them the benefit of the doubt because of the times and recently re-opening

Name: Buccan
Comment: It’s always best good, best service in town.And seating was perfectly distanced , also best.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Amazing in every way. Entire staff from hostess to manager to waiter to runner were a pleasure. Food was incredible. Will 100% return.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Always a great experience! With the new social distancing guidelines they had tables spaced out but it was still delicious and a lovely experience. The new Yuzu cocktail is so good!

Name: Buccan
Comment: Best restaurant in FL!

Name: Buccan
Comment: This is one of my Top 5 favorite restaurants of all time. The food is exceptional - book a resi, you won't be disappointed

Name: Buccan
Comment: Not like it used to be. If you can't live up to your old standards, stay close or lower your prices.  The food sucked, especially for the high prices.  Don't rip off the people who support you.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Always wonderful service, exceptional cuisine, and an overall favorite. Delightful.

Name: Buccan
Comment: Great other than the hostess initially trying to seat us on the Imoto side without giving an option or explaining that in advance. Buccan is my favorite go-to when visiting PB, and the Imoto vibe wasn’t what we were wanting. All good with the meal after that point once we got our table at Buccan.

Name: Buccan
Comment: I am glad Buccan is back. Even de reduced menu still brings you classics and some extras from Imoto. Seating is observing guidance for social distancing.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Amazing food and service was outstanding. Would definitely recommend for a romantic date night.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: We enjoy Cafe Monarch for special occasions.  It is a little pricey (we typically spend at least $500 per couple) but it always makes for a memorable evening.  Their garden is terrific with comfortable temperatures even in summer.  All dishes on their 4 course menu are first class.  The staff is second to none. Important, social distancing and face masks are enforced.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: We went for our 30th anniversary.  Everything was spectacular.  Loved to food.  The wine choices that were made for me were very good.  Strongly recommend.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: What's more to say about Cafe Monarch.  The food and service is always outstanding.  Especially impressive during the this pandemic is the extra care they are taking care to give all their guests a safe environment.  All staff are wearing masks. Even the valet was masked and wearing gloves.  They've removed approx 25% of their tables to overly comply with the social distancing guidelines.My wife and I couldn't have felt safer dining in our own home.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: My favorite restaurant in the United States!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Not the best seating, the lamb was very fatty. Otherwise decent experience!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Just not really worth $600 date night

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Excellent food and service!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: This is, non-stop, our favorite restaurant in the PHX area, and it is special enuf for the most special occasion.  We hosted our friend for dinner, and tho she's lived here for over 25 years, this was her first time at Monarch.  It was a truly wonderful evening!  As always, the wait staff (Noah helped us out on this occasion) is knowledgable, attentive and truly seems to enjoy every part of the job at Monarch.  Having been closed due to Covid for 2 months, Noah was ecstatic to be back at work!  The food choices, and willingness of the kitchen to adapt to individual tastes and needs, are marvelous.  We all had the cauliflower soup, which is my perennial favorite 1st course here.  Two of us had the soft-shell crab and our friend had the compressed watermelon salad as the 2nd course, and we all enjoyed every bite.  I had the rib eye and stuffed zucchini blossom next and they had the lobster raviolo and we were all happy.  My entree was the Ahi; they had the seafood with gnocchi and we all agreed we had made excellent choices.  We have learned over time that doing the wine pairings not only provides us with a wonderful opportunity to try new wines, but with the wait staff all being sommeliers, it adds to the evenings drama and pleasure.  Due to our birthday celebration, they treated us to a tasting platter of 3 marvelous desserts - what a sweet, sweet ending to a perfect evening.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Consistently the best meal and restaurant environment we've ever had.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: An absolutely amazing experience for any special occasion. Richard made it an event to remember. We are grateful.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Excellent food and service but a little pricey

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Fantastic experience. Expensive but worth it. The best restaurant in Phoenix/Scottsdale by a wide margin.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Amazing dinner. Wonderful foodWaseem was extraordknaru

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Amazing!!!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Birthday dinner for my husband was perfect.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Best restaurant I’ve eaten at in AZ!!  Cafe Monarch was always good but the new location and restaurant was amazing!!  Best place for a special occasion!!  Exceptional wine list also.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: The absolute best in town!  Food was superb, service was beyond excellent and the ambience is wonderful.  If you haven't tried Cafe Monarch you need to.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: You exceeded all of our expectations. The staff went above and beyond to make it an amazing experience.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: This is the absolute best restaurant that we have found in the Scottsdale area. The unique combinations of flavors in the menu items are truly among the best we have ever had.  The attention from the staff was perfect. On this visit we celebrated my 65th birthday. I was presented with a small trinket box with my dessert complete with a sparkler. When we left I immediately made another reservation. We love Cafe Monarch.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Noah was the best server ever. He made me feel so special for Father’s Day. My wife & I needed this so bad!!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Always an amazing experience here! The staff, atmosphere and food are impeccable! Best thing a mall? They are 100% consistent. Highly recommend!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Fabulous experience!  Service and food were amazing.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Excellent evening to celebrate our anniversary.  We were seated on the back patio, which was very comfortable even in June.  The service was OUTSTANDING!  Everyone we encountered was very polished, professional, polite but yet personable too.  The food was very good, decent portion size so as to not feel stuffed at the meal's conclusion.  There was a party of four women who were seated near us who were a little loud but the staff was very good at addressing it before it became a problem. As good as it was, and we'd love to return, it's not your normal dining venue due to cost; the final price tag is hard to justify other than as a bucket list item (hence the value rating).  This is not meant as a negative, just a reality check for most.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: I had not been to the Cafe Monarch previously, but had high expectation based on the reviews. It turned out to be one of those rare instances in which the reality exceeded the high expectation. The staff are friendly and upbeat, the service is attentive but not intrusive, the menu selections are imaginative, the wine list is more than impressive .  My meal was outstanding and I'd say the experience captured ' fine dining'.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Simply and absolutely Amazing !! No better service in Arizona.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: We went to celebrate a birthday and the service was impeccable. They gave us a few surprises which was so kind. The food is outstanding as well!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: A very very classy evening dinner done to perfection. From the moment you arrive it is obvious this is a top line establishment in decor, staff attentiveness, the table settings, the extra service staff, the comfortable and perfectly spaced seating. Be aware they practice all the social distancing and CDC guidelines with masks, etc. the menu is pre fixe but with several choices at each of the 4 courses. But it is really a 6 or 7 course dining experience if you add their chef’s little tasting, the foie gras that is a MUST, and of course a dessert. An extensive wine by the glass, creative cocktails and special wine pairings are in addition to an even more impressive wine list. Plan on 3 hours of bliss.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Quite possibly the best meal of my life! We celebrated my husband and I getting married this past Saturday. This is our honeymoon trip and we couldn’t be happier having had the opportunity to dine at this spectacular place. The food was incredible, the staff were the kindest, and the ambiance was unforgettable. We will definitely be back!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Finally got the chance to enjoy the cafe monarch experience. It did not disappoint. Courses were perfectly prepared, wine was exceptional and the server was extremely attentive. Definitely lived up to the reputation we have heard from many other friends.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Amazing ambiance, amazing staff, amazing food!

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Great staff start to finish. Very attentive. Good menu choices. Food prepared perfectly.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Our favorite restaurant in Scottsdale. Can't wait to go back.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Richard was amazing, very professional, fun and knowledgeable. The food was second to none, and as promised, we didn't leave hungry. Perfect anniversary dinner. We will be back and definitely highly recommended.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: One of the top fine dining restaurants in Scottsdale, no question.  In Old Town.  It should definit be on your list, so go add it now.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Food and service are excellent with wonderful romantic ambiance. We have been going to Monarch Cafe for several years and it never disappoints. The staff is impeccable and Richard, our favorite among the staff, always provides great service. We highly recommend.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: One our favorite places to go for date night in AZ.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Cafe Monarch is a nice AZ fine dining restaurant with good food.  Service was okay, but did not measure up to the hype.  Our waiter seemed like a super nice guy but forgot which course we were on, tried to pour us the same wine we already had with a previous course, got confused who was having what to eat and seemed nervous and not confident.  For me the service can make or break a dining experience and I am saddened that our service was sub-par for the expectation/price of the meal.  The food was good, but not great.  Cauliflower soup was the best course for everyone.  Mushroom stack, blah, skip it, too greasy, veggie lasagna was over sauced with what tasted like tomato paste.  On the other hand, the cocktails were great!  At the end, we wished we sat at the bar and just ate the soup and drank the cocktails! We all left feeling like we were let down.

Name: Café Monarch
Comment: Wonderful experience! Definitely one of the most romantic dinner environments I’ve ever been too, with unparalleled service, a very courteous and professional staff, absolutely delectable tasting options, and a vast drink and wine menu. Albeit a very costly dinner as a whole, it’s something everyone should try at least once if you are celebrating, looking for a great date night, or just searching for for a quiet, enjoyable and immersive culinary adventure. Top notch

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: We appreciate the consistent quality and it is a long time favorite for us.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: It was my first time and it was worth all the great things I had heard about it.  Can't wait to come back!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: As always, best food in the Midwest!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Delicious food in a Parisian- like setting. Friendly and knowledgeable waitstaff. Wonderful date spot or special occasion venue. We will definitely be back soon!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Always a fabulous artful meal with excellent customer service!  Thank you!!!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: The best restaurant in KC !   Perfect for lunch or dinner....whether for two, alone or a small group.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: food was excellent as usual.  appreciate the attention to virus safety

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Time and time again... the best dining experience in KC.   Fabulous food (try the veal), ambience as genuine as if you were sitting in a France.  Wonderful service.   A joy, every time.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Amazing french restaurant! Service and food were great. We'll go back for sure. Merci beaucoup!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Did the 4 course prix fixe tonight. Smoked salmon, potato salad - crisp potatoes with tasty salmon with a CinsaultCorn bisque, pesto - this wowed us! Sweet and savory with a sparkling white wineSkate wing, brown butter, haricot vert, tomato with a muscadet - what you would expect from one of the best French restaurants in the country! Lemon, cherry and cassis verrine with créme chantilly - excellent finish to a great dinner. Tart cherries... French press coffeeWe had staff did 1/2 glass wine pairings for us. Excellent service. Social distancing done tastefully inside. Only 7 tables and 2 bar seats available. More seating outside with distancing n mind too. All staff wore masks and never lowered them to talk. Love Cafe Provence will continue to return!!!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Great food. The staff was friendly and helpful.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: I adore this beautiful French restaurant! The food is fantastic. The service is exceptional and the ambiance is quaint and transport you to France. I come here often.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Cafe Provence is our favorite place because they always offer the full package dining experience.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: This was our 1st time back after the COVID-19 quarantines. The food was excellent as always. The service was also great

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: We celebrated a birthday and enjoyed a phenomenal meal which made the celebration fantastic!  Flowers had been ordered from a near-by florist and had been delivered for the table!Absolutely perfect!!!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Best french restaurant in kc

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: It was delicious. Outside seating and our server was wonderful.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Cafe Provance never disappoints.  The food is always fantastic.   The service very professional and polished.   We usually do lunch because it's a greater value .

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: I always bring my friends here for a get together or special occasions. Today was for a friend’s birthday. The food and service was exceptional as always. Thank you for making our day special.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Just fabulous as always! My favorite restaurant in town.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Always a beautiful room, immaculate service, and the most amazing food.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: As one of our favorite restaurants, we were so excited n go there for meal.  Food was outstanding and service as always - excellent.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Wonderful experience! Great food and service. Good distancing practices as well.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Thank you!! We are so happy you are open!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Great ambiance and food.   Service was excellent.   Good selection

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Always wonderful!!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Superb as always. So happy to dine in again. Lovely experience.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Cafe Provence has always been one of our favorites and still is at the top of our list.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Best restaurant in the KC area!  We always enjoy the food and fantastic service!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: This is a small family run French restaurant of consistency and quality.  The service is always solid with knowledgeable staff and the right amount of attention.  The food is classic and always delicious.  My only criticism would be for a slightly larger wine list offering some value new world wines.  However I have found their wines by the glass always have something to tempt the palate and support the great food.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Have eaten everything on their menu & everything is fantastic. It's like entering a restaurant in France. It's as good as any French restaurant in the world.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Amazing food and service. Will return.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: My wife and I came here for our anniversary. She had the crab cake and I had the rack of lamb. Both were amazing. Our booth felt intimate and the staff was very courteous. Will be coming again.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: It was odd being in the restaurant with half the tables decorated rather than seating diners due to the county only allowing partial seating but the food was every bit as wonderful as always. The gnocchi with pea puree was easily one of the best dishes I have ever eaten. The halibut was as always perfectly cooked and served with an artichoke, potato puree and a lemon, caper sauce which had a delicious tart flavor tempered by the fresh peas. The service was great as usual and everything was perfect.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: This is my favorite restaurant in theater Kansas City!  It was also our first time to venture out since the pandemic began and the restaurant takes all precautions and has social distancing in practice!  Bravo to Cafe Provence!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Perfect lunch for our first outing. Food was top notch. Excellent service.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Enjoyed “opening” evening since the restaurant shutdown in March 2020!   Absolutely a wonderful experience.  Food excellent - as always!  Can’t wait to go back.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Tables are close together. Waitstaff has to be nimble. Overall excellent place for great French food. Good wine selections too.

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Cafe Provence is my favorite restaurant, I used to go a lot and haven't been in 1.5 years. I went back on Saturday and it was as amazing as ever. Very excited for the opening of their new restaurant "Verbena" to open in the Meadowbrooks Development on 95th and Nall this April!!

Name: Cafe Provence
Comment: Fabulous food wonderful atmosphere!!  Great service! I’ll take one of everything to go please.

Name: Charleston
Comment: A very elegant dining experience. Menu has the best gourmet offerings one could desire!  Worth the price!!

Name: Charleston
Comment: Eating here is an event and is sublime from start to finish.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Always a pleasure. Fine wines. Pricey, but worth it for special occasions. Portions are small (tasting) but magnificent.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Excellent as always!  Bartender was exceptionally knowledgeable, and food was fantastic

Name: Charleston
Comment: Food & service is great , worth the price.Best experience

Name: Charleston
Comment: Very good food; average to good service; a bit noisy.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Wonderful service, outstanding food. A great dining experience!!!!

Name: Charleston
Comment: Charleston is one of the top tier restaurants in the mid Atlantic region.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Outstanding food preparation. First rate wine list.Impeccable service.Elegant comfortable ambience.For special occasions.

Name: Charleston
Comment: This was the most amazing meal my wife and I ever had. Special occasions become elevated dining in a place like this. We were incredibly happy with our experience

Name: Charleston
Comment: The food is always good. The location is great and the view of the water you can't beat.

Name: Charleston
Comment: BEST FOOD, BEST SERVICE, BEST DINING EXPERIENCE EVER!!!

Name: Charleston
Comment: Excellent food! One of the best spots in Baltimore.

Name: Charleston
Comment: My favorite restaurant!  I love the way the menu is presented with no categories.

Name: Charleston
Comment: By far, the best restaurant in Baltimore.  Cindy Wolf is a creative genius.  She  also keeps the restaurant performing like a well-choreographed dance.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Outstanding menu, wine selection, and service.  An experience not to be missed.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Wonderful for a special occasion. Food, service, and ambiance are all outstanding.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Best place for a romantic night out or special occasion with amazing food, and great service.  The lobster curry bisque or the she crab soup are both delicious.  Local and fresh ingredients are used.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Outstanding food and impeccable service.  What else do you need?!! The perfect place to celebrate a special occasion and now a more casual dining opportunity in the bar.  Charleston is expensive, but worth every penny!

Name: Charleston
Comment: Formality reigns with kindness and gentleness!  Delicious dining experience.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Special occasions with wife. Always more special here at Charleston.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Memorable food experience. We went for a special birthday, and the meal lived up to the hype and the price. They pay attention to details and you feel special about being in the beautiful place eating gorgeous and delicious food.

Name: Charleston
Comment: I've been here twice for special occasions and absolutely love it.  The food is spectacular and the service is outstanding.  Completely worth it.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Cindy Wolf's oldest is still her best and food shines at Charleston

Name: Charleston
Comment: Cindy Wolf knows how to run a restaurant.  Charleston has been renovated since it's inception but there was never a time the food wasn't top notch. Innovate and delicious.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Some of the finest food and service in the area.  The best sauces and selections of foods.  Super wine list and pairings.  High quality everything.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Great restaurant wonderful food and service never had a bad meal.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Baltimore's finest restaurant. Every detail is perfect, from the drinks, food, service, and decor.  Pricy but worth a visit.

Name: Charleston
Comment: It has been several years since I ate there but it remains the best restaurant/meal/evening I have had to date.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Definitely a special occasion spot, never disappointed, exceptional food and service.

Name: Charleston
Comment: So here's the thing. The food wasn't bad. It was good. It just wasn't $500+ for two people good. My husband and I have been to exceptional Michelin star/bib gourmand restaurants in the United states, UK, and elsewhere. These places provide you with an excellent experience and fantastic food that we feel are worth the amount they charge. The bottom line for us was the service was nice, the food was good, but it was absolutely not worth how much we paid especially when compared to world class restaurants that charge nearly HALF the price for an unforgettable experience. Not for us.

Name: Charleston
Comment: The portions were very small and very rich.  I ordered a filet mignon medium and got rare,  The cheesecake for dessert was the size of an ice cube.  The service was outstanding.  Overall, it was nice; but I did not consider it a good value.

Name: Charleston
Comment: We hadn't been to the Charleston for many years.  We were not disappointed.  It was a wonderful experience.  The food was great and the service was superb.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Baltimore institution. Wine bar with most delicious food in the world.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Fantastic private dinner for 16.  I will return whenever I'm in Baltimore.

Name: Charleston
Comment: A top notch experience from start to finish!

Name: Charleston
Comment: Best Restaurant ever!! Wonderful experience all around!!! A must when visiting Baltimore.

Name: Charleston
Comment: One of my favorite restaurants! My wife and I frequent Charleston celebrating many momentous occasions and the New Year's menu is always extra special.  Charleston is one the best restaurants in the United States. Everything is perfection. I have had the pleasure of dining here many times and it always amazes. The lamb I had here recently was the best preparation I have ever eaten. The truffle soup with foie gras I had recently is something I'll be thinking about for many months. Quiet honestly you just have to eat try the diversity of the menu to experience it. No review could describe quality and taste of food or does justice to all the flavors. You just have to eat it!   A true culinary experience. The service is truly professional and friendly.  No better way to start a new year.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Imho the only destination in Baltimore for true fine dining. Opt for the pairing menu to get the most out of most food and wine.

Name: Charleston
Comment: Dinner was outstanding from start to finish. Great service and great food.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Closed. No reservation confirmation. Went to Anson instead

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Best crab cake ever!!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: We really enjoyed our dinner!  Taylor introduced himself as our server and that Steve would be assisting him, however we had at least 2 others assisting. The service was outstanding! We did the the 6 course, my husband did it with the wine pairing. They were very generous with the wine, there were a few wines that he really enjoyed and he was offered a 2nd pour. Food was very good and Taylor was very helpful in helping us choose the selections for the courses.The restaurant also had a jazz type band, they played at just the right volume so that you could enjoy the music and still have conversation.If this restaurant was located close to our home, it would become a "go to" for us!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Always a pleasure to dine at the Grill. The staff was outstanding and every morsel was delicious.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Food was great. We are vegetarian and there were enough options for me and my husband. They are very kind people and they have a fantastic service.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Great service and very good food.Wine selection was superb.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Food and service was outstanding! I am looking foward to sharing great times with friends and family here.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: We went to Charleston Grill for our anniversary. They treated us so well and the food was outstanding!  My wife felt it was one of the best dinners she had ever had!!  What a very special night for us. Every aspect of the dinner was perfect!!  Great serving and great taste!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Amazing highly recommend this dinner!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Just an amazing perfect meal!  Came for a girls weekend and this meal and our server Adam were truly a highlight of the trip.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: It was fantastic! Highly recommend and would definitely come back.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: If you’re looking for superb service and delicious cuisine - look no further. Make your reservation now. Every request was accommodated with a smile, from our preferred seating to the pace of our meal. Our waiter, Jerry, was personable and knowledgeable. He went out of his way to make sure we had a perfect experience. It felt like we were the only guests in the restaurant. We are excited to return.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Great food, great service, very attentive to our 2 year old granddaughter!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Great date night location! Love music until after closing time, great drinks and a variety to choose from. Service and food was outstanding, can’t wait to go back!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Absolutely fabulous dinner, from start to finish! Great wines also.... cannot wait to go back!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Have stayed at the Belmond several times.  This is our second time dining at Charleston Grill located on the property.   The service was exceptional and the food was awesome.   We had the crab cake and I must say one of the best I have had.  My husband had the oysters.  I had the flounder and it was delicious.   Next time will definitely try the tasting menu!! Can’t wait to return.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Spectacular evening!  We did the tasting menu and wine pairing.  Food was delicious and wait staff impeccable!  A must if wanting a fine dining true experience!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Last night in Charleston was the best dining experience we had all week!  Amazing food, outstanding service, and quiet and romantic ambiance.  Everything we could have asked for in a dinner date!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Everything was excellent!  My husband had the steak and said it was one of the best he had and I had the linguine and enjoyed every bite.  Bread offerings were great and drinks were wonderful!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Wonderful meal, great ambiance and excellent music for the occasion

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Nice food, expensive, and where are the young clients?.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: The service and wine list were great, but we were both disappointed with the food. We ordered oysters and the 4 course tasting menu. They weren’t kidding about tasting, we did not get much, what we did get was not very impressive, definitely not worth it. I would not go back or recommend it.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: It was our belated Valentines dinner. We especially enjoyed the little extra touches: the treats after dinner, coffee from a french press, etc. Service and food was excellent.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Got off to a very slow start waiting for our drinks. They were not as good as we’ve had elsewhere. We did the chefs choice tasting  - amazing crab cake. Everything else was nice but very rich. We all had stomach issues later in the night.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: We went for my husband’s birthday dinner.  The staff treated us so well & made it very special!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Amazing food and service!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Outstanding food and service. The crab cake was the best I have ever had(and I have had many)!  We will definitely be back!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Fantastic food and service - would highly recommend!!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Lovely food and service. Excellent selection of white Burgundy. Order the crab cakes!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: A great dining experience...………………………………………………………………………...

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Amazing food!! Great service. wonderful dessert. A bit pricey, but well worth it.I'd recommend this as one of the great restaurants anywhere.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Wonderful evening celebrating our 30th Anniversary!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Overall attention to detail and high quality of food and service

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Everything was wonderful. The Williams Duo music was fantastic!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Amazing wine list, including half a page of vintage champagne

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: We love the food! The restaurant is beautiful and the valet service wonderful, but the food is the star.I always order the caviar and am never disappointed. We also ordered the sunchoke side to share, and it was the best thing I have literally ever eaten. Amazing. In addition, the service is great and you will leave full, as the wait staff brings snacks along the way throughout your experience. Even cute little dessert bites.Definitely in my top two places to eat in Charleston.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Great food and service.  The staff was attentive and responsive to our every need.  Charleston Grill is one of our favorite dining stops in the city.

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: My wife’s birthday and the meal and evening were fantastic, great food, superb service!

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Excellent in all aspects. The hydroponically grown salad leaves were delicious and great to see the current technologies being brought to the table for our enjoyment

Name: Charleston Grill
Comment: Wonderful in all ways. Crab cake was amazing!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Ice Cold Martini, Chilled Rosè, Excellent Soft Shell Crabs! Wonderful Chicken Liver Mousse (would love the recipe) served with piping hot toasted baguette.  The service was performed perfectly with facemasks and little contact.  A beautiful D.C. summer evening on a romantic outdoor patio. Couldn't ask for more.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Awesome place.  I would recommend this place to a friend..

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: My friend and I arrived (both women) and were seated at a 2 top not on the patio but outside of it. We were both wearing nice dresses. A young couple directly after us was seated inside the patio at a nice 4 top. She was wearing jeans and a crop top; he was wearing shorts and a tee shirt - both had on tennis shoes. They were 20 years younger and were given a better table. They were in and out within an hour. My friend and I had a cocktail, a bottle of wine, appetizers, our main course and desert (that the waiter didn’t bother to take out of the “to go” container.) I’ve definitely had better service. The food was outstanding but the service was lacking.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Had inside table which was great due to a/c on a humid DC night!  The dining room was atmospheric and quietly elegant.  Our server Torrance was awesome, and very helpful when deciding what to order.  I had duck confit which was amazing, 2 others had the steak & frites which they said was excellent, and one other had the burger which he couldn't finish because it was so big!  But he said it was delicious.  Nice pre-dinner cocktail menu.  I had the Pimms cup which was yummy.  Nice touch was that we didn't order any desserts, but were sent home with 2 complimentary small chocolate cakes to share.  We will definitely be back!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: We returned to Chez BS after a long hiatus from any restaurant dining.  CBS had just opened the week previous and only outside on their patio.  The patio/alley is more than comfortable and real feels like vacation.  CBS has installed wonderful overhead awnings that are both handsome and practical.  We enjoyed our meal and were sent home with desert fixings - 2nd week open no desert menu yet.  We loved our father's day meal at 6:30.  No rushing - good a service and fine food.  BTW - our last meal out before the CV 19 shutdown was at Chez BS so we did a bit of a loop.  Best to all! Stay safe and we certainly felt that way last Sunday.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Delicious food and very attentive service, particularly during a very challenging time. Good to be able to dine there again!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: All tables are now seated outside and on a beautiful evening it is really special. One of the best Caesar saladsI’ve ever had and I recommend the trout and soft shells. Post shutdown, our server seemed especially pleased to have customers. Can’t wait to go back. Tip them generously bc they’ve been out of work!!!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Delicious meal and outstanding service in their patio.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Chez Billy Sud was recommended to us as a great place for a quiet family birthday dinner, great ambiance, excellent food and for just being a perfect place for French dining. It had all that and met all expectations and more. The staff are super friendly. I wish the inside seating opened soon. It is filled with vintage things, there's an old woodburning fireplace and it just smells incredibly. Definitely looking forward to coming back.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: It was so great to get back to Chez Billy Sud a few days after they re-opened. The staff here does such a great job and it was great to see them after all this time. We sat out on the patio and the weather was perfect! The food - soft shell crabs - just outstanding!! Still the best soft shells in the city! Love this restaurant. Looking forward to coming back soon!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Always fantastic! Currently, they have a limited patio menu but it is still delicious.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Absolutely the best preparation and presentation. For me, THE go-to special occasion place.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Service was amazing. I would definitely go back with friends the scene is great! Perfect for a quick French bite or drinks with friends.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Wonderful service as they opened back up. Lovely!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Exceptional. The dining room, the ambiance, the meal, the service - bravo! Thank you, Debra and Chez Billy Sud, for a delightful evening.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: A great little intimate and delicious restaurant. Steak and mussels were wonderful, as was the Caesar salad.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Just a perfect date night spot. Cosy bistro seating. Super friendly staff. Tasty dishes, both seasonal offerings and French classics. We will be back!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Great experience. Service and food were fantastic. Great atmosphere for date night.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Chez Billy was amazing!! I can’t say enough good things about our experience. The food was amazing. The ambiance is perfect, very quaint and chic. Will be back !!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Fantastic food and ambience!  We will definitely come back.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: In my opinion, it's the best overall French restaurant in DC.  Yes, better than Le Dip.  But please don't go, as I don't want it to get any harder for me to get a table here.  Service is always attentive and professional.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: The three of us had trout, tuna, and salmon, all was excellent.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Beautiful little French restaurant in Georgetown with gorgeous interior and perfect menu. Went to brunch and every detail is magnificent!  Service attentive and friendly. The Niçoise salad was delicious and be sure to sample the beignets.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Chez Billy Sud is a true neighborhood restaurant that works well for either a casual night out or a more special date night. The food is always on point and the execution is true to the classics. Nothing is 're-imagined' or 'interpreted', just technically cooked extremely well. Our server (whose name I didn't catch, regretfully) was tremendous and seemed to be handling 1/2 the dining room incredibly graciously. We had drinks at 3 different restaurants during our night, and the ones at Chez billy Sud were the most consistently executed and well-balanced. Consistency is a sadly overlooked attribute when everyone wants to be 'new' but Chez Billy Sud continues to exemplify the idea that care and execution are the real drivers of success. We'll absolutely be back, especially for the patio and rose in the summer / spring.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: This is an 'casual' vibe but upscale French restaurant, elegant, charming, with impeccable service.  The food is outstanding.  Highly recommended.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Dining experience was spectacular as always. Party included a 90 year old. Service was courteous. Noise level low as we were seated in small front room having few tables, and tables wee well spaced.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: We came for lunch at 12:30 on Saturday and it was EXTREMELY noisy.  It finally quieted down later.My salad was good once they cooked the tuna a little more.  The waiter could have been more attentive.  He seemed to disappear at times.  We thought it was odd that they don't offer espresso or cappuccino.  Maybe simplicity is better for them, but we thought it was a bit inhospitable. He said there were so many coffee places nearby... Not a big problem.  Overall, it was a very nice lunch.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: This was a wonderful evening out from the warm bread served with the salads and appetizers to the complimentary champagne that came with dessert  (the attentive waitress had figured out there was a birthday being celebrated). The mussels were particularly delicious, and my husband and I loved the sea bass with fennel. Lovely.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Great experience!!!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Amazing experience - perfect table!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Wonderful restaurant. Great food in great area. Service was excellent too.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: The croque madame was good, not great--too bread-y and not enough gooey stuff. But the caesar salad was one of the best I've had in a long time, the burger and fries were very good, and the  cotes-du-Rhone--new to the menu as our wonderful server told us--was a lovely choice. The sweet, light-filled and calm ambiance of the restaurant is a welcome respite in trying times, and we'll definitely go back.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Excellent dinner for a celebration with my mother!

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: The beef cheeks were great!  My wife steak was ordered medium rare and came medium to well done.  A new steak prepared which was burnt on the bottom but cooked to medium rare.  The frites were a complete failure.  This is a high end restaurant.  Those frites should have never made it past the kitchen doors.  They were limp, oily and had no seasoning.  At that point the wine bottle was finished and I had finished my meal so we decided to not complain further but pay the bill and go home.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: The food is not consistent. I have come here a few times and generally order the same dishes like the trout and the escargot each visit. The fish was totally over cooked and dry this time. It seemed deep fried and flavorless. In the past it was not this way. The escargot dish was mostly puff pastry and mushrooms, barely any escargot (and for $22?!). The staff is a bit fussy so good luck trying to get something redone.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Traditional bistro style menu with offerings that few restaurants continue to provide.  Very fine meal.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Don’t usually take the time to write reviews but we had such a great time last night celebrating my fathers 72nd birthday I felt compelled to share our experience. Place was a little noisier than expected but it’s hard to get super quiet during peak dinner hours and my dad is hard of hearing anyhow. Food was amazing, we enjoyed the Allen Brothers steak, Duck confit and Ahi Tuna for entrees. The chicken liver mousse and the country pate’s for appetizers were amazing. Service was impeccable, I can’t remember our waiters name for the life of me but he was a young 23 year old blonde guy and was super personable and on top of his game all night, very attentive but also not overbearing. My husband and I are in the service industry as well and we were super impressed with everything. Props to Chez Billy and the entire FOH & BOH staff for a wonderful night to remember. :)

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Absolutely.  We have been there several times and this was our best experience yet.  The food was really divine, and the service was pleasant and we did not feel rushed.  Too bad the street is so torn up making it difficult to come and go.

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Mom was in town visiting and wanted a nice place to take her. She loved it

Name: Chez Billy Sud
Comment: Great food and great service.  A gem in Georgetown.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Those steaks were super delicious as well as salad, side of veggies and deserts :) It was in the evening a day before all LA restaurants started close and serve only take-out orders. Seemed many customers cancelled reservations, very unusual to see empty tables, dining just few customers. Top class food for sure, at same time cozy and casual atmosphere, I wish they make a little more reasonable prices. Like, 36 oz bone-in ribeye steak was $205 that perfect size to share for 2, $102.50 each person, probably $20-$30 higher than Mastro’s, BOA, etc.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: My experience here was amazing. Great food & impeccable service. We had many things on the menu & they were all exquisitely done. For meats, the Porcini rubbed short ribs are fantastic. If you can afford it, the 36oz Ribeye (or NY Steak) is a must for the table. It was dry aged spectacularly. Truly one of the best steaks in all of LA.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: I don’t know where to start. I arrived and several of my guests preceded me. Their wine has been decanted but no water poured as they waited. After about 5 minutes the waitress appeared and I told her that we would start with champagne, foccacia and salad immediately but she responded that we had to order everything at the same time or the chef wouldn’t even look at the order. So we sat and decided the entire order which I then shared with waitress. I ordered lots of food and then asked if we could order more just in case we wanted more afterwards and was told that it depended on whether or not they needed to turn the table. The sides came out first and after a few minutes we served them and them finally ate them before the meet arrived. I brought the service issue to my servers attention and she then proceeded to avoid me even though I had told her earlier that i was picking up the tab for our party of 6. Empty water glasses and plates left on the table between courses. I flagged down other servers or personnel to get service. It was a rather  unfortunate series of events that made for a less than special evening for the birthday celebration intended.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Extremely disappointed with the steak. My group and I tasted nothing but salt on a $200 bone in. I was excited and looked forward to our visit but I was extremely disappointed with the quality of the food.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Fantastic dining experience! Loved the food and wine. Excellent service. Fun vibe. Very expensive, but felt like a special night out. Would highly recommend!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Our sixth visit was unfortunately our least favorite. We LOVE Chi Spacca. Even this off night was pretty wonderful. That said, we noticed a pricing issue between what was on the menu and what we were charged for an item, and one of our meat dishes was far too rare for us to enjoy, which was especially disappointing since we had ordered the same thing three times before, and it was fantastic. Service is always terrific, and if this had been my first visit, I probably would have loved it, but since we have seen Chi Spacca at its most spectacular, this visit was a bit of a letdown.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: My wife and I celebrated our 25th anniversary, and the food, service and ambience exceeded all expectations. Although the restaurant is pricy, for a special occasion it is more than worth the money!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Always a fantastic experience.   One of the best in LA for a reason.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Most of our food was outstanding. The oil-soaked bread with burrata, the little gem salad, the plate of citrus (a wonderfully refreshing palate cleanser before the main course), the broccoli, and the lemon posset with balsamic were all delightful. The only dish that my made my partner and I look at each other and say anything other than, "Wow, this is perfect," was, surprisingly enough, the meat entree. We ordered the Porcini Rubbed Beef Short Ribs, and I have to say that the salsa verde was more enjoyable than the meat itself. They tasted overcooked and were somewhat lacking in flavor. That being said, we still cleaned the plate as the short ribs would still blow most out of the water - even if they didn't live up to the chi Spacca standard. Our service didn't meet the typical standard of a award-winning restaurant, either. Our server was not very attentive and we had empty, dirty plates stacked in front us more than once, though I suppose this is better than an over-attentive server, and it may be because we chose counter seating rather than a table. All in all, I would recommend chi Spacca with an 8/10 stars.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: We had a reservation but it wasn’t honored. We waited 25 minutes in a very small outer space with no seating and the door to the actual restaurant was kept closed so we couldn’t look inside.The look and feel of the restaurant was very nice and the wait staff was fine . Certain dishes were delicious (the focaccia bread in particular) while others were very disappointing (the tomahawk pork chop). Not cooked thru and I disliked the seasoning of fennel pollen. Will probably not return.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: We loved the food but is not very often resturant to go for bcuz is pricey but overall I will recommend

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: The food wasn’t worth the price

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Amaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaazing!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: by far one of the best restaurants in los angeles. the quality and value of food is so perfect. everything on th menu is amazing. especially the salad with bacon vin. and the diablo chicken

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Valentines Day!!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Great vibe. Not sure about quality of steaks

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Had the pleasure of dining with Lidia Bostianich as she shared recipes from her newest cookbook.  Great food, great wine and great company!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Loved the special event on Feb 10

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Too much Salt.......I didn't think the food has maintained it's level of taste.  It's not the same ChiSpacca as it was and I've been dining there once it's opening!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: The overall experience was okay but not exceptionally great. We asked a member of the staff for help with taking our photo and he responded that he was busy and did not stop, come back or made an attempt to help us however when they were setting up a new table next to us with new guests they gave them all their attention. felt that we were not valued as guests, disrespected and we will not be dining here again.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Great Dinner due to Eduardo. Great service from him. He was so knowledgeable and efficient. All food was delicious. Would definitely return. Duck was on point.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Fantastic!!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Fantastic as always.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Outstanding meal!!!!  Wow!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: This place is next level. Sit at the counter for a great experience and to interact with the chefs. Sometimes you might get a little surprise tasting. food, menu, service, ambiance are all top notch. Can’t wait to be back here again.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: The BEST Italian food in LA. No one makes Caesar Salad better than chi Spacca. It's right there with Tricolore Salad at Pizzaria Mozza.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Simply outstanding!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: WHAT A GREAT EXPERIENCE. SET UP A RESERVATION WITH AN EARLY 6PM TIME. AND EVERY DISH WAS ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS. ORIGINALLY CAME FOR THE TOMAHAWK AND ENDED UP BEING BLOWN AWAY BY EVERY PLATE THAT WAS BROUGHT OUT. THE SALAD WAS FRESH AND ZESTY AND A GREAT SPIN ON A CEASAR. THE SWEET POTATOES WERE SURPRISINGLY SWEET IN THE WAY YOU WOULD HOPE THEM TO BE. THE TOMAHAWK WAS DELICIOUS AND HUGE, COOKED AS THE CHEF PREFERRED AND THAT DID NOT DISAPPOINT. THE STARTING OF THE SAVORY BREAD AND BURRATA WAS A CLEAR SIGN OF THE GOODNESS TO COME. I WILL HAVE DREAMS OF THAT BURRATA.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: well service is always excellent!!, food outstanding!price very good!we love it!thanks!angel

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Our favorite restaurant. The food is phenomenal. It’s expensive but worth every penny. Run don’t walk to chi Scappa

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: The best pork chop I have ever had. Sit at the bar!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Best meal ever!!!!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Top 5 restaurants in Los Angeles. Maybe even better than Sonoratown. (Crack at LA Times food critics)

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Excellent birthday dinner!

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: One of the best restaurants in L.A.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: The chicken is Magical ✨

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: One of the few restaurants that we can say is authentically enjoyable to eat as the food is prepared so well and so fresh with taste unbelievable and so enjoyable.  People are laid back and natural, we do not get the feel of coming to a place with attitude.  We will rank it as in our top 3 to go in LA.  And we have been around many of the top places in Europe.  Totally recommendable.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Chi Spacca was one of the best restaurants that I’ve ever been to. From service to food this restaurant was outstanding.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: I really wanted to like this place. While the food was about what was expected, the entire experience was a huge let down. First, we were seated 45 minutes after our reservation, and then it took another 30 just to get service. The restaurant has about 5 tables total, so the fact we RARELY saw our waiter the entire TWO HOURS it took to eat was also extremely unfortunate. The courses came out 30 minutes apart, which was very strange to have a bowl of mashed potatoes sit there for half an hour until the first meat came out. Our waters were never filled, and I think I only got one beer the entire meal because our waiter literally never came back after we ordered our food. Except one time to apologize for how long everything was taking. I will say they gave us complimentary sorbet at the end, probably because it was now 11PM and we were just eating. While the food is tasty, I really don't believe the restaurant is as fine as it seems to have convinced itself it is. For how much it costs, I would definitely go for a more exemplary dining experience elsewhere ie: Bavel.

Name: chi SPACCA
Comment: Too much lemon in all the salad (Caesars salad), stuffed squash flowers, and broccoli.  Roast chicken was not well cooked - the meat near the bone was pinkish/a little raw.We were overcharged for the water... US$3.00 per person but they charged for 7 guest to my table of 6.They brought a happy-birthday dessert for the celebrant at the table, but charged us for it.The waitress/sommelier was obviously pushing us to order too much for the table. For the table of 6, we had a roast chicken, a lamb shoulder, and the US$220 steak, aside from various vegetable dishes.

Name: Coppa
Comment: During these trying times for all of us, eating al fresco at Coppa was truly a breath of fresh air.  The service (Jen) was very friendly and at just the right tempo.  Pizza and pasta were delicious.  A beautiful way to spend Monday night.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Wonderful meal and great service! I was very impressed with what they have in place in response to COVID.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Thanks for being so covid-conscious and safe!!

Name: Coppa
Comment: great food!

Name: Coppa
Comment: First dining after 3 months of restrictions. The outdoor seating was awesome in a semi_quite South End neighborhood. Limited selections on the menu. Nothing extravagant. We ordered a pasta dish with clams which was decent. Drink menu very limited (maybe due to the situation). Tiramisu was not good at all and it was a waste of money but otherwise was a good experience. Loved sitting outdoors and the staff were really nice and super friendly particularly with my little doggie so for that reason along I would go back!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Amazing. The patio is awesome!!!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Fantastic!

Name: Coppa
Comment: It was a great date night after a long time being tucked away in the apartment. The staff was very accepting of having our little pup dine with us on the patio! It was awesome.

Name: Coppa
Comment: So glad to have Coppa back! The Nduja with Squash Blossom pizza was incredible and so were the Meatballs and Arancini!

Name: Coppa
Comment: SO glad Coppa is back open after COVID! It's always the best and the patio was super nice.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Great overall experience. I love this restaurant so much

Name: Coppa
Comment: Hard to find, darkly lit outside so I wasn’t sure this was the restaurant… no one out front to greet us... so I went inside. No one working made eye contact so I walked further in until the host came in and snapped at me that I’m not allowed inside. He then seated us and I calmly said I didn’t appreciate the way he spoke to me... He replied “Ok” and didn’t apologize.  So I asked, “If we stay, would you be our waiter?” He said yes he would, so we left. In an era where businesses and especially restaurants are struggling, rude service like this is unfortunate.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Great food and excellent service! Would definitely recommend to a friend.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Great outdoor seating area, & food is always amazing! Tables are small so wouldn't recommend for larger group, but absolutely perfect for date night. One of my favorite places in Boston.

Name: Coppa
Comment: We enjoyed our dinner at Coppa, the seating was along a nice quiet street and staff were very friendly. Portion sizes were perfect and normal, and not the huge American sized portions we’ve been receiving at other restaurants. The pizza was the best pizza my husband and I have had since being in Italy (hubby lived there for some years and I visited often). The food was delicious and we’ll definitely be back!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Great bday dinner!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Great outdoor dining experience and they’ve adjusted so well in these times!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Always fabulous food...great outside atmosphere and great service. So glad they are open again!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Wonderful adaptation to extended patio dining. I felt safe and was served quickly and courteously.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Great service, restaurant performs like a well oiled machine. Flawless, I've been many times, and I plan on going many more times.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Wonderful meal. I felt like every precaution was taken to ensure my safety in these crazy times. Lobster Bucatini was delicious. Meatballs were amazing. First sip of the Aperol Spritz had me grinning from ear to ear. Thanks Coppa!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Sitting out on the sidewalk worked out fine. Food and service were great. Was very pleased with their commitment to safety and cleanliness, very well thought out.

Name: Coppa
Comment: They are handling the COVID situation well and it’s a nice neighborhood spot to grab some food and drink.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Nice outdoor dining! Somewhat expensive but delicious and lovely

Name: Coppa
Comment: Awesome. They're dealing with covid so well. Can't say enough good things.

Name: Coppa
Comment: We had a great dinner at Coppa and were pleased with how they handled a tough situation around reopening during COVID. Food was great, service was great, and it was great to be eating outside again!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Jen was great! Super nice and had a great personality! So glad they are back open. The food was killer

Name: Coppa
Comment: Great experience for brunch. Food and drinks were so good! We look forward to things resolving with COVID-19 to come for a full dinner.

Name: Coppa
Comment: This is me and my friends go to spot when we want pasta! Always the best!

Name: Coppa
Comment: Cozy little place. Fabulous pasta. Good wine. Cute neighborhood.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Food was delicious and our waiter was very nice and attentive . My only negative is how small the restaurant is and how closely you are sitting to others. Also they don’t have a full cocktail menu mostly just wine but food is very very good

Name: Coppa
Comment: Good quality of food Very little portions and way too expensive for that. Service was unfriendly

Name: Coppa
Comment: Our favorite go to spot for any occasion. The perfect ambiance for date night or dinner with your Italian dad :)

Name: Coppa
Comment: Perfect neighborhood restaurant, serving simple but delicious good.

Name: Coppa
Comment: V romantic

Name: Coppa
Comment: Never disappoints.  Special place.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Excellent food  hostess  very friendly although small restaurant did not feel rushed . Waitress was good but very busy our table near the door so it was cold every time door opened . I would go back !

Name: Coppa
Comment: Classic South End Spot for Italian inspired Small small plates. Get the Caesar and Meatballs or Grinder. Can't lose.

Name: Coppa
Comment: Excellent food in a casual, intimate setting!  I highly recommend Coppa!

Name: Coppa
Comment: COPPA REVIEW 3/3/20We ate at Coppa 5pm yesterday and it was our first negative experience there, such that I am asking: “Does Coppa have a new chef ? ” Well the surprising answer, for me, is No. But why does he want to obliterate the clean dependable Island Creek Oyster flavor by over soaking it in a strong cranberry vinegar? All I can figure is that maybe the chef’s ego is greater than his wanting to showcase his excellent local product. The answer for me was to lift each oyster out of its overpowering vinegar bath , blot it, and eat it as is. Fantastic. The Celery Caesar was as scrumptious as ever. The scallop app. was nuanced and layered with unctuous treatments. The Arancini remain our favorite in the city. The very disappointing entrees were the Gemelli with its muddled flavors, and the Pizza which the menu description never mentioned- was covered with chili flakes. Our waitperson [she must be new] was slow and inattentive no matter how much we urged her to deliver our food. This affected considerably our overall experience there.We will wait for some menu changes before returning.

Name: CRUST
Comment: It was amazing as always. Great food and the staff is super friendly and attentive. We went for Father’s Day dinner and couldn’t be more pleased. We are long time customers and Crust is our favorite.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Fathers Day

Name: CRUST
Comment: Couldn’t wait to try this place out,, the owners are awesome and the Pizza was amazing,, we traveled all the way from PA and will definitely tell everyone about this place when we get home.. Fantastic!!!

Name: CRUST
Comment: Absolutely loved it! We celebrated our son’s 20ish birthday and it was spectacular. We had a party of 6 and each one ordered something different, all equally delicious I must say. Our server was very attentive and recommended some dishes and wine. Anita the owner checked in on us to make sure we were ok, as she did with everyone else in the restaurant. We had a fabulous time in an amazing restaurant that did not disappoint. We will definitely be back.

Name: CRUST
Comment: One of my favorite Italian restaurants. Always excited to visit as I know the experience will be awesome.  The environment is very relaxed, plus they always go above and beyond to accommodate; never any complaints on the food.  Definitely a must on anyone's list of restaurants.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Wonderful Excellent service. Food was incredible

Name: CRUST
Comment: I always receive an online request to give my feedback about my experience at Crust. It’s honestly never a chore because I love telling everyone how awesome it is. From the moment you walk in Anita or someone welcomes you and makes you feel like you’re at a family dinner. That kind of hospitality doesn’t end with the welcome but continues on with the service until you’re saying goodbye, “until we see you again”. On top of the amazing hospitality, the food, it is absolutely delicious. Never had a bad dish here. Explore the menu and enjoy something you don’t normally have or stick with a favorite classic. No worries everything is great!  Hands down one of the best restaurants in Miami.

Name: CRUST
Comment: We ordered several things , the problem was the salad it had old walnuts, when we called the manager, she from the first moment affirmed that it wasn’t like that, that the chef was her husband and that he had to try it to confirm our complain. Then she returned with sarcastic attitude denying our claim. She brought a punch of complete different walnuts and asked to us with the same attitude what we wanted another salad or discount the older one from the account. Very disappointed an arrogant attitude to be honest.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Great Italian food.  Good service.  Will return.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Always a pleasure to dine at Crust. Anita welcomes us like family. Highly recommend!

Name: CRUST
Comment: Food was great service was meh

Name: CRUST
Comment: Flew to East coast just to eat at CRUST before driving to our destination on west coast. It’s that good!!

Name: CRUST
Comment: It was as it always is “ GREAT. I love the food, owners and there server’s, as they always make you feel at home, my only complaint is that they are not closer to me but whenever I am somewhere near I always book my table at Crust.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Very personable staff. Work very well together. Was extremely impressed by the teamwork and happiness shown by the employees.

Name: CRUST
Comment: We love Crust.   Went for my birthday with another couple.  totally enjoyed by all.  Portions are generous and food is delicious.

Name: CRUST
Comment: The staff was amazing the hostess was over the top and so friendly and nice. We had a cranky 2 year old and the staff was super nice bringing coloring books and interacting with him to calm him!  Best Italian and so much food!!

Name: CRUST
Comment: It was fantastic.  From the hostess to the servers.  The food is amazing!!!!  This is our place when we want to have great Italian food!

Name: CRUST
Comment: Always an extraordinary experience!

Name: CRUST
Comment: Great food just to much

Name: CRUST
Comment: Great restaurant, best pizza in miami, the risotto was even better!!

Name: CRUST
Comment: I can’t get enough of the place. The food is consistent. The staff is impeccable. The food is D-E-L-I-C-O-U-S!!!

Name: CRUST
Comment: Excellent!! Must make a reservation .

Name: CRUST
Comment: The food is amazing! The service is really good. If you want a quiet place for a date, this is not the place to go. It is very lively and has a very energetic ambiance.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Great food, great service

Name: CRUST
Comment: Great food and incredible owner!

Name: CRUST
Comment: We went for my mom’s 85 th Birthday before going to Hamilton at the Ziff.  So we’re greeted by the owner with birthday kisses for mom. The portions are huge and wonderful. Sharing is a great idea!!! Definitely on my favorite list. We will be back soon ( after I finish my left overs which have lasted all weekend 🥰).

Name: CRUST
Comment: Great food but portion size was to large my pizza would have been much better with half of the ingredients on top and seen  some of yhe pasta dishes getting delivered and the were huge. Very off putting

Name: CRUST
Comment: Nice. Good service and great food!

Name: CRUST
Comment: Truly an incredible place every time I go! Food, service, decor, ambiance to name a few is always on point! Thank you for making it such a DIVINE place to dine!XOXO...Belkys Sanchez

Name: CRUST
Comment: Amazing as always!  Hope to keep celebrating anniversaries there for many more years!

Name: CRUST
Comment: So enjoyable. Worth the long drive from boca raton!

Name: CRUST
Comment: One of our favs

Name: CRUST
Comment: As always, food was delicious.  Service was a bit spotty, and it was a bit noisier than usual (even though we went very early!).

Name: CRUST
Comment: The owner’s warmth sets the tone for the whole experience. Everything about this place is an embrace — from the plentiful menu choices to the robust portions to the special touches that make you feel like a treasured customer even when you’re not a regular (yet! we will be after this).Really an exceptional, special place. These people are doing what they were called to do, and it’s all about love.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Wonderful! Portions are large though! The eggplant parm serving feeds 4! Service is great, food is fantastic!

Name: CRUST
Comment: More Italian food for your money than I have ever seen any restaurant ever serve.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Great food atmosphere was fantastic definitely recommend sitting outside on a nice day.

Name: CRUST
Comment: Love this restaurant!  The meal and service were spectacular as always!  We will be back soon!  Thank you!

Name: CRUST
Comment: If you're into great spaghetti sauce, this is definitely the place. The portions are ridiculously gigantic. More than enough to feed 2 people if not 3. I was disappointed that I could not swap out the pasta I wanted with my main choice. But they did tell us in the beginning that they wouldn't do what I wanted them to do. The prices were reasonable, but I want a place to give me what I want to eat.  I had to change orders to get what I wanted in the sauce.

Name: CRUST
Comment: The Crust  salad with beats, walnuts and house mustard vinaigrette was delicately balanced to present a delicious blend of flavors. The Crust salad was extraordinary. My partner had the Caesar salad which was an average salad. If we had known the portions were so large we would have paid the split charge and shared the Crust salad.We had the “individual size” pepperoni and pineapple pizza and the Crust Pizza. Again, huge portions, and if we had known we would have paid the split charge and shared. We noticed other diners around us with pasta “entree” that were also huge portions. We ended up leaving half of each pizza. The pizzas were good; not outstanding. We were expecting an outstanding pizza after all the awards and publicity about Crust. If you go to Crust remember the portions are extremely large. Plan on paying a split charge to share or taking a portion home for another meal.

Name: Daniel
Comment: Fabulous service. No rush. Wonderful assistance in explanation of every course. As always our did our explanation

Name: Daniel
Comment: First class throughout.

Name: Daniel
Comment: My daughter and I visited Daniel while on a spring break trip to New York. We ordered the tasting menu, which was a nice way to sample various items. The service was impeccable and the atmosphere was lovely - quiet but not stuffy.

Name: Daniel
