The staff is always very personable and welcoming and I look forward to coming back when they make more changes to the seasonal menu and potentially bring dishes over to the NYC branch from Seoul!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: The food was really good and creative, the service was great and atmosphere very calm and pleasant. I felt it was a little overpriced, but in general it was a great experience and would recommend it for sure.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Everything was superb! One of the best dining experiences I have had in years.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Excellent. The food, the service, the atmosphere, all excellent. Every bite makes one pause to savor the amazing combination of flavors. Each course brought a new favorite after thinking the last couldn’t be topped. It was a 2 hour drive, a train ride and a cab to get there from home and we would do it again without a second thought. Truly a memorable dining experience.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Amazing !!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Easily one of my favorite meals of all time.Excellent food. Excellent service. Great wine menu as well.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Amazing Michelin two star restaurant that’s quiet and perfect for dining with your loved one or a group. The Korean food was unique and a memorable Experience

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: It is very special when you can walk in to a restaurant and feel like you’re dining surrounded by family..that is the feeling we get every time we walk in to Jungsik. Our meal this evening was wonderful, as usual. Every course was delicious. Finally getting to try the truffle cone was the highlight of the night. Now I can’t wait to have it again. Many thanks to George, Catherine, and Tim for another memorable evening.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Very amazing

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Great dining experience. We opted for the Chefs tasting menu and it was outstanding !

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Staff were really nice there. People are talking about the dishes in a great passion. The food tastes more like a French cuisine than a Korean one, but they do use some Korean spice and sauce to tune up the tastes. The desserts were also good. Most of them were not sweet so that I can finish them even if I was already really full. The Pinot Noir grape juice was awesome!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: The food was amazing! Attentive waitstaff, nice ambience, but the food was the star of the show.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Loved our evening at Jungsik. The food and the place were incredible, with the service very pro.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Awesome experience!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Amazing! Enjoyed every moment

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Food is really good

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Great experience in NYC!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: A bit too much introduction to food

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Amazing service - everyone was attentive but not overly so. The food was thoughtfully put together, with some surprising flavor and texture combinations here and there. We were celebrating a special occasion, but I’m planning on bringing my parents next time they are in town because they need to experience something like this.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Very good tasting menu, just overpriced by about double what it should be.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: We thoroughly enjoyed our dinner. The « banana » dessert was my favourite part!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: The Overall food quality is great. Yet some dish are bit salty. Love their dessert!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Outstanding experience!  Food and staff are amazing!  Oscar is wonderful!  We loved the evening!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: We were celebrating my boyfriends birthday and the entire staff treated him very special unlike anything I’ve ever experienced.  The waiter was very charming and attentive.  Totally recommend!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Fantastic experience - beautifully orchestrated courses delivered by talented staff. A definite destination while in NYC.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Beautiful food with creative flavors “inspired” by Korean food. Best way to describe it is French-Korean.

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: I selected Jungsik for my birthday dinner in NYC with my mom and wife. I couldn’t of been more pleased with the selection. The service was best in class if not better than some of the finer restaurants that I’ve eaten out in Europe. The ingredients were extremely fresh, very different than your standard fine dining food, and I couldn’t of been more pleased with the selection. The service was best in class if not better than some of the fine restaurants that I’ve eaten at in Europe. The ingredients were extremely fresh, and very different than your standard fine dining food without being “strange.”  The staff was so friendly and extremely attentive. We had the signature menu and I am so glad that we did. I would recommend this restaurant anyone anyone who is looking for a unique fine dining experience that is extremely memorable and fun!

Name: JUNGSIK
Comment: Great food. Highly recommend

Name: Kinship
Comment: Went here for an anniversary dinner a few weeks ago and it was a terrific experience.  We used to live in Manhattan and couldn't help comparing the experience to the likes of Le Bernardin, Babbo, etc.  It was definitely up there in all aspects- attention to detail, knowledgeable wait staff, perfect execution.  The actual dining room itself was okay but we were there for the food and I was definitely glad to be surrounded by 30+ age group diners.

Name: Kinship
Comment: A very special restaurant!

Name: Kinship
Comment: kinship is a calming, soothing, elegant oasis where the food is taken seriously but the people are down to earth. it is a lovely dining experience.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Our evening at Kinship ranks up there, with memorable dinners at the two or three top restaurants in the Washington, DC area.  Our visiting out-of-town friend, who regularly travels around the world (literally),was awed, as my spouse and I were, with the consistently superb quality of every dish, the perfection of preparation, and the elegance of presentation. All of this was enhanced by correctly recommended wines, highly professional service, and a "classy" ambiance. We can't wait to return!

Name: Kinship
Comment: Food was great and service was exceptional

Name: Kinship
Comment: The experience here was fantastic. Our server was knowledgeable, astute, and friendly. Food was all fantastic, and my boyfriend's drink was the "best old fashioned he's ever had." We had a small food allergy and they were more than accommodating about it. We will definitely come back for more special occasions!

Name: Kinship
Comment: The food is simply exquisite.  We enjoyed the flavors of each dish very much.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Excellent service and very accommodating. We had a baby with us and they were more than willing to help in any way possible.

Name: Kinship
Comment: I was pleased with my experience at Kinship, but I don't believe that I will be going back. I enjoyed about half of the dishes that we ordered, including the tuna appetizer, the grilled shoat, and the Vietnamese banana fritters. However, I was underwhelmed by some of the other dishes. I enjoyed going to Kinship as a one-time experience to check off the list, and I'd recommend it for adventurous eaters willing to take a chance and potentially be disappointed. Service was really amazing, and the ambiance is exquisite.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Sam AND his barback/assistant WERE AWESOME!!! Had a great Sunday, we mentioned we would be back EVERY SUNDAY.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Lovely, cozy setting with very attentive staff! Sunday dinner so we were all going for a lighter dinner, so order several apps to accompany a shared entree. Sea bass to share was lovely, came with roasted cauliflower, mini-porter house rolls. We enjoyed also the crispy taro root appetizer, too. We also enjoyed the Vietnamese banana fritters for dessert.

Name: Kinship
Comment: One of the best meals I've ever had! The Kinship chicken is a must.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Remains one of the very top restaurants in DC.  Beautiful setting, great service, excellent wine and amazing food. And Chef Eric having red chile chimichurri on his menu?!  Definitely try the piri piri beef.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Great birthday experience with my boy friend. I will definitely be back again!

Name: Kinship
Comment: Birthday for wife

Name: Kinship
Comment: Our waiter was incredible and the food was even better. Is it a bit pricey? Sure, but it's also worth every penny. The Chicken is as good as everyone says it is.

Name: Kinship
Comment: A perfect dining experience.Food, service, ambiance...  5 stars

Name: Kinship
Comment: What I can say about Kinship is....... it all makes sense. From the walk through the door you are welcomed by people who care and want to make your experience an exceptional one. It was our anniversary so when sat at the table there was a card to congratulate us and I knew we were in for a great meal. The service is almost robotic in a way where it doesn’t seem fake but a guiñe care for the customer. Food pace is perfectly executed while the service team replaces and replenishes your water, silverware, and bread. Food is being prepared in the back awaiting for the arrival.The food is just as amazing as the service. The sunchoke with Avocado and Ají Dulce peppers is a must try. So is the quail. Entres of Duck confit and Braised Shoat shoulder really sent it over the top. Eating here you really understand and see what a great restaurant is about. The team here has all bought into the concept and work like clock work. It’s a pleasure to come here and I will continue to sing the praise of your team and your restaurant. Very well done Kinship! Thank you!

Name: Kinship
Comment: Great server.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Great good, great atmosphere, and great (very friendly) service. We’ll be back.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Impeccable service with genial and well-trained staff. Food was incredible. Small plates with distinct flavor profiles that reflect the skill and talent of the chefs. Each waiter is also sommelier trained and had excellent wine recommendations with each course. Very accommodating with allergies (gluten free bread is unreal!) and thoughtful touches for birthdays. We are definitely coming back!!

Name: Kinship
Comment: Amazing!!!

Name: Kinship
Comment: the taste of food is a little bit heavy for us

Name: Kinship
Comment: Celebrated Valentine’s Day dinner at Kinship.  The customer service was wonderful. The cocktails were great.   As for the food, am not sure if I am happy or disappointed.  I mean, it was great overall. However, comparing it to other fine dining restaurants and/or one starred Michelin starred restaurants, I don’t think they are at par with them.  For example, if I haven tried Marcel’s boudin blanc, I would say it’s great. But, I have to say Marcel’s is better.  And, I would stay away from their Moulard Duck Foi Gras Confit.  I love foi gras and never had a bad one. I have my favorites and not, but I would say theirs is the worst for me.  Overall, it’s a great restaurant. I just can’t say it’s the best one out there.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Food and service was excellent! Really enjoyed our dining experience.

Name: Kinship
Comment: I would absolutely and have already recommended Kinship to multiple friends and colleagues.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Some of the best food I have had in DC, the menu was exceptional, the lobster french toast was out of this world, and the service and ambiance were something I would expect from a much more expensive restaurant. I would go back in a heartbeat, the staff decor and food were an experience unto themselves. Will recommend to anyone looking for an elevated food experience in DC

Name: Kinship
Comment: We thoroughly enjoyed our meal at kinship. The portion size was just right.  The quality of the scallops and the overall venison dish were superb. The Jerusalem artichokes and pommes anna were very tasty starters.  The 4/5 stars was because of the chocolate tart with lapsang souchong; very smoky taste.  Maybe others love it, but we found it a bit odd. Service was outstanding.  We will be back often.

Name: Kinship
Comment: I specifically selected anniversary under special occasion when I made the booking, but nothing was done differently for the occasion. We found that surprising and disappointing, epecially the fact that the two tables next to us received cards, complimentary desserts and were wished a happy anniversary.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Very well taken care of and everything was timed out at a nice pace.

Name: Kinship
Comment: service was great - food was a little better than average given the price point.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Incredible service, amazing innovative food, all-around fantastic experience. Top 3 must try...lobster french toast,  Maine scallops, chocolate souffle cake.

Name: Kinship
Comment: This was our first time to kinship, but not our last. The menu is creative and organized in columns of "style/feeling" with a couple of starters, a couple of entrées, and a couple of desserts in each. The food was first-rate and well priced for the quality. There were a number of locally sourced meats and produce. The wine list was smart with a good variety. Especially noteworthy was the list of very good 375ml bottles.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Kinship is simply outstanding. Great place to celebrate a special occasion. The food and service are terrific. Can't wait to return.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Amazing and creative dishes with excellent service

Name: Kinship
Comment: Excellent meal at Kinship. Service was polished, food was spectacular.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Fantastic experience. Service was amazing. Food was amazing. Just go.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Great meal!  Loved the lobster appetizer and roasted chicken.  Service perfect!  Thank you.  Ill be back soon.

Name: Kinship
Comment: Exceptional in every way though you can’t have the 4# chicken unless you can commit an extra 80 minutes to the cooking process. The sausage and cod were our second choices and they didn’t disappoint

Name: Kinship
Comment: Truly enjoyed your unique dining experience.  Loved the booth we sat in for the 4 of us.  Food was fresh, flavorful, eclectic, right size portion, that allowed each of us to taste/enjoy each others dishes.  All of the staff was most helpful.  Recommendations for tasting multiple different dishes was great!

Name: Koi
Comment: Surprised my boyfriend here for dinner and he enjoyed the food and service. The waiter was sympathetic and patient with us. I would recommend coming here.

Name: Koi
Comment: Amazing service, great food, one of my favorite restaurants!

Name: Koi
Comment: Good food and service.  Ambiance was good as well.

Name: Koi
Comment: First visit to a restaurant during Covid pandemic.  Great food, great service.  Tables were separated well and staff all had masks.

Name: Koi
Comment: Tried this place out after they re-opened due to covid.  Miso black cod was a great dish, the rest of the dishes including the sushi was mediocre.  Service was pretty sad, I ordered a dish and asked to change it ONE MINUTE later, and was told by the waiter “I’m sorry I already put the order in.”  What stupid service and restaurant doesn’t let you change your mind?  He should have said - “yes I’ll change the order immediately.”  Doubtful I’ll go back given the poor training of the servers.

Name: Koi
Comment: Everything from the moment we walked in was outstanding.  We have just found our favorite LA sushi place.  We ran 20 minutes late due to PCH traffic and they still seated us right away.  Our server was exceptional and the food was terrific.

Name: Koi
Comment: There were signs up notifying of mandatory masks that need to be worn when entering the restaurant. Many customers were not wearing masks as they walked in, or whilst speaking to host, nor whilst walking to their table. Several tables are NOT 6 feet apart (ours at most was 3 feet from the tables next to us, and the booth). However, they did a great job with the booths providing Perspex dividers to separate the booth seating. The servers/waiters did an excellent job providing a service that is very difficult now with gloves and masks, they provided a top notch service to us, food was excellent as always, and if they can figure out how to distance tables we will keep coming back

Name: Koi
Comment: Great place to go on a date

Name: Koi
Comment: Koi has their act together as they reopen. Sign of a professional organization. Food ambiance service all great as always. Drinks were delicious too. Will be going back regularly.

Name: Koi
Comment: Tony was an amazing server! There were guys smoking in the patio next to our table which was gross. The bartender with the white hair was rude; when my friend wanted to order a drink with Mezcal he asked, “Have you had that one before?” to which she replied no. He responded “Then get something else.” Luckily we were able to order them through Tony at our table. Do better.

Name: Koi
Comment: Excellent food and service. We're a regular and happy to come back time after time. You have to try the crispy rice with filet mignon.

Name: Koi
Comment: Thank you for great experience! Friendly service, delicious food!!!

Name: Koi
Comment: A must, when you are in LA.  Only negative is the high noise level.

Name: Koi
Comment: Things are always great at Koi.  Food and Vibes are perfect.

Name: Koi
Comment: Always a treat. Exquisite taste and service is great

Name: Koi
Comment: Server messed up a couple times after asking for specific things but not the end of the world

Name: Koi
Comment: Spectacular food. Creamy shrimp is pure heaven on the plate; sizzling rice takes this item to the addictive level; and, the sashimi is fresher than any you’ll find anywhere. Brilliant.

Name: Koi
Comment: Exceptional attentive complete. service with outstanding food and good advice from waiter.A tiny setback was slight rudeness from valet Parker but this was quickly forgotten

Name: Koi
Comment: This ain’t real sushi.   Overpriced for run of the mill pieces of fish.   Meh.   Very loud lots of kids playing video games loudly without headphones .

Name: Koi
Comment: Bad service long wait for drinks

Name: Koi
Comment: Amazing!!! We booked Koi to celebrate my daughters 21st birthday and we loved it!!! The food , service and ambiance were outstanding!   Highly recommend this restaurant.

Name: Koi
Comment: Had a reservation at 9:15.... wasn’t sat till 10:30

Name: Koi
Comment: Absolutely horrible. We had a reservation but still waited an hour and ended up just sitting at the bar. The service was terrible they were very rude to us.

Name: Koi
Comment: We had a reservation for 9 PM. We weren’t seated till 10:20. People who came after us with no reservations were seated before us. When we asked about the wait it looked like they forgot about us.

Name: Koi
Comment: The host was understandably frustrated and was trying his best as all reservations were behind but we weren’t seated till 9:45pm with an 8:30pm reservation. There aren’t enough seats at the bar so people have to sit outside where it was cold. I understand that Valentines is a busy night but to wait over an hour past my reservation time was a bit extreme. Plus the bartender didn’t know how to make a paper plane, bummer since they have such great whiskeys available. At least the food came out quick and was delicious but it would have been a better experience had they comped some edamame or something for making every reservation wait such an extreme amount of time.

Name: Koi
Comment: Food was great but waited 45 minutes to sit down

Name: Koi
Comment: Kiiro roll is A+

Name: Koi
Comment: Perfect spot in LA for any occasion

Name: Koi
Comment: カウンターでご飯を頂きました。職人さんの腕前を間近で見ることが出来とても感動しましたし楽しかったです！ひとつ難点は割と賑やかで注文が通りにくいと感じたことです。それ以外は料理も美味しいしとても評価いいです( ˙꒳​˙  )👍✨お寿司の方がやすいです！刺身にすると何故かお値段爆上がりするので注意！笑

Name: Koi
Comment: Thank you and the team for always making us feel special and welcome. Also the food is always insanely great!

Name: Koi
Comment: Great food and service.

Name: Koi
Comment: Great birthday dinner celebration

Name: Koi
Comment: Amazing food, fantastic staff and beautiful space. Rich the bartender was wonderful!  Our reservation was for 8:45 and we waited a bit at the bar which was fantastic. The gentleman who seated us was so apologetic that we had to wait a bit and we truly didn’t mind. The evening was wonderful!

Name: Koi
Comment: The Manager at the hostess stand was so amazing! His personal touch makes the restaurant!

Name: Koi
Comment: Overall experience is still good but It’s a bit dark in our seating area. Dim is good but not too dark.

Name: Koi
Comment: Always on point for the food. Management is stellar. My to go place.

Name: Koi
Comment: Always fun. Let the waiter choose for you and just relax.

Name: Koi
Comment: Amazing food always! Consistently great. No complaints..I love Koi. 10/10 recommend

Name: Koi
Comment: Everything was good until my girlfriend miss calculated the tip, honest mistake and the server ran out after her to the valet to ask for a bigger tip. I was disgusted. Won’t be going back

Name: Koi
Comment: A very good experience, delicious and most important very good service and friendly staff

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Always a fantastic experience. Seth was our waiter and we really appreciated his attentive and engaging demeanor.  Food was spectacular as always.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: I suppose we could have moved, but the party behind us was very loud. Millennials don’t understand the idea of using their “inside voices”.Excellent food. Strong cocktails. Amazing service.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: awesome place.  great service, great food, a little noisy.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Family dinner prior to our daughter’s wedding...

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Excellent, as usual :)

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Simply the best restaurant in San Francisco. Consistently fabulous, great service, and a lively and happy crowd.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Our waiter was amazing!  Food was excellent!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: We always enjoy Kokkari and Sunday was no exception. We shared spanokkopita, avgolemono soup and the wonderful Greek salad, followed by the lamb shank and a bottle of red wine. Our meal was topped off with baklava and icecream. Couldn't be beat in our opinion!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: The kataifi ekmek was a delightful dessert.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Had a wonderful meal with friends. Service and food were excellent.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: It was our first date since having a baby! They gave us a great table, we had great service and food! They went the extra mile to make it extra special for us.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Experience was amazing it’s our go to place for special occasions or really nice datesThe food is amazing the ambience is great

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Really consistent amazing food - worth every dollar!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: One of my favorite places to dine. Ambience has you wrapped in white table clothes and the true aroma of Greece.Excellent service and polite employees.What more would you ever want!!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Of course this place kills it on every level. I’ve been coming here for special occasions for at least 15 years and it’s consistently amazing. Always try the kataifi dessert if it’s on the menu!!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: The lamb and octopus were as amazing as my friends described it would be. However, everyone in our party commented that the host was very “snooty.” I think stoic and unfriendly would be better descriptors.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Fantastic food paired with exceptional service made for a fantastic evening.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Super delicious. I really enjoyed the appetizers. Definitely recommend for a date night.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Love the food offerings!!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Great quality creative kale salad loved the octopus chicken was a bit dry great wine selection loved the Greek white wine we had

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Wonderful place great food ,service and ambience  very well prepared chicken, lamb, beets, and broccoli sides. We will return

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Always a great dining experience at Kokkari. Nice special occasion restaurant.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Food and server were great!  Noise level so loud can't hear people talking at the table.  We had a special birthday celebration, and we all had a wonderful time.  Thank you so much!  Holly C. Kully

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: One of the finest dining experiences San Francisco has to offer. Quality of food is exceptional, and service very professional.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Great food, as usual. Valerie couldn’t have been any better as a server. Knowledgeable and sweet and always there when we needed her.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: In spite of arriving 40 minutes before reservation time, they were 10 minutes late in assigning me a table .Food was delicious

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Everything was super tasty and I loved the ambiance. I’ll definitely have to go back so I can try more items on the menu!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: First time in San Fran. Came on the recommendation of a friend. Food was perfect, service was warm and friendly but professional and knowledgeable. Very helpful. Everything was fresh and perfectly cooked. Loved it.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Muy agradable lugar al que no suele llegarse como turista.Excelente comida

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: I wanted to hail, I believe her name was Alana. She couldn't have been nicer and more helpful. Both of my guests had never been there before so it was a real thrill for them.Thank you.Katie

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Lovely ambiance and wonderful food. Always enjoy Kokkari!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Amazing food and amazing service. Very authentic and makes you feel like you transported to Greece

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Enjoyed the dining experience.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Great meal and terrific service!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: The grilled octopus was out of this world and I’d go back just for that! The Greek salad was under seasoned and the tomatoes were mushy, and we had to send one of the lamb chops back because it was very rare. Greek potatoes and saganaki were definitely impressive with the cheese still sizzling on the skillet, delicious!!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: All was very good. Hostess was very accommodating offering us a choice of seating

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Lovely food, staff knowledgeable on the wine list. Will be dining again

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: My favorite restaurant in San Francisco for more than two decades!

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Kokkari never disappoints!  This time they outdid themselves. Not only was the food excellent but the service was incredibly thoughtful with just the right balance of friendliness and distance.  A standout was the fresh plump squid stuffed with feta and olives on a bed of watercress. Sublime. The coffee is the best I have tasted in ages - even the decaf. And they brought out a scoop of baklava ice cream with a candle for my friend;s birthday even though we did not order any other desserts. The decor and atmosphere are of a class and elegance it has become all too hard to find in San Francisco or anywhere else these days. Kokkari is a wonderful experience whether for lunch or dinner.

Name: Kokkari Estiatorio
Comment: Waiter wasn’t very friendly but the rest of the staff was great. Food is very good and the place is really charming.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: What a joy to return to the re-opened, if socially distanced, L'Auberge Chez Francois!  From the mushroom crepes to the trout almondine, from the salmon three ways to the tournadoes of beef, we've longed to savor these among our favorite meals and they were as delicious as remembered! (And of course, the little lagniappes, including the addictive garlic toasts and the tart and creamy palate cleansing lemon sorbet delighted our palates and made us smile and feel all was still as it should be at L'Auberge.)  The only thing we missed?  Sharing the space with more happy guests celebrating special occasions!  We look forward to when they can join us again in filling up this beautiful space.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Always a great choice for a meal on the patio.  But I'd probably go to Jacques Brasserie next time for lunch.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: We went there to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary - it was wonderful!  We enjoyed ourselves completely!  Service was perfect, great wine and great meal.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: What a wonderful evening dining on the Chez Francois patio. It felt so good to be back enjoying the delicious food, the exceptional service and the beautiful scenery.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: It is the place we celebrate our anniversaries with another couple.  That got postponed due to the Covd-19, but the service is excellent and even more so this time.  The staff seemed genuinely glad to see us.  The food also was excellent, but it is service that makes the overall evening outstanding.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: The same wonderful restaurant it has been for more than 60 years!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Our first restaurant dining experience since the quarantine. We were welcome at the door like old friends coming home after a holiday. Ambiance & service were excellent. We recognized some faces behind the mask including Jacques who waved between courses. Desserts are outstanding but my “little campers in garlic” (snails) brought back great memories. Merci K&B

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: We miss the foods when the father, Monsieur Francois, was the master Chef .

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Delicious food and great service!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Outstanding, simply outstanding in every way.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Anniversary

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Outstanding modifications to outside dining due to Covid.  Could not have been more comfortable.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: L'Auberge has recovered from the Corona Virus food and service restrictions to a large decree. The food quality is good again, although the menu is still somewhat restricted. Outdoors they now have a big tent, which is open on the sides. The wine menu is back to normal, which means excellent.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: The management and staff have done a wonderful job re-opening in a way that makes you feel comfortable and safe.  We dined inside due to thunderstorms.  Lovely evening.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: We often visit L'Auberge for special occasions. Today was my wife's 85th birthday. Despite the restrictions caused by the coronavirus, the wait staff was very attentive and the table spacing was sufficient to provide social distancing separation.  As usual, the food was outstanding although the usual small glass of wine has disappeared as part of the fixed price luncheon menu. Not a big thing, but a recognition that things are gradually changing.We look forward to a return visit in August to celebrate our anniversary. If we can find friends or relatives to share the event, we surely will.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: One of the great experiences in life that is highly recommended

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: We are sooo glad that L'Auberge has reopened, as the patio seating always transports us to France somewhere for a couple of hours. The outstanding quality and service is as we remember --before the pandemic!! Thank you to all the staff!!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: We hadn’t been to a restaurant in 3 months, but we wanted to celebrate our anniversary. As always, L’Auberge was superb!  We felt safe with other tables at a good distance, and the waiters wore masks and gloves. The food is as spectacular as ever in a beautiful setting.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: This is our favorite restaurant in the entire Washington DC area and has been for many years. We are anxiously waiting the reopening we just occurred. Our dining experience was great. The dinner portions were more than adequate And the quality of the food was impeccable. This restaurant will never disappoint and is Where you want to hold a very important event such as an anniversary or birthday or engagement. We give this restaurant five stars.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: So happy to be back at our favorite place.  Great safety precautions utilized.  The food was as fabulous as ever.  We loved the special blueberry tart with homemade cinnamon ice cream.  Service was close to perfect.  Eric did a wonderful job.  Sitting on the patio on a gorgeous day was the ideal complement to a fantastic dining experience.  The entire team made sure we felt pampered and safe.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: As good as before Convid-19. All necessary steps taken.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: This is a wonderful restaurant to go to, particularly to celebrate important events and when you can sit outside and enjoy the garden and ambience.  We always go here for birthdays and our anniversaries and are never disappointed.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Lovely outdoor tented area with tables spaced apart for social distancing.  All staff were wearing masks and kept their distance as much as possible.  Paper/disposable menus.  Waiting area inside did get a bit close, but our name was called as we were heading outside to wait.  A few items were already sold out when we arrived and the menu was more limited than usual, but many of our favorites were available - we all enjoyed our selections and can't wait to return!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Always a wonderful experience to dine here, but now it was as good as going on a week long vacation! After being at home due to the COVID-19 precautions for 3 months, it was such a treat to be at L'Auberge Chez Francois. We ate on their patio under a huge tent criss-crossed with lights, small fans blowing a light breeze. Tables were about 12' apart, making us feel 100% safe. The waiters all wore face masks and gloves and brought our silverware and paper menus after we were seated. The food of course was perfection as usual - I had the lobster and crab, my husband and son-in-law had the Chateaubriand - but honestly it was the atmosphere that let us relax that really made the evening!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Everything about L'Auberge Chez Francois is exceptional!  We were seated upon arrival and the restaurant is taking great care to ensure cleanliness and is very careful about social distancing and observing all of the current safety requirements.  The food was wonderful, Chef Jacques stopped by to visit with us, from a distance of course, and we could not have been more pleased.  Service was excellent and everyone is especially warm and friendly.  We had a 6:45 PM reservation and arrived right on time, but stayed until around 10:00 PM as we were having such a lovely evening.  We'll be back soon!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Always perfect.   They were able to provide the same excellent service and food as always even with the covid-19 restrictions.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: As always perfect dining experience,  food was delicious, not rushed, menu was somewhat limited, like most of the restaurants just opening, but ample choices.Waiter was delightful,  relaxed any fears we had of our first dining in experience during the pandemic.  The waiter wore mask and was considerate of social distancing.  We both ordered the lobster special, our favorite, was amazing as expected.  Look forward to returning again soon.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: We are outside and it was lovely. The food was great!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: It was the perfect night.  We ate outside under a large tent with festive lights and a cool fan.  The tables were far apart and large for a small group of 3.  I felt very comfortable eating there even during a pandemic!  It was the perfect way to celebrate Father's Day!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: I have been to L'Auberge Chez Francois many times over the past 20 years. I believe it just gets better every time. Not sure how that is possible since I rate it a 10 every time. The food is amazing and the staff are top notch!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Our experience was wonderful!!  Food and service could not be beat!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Food not up to par, salad mediocre only some wilted greens no tomato, ran out of mussels for appetizer and our reservation was 12 noon you were only open 1/2 hour.  Veal was very tough.  Waiter not attentive with drinks

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: L'Auberge Chez Francois hasn't missed a beat with their successful re-opening. We tried the Sunday brunch menu which has a wonderful selection of appetizers (including oysters), a wide array of main courses (I'd recommend the veal with Virginia ham) and an ample selection of desserts and the best Cheesecake I've ever had. The service is always spot on and the indoor and outdoor seating is very comfortable and a great get away for a Sunday afternoon.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: L'Auberge Chez Francois has been our family's most favorite dining experience ever.  We have gone there for many years for ALL occasions.  The food and ambiance is incredible.  I recommend it wholeheartedly.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: So glad they are open and made it through the coronavirus shutdown. Food and service above all are still great and it's always an experience, whether grabbing a quick lunch or enjoying dinner over several hours.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: As good as always despite the difficulty of Covid!

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: We LOVE L'Auberge Chez Francois and have been going there for over 20 years. Every single time we go the food, service, atmosphere is absolutely perfect. As soon as they re-opened we went and ate outdoors. Everyone there is 100% careful with face masks, social distancing  and all efforts to keep everyone safe. They have a large tent with cooling fans for those who want to eat outdoors, beautiful gardens, flowers to see. We will go back next month for sure.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: Father’s Day

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: One of my favorite restaurants because of their awesome service, food, and relaxing atmosphere. They encourage guests to enjoy their dining experience.

Name: L'Auberge Chez Francois
Comment: This was our first time back since L'Auberge Chez Francois re-opened, and the restaurant fully lived up to its expectations.  We dined outside for lunch, and the rains came just as e arrived. Thanks to the new tent, we were very comfortable and dry. This was just the second day since the restaurant re-opened, and service was just a bit slower than usual. But that's to be expected after a three-month closure period.  The lobster bisque, salad, beef tenderloin and key lime pie were all just as we had remembered them: excellent. A meal at Chez Francois isn't just a meal, it is a delicious experience.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: We had cause for an impromptu family celebration, but wanted to feel safe outside and socially distant. The lovely courtyard at La Grotta was perfect for us. The wait staff was attentive and charming. Thank goodness La Grotta is still here, withstanding the test of time.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: THE BEST food, great service, beautiful ambiance, and our favorite dinner we have had all year! La Grotta is outstanding on all fronts!!!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Fine food and excellent service in a delightful ambience.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Once again the food was excellent. Three of us ordered a dish not even on the menu and it was cooked perfectly. They chefs and staff happily accommodated our off menu request. We can't wait to make reservations and come back soon.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Our family had a wonderful service and experience!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Wonderful experience.  Can't wait to go back. Amazing food and amazing service.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: This is our second time dining at La Grotta and the experience never disappoints! The food is superb, the wine list is extensive, and the service is unparalleled! We’ve had Juliano and Danny as our servers and they are true gems!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: This was my first experience at La Grotta after many recommendations. The food was phenomenal and the staff was extremely friendly. It took almost 30 minutes past our reserved time to be seated because COVID related reduced capacity.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Delicious meal great service! One of our most favorite places to eat! Treated like family.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: La Grotta never disappoints. The service and food was outstanding. The best mussels and lamb chops in the city. My only complaint was that were were seated next to a very loud party of four outside.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: The experience and food were great. Billy was a great waiter and made sure all of our needs were taken care of.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: We’ll be back!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Excellent food and service!!!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Amazing Great food. Great service. Superb experienced staff

Name: La Grotta
Comment: This restaurant has been around for over 30 years, and there is a reason for that. Simply put; the best Italian restaurant in Atlanta.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Just was not as good as it has always been Disappointing

Name: La Grotta
Comment: We enjoyed a wonderful meal on the patio.  Both the service and food were excellent.  La Grotta remains one the best values in Atlanta, if not the very best.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: I was extremely happy with my service, food, and atmosphere at La Grotta. Everything was delicious!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Fabulous restaurant. Nice to dine in after months of pick up

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Lovely evening with excellent service and delicious food. So glad La Grotta has reopened. Had the escargot appetizer. Wonderfully creamy and tasty. Cannot wait to go back.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: My favorite restaurant in Atlanta by far!!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Amazing meal. No sign of corona virus here!!  Packed at 8:30 tonight. Everything was great except the service was awful.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Awesome food!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Amazing !!!!  Not too much else to say.  Loved the food and the service, highly recommend.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: The best Italian food in Atlanta.  Service was impeccable.  We celebrated my daughter's 18th birthday, and they treated her like Royalty.  This is as good as it gets in Atlanta for both food and service.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: I have to say that the food was absolutely delicious!  A bit pricey but nonetheless, delicious!  The wait staff was wonderful and very attentive except towards the end of the meal when the place got busier.  I had to flag the waiter down to bring us the check.  I would have wanted the tables to be spaced out a bit further than they were.  During our meal, which was a joyous occasion, there was a lady who was obviously not happy with how things were going at her job and  we got to experience it like we were at her work with her.  She was just loud, obnoxious, and rude.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: I am not one to write reviews unless it was memorable in either direction. It was my second time at La Grotta. Tony was our server - he made us feel very welcomed. Professional, funny and intuitively attentive without ever making us feel rushed or ignored. He made a work dinner a special night. The food was incredible too. If you ever wanted to try quail, this is the place to do it. It was cooked to perfection and the sauce .... oh the sauce!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Pretty great, except the clams which they removed from the bill. Otherwise it was a great meal and experience.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Food is excellent with good portion size.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Myvwife and I celebrated our 35th anniversary at La Gtotta and it was a wonderful experience. Great food, superb service and warm atmosphere is a winning combination.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Excellent wine .  Great food and service.  Room was a little loud, but a lot of happy folks tend to make some noise.  Would go again.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: The food was amazing.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Consistent, classic, always a notch above in all arenas!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Impeccable dining experience.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Everything was excellent. This is a must place to dine

Name: La Grotta
Comment: WonderfulI have a difficult time picking an entree

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Always a favorite!  Never disappoints!

Name: La Grotta
Comment: Everything was amazing! I’ll admit that the outside does look like a retirement home lol but once you make it inside, it was lovely. The food was A++

Name: La Grotta
Comment: A great restaurant! Fantastic meal, excellent wait staff, friendly manager. Really a to notch experience. Highly recommended.

Name: La Grotta
Comment: The service was quite good; the ambiance very nice;  however, the food was really much below what it shoujd be for a fine, expensive restaurant

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Absolutely incredible in every way. A must go in Maui.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: As always, they did an amazing job!!!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: We had a wonderful time. Everything was enjoyable from the cocktails, to the delicious entrees, and the dessert. The waitstaff were superb. You can tell that they have been well trained.  Kudos to the management.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Awesome meal and fabulous service!!! They treat you like you are the only ones there. Very welcoming and accommodating.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Hands down the best food we had in Maui! We loved it so much we went back for dinner two consecutive nights! They confidently handled my Celiac safe dishes and had numerous GF meals available. LOVE!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Our 4th time coming here in many years...this is the second time we have been here for an anniversary dinner. The fish special was AMAZING.  The wagu ravioli for an appetizer is always good but the sauce is too curling good....get extra bread to clean up every drop of the sauce.  The beet and goat cheese salad was good as well.  Atmosphere is great. Lisa M our waitress was just delightful....great smile fantastic personality.  Just a wonderful experience AGAIN.  Be back next March and do this again.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: I am fortunate to travel to Maui every 2 years. While in Lahaina  I enjoy sitting @ the bar at Lahaina Grill because I am single and the bartenders are very friendly and remember me. At my last visit on 3/16/2020, the owner was there. He made a point to introduce himself as the owner to the couple who sat next to me @ the bar. It was their first time @ the restaurant   He continued visiting many many of the customers at the bar and restaurant area. However, he made no effort to approach me. I felt I wasn’t a valued patron because I was a single woman.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: The food and service were excellent. Unfortunately, they have crammed too many tables into the space causing excessive noise and very tight seating areas.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Lāhainā Grill is terrific. A special experience and amazing food every time. Service by Jillian was top notch.  We are happy to recommend this place, if you know the pricing going in.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: It’s always such a treat to eat at Lahaina Grill. The staff is wonderful! The food is always exceptional!! And even if we eaten too many rolls( the herb butter can’t be beat!!),we can’t pass up the triple berry pie!!! The wine list and cocktails are exceptional too!! Lahaina Grill is one of favorite restaurants on Maui!!!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Always Fabulous!!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: We could feel the wonderful ambiance from the minute we entered the restaurant .  The service was outstanding as well as every bit of the food we ordered.  We will definitely go back!!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Great restaurant.  One half block off water - no ocean view - but excellent food and artwork in dining areas.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: As usual great food and great selection of fine wines. The service was outstanding .

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: The food was amazing and the service all over was the best!!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: We were celebrating a birthday and couldn't have asked for a nicer experience. Server Michael, the food, the wine and our birthday pie ... Amazing!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Love the ambience of this restaurant!!Food was delicious and cherry berry pie very good!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Exceptional restaurant with exceptional food and service. We were seated in the quietest area, which was helpful. Otherwise, we would not have been able to hear each other. However, we will be going again this week, right back to table 34!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Wonderful experience as always.Everyone’s meals were fantastic and Lisa our server was spot on!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Michael our server was phenomenal!! Everyone working there went out of their way to chat with us and assist us. Michael even gave us the recipe for the berry pie as well as the penne and meatballs!!!  We can’t wait to return soon!!!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: This restaurant is charming, and the service is perfect.  We each enjoyed a delicious drink (one alcoholic, one not) and a seafood entree.  Although the food was very tasty, we each felt it should have been warmer.  We were warned that the plates were extremely hot, which they were.  Unfortunately, the food was not.  It wasn't cool enough to merit sending it back, especially since we were there at 5 pm and it was already really busy.  For the high price, however, the food should have been excellent, rather than just very good.  I still rated the restaurant as excellent, however--everything else was terrific.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Great service and best food we had our entire vacation. We are both vegetarians and the options did not disappoint.Highly recommended!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Wonderful dinner! The food is excellent. Prepared perfectly and presented beautifully. Our server and other staff were super attentive.  Noise level is a bit loud. We will be back!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Another wonderful meal from LG. It's no wonder I come back every time I'm on the island. This time I started with an amazing seared tuna and foie gras plate followed with the opakapaka special. So goooood!! Buddy was a wonderful server, she's a blast. There is just so much warmth about the place.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: The food was outstanding.  We had the special red snapper, it was absolutely delicious.  The service was excellent as always.  I dine here every time I visit Maui. Highly recommend!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Enjoyed the food and atmosphere.  Staff were excellent.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: The meatballs and the short ribs were awesome and Maui onion soup andMy special birthday berry pie!!!!And Buddy was a character/awesome person took good care of us!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Unquestionably,  this is one of the finest restaurants we have ever dined in. And we have eaten all over the world. Everything was superb - wait staff, food, ambiance, decor, etc.  You are taken care of from the time you enter the restaurant to the time you leave - and if you leave something behind at your table when you leave they will come running after you to make sure you get it back (in my case my hat). The owner goes to each table and introduces himself and makes you really feel at home. This is a top notch organization and the results show it. A real gem!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: 50th anniversary

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Scottie was a wonderful server. Type of place that focuses on the details and treats you with class. Wonderful food.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Wife and I went here after receiving a $100 gift card from my sister.  To be fair, we would never have gone here if not for the gift card after seeing the prices, we just don't dine at expensive restaurants.  Wife had Pacific Salmon ($49) and I had Boneless Short Rib ($46).  Neither of us drink alcohol.  Wife's Salmon was to come with Asparagus, came with String Beans instead.  Waitress and table assistant did come by a bit but nothing special about the service (I would imagine if we got drinks and an appetizer they would have come by more often but not much of a need with just us getting the dinner plate with no desert).  Her Salmon was OK as was my Boneless Rib but nothing special tasting.  Inside was nice but nothing special and a bit noisy even though we weren't in the main dining area.  No place to park close and plan on $10 or more paid parking unless a few blocks away ($5).  Gift card covered the meals, gave a $20 cash tip.  If you like expensive dinners this place may be good with you, check out the cost with the online menu. We much prefer the Okazuya & Deli Honokowai at 3600D Lower Honoapiilani.  If you've never been there go (take cash, they do not accept credit card and closed on Sundays).  Average dinner price is $17-18, the Mahi Mahi (includes two sides) is unbelievably good as is everything on the menu, it's TAKE OUT so it's perfect for beach dinning or at a condo lanai.  Wish sis had given us cash for us to use where we wanted, but her thought was in the right place.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Amazing food and service 💕

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Awesome place. Food and service was amazing.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Have been to Maui several times but this is the first time eating here..... everything was awesome! We will be back for sure!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Don’t miss the Lahaina Grill.  A must while on Maui!

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Went for our anniversary dinner and had asked for a special table, we ate in the middle of the dinning room. The waitress was nice but had a very odd personality that didn’t seem like she really cares to be there. The tomato in the tomato and mozzarella salad was hard, underripe and had been blanched to peel. Odd. Can’t believe they can charge so much for one tomato and some cheese! The entrees, one being the special for the day, were a let down as well. Not sure what all the hype is about this place.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: We've enjoyed many evenings at the Lahaina Grill and everyone is special.  Among the many fantastic restaurants in Lahaian and on the island - the Lahaina Grill is our favorite and we believe the best.

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Great food and staff

Name: Lahaina Grill
Comment: Ask for a table away from the bar. Very loud.Wish they could get a better parking experience. There is no handicapped parking near by.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Excellent food and service

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Always a Home run of a dining experience. Food and wine are excellent and staff is knowledgeable. My only call out is the server seemed a little annoyed we ordered dessert/dessert wine. Understandably she wanted to close out her tables and go home but otherwise great experience.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Consistently excellent. We brought people who hadn't been there and they were very happy. Service was great, seated promptly, food came out in an orderly and timely manner.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Outstanding as always! Love the new expanded brunch menu and excited that you'll be open for brunch on Saturdays too!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Both the food and the service are consistently good.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Great place. Awesome pasta.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: The food tasted very nice, only the serving size could have been bigger

Name: LArtusi
Comment: The crudo  was outstanding, the wait staff professional, knowledgeable and friendly.  I was disappointed in the Branzino  it was overcooked and over sauced  and Brussels undercooked; but my husband’s Halibut  was excellent!  Wine list and wine excellent!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: We had a nice brunch, nothing life-changing but good  - the portions are huge though. We ordered way too much - wish the waiter would have told us?!!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Start to finish, the service, suggestions, and presentation were tremendous.  And as for the food?  Again, never missed a single beat, the quail, tuna tartar, spaghetti, there was not a crack in any of the dishes. Finishing with the olive oil cake with creme fraiche was the perfect closure. Bravo to this restaurant that again came through.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Amazing. So hard to get a reservation but l’artusi was amazing

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Amazing brussel sprouts and french toast. The pasta was good, but a little over priced.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Went for Brunch. Not many true Italian options, not sure anyone on the staff even spoke Italian. Restaurant decor was dated and sloppy. Despite all the stellar reviews we were underwhelmed by the whole experience. Food was good but, pretty standard.  Service was OK.  Didn't make us want to try to get on the list for dinner.  We talked about how disappointed we were the rest of the day.  We'll be going to Rafele from here on out.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Service was a little slow, after the food was delivered - it felt almost like our table was forgotten. It took awhile to get a check (we had to flag down our waiter after the first time we asked for it) and once we put down our credit cards even longer to get back the check to sign. To be fair, they may have been short staffed. It was fairly busy. However that said - when we did get service at the table, everyone was friendly and accommodating. Food was outstanding.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Excellent brunch! The pastry basket was filled with delicious homemade treat. Our service was stellar.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: The food was excellent but was very disappointed with the service. Dined here once before and thought the food was good but was blown away by what I thought was the best service I had ever had. Then this time I went, waited over 20 minutes past my reservation time, server was inattentive and the gap between appetizer and entree was far too long. Food was good but poor service overshadowed it this time.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: We had a reservation at 8:30 and they sat us at 9. They gave us a glass of champagne as an apology which was nice. Otherwise the experience was great, server was knowledgeable. Food was good but did not exceed expectations.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: The food here is amazing, especially the pasta, but the ambience and service have suffered from the popularity of the place. Still overall one of my favorite restaurants in Manhattan.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: We have been several times to this restaurant for dinner, this was our second time for brunch and we were so displeased with the service and how much they rushed us through our meal. It was a late brunch reservation and they cut off service because they had to get ready for the dinner crowd. My recommendation is not to allow customers to make late brunch reservations if the service level is diminished  because they have to turn over for dinner.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Great service and an even better meal!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Delicious as always - highly recommend sharing the Lemon Ricotta pancakes on the side :) Were very accommodating when we were late for a reservation despite a busy brunch time!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Excelente Service! Amazing food!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Food was great, service was awful. Got orders wrong, took a long time to check on us. Would still go back though!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: My boyfriend & I LOVE L’ARTUSI !!! We always are trying new spots but this is a place we will forever love and continue to return to regularly 🥰

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Everything was delicious and the service was great. The spaghetti was really light and fresh. Roasted potatoes are a must as is the olive oil cake!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: It was our first year anniversary each plate was delicious

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Amazing pasta. Delicious meal. Cant wait to go back

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Wow — stellar food and service and not a fortune

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Lovely restaurant and food but difficult to get a reservation

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Amazing experience from the service to the food. If you can get a reservation I highly recommended.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Clearly this is a very popular restaurant but to my mind, it is overrated. The dishes we ate that night were overseasoned with far too much emphasis on chili in every dish. The steak was ordered medium rare but was served rare and I know we could have sent it back but this would have disrupted the evening. The tables are too close together and the noise level was rising even though the restaurant had only just opened.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: One of our favorites!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Always incredible.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Phenomenal food and absolutely amazing service. Our waiter went above and beyond to make our first l’artusi experience amazing. Food is insanely good.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Love love love L'Artusi. This place knows what it's doing. It has amazing food and the best, nicest, most competent waitstaff and management. In a city with so many good restaurants, this is the one I go back to again and again as my favorite.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: It still seems de rigeur for city restaurants to court noise level beyond the ears of most human diners.  That said, L’Artusi was a wonderful culinary experience, with a thoughtful sommelier who was touchingly unaffected, and a waiter with a sense of irony.  The butter lettuce salad was a marvel, the pasta (kale pyramide) far from the “pile of greens” its name tends to imply to Americans.  That we were the oldest diners in evidence is certainly not a complaint...just a regret for lost dining innocence!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: We came for our anniversary and the service was amazing! We had a 10pm reservation but popped in around 7 and they were able to seat us early right away. They provided complimentary champagne at the start which was special and thoughtful. Our waiter Dan was perfectly attentive, helping with recommendations and kept the speed of the meal at a relaxing, welcoming pace. The experience overall was one I can’t wait to recommend to others! We will be back!

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Was very good! Food was delicious. Minus 1 star for the noise level

Name: LArtusi
Comment: The food is always great here! It is a special place because my fiancé and I ate here before he proposed to me in April. The food is so good that we have come back just because and to bring visiting friends and family.

Name: LArtusi
Comment: Unfortunately the hangar steak this time was not up to the usual lartusi standards. It was tough and not just one piece but all of it. So disappointed. I have been here 5 times before with no issue. Plan to go back again and try it. Made the whole dinner a fail for a new guest.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Again, we always feel comfortable, here. We enjoy the staff and choices for dining. I didn’t want to be critical so just explaining “value” one star below excellent due to wine price. We’ll still drink wine, there.Jan

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Always nice. Indoor patio was a little warm.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Our serving was amazing! He gave us great recommendations and honestly needs a pay increase for the amount of attention he gave out table. Really appreciate the service and quality of menu items. Muscles, beeet salad, crab and tuna tower all sensational.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: The food, service, and ambience were all fantastic.  The services provided by the professional management and staff are the main reasons that we keep coming back.   The old world elegance is a rare thing, and we value their focus to make sure that everything about the dining experience is excellent.   I highly recomend this restaurant.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Service was attentive without being intrusive.  Crab avocado appetizer was delicious.  Perfect for a great date night or special occassion.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Excellent service and food as per usual.  Our favorite French.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: First time back after the COVID shutdown... SO good to be home!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Had lunch outside with two friends and it wasgreat‼️

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Lovely and excellent cuisine!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: I love their brunch. Poached eggs are always cooked to perfection.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: A great place to get a taste of French informal dining in Dallas. Service is impeccable and the menu and beverage selection is great. a very nice date location.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: It’s always a pleasure. The staff is perfect and the food outstanding.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Finally after pandemic Place sparkledFood tasted better than ever

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: The food, service, and ambience were all fantastic.  The services provided by the professional management and staff are the main reasons that we keep coming back.   The old world elegance is a rare thing, and we value their focus to make sure that everything about the dining experience is excellent.   I highly recomend this restaurant.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: It was wonderful to dine in at Le Bilboquet. I was celebrating my 70th birthday with my husband and another couple, friends of ours.The staff was excellent. Accommodating in every way. We were never rushed and really enjoyed the ambience.I had the crab and avocado salad for my entrée and it was delicate and lovely to my palate. My husband was thrilled to see the Frog Legs were on the menu and indulged. I had gazpacho soup for my starter and he had the grilled endive, which I kept eating from his plate. It was prepared beautifully. The restaurant gave me a complimentary peach tarte a la mode dessert for my birthday which had a brilliant sparkler on top. Our dinner was a perfect experience.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Great food and great service. Even under threat of incoming riots, the staff was extremely professional when making the emergency shutdown of the restaurant.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Gracious staff and the food was delicious‼️

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: The dinner was delicious and the service was outstanding. Our waiter was so helpful. I look forward to returning soon. Thank you, Beverly Franckhauser

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Le Bilboquet is always an incomparable Dallas dining experience in all respects.  It is something that everyone should experience at least once.  However, it is far better to make it a regular personal event!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Great servicePatio is quaint Quality / price on the food is the issue The  foie gras is a Demi cuit but had no taste ..... the brioche that came with it was on the other hand excellent The escargot where small and  overcooked The halibut was fresh but the dish itself boring The scallopini where good well prepared The profiterole were okThe flotting island with the creme anglaise was a 7The waiter was great

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: One of my very favorite restaurants in Dallas!! Cajun Chicken is the best! Beautiful place and great food and service!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Excellent service, food and social distanced tables.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: All tables were spaced.  All servers were masked.  Our table outside was perfect.  Even the weather cooperated.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Great service and delicious food! The chocolate mousse is a must!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: excellent food -- great wine list and superbe service we will be back soon

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Food and Service was excellent.  Server could not have been nicer and more attentive.  Food was exceptional.   Highly recommend.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Had a great Brunch. Highly recommended!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Charming place.  Food was good and service was very nice.  It was our first time to dine there and we’ll be back.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Pinot Grigio was fantastic, Cajun chicken and veal scallopine were awesome. Excellent service!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: The restaurant did not enjoy we had a toddler with us! Even though the toddler was very well behaved, heaven forbid any child make noise in this establishment. Further they switched out bottle with another table of which we didn’t make a fuss. When it was brought to mangers attention it was made to feel as though I was being extended a curtsy to comp an extra glass I ordered rather than a apology. The manger then pointed out to me that 3 small wine glasses of Prosecco is a normal amount per bottle. I don’t wish to be insulted on a Sunday morning and then have my intelligence questioned. Clearly the lack of service was disappointing!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: It was our anniversary but we didn’t think we told them. Possibly it was in our profile. Regardless, they brought us dessert and helped us celebrate. Everything was wonderful. Might be our be fave!

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: The food, service, and ambience were all fantastic.  The services provided by the professional management and staff are the main reasons that we keep coming back.   The old world elegance is a rare thing, and we value their focus to make sure that everything about the dining experience is excellent.   I highly recomend this restaurant.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Table was very small and up against a post. The four of us were very crowded, and it felt cramped and uncomfortable.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Wonderful dining experience and delicious food. We always have a great meal every time we visit.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: The best go to in Dallas! Best Neighborhood spot

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Always wonderful

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: One of my favorite restaurants in Dallas.  Ambiance is lovely and the food is always delicious

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Excellent each time.

Name: Le Bilboquet - Dallas
Comment: Incredible food, exceptional service, wonderful setting. We love Le Bilboquet.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Food, service and ambiance all excellent. Problem was my Italian leather gloves were picked from my pocket at the coat check. Management promised to make good on this and they never did.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Fantastic food .good service.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Lovely space - food was fabulous. Took a little time to get any service/ welcome at the table, save water delivery. Nice wine choice via sommelier. We’ll be back. Love the Paris-based Spring.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Everything was spectacular!  Among the best dining experiences any of us have ever had.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Waited too long to be seated. Especially when we were seated at a mediocre table. Right next to the entrance. Cold draft every time someone opened the door. The kind of table one gets when they’re a walk in. Asked to sit in the main dining room and they told me that would not be a problem if I wanted to wait another 30 min. This is NOT the type of service one is supposed to get at this level restaurant. Food was ok. Service was very good except they left the crumbs on the table too long after the plates were taken away. Not impressed.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Great and creative food. Impeccable service and a great and cozy ambience. A bit pricy though.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: El mejor lugar para comer en todo NY sin duda

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Not a single complaint. Everything was spot on and we will be back.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Superb! 4course tasting...out of this world

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Delicious French food in a charming and beautiful setting.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Too many workers standing around just chatting with each other. Best employee was the water server. Way too many staff with nothing to do. Food was above average but nothing exceptional compared to other Michelin restaurants.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Le Coucou was outstanding in every way. Beautiful space, with great lighting and generous spacing between tables, which allowed for easy conversation (at normal volume) at our table. The food was traditional in style yet creative and perfectly executed; truly delicious. Save room for dessert, which was exceptional. Service was superb: attentive and professional, but not hovering. With wine, this is an expensive evening, and easily worth it.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: My favourite NYC restaurant, they really treat you like gold when you visit.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: By far, our favorites dining experience in the states.  From the moment we walked in until we left every moment and every detail was impeccable.  It was like art watching the staff, both front and back of house seamlessly attending tables, food and beverage.   We thoroughly enjoyed our table as the view of the kitchen was front and center.  My boyfriend ordered the quenelle de brochet and duck.  It was as good as any I’ve had in Paris.  Thoughtful and approachable wine list exciting novices and aficionados alike.  And then there is dessert... DO NOT SKIP.  A big thank you to Guillermo for taking us through such a beautiful afternoon.  We cannot wait to return.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Beautiful and excellent  restaurant ! Love it! I recommend this restaurant

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Third visit to le coucou, wonderful as usual with one caveat. The table behind us was extremely loud. It was apparent to us that the staff was unhappy with their behavior as well. I continue to give 5 stars in the hope that reservations will be monitored to maintain the pleasant atmosphere we have experienced in the past.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Le Coucou is so wonderful- great ambience and fantastic food & service. Great for all occasions! Very civilized and elegant!

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: It's still a fine restaurant, and I think we'd go back, but it's not the really wonderful experience we had in November 2018.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: In a word: EXTRAORDINARY!

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Great experience! Service , food and vibe! Highly recommend!! Top 10 restaurant in my list.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: I don’t know if I would recommend Le Coucou for breakfast. It was such a huge let down with some breakfast dishes not being available.Two weeks prior I had gone for dinner which was an amazing meal and experience. Breakfast was the total opposite of dinner.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Unbelievable!!

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Exceptional

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Just awesome. It was amazing.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Le Coucou is a perfect place to relax and enjoy a lunch or dinner in a beautiful, pleasant atmosphere. The service is impeccable, very friendly, attentive and discreet. Needless to say that the dishes served here are wonderfully prepared.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: A perfectly beautiful restaurant with charming service and delicious food !

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Everything was amazing from start to finish.I just wished our server was a little happier that day and at least try to smile. The food was delicious and ambiance was just right.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Flawless French cooking accompanied by superb service

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Amazing atmosphere and the service is impeccable. Food quality is top notch with a lot of deep flavors.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Wonderful dining experience.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Outstanding restaurant in all areas. My new firm favourite in NYC.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Food was delicious, service amazing! We were expecting brunch, but we realized there wasn’t brunch, only lunch. It was amazing either way

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Overall the restaurant was very good . I was disappointed that I couldn’t get a later time . The food was delicious , dessert could have been better . The decor is beautiful! . It is very pricey.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: I came here for my birthday about a week ago. Everything was absolutely perfect!! The whole experience was amazing- everyone was super friendly and attentive, the ambiance was stunning, and the food was amazing! Can’t wait to go back!

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Perfection

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: What a wonderful dinner. Delicious food, stunning presentation, enchanting space. Erin the sommelier was amazing. Can’t say enough good things about Chef Rose’s latest jewel (I was a big fan of Spring in Paris). Can’t wait to come back!

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: One of our favorite places. Never disappoints.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Our first date night since the birth of our baby son!

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Food and service were excellent.  Restaurant is lovely.

Name: Le Coucou
Comment: Outstanding

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Although the food was good, we were given a bad table and spent the whole meal in very hot direct sunlight. Since this was a special event, the table placement was extremely disappointing.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: This was a dinner for my 40th birthday and my best friend’s 43rd birthday. When I made the reservation, I noted it on Open Table. I also told the reservationist when he called to confirm. No one said a thing - nothing!!! - during our entire experience. I certainly did not expect anything big, but a “happy birthday!” would have been nice. Very disappointed in the service.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Had lunch around 2pm. We sat inside.  Food and service was great, however, there were so many fly’s all over the place that we couldn’t wait to leave.  It really destroyed the whole experience.  They left the door wide open on a warm sunny day.  I understand one or two but there were at least 10 fly’s constantly flying around us.  It was absolutely terrible.  It was unacceptable.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Fun! Waiter was extra nice and everything on the menu sounded like a dream!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Note that we dined at Le Diplomate during social distancing--well less than 50% capacity inside.  Normally it is not a quiet place. We ate inside; they also have tables outside, but at 90 degrees inside was better.My choices: warm shrimp salad and trout with almonds.  Salad was phenomenal, due to perfectly cooked shrimp and ripe avocado along with the greens. Trout was perfect. Spouse had foie gras pate, incredibly smooth, and the Tuesday night lobster risotto special.  Both really good--lobster cooked perfectly.  Splurged on an expensive bottle of white Burgundy.
