Perfect with these dishes.When restaurants open fully, Le Diplomate will return to being packed.  Good for them, even though that means it will again be tough to get a reservation.  (We dined on a Tuesday night with reservations a week in advance.)

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Food was amazing, server outstanding, restaurant decor charming

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Bro sickest meal i’ve had in DC. Server was crazy good, food was even nuttier. I called my moms to tell her how ridiculously ill they were with it. FIVE STARS EACH AND EVERY DAY.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Very good restaurant. Food is amazing and service as well. Would go back for sure anytime. A very large selection of great wines.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Our server, Carl, was very personable and made some great recommendations.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: This was our first time eating at a restaurant since CV 19 hit and things got shut down. We ate outside and have to complement Le Diplomate on how well they are dealing with service and food in the current environment. Would definitely recommend you go there

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Enjoyed the patio

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Excellent service and very good food. Appreciate the distancing of tables.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: It was great to be back - although 50% of Le Dip is the ambiance and energy which has obviously diminished with CovidI cannot wait until it’s up and running at full potential

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Always a pleasure!!!!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Happy to see you open again.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Amazing experience, our first time dining out in 3 months since COVID.  Truly a great and safe experience, marked floors, respectful social distance, kind staff and delicious food we missed!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Appropriate social distancing and additional cleaning measures in place to give diners confidence in safe dining. Food and service were great as always!-Gabe

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Le Diplomate never disappoints us! Delicious food&drink, great service!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Granted I Booked hours ahead (not days):Made request for outdoor seating. If unavailable I asked for a call if that was not possible. Arrived; waited and then was told indoor only. Hostess acknowledged our request. The hostess was unapologetic regarding no call (this is really all that was needed: “sorry it’s been busy and we were unable to get to requests.” Simple courteous customer service from a “host”. )The app did not give any warning of indoor only. When I look to reserve now It gives the option for outdoor. I would suggest to open table if unavailable that this also be evident.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Excellent cuisine and gracious service. Jacquesson 742 exceptional! Thank you as always.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: It was my birthday. Excited to get out and had a reservation for outside seating. Instead, I was seated indoors. I asked a staff member after we were seated to check on the mistake for me, but no one ever did. I thought I might be okay inside, but I got nervous and my husband sat next to me for a moment to see if I would be okay. The manager immediately came and asked him to move, and while I am understanding that with Covid that was against the rules, he should have been escorting us to our outdoor table per our reservation. It's on me that I didn't get up and leave, but I wanted to enjoy a night out finally. With so many restaurants in need of our support, this one doesn't really deserve it. The food is always good, so I have no complaint with that, but I would only suggest going here if they will honor outdoor reservations.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: I felt rushed by the staff, my steak came Out cold, the bread is not hot looks like it was from the previous day. my server had no patience and was limit ignoring us, I am not sure if I will return there one day

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Had dinner with a friend that I hadn't seen in years.  We spent hours catching up and never felt rushed - even with the restaurant at the required 50% capacity.  Adnane was the perfect server and the food was spectacular, as usual.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Kudos to Le Diplomate not only for the excellent meal, as always, but also the wonderful job they did with social distancing protocols. The experience was pleasant, and we felt comfortable with the extended distance between patio dining tables. Thank you for opening so responsibly; it was great being back.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Had a terrific brunch! Caught up with two friends! Food was delicious! Le Dips utilization of QR menus makes it contact free friendly. Smooth service and wonderful ambience.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: They did great with social distancing the tables.  All staff wore masks and menus were scanned to your phone.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Excellent as always. Thank you!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Hands down, the best top-to-bottom restaurant in Washington.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: All of my hot dishes came out cold: (mushroom tart and steak frites (both steak and fries). My steak was also much smaller and less properly seared than by partners.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Very good food and service, but our waiter was a little abrupt. Ambiance outside is not as authentic.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: I was so happy that the patio reopened.  Le Diplomate has always been one of my favorites and it was wonderful to see some of the old favorites back on the menu.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: The. BEST. Ever

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: It was my mom’s birthday on Jun 17, I was really excited to take her to the restaurant so she could try the duck à l’orange dish. However, due to COVID 19 they don’t serve that entree, which was not a big deal at all.It started to rain when we came in, we sat outside the patio, later on the rain was heavier, so I asked the waiter that was it possible could we move the table to inside a bit cause we sat right on the edge of the patio so my mom got wet. He explained that he couldn’t cause of the social distancing. We all got it. Then I asked him was it possible could him pull the rain cover down a little bit? He answered “sorry I cant”. Then he walked away. We had 5 people, and there was a big table behind us, it was enough for 6 people and he even didn’t bother to ask do we want to move the table or not. Even he saw that we will get wet when we sit there.The service was really bad!! He barely took care off us. He let us sat there more than 20’. So I walked to the host and asked her could we change our table? Then she said “yes”. Foods came out. We order 4 portions of Beef Bourguignon, I got the Half chicken. The chicken was fine. But the beef were really salty. Nothing like I expected. I didnt mean to say everything had to be perfect. But I did trust Le Diplomate is a good restaurant to take my family there to celebrate because I had been there many times. It was good though. Not like this time. We all understand that due to COVID 19 everything is getting harder, but as a big restaurant with good reputation, they should had done so much better than that. I didnt want to complain anything about what happened, but this time it was bad. Overall,I want to give some feedback so the restaurant could improve their performance in advance.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Lovely lunch!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: The food and drinks were delicious.  It was the best French onion soup and trout amandine I’ve had and the mussels were of ideal consistency and flavor.  We felt safe because the outdoor patio tables were placed far away from each other and the servers and other customers were very respectful of social distancing and infection prevention precautions.  A great first outdoor dining experience in uncertain times!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Always a lovely time at Le Diplomate.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: This was our first outing at a restaurant since the Covid pandemic and our server made sure our family had a beautiful meal and experience, despite the hot and humid weather.  His cheerful attitude made all the difference, and he timed our meal perfectly. Thankfully, the hostess seated us in a very shady spot and she did a great job of making sure everyone was socially distanced.  Amazing service as per usual!!

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Felt very safe!  Best first meal out of quarantine!!!  🙌🙌

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Get the burger it is absolutely awesome!!!!  The drinks and cheeses are good as well.

Name: Le Diplomate
Comment: Great Burger!!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Sunday Brunch was delicious.  Great variety of meal options.  Eggs Benedict was done to perfection.  Very pleasant atmosphere.Would highly recommend.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Simply the best restaurant in Palm Springs.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Great 5-Star restaurant with a very knowledgeable, considerate and caring staff. Outstanding menu selections, many unique to southern CA.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Outstanding, one of the best in the world..

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: This is not only our favorite restaurant in Palm Springs, but anywhere.  It is expensive and a special occasion kind of place.  We make it a point to dine here whenever we visit.  Highly recommend!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Every aspect of the meal was wonderful. The patio is gorgeous and the wait staff is top of the line. The chef is as good as it gets.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: The food was sublime as always, and Marcella was a fantastic server!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: The brunch menu is terrific. Although a fixed price, including wine and champagne, they offer quite a few choices for each course. Desert was great. I am especially fond of floating islands which my grandmother used to make. I haven't found any other place that match hers. Services was outstanding.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Brunch was superb. Service first rate, correct and friendly. A pleasurable mid-day occasion.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: We typically come here on special occasions like anniversaries, birthdays, or Valentine’s Day. It is truly an outstanding dining experience in almost every way.  My wife always feels special when I take her here.  Sitting in the courtyard under the ficus trees and lights is classically romantic.  For food lovers, the menu is unique and diverse, you’re guaranteed to find something special, quite the food adventure, and I’ve never had a dish that isn’t delicious.   The wait staff is very courteous, prompt, friendly, all the things you want.  I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a special night out.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Wine by glass very expensive but a great wine list

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Lovely courtyard

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Le Vallauris is probably the best 'fine dining' restaurant in Palm Springs.  I actually like having lunch there more than dinner because during the day you can see the beauty of the patio.  We got the 3 course lunch for $44.50 and it was worth every penny.  The staff is lovely and they know that to dine there is a special treat, so you are treated very well.  It is not cheap but then it wasn't made to be that way.  Truly an incredible restaurant.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Simply the best Palm Springs has to offer.  The food is spectacular and the outdoor garden area a very beautiful place.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Intimate Birthday dinner. Charming romantic interior courtyard. Old school classic style but not stuffy.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: This is an elegant old Palm Springs place, great outdoor patio eating.Lobster bisque was gorgeous. Not the cheapest place, but fantastic wine list and excellent food.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: La Vallauris does not disappoint.  As always, the entire experience was remarkable - the food, service, ambiance.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: A plus every time!!!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: This is my favorite restaurant in Palm Springs, if not anywhere.  The service is attentive without being overly pretentious.  The outdoor dining patio is lovely...almost makes you forget you're dining under the stars.  The menu is imaginative while not taking unusual flavor chances.  The pre fix menu is a bargain for what's included.  I always look forward to returning!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Our entire experience exceeded our expectations. From the friendly and fun reception to the lovely alfresco dining room the setting was superb. Our server Christine was on the finest we’ve encountered, she made spot on recommendations for wine pairings and was a delight to chat with.The experience was elegant without being pretentious! Loved it.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Always perfect...Perfectly cooked...perfectly served...perfectly perfect!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: It was a real treat to dine in a beautiful resturant with class and elegance!  The waiter was wonderful  and we enjoyed the evening and it is now our favorite resturant in Palm springs

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: We dine here every time we are in PS.  Beautiful patio, perfect service and wonderful food.  The Degustation menu was not only delicious, but very well paced.  Delightful dinner.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Always great food and great service. We love the beautiful patio setting.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Our favorite restaurant in the world...from start to finish, everything is superb. A beautifully paced dining experience!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Excellent food, setting, ambiance.  Worth a special occasion

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Celebrated my wife’s birthday accompanied by her older sister, who was a little slow getting ready and we were going to be 15 minutes late. Called to let them know and they held our table, no problem. Service was wonderful and attentive, moving heaters to keep us comfortable. Escargot was very nice and garlicky. Wife and I had duck that was nice and crispy as advertised. Sister loved her lobster salad. Martinis were acceptably priced at $15, but the least expensive wine by the glass was $18, which I think is way too high. That’s my only complaint. Otherwise, an enjoyable meal and evening at a beautiful venue.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Charming, gracious and lovely in all catagories!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Wonderful Sunday Brunch, Would recommend going. Make sure you sit outside it is beautiful .

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Sunday brunch with lovely free flowing champagne is wonderful experience. Staff ver6 att3ntive despite busy time and sitting out amongst trees very pleasant.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: I had one bite of my entree and knew it would make me sick if I ate the whole thing, it was too greasy. I tried to send it back but the manager came out and told me that no one else had complained and they charged me full price for the disgusting dish. Never had such a rude waitstaff.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Wonderful experience as always.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: We were most disappointed with the service. Our waitress was aware that we’d asked to speak to the sommelier to order a 3rd growth Bordeaux but still placed our food order   Our first course arrived before we’d ordered our bottle of wine as we were waiting for the sommelier. It was unacceptable. We should have returned the food, but most importantly she should have postponed our first course. What was to be a beautiful evening became a most unpleasant evening as our first course was cooling off as we spoke to the sommelier. We were rushed which is unacceptable when you spend over $400 on an evening dinner for 2.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: From the moment we were greeted by the maitre’d we knew this was going to be a memorable experience. The wait staff was over-the-top attentive and the waitress engaging and knowledgeable. We have dined at Alinea, Le Bernadin and Daniel to name a few of our most remarkable experiences and this ranked with the best.While a bit more expensive than the standard Palm Springs/Palm Desert fare this was worth every penny of the additional cost. Starting with escargot and finishing with a dark chocolate torte, every dish was delicious. Don’t miss this wonderful PS experience.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Great fine dining in Palm Springs. Old school classy restaurant.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Top notch all the way. Management is present at the tables and everyone is friendly and professional. We ate there two nights in a row.

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Our first night in Palm Springs and we had reservations for 6pm.  Got there and no patio seating, they put us in a walkway and we said no, they moved us inside and after 5 minutes it got hot and stuffy so we decided to leave.  The owner/Mature D came out after us and asked why we left, he offered to seat us in the patio!!!  It was a really nice experience!  The sea bass and lobster were fantastic!  We would recommend this fine dining experience!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: Delicious, great service and wonderful ambience! We’ll be back !

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: I took two special friends to Le Vallauris to thank them for their help. This is ALL of our favorite restaurant EVER!! We all feel very special when we dine there. Everything is first class and the staff always makes us feel special. Of course, we are!! If I could afford it, I’d eat there daily! It’s that good!!

Name: Le Vallauris
Comment: I always feel that I,ve spent an afternoon in the south of France when I have dined at Vallauris.Merci

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Linwood’s is always my favorite “go to”. I can always count on a great meal every single time I go there.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: I am a regular customer at Linwood’s.  On this visit, the service was very slow.  Imagine looking at an empty plate with crossed utensils for 20 minutes before wait staff appears with the bill.  The restaurant was not super busy, but I was forgotten with beverage service, then between appetizer and main course.  I know that the wait staff can do better.  The BBQ salmon was excellent and the crab gazpacho did not disappoint.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Always good. Glad that the menu is expanding, too.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Slow service. Portions of food smallNot up to pre-COVID standards It will take time

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Excellent as always.  Outside tables were spaced apart nicely and staff was courteous with masks on at all times.  Was a little disappointed in cosmo which was way too strong and not good.  Love the way Linwood’s splits entrees for people.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Food and service always outstanding. Linwood’s has made outdoor dining upscale. Annie provides excellent service every time!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: The food is amazing, drinks delicious. If I have to find something “negative “, it would be the fact that their watermelon salad isn’t on the appetizer menu at this time.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: The staff at Linwood’s is phenomenal

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Amazing food and service.  Octopus app was best I ever had!  Crab cakes all lump no filler!  Great seafood tacos.  Bronzino was cooked to perfection.  Service is impeccable and not overbearing.  They are doing a great job of making you feel comfortable during the pandemic.  Everyone socially distance.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Everything was wonderful!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: We dined outside at well spaced tables. It was a pleasure to be able to eat real high quality restaurant food again. The bronzini was delicious, the atmosphere was very casual and well thought out and the service was excellent. A nice return to civilized dining.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Many years and many dinners with today’s challenges Linwood’s still never disappoints.  All dinners and appetizers were great, tuna tartare, sea bass with crab, Brussels Caesar, all were great.  Pro service and acceptable ambiance considering.Loved our evening at Linwood’s.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: We were seated as soon as we arrived, but our server did not come to the table for 15 minutes to greet us. When she did come to the table she apologized and stated she is getting familiar with the new routine since reopening and would be right back after closing out the table next to us. She did apologize for the delay, but she walked pass our table at least two times before greeting or recognizing us. During our dinner service we asked for bread and she shared she would get it right away. Again, apologizing for not bringing it out. A few minutes later she returned without bread and informed us that they ran out of bread. Really??? People are still being seated for dinner service and you run out of bread.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Perfect as always

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Excellent food and service

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Annie is wonderfulGood deliciousPerfect

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Great food, great service, great ambiance in outside patio area. Linwood is taking all precautions to keep diners safe.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Linwoods is our favorite restaurant, has been for a long time. Never disappoints. Great food, great cocktails, and GREAT service.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Linwoods is always great!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: It is always a treat to return to our favorite restaurant.    The food, drinks and service were superb, as usual.   Linwood's was the first place we wanted to visit, now that inside dining has opened up.  Tables were distanced, and precautions were being taken.   It was great to be back!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Pineapple martini is always a must  Great brussel sprout Caesar salad , wonderful hamburger, great roasted chicken (allow extra time, it takes 30 minutes) amazing hot fudge sundae. Great every time.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: loved eating outside--food and service tops--what you always get from Linwoods!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Birthday celebration... food was amazing!  I tried the tempura lobster with honey butter sauce and it was soo delicious!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: GREAT FOOD GREAT SERVICE it’s like that every time

Name: Linwoods
Comment: On the patio, lovely, safely done.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Linwood has taken outdoor dining to a new level!  Food and service always on point!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Linwoods never disappoints.The entire experience is always excellent. Expensive but worth every penny. The outdoor seating was delightful.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Very clean. Food was great and came out fast. Waitress was attentive

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Excellent as always!! ❤️

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Always a great experience very friendly and a great staff   Food is always good and they always have a smile

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Linwood’s never disappoints. They did an awesome job making us feel welcome and safe in what is now a difficult environment to operate a dining establishment.  Kudos to the management and staff for their hard work and organization.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Our first dining experience since the Covid-19 closed everything down 2 months ago... couldn't have been better!! Linwoods is one of our favorite places - it was a beautiful evening - the outdoor eating setup was great - service was excellent (Annie) - and our food was delicious! It was a great welcome back to almost normal!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Linwoods did a great job with their outdoor seating and safety - cleaning measures to ensure their guests had a safe environment. The food was amazing , service was impeccable and Linwood came to table to personally thank us for dining there! Highly recommend and can’t wait to go back !!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: tempura lobster.... sadly....   no where near as epic as it used to be....     no honey. sweet flavor....     brussel salad lovely octopus cooked perfectly.     WAYYYYYYY to much other stuff on the plate.. all octopus flavor went away

Name: Linwoods
Comment: second time in a week - food and service was outstanding

Name: Linwoods
Comment: As always the food and service were wonderful.  We were also very impressed by the steps taken to make diners feel comfortable, as the restaurant had only recently reopened to outside dining during this crisis.  The tables were well spaced, everything seemed very organized and clean.  We felt very comfortable eating there, and look forward to going back.

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Don't let the outdoor dining stop you from visiting Linwoods.  They still do it Right!

Name: Linwoods
Comment: We ate outside glad to support our local restaurant been coming here for years

Name: Linwoods
Comment: We had our dinner on the patio outside because we are still in phase I of the virus regulations.  It was chilly and windy but the weather did not stop us from enjoying our meal

Name: Linwoods
Comment: Hole pretty much any food would have been fantastic after being cooped up for months, the quality was amazing. It is as if they picked up right where they left off. I was so impressed by how hard everyone on the staff was working hard to make this strange time feel “normal.”

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: They didn’t tell us it’s closed. We get e-mail the day before reservations that the dinner is confirmed. We get a Taxi from Lahaina to Paia and then we see it’s close.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Macadamia nut crusted fish stuffed with crab might be the best thing I’ve ever eaten.  Cocktails were perfect.  Beautiful place and the view of the ocean/beach is a perfect touch.  Great ambiance.  Server was amazing.  He was very knowledgeable, friendly, helpful, and energetic.  Complimentary bread was ok, but i could’ve had a gallon of the complimentary Clam-and-mushroom bisque.  Black pearl oyster dessert was beautiful and elegant, but I definitely think we probably could’ve gotten a better tasting dessert based on the other options we saw.  No problem if we get to back though!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Incredible food and beautiful view!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: 4th time at Mama’s Fish House and it, of course, never disappoints!!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: It was our first time at Mama's Fish house and the food was amazing and so was the ambience.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: The food and atmosphere are amazing. I had a vegetarian option that was not on the menu, it came with a banana curry sauce, which was absolutely to die for. I highly recommend going here at least once. However, the price is a very steep. Drinks are $20+ and food is $50+. I would expect to pay a premium for the quality of the food, but unfortunately the price is so high I do not see myself coming here more than one time per vacation.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: We had a wonderful experience at Mamas the day before they had to shut down.  We almost put it off a day and I am so glad we did not.  They’re Mai Tai was the best I’ve ever had.  We ordered every appetizer on the menu and they were all outstanding!  Our server was so wonderful as well as all the staff.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: A legend for dining in Maui. This place is always a treat - everything is done right. From the valet to the end of the meal - it all flows seemlessly and seemingly w/o effort! Yes it's expensive - very - but worth every penny.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: We've been to Mama's many times in the past and have never been disappointed.  Everything was exceptional, except that somehow we got missed with soup and bread appetizers, however the server apologized sincerely and sent us home with a goodie bag with bread, butter and soup.  The meals were excellent

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Food was delicious and presented well. Our waiter was wonderful as well. We were seated along the coastal view area which added to the wonderful experience. We will be back!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Wonderful day to lunch at Mama's and celebrate our granddaughter's upcoming 12th birthday while she is here on spring break from Colorado.  Attentive, thoughtful service by Will along with wonderfully flavored mahi mahi and yummy creme brûlée.  She felt very special and we enjoyed the moments at Mama's with her.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: This is by far the best place to eat on the island! The food is prepared beautifully and the servers are right there to help you with anything! The atmosphere is romantic and if you don’t want that it still is incredible!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Awesome food and service. We always enjoy our vidd sad it.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: I sent my daughter and son-in-law to Mama's Fish House for their anniversary.  My daughter texted to say it was the best meal they had ever had and that the waitress was really great to them.  I gave the restaurant my credit card ahead of time and they did everything right, including having an anniversary card from me all typed up and ready to give them.  Really impressive as I did all of the arranging from California!  Thank you, Mama's for making their anniversary REALLY special!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Outstanding atmosphere!  Great food and history at this place. They should bring back the old menu with more fish and preparation options.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: The food was amazing!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Mama’s House is a Must Do when in Maui.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Probably the best restaurant on Maui and possibly one if the best in the USA. Setting, food, service and ambiance are excellent. This is a very unique place. Just go. Make reservations.....

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: had to wait 20 min. with reservation   with plenty of open tables

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Amazing food and service!! Be sure to save room for the Black Pearl.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Worth every penny!  Coconut ice cream and coconut cake were more amazing than words could describe.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: The staff as always was exceptional and made my birthday special.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: As always - MFH was outstanding from the moment we arrived to the time we left. The ambiance is without compare - service & food more than that! Will always make MFH a must whenever on Maui!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: I have heard great things about Mama’s Fish House so thought I’d give it a try.  It far exceeded my expectations on every level.  Food was outstanding, drinks were quenching, service was attentive and friendly and the ambiance was what you would expect for a Hawai’i atmosphere.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Horrible service from bar and hostess stand. Food and server were great though!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Not a better place to have Dinner in the world. Food is the best bar none.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Amazing restaurant. From the beach and views to the wonderful service

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Hubby and I got a beautiful scenic spot by the window in this open air waterfront restaurant. The service was amazing and the food was pretty good. Will return again.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: It was excellent in all aspects!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Everything I expected and more! Food, service, and view all top notch.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Mama’s was great as usual. The setting is gorgeous and the food excellent.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Excellent selection of fresh fish. Beautiful restaurant, attentive staff.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Absolutely our number one favorite restaurant. Best Hawaiian setting, atmosphere ,on Maui..Everything is excellent.Dave Baker the day manager is perfect....

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: great food and atmosphere.  second time eating there and was great both times.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: ALWAYS a great experience!  This time was no exception. Gluten Free options great as well!  My compliments to all.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Always a must destination for us when we visit Maui and never ever disappoints.    Service is great.   Food is spectacular.  But the ambiance is like now other.   It’s like a movie set it’s so amazing

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Our server Mike was awesome, the food delicious and the ambiance spectacular. Would definitely recommend Mama’s!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Wonderful experience! The food is truly the best on Maui. We visited for our honeymoon and they staff made us feel so special and cared for!

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: I'd highly recommend Mama's fish House to any visitors to Maui. The service was unreal and the staff made sure every aspect of our dining experience was perfect.

Name: Mama's Fish House
Comment: Wonderdul location!  Great food!  Fabulous service!  Felt a bit gouged by the prices.  $20.00 for a glass of fairly inexpensive wine

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Wonderful food and service, they always deliver!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Everything about MF is amazing. The food. Wait staff. Ambiance. I can’t say enough about it.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: The food was excellent especially the Halibut en Croute, which was exceptional! I really wanted to try the very popular Chili Lobster with Texas Toast too, but my friend couldn't have lobster 😭. Next time for sure! Our server was the best as well. She went above and beyond to hook us up with little "extras" during the course of our meal, which made the experience that more wonderful. I look forward to my next dining experience at Marc Forgione.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Outstanding as always!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Service very poorHalf way thru wsiter just started ignoring usOrdered coffe capucino etcIt never came but was on the checkBig let down from prior visits

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: I have enjoyed several birthday dinners since the restaurant first opened in 2008 (I think), and as of Tuesday night the quality of the cuisine, service, and experience has not been diminished in any way.  That almost never happens in NYC!  Thank you for another delicious and fun evening.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Great upscale-casual atmosphere, amazing food, and the staff went above and beyond to help us celebrate.We had the halibut and the black cod, and I couldn't imagine how to improve either dish.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Above and beyond anything that could have been expected. After visiting Peasant, and meeting and talking with Chef Forgione (and being absolutely blown away by the food) only a week ago for my first dating anniversary with my boyfriend, I decided to take him here for his birthday. We were treated like royalty from the second we walked in, and the food matched the service. We ordered the chicories salad to start. It may sound/seem simple, but that was one of the best salads we’ve ever had. We were also given the Hiramasa tartare dish, which my boyfriend declared the best tartare dish he’s ever had. I had the half chicken (cooked under a brick), and he had the halibut - both outrageous. We had the carrot cake for dessert, but we were also given what the waiter called, ‘The Egg.’ He basically told us to move back in our seats a bit as he proceeded to toss a white chocolate egg filled with passion fruit into a plate ... it was as hysterical as it was delicious, and my boyfriend does not like passion fruit. There are no words that can properly describe this experience. From the card my boyfriend received when he sat down wishing him a happy birthday from the restaurant to the desserts to the sparkling wine to the everything bagel amuse bouche to the amazing atmosphere, this was a one of a kind experience. Simply outrageous, and we will be back.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Amazing as always!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Bad service and the food is over priced for what it is .

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Incredible food from start to finish !

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: This is a superb restaurant.    The chicken is spectacular!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Good place for a business meal. A bit overpriced.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Outstanding!!!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Always terrific !

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Great food, service.  Expensive but worth it

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: This place never disappoints. The food and wine were perfect.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Consistently some of the best food  and service in NYC. One of our favorite restaurants to go to for special occasions.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Good was excellent and so was the service. Server was very knowledgeable and offered great advice about certain dishes. A little pricey but worth it for a special date night/occasion

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: For my first NYC dinner I was blown away! Will definitely revisit

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Great service and food. Restaurant is extremely loud with no sound dampers. Go early for the food and miss the noise volume.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Love this restaurant Wonderful staff Great food

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Absolutely amazing service and delicious food!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Terrific all-around dinner.  Love the chicken for two, as well as a pear desert.  Service was attentive and efficient.  However, some of the appetizer portions were a bit small.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: We LOVE this place, and dine at least once a week here.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Every year we sneak down to this beautiful and cozy space eagerly awaiting the Singapore Chili Lobster, Halibut with Sauce Proposal and the brick chicken.   Loved the Laotian sushi during our last visit.  So thoughtfully prepared and lovingly executed each and every time.   One of our very favorite beacons for a perfect meal.   When we haven’t made it down to NYC in a while, our home bar can always pour the iconic banana Jameson, yet that always seems to make me ready to plan our next visit.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: I’ve wanted to go to this restaurant for years. I went for my birthday and it did not disappoint. Highly recommend!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Working in NYC for a month, I decided to have my own restaurant tour mostly chefs that I’ve seen on the Food Network. It’s also my birthday month, so I am going all out! I am thrilled this was one of my top picks! Everything is amazing! The staff, ambiance, food, little treats between courses, everything! I tried food I do not typically like venison. Being from Louisiana, someone is always cooking venison, and is not something I like. However, it was recommended by my waitress that it was her favorite. I figured if anyone was going to change my mind about venison, this maybe the only hope. Oh my, it was delicious! I can’t believe how much h I enjoyed it! My friend had the steak. We would giggle every few bites because the food made us that happy! Thanks for an amazing experience!

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Exquisite from start to finish. Exceptional service. Delicious and creative food.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Food is very good. Trout was perfectly grilled with Chanterelles and gnocchi with butter and sage. I’ve dined here several times and will come again.The servers are efficient and discreet.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: We had an excellent experience; great food and service.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Servizio eccellente ma cibo davvero nella media, mi aspettavo molto molto di più nella qualità.Prezzi esorbitanti, dolce buonissimo.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: This is a perfect spot for Christmas Eve dinner with close friends and family. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, the food superb. Our waiter was well informed and efficient. There was one thing that really had a decidedly negative impact on our experience: the presence of a waiter’s helper who paced back and forth constantly during our entire stay. I could feel eyes upon me as if watching every bite. When I put my fork down I was instantly approached “Are you finished?” I’m just sorry I did not ask the waiter to have this person removed. I understand the need to turn the tables on a busy night like Christmas Eve but must say that I will think twice before returning and, if I return, I would request to be left alone by the waiter’s helper.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Not impressed at all were waiting to eat here for months and when I did I only liked dessert and I couldn’t believe that there’s such a hype over this place. I’ve been eating everywhere from NYC to Miami Michelin started restaurants and mom and pop shops this was not good. I would not go back many other awesome places to eat right around the corner.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: My favourite restaurant in all of New York City - never disappointed and I make sure I go every time I visit

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Fabulous experience from start to end.Knowledgeable professional staffIntriguing / manageable cocktail menu and wine selection.Amuse established the mood for a creative competent kitchen.Shishito peppers simply salted and grilled ...Chicken under a brick - crisp skin floated over succulent half a chicken served 2 with sizzling halved potatoes.Two chocolate chip cookies did not benefit from the purposely melted ice-cream ...certainly abortion meant for sharing ... but why😉.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Great food, excellent service! The tasting menu was very good.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: I Love this place. The ambiance is amazing, food is great, drinks were phenomenal— service impeccable. One of our favorite NY restaurants.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Our second visit here was a bit of a disappointment.  The place was very full and very loud.  The menu is quite limited, which we knew, but the starters and appetizers did not have much appeal, and the peppers were considerably more spicy than described by our waiter.  Many people, ourselves included, seemed to be there for the chicken for two.  It was fine, but roast chicken can accumulate a bit too much pan juice, which makes it seem greasy and less appetizing, which is what we experienced this time.

Name: Marc Forgione
Comment: Our fabulous server, Lise made the whole evening extremely enjoyable!  Food was amazing and we loved Marc’s signature “perfect bite on a spoon”!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: A classic dining experience, starting with delicious drinks at the bar and an excellent jazz pianist. The Tasting menu offerings are exciting and choices are flexible. Excellent spot for a special occasion.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: My husband and I had dinner at Marcel’s before attending a performance at the Kennedy Center. We opted for the theater menu. It was one of the nicest meals we have had in DC in a while. The service was impeccable — they even provided a selection of reading glasses so my husband could read the menu. Service was attentive without being intrusive or rushed. Service was great, and not just by DC standards. The food was excellent, as well. They even have a complementary car service to the Kennedy Center. I would definitely go back again, and we will certainly make this our go to dinner spot before heading the KC.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Fabulous as always!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: It was such a pleasure to go to a restaurant where you are taken care of so completely. The QUIET dining room allows for normal and even whispered conversation. The wait staff are extremely professional remembering everything you’ve order and examining every plate prior to serving your dinner for quality control. I can not recommend Marcel’s too highly.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Our entire evening could not have gone better.  They were out of our selected caviar, so they upgraded us at no charge.  The scallop starter and the squab were outstanding.  The staff was impeccable, warm, knowledgeable, just the right amount of presence.  The decor sumptuous and restrained.I know we will return again and again.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Terrific meal.  Each dish was special. with a unique blend.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: the restaurant met our expectations in terms of food that was delicious, elegance and  courtesy of the staff

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: We had a fabulous evening at Marcel's. The service from the front of the house was perfectly balanced between attentiveness and discretion. The food was beautifully prepared and presented and delicious in every way. Marcel's is elegant and we enjoyed the evening very much. What is Musak everywhere else is a the gentle jazz piano in the bar at Marcel's. The perfect atmosphere for a special evening. Recommended.Two items that detracted somewhat, but never interfered. There appeared to be some tension between the wait staff and the support staff - maybe just the usual search for perfection but we overheard more than one impatient comment. Second, for a prix fixe menu offering we were surprised there was no option for wine pairings and when we asked if one could be provided received a frustrated response that sure, we could do that if you wanted. That said, the pairing were from the wine-by-the-glass menu and were splendid!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Always an exceptional experience. We had the 4-course menu option and sat at the bar before our show at the Kennedy Center. We loved all our dishes - I had the black cod, salmon, and lobster timbale. The poached pear dessert was delightful. Highly recommend!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Lovely dinner, we were well taken care of, and the food was outstanding.  We'll be back!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: We had a great experience. And they offer a car service to the Kennedy Center, which was an added bonus.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: This was our second time; it won't be our last. Jonathan is the epitome of five-star service, perfectly paired with Chef Robert's exquisitely delicious and beautifully presented dishes. The dining room is an oasis of peace away from the noise of this area. Gentle jazz and live piano play softly. Sight, sound, smell, taste, texture - Marcel's perfectly attends to every sense. There is a reason Marcel's is in Tom Sietsema's Hall of Fame for DC dining. We look forward to our next experience at Marcel's.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Another enchanting evening at Marcel’s - a wonderful dinner with great service.  The creativity never stops.  There is always something new to try.  And Marcel’s will always accommodate food allergies without compromising quality.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: This was our second time here, and it was equally good. It is a new favorite for special occasion/Kennedy Center evening dining. What a nice dinner out should be.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Great food and amazing service.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Great for special events.  We celebrated our 28th wedding anniversary and our son's acceptance into the MD and DC Bars.  We chose the 5 course tasting menu.  Everything was perfect.   Great job by Vinny and Staff.  Kudos!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Soup to nuts, outstanding in every way -- perfect service; beautifully plated; lovely wines; and correct portions for me!  We loved the food, the service, particularly our waiter, and the seamless experience of dining, having Real French Food, with nouvelle twists, and the car service to and from the Kennedy Center is a terrific perk!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Always fabulous.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Food and service were impeccable. The three course pre theatre menu is full of great choices and a good value. The chicken in tarragon buerre blanc was amazing.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Vinny is a fantastic server. Highly recommend

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: One of the best restaurants in Washington DC now and form many years. Great food, quiet lovely ambience and attentive and pleasant service.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Phenomenal food, great service and nice ambiance. Good wine list but overpriced. Easily 4x market prices.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Meet an old classmate you haven't seen in years

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: We had an excellent time - food, presentation, service, atmosphere all exceeded expectations.  It was one of the few top-notch restaurants where you can have a decent conversation.  Yes, you pay for that privilege (tables aren't crammed together) but it was surprisingly reasonable given the quality of the experience.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: We are coming back within two weeks of our first visit. It is rare to have a nice place live up to expectations, but Marcel's did. My husband said this was his favorite meal since we went to French Laundry, and that was about a year-and-half ago of regular restaurant going (West Coast and DC).  We go out to eat a fair amount in all price ranges and in this range, once expects more than just good food. We got great food and great service executed by professionals, not just folks who want to wait tables for a couple years before they move on to their "real job". And, yes, it is not a bargain dining hall, but we felt it was a good value for the quality, portions,  presentation, and vibe (great jazz pianist in the lounge, complimentary swank ride to the Kennedy Center for show). Plus, the wines by the glass were priced very accessibly and tasted like much more expensive price points. If you appreciate a more traditional fine dining experience with professional, adult staff and are tired of dropping a couple of bills only to see everyone around you dressed like slobs, make your next date at Marcel's.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Excellent special occasion location. Great food and service.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: We have been dining here for 5 years. Always had a great meal.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: I took my wife for our 29th anniversary and I wasn’t sure what i was get into.But then. The show stared. Amazing food. The unique taste of each plate, was unreal. Henry the waiter. 5 stars. And then i had the honor to meet David. Not just an amazing chef. A true gentleman. I don’t know when i will go back. But for sure i will

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Food was delicious and service, exceptional.  We were within hearing distance of the pianist in the bar; loved that!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: We have been to the fine dining room a number of times and love it.  We were eager to try the Bar special menu.  Our reaction was that the food was fabulous.  However the amount was  on the small side and the wine pairing was minuscule.  There was no dessert included.  We were sort of in and out in a short time.  Generous on the bread service.We would not go back for the bar experience but would go back to the fine dining room.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: This wasn't just dinner out--this was a dining experience. Go when you can take your time and enjoy being pampered by the service, wowed by the presentation and flavors and relaxed by the elegant ambiance.  It'll be the  kind of evening that you'll talk about for a long time.  I can't imagine rushing through dinner here to get to the theater but I guess people do. I didn't want to leave. The food was amazing. There used to be a Washington Post food critic, Donald Dressden (goes way back) I think his name was--when he went to a great restaurant he said the "food sang" yep, the food sings here, like Pavarotti on a plate, or something.  You have to go, save up your birthday, anniversary, special occasion or just 'cause you deserve it and spend it here.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: This restaurant is without doubt one of the top in the DC area if not the country. My only regret is that I did not try it earlier. The staff - from the owner to the waiters to all who assisted us - were kind, punctual, caring, and welcoming. The chef and cooking staff really know what they are doing and the food is sourced fresh and of highest quality. We ordered from a tasting menu from which one could choose four, five, or six dishes. We chose four, which was more than adequate. Among the three of us we had salad, fish including shellfish, venison, pasta, and several desserts, inter alia. The vegetables were fresh and the cooking afforded succulent, wonderful tasting options. The wine selections ranged from reasonable to pricy, and we were able to get a bottle of a recommended red wine by the glass that was excellent, from a vineyard and vintage that we knew. Expect to pay twice what you would a most high end restaurants but the result will be more than twice as good. I was reminded of an Inn in the countryside in Virginia that has great food, but Marcel's is  better and less expensive. We'll definitely be back!

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: A perfect evening from the impeccable service to the menu choices to the presentation and taste of each course.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Wonderful complete dinner- all aspects were first rate - Vinny took exceptional time care of my wife and I

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: This is a wonderful French restaurant with smart service, a creative and skilled chef and a lovely wine list. Each dish has deep roots in traditional French haute cuisine that have been married expertly to our time. It is the perfect place for a special occasion.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Highly recommended.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Marcel's has always been one of the best dining experiences for us. We were there for our Anniversary last weekend. We told our waiter/host Mark that we wanted a picture with Chef Wiedemier for our Anniversary and he came through for us. Mark took great care of us ... very professional, attentive, good natured. Like talking to a friend. Mark loves his job and it shows. We especially enjoyed the Foie Gras, lobster appetizer, sea bass, but everything was a foodie treat. Ambiance is classy and even though restaurant was almost full, it was not noisy and you could enjoy having a nice conversation in a soft voice (a rarity nowadays in restaurants).

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: The service was top notch, which you would expect for a restaurant of this caliber.  The presentation of the food was wonderful and the flavors were distinct and exceptional. The tasting menu was right-sized and  perfect for the amount of courses chose. (Four).  The wine pairings were well thought out.  Overall a wonderful experience.  A call out to our head waiter Adam.  Spot on service.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: One of the top French restaurants in Washington.  A traditional, delicious menu--no foam-filled balloons.   Just great food beautifully prepared and served.

Name: Marcel's by Robert Wiedmaier
Comment: Impeccable service and a wonderful wine list. The best parts of the menu are the starters ( scallops, boudin Blanc consommé) but the duck entre was average.This restaurant is heart attack expensive and I would have expected better.

Name: Marea
Comment: Great all around!

Name: Marea
Comment: I wish I could give it 6 stars. This place is a gem.Food and service are outstanding. Excellent wine list.

Name: Marea
Comment: We had a fantastic evening. Staff were gracious, professional and attentive. Dishes were excellent. Looking forward to returning soon.

Name: Marea
Comment: Fabulous gluten free pasta   I loved the truffle and anchovy sauce. Perfection.

Name: Marea
Comment: As always amazing!

Name: Marea
Comment: Marea is an elegant restaurant from the decor to the food to the service. Great attention is paid to every detail to make the experience luxurious and special. We were there for a birthday lunch starting with excellent cocktail and wine (don’t miss the delicious bread as it’s brought around) into appetizers of a variety of crudi (thinly sliced raw fish) and entrees of halibut and steak. We ordered sorbet for dessert then were pleasantly surprised with a special birthday dessert plus cookies and small tiramisu portions. All were excellent and beautiful. Adding to the overall atmosphere is the elegant china, cutlery, glassware and serving pieces. Dining here made it an occasion.

Name: Marea
Comment: Always perfect! Best place in New York

Name: Marea
Comment: My husband and I enjoyed an amazing dinner at Marae last Sunday. We treated ourselves to the five course tasting menu with the wine pairing. Everything was delicious, especially the halibut and the Tagliatelle with a sauce made from bone marrow. The chocolate dessert balls were also scrumptious.  Each wine paired nicely with its dish. The service was exceptional. We shall definitely return and hope the Tagliatelle is on the menu that night.

Name: Marea
Comment: It was perfect and my 2-yr old daughter really enjoyed the food as well as the setup.  Really appreciated it.

Name: Marea
Comment: The atmosphere and the wait staff are absolutely stupendous! The food however, ranges from good to very good. Nothing reached a level of excellence. At these astronomical prizes, I would expect to be blown away by every morsel.Certain dishes were cooked perfectly and we're quite tasty, however others seem to be overcooked. (Not a good thing with seafood.) Parts of the grilled octopus we're just downright dry tough. Regarding the Brodetto, The broth, while absolutely delicious, was served warm to start with and cooled to room temperature by the end of the dish.If you are looking for calm, culture, civility, this place is it. If, however, you were looking simply for amazing food, you may find yourself a little disappointed. Overall, a lovely dining experience with a phenomenal wait staff, but I just wish the food had lived up to the rest of the experience.

Name: Marea
Comment: 3rd visit and every meal outstanding! Pointless to explain just to! Not stuffy like most restaurants of this caliber

Name: Marea
Comment: Great place for lunch!  Great menu and beautiful space!

Name: Marea
Comment: Excellent food, service and ambiance.  Going back very soon.

Name: Marea
Comment: Marea keeps getting better and better.  The setting and the service are magnificent, and the food is extraordinary, every time.  The service is so smooth and predictable that it is an easy choice for pre-theater dining, even with 4 courses.

Name: Marea
Comment: The Branzino was awesome. Great ambience. Beautiful room. Definitely would go again.

Name: Marea
Comment: First time on a Tuesday evening and did not disappoint - love this place!

Name: Marea
Comment: Enjoyed another wonderful lunch. Tuna crudo, octopus starters very nice. Sent back a bottle of wine and got replacement equal value - no problem. Mains of scallops and striped bass very tasty. Special thanks to somm! Can't wait to be back.

Name: Marea
Comment: Extraordinary combination of atmosphere , service, and culinary delights.

Name: Marea
Comment: Consistently delicious!  Always great service!  My most favorite place to eat!!

Name: Marea
Comment: Wonderful service, atmosphere and food.  My favorite NYC spot!

Name: Marea
Comment: Very attractive, sleek and comfortable dining rooms.  Warm welcome, excellent service.  Very extensive wine list with a good selection of under-$100 bottles. Prix Fixe lunch @ $67 or will offer a la carte.  Very good tuna crudo, tatare.  Very good pastas ( garganelli, Agnolotti).  Attentive service. Quite expensive for lunch.

Name: Marea
Comment: Marea always is outstanding — wonderful good quality and service.   It is expensive, however.

Name: Marea
Comment: Everything was delicious.

Name: Marea
Comment: I was celebrating my kids first trip in New York and after two days of cramming tourist attractions and activities all day we needed to unwind and relax while enjoying a delicious meal that warmed the heart... though it’s a fancy restaurant and very upscale I can say my kids and my husband and I enjoyed the best spaghetti with butter we had in our lives... the rest of the more intricate food items like the lobster risotto the steak the halibut the burrata lobster were divine. Definitly if your kids are not too loud ( my son Definitly was so i gave him my phone to keep entertained) it’s a definit must go restaurant for food, comfort, and that finesse touche.

Name: Marea
Comment: Terrific food and great service

Name: Marea
Comment: Marea has exceptional food, wine & service - always a perfect experience!

Name: Marea
Comment: The food was wonderful and the atmosphere was perfect for indulging

Name: Marea
Comment: it was a really great experience for a special occasion.

Name: Marea
Comment: We went to this fabulous restaurant over the holidays, had a delicious dinner and could not wait to return when back in a Manhattan from South Carolina.  This time I booked an afternoon Valentine meal as we had concert plans for the evening.  We chose the five course tasting menu and had one of the best experiences ever!  We thoroughly enjoyed each dish, mostly consisting of exquisite seafood and specialty pasta, paired with some fabulous wines.  My partner stayed with the white wine accompaniments while I enjoyed the lighter reds that were selected.  Service was outstanding, and there was still an air of romance at the corner booth despite it being 230 in the afternoon!  Marea will be on our calendar every time we visit the Big Apple!

Name: Marea
Comment: Marea made my husband's birthday very special, giving us a wonderful seat and bringing a festive dessert, on top of the amazing food!

Name: Marea
Comment: Valentines

Name: Marea
Comment: The food was superior.  The service was superior.  The staff was efficient and appropriately friendly.  The best meal during our trip to NYC.

Name: Marea
Comment: Perfect spot for our birthday celebration!!!

Name: Marea
Comment: Marea never disappoints, it was amazing as always. Michael provided excellent service.

Name: Marea
Comment: We go every year for dinner on our anniversary and few times during the rest of the year for a special occasion. Never fails to exceed our expectations!! We love this restaurant!!!

Name: Marea
Comment: It's one of our favorite places in New York. Food ,Service, location, ambiance is always excellent

Name: Marea
Comment: Marea Continue to provide a restaurant with pleasant ambience relaxing atmosphere excellent cuisine and attentive but obsequious service.

Name: Marea
Comment: The food is outstanding at this restaurant.  The service is top notch also

Name: Marea
Comment: One of the top restaurants in the city.  My wife and I were saying afterward that it was literally one of the best meals we have ever had.  Amazing restaurant start to finish.

Name: Marea
Comment: Food was amazing. Servers changed often and didn’t inform us. Nobody offered another glass of wine until ours had been empty for over ten minutes. Seemed like our table was forgettable. Probably won’t return.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Always an amazing meal at Market! We go every time we are in San Diego. It’s worth the ride!!!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Very innovating dishes with great taste. You won't get bored here. There is something for everybody and all dishes are expertly prepared. Great wine list and exceptional service. Well run machine

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Food was outstanding maybe as good as I have every had and that includes the French Laundry.  Service was not as good as the food a little slow.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Service was a bit slower than previous visits and entres took longer than expected (based on experience at Market) to come out of the kitchen. Food was, as always, excellent. My wife's gluten allergy was forgotten (waiter asked when we arrived as they always do) when the restaurant brought out a cake based desert to celebrate our aniversary - somebody  dropped the ball.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: One of the best meals I’ve had. Creative dishes. Friendly attentive wait staff.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We went to Market to celebrate my wife's birthday. Market is one of our favorite restaurants. The food is always great. The decor of the restaurant is lacking (needs a refresh) but the food is amazing. We both did the tasting menu and I have to tell you it ranks up there with the few times I've eaten at Addison. Since the portions are bigger at Market I would say it was my best dining experience in the 5 years we have lived in San Diego. We will certainly visit again but really wish they gave the place a face lift.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Great meal.  Food was excellent.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: The unpleasant part of this evening for me was that the A/C was blowing directly on my shoulders all evening long and there was no way of getting away from it. And believe me I always love A/C everywhere I go.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: The “complimentary valet” is a confusing concept... you still want to tip the valet, but who carries cash these days? So just be prepared to bring cash so you can tip the valet.Hostess was not warm, as a hostess should be. However, the waiters were exceptional! Thank you. Very friendly. I don’t think management should require them to memorize specials of the day, as it comes across very rehearsed, awkward, and off-putting. Save them the embarrassing stress & just write it on a simple menu card. I love a dark, cozy ambiance & this place is that exactly. The food was good but I noticed on the tasting menu the same base sauces and ingredients were repeated a few times. If you don’t like salmon, don’t order the trout... it tastes identical. The Cabernet braised short rib was insanely delicious. I was accidentally given a restaurant week menu & the manager was kind enough to honor the discounted prices on the menu I was presented with. Thank you. Very generous gesture.Some of the side panel wood near my table was very dusty (attention to cleanliness details always appreciated), and there were a few annoying gnats buzzing around that I had to keep swatting away & this interfered with my relaxed dining mood.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Always an amazing experience eating at Market. Food is truly awesome!!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Just outstanding. The food is the best in town.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Market is in my top two restaurants in San Diego! Always delicious, service is great, a fabulous experience. My only wish is that some of the tables were a little bit further apart so we don't hear every word of the conversation next to us. Of course, this will not keep us from returning again and again for Chef Schroeder's amazing cuisine!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We are never disappointed. The food is amazing matched only by the service.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Food was salty. Our main dish came late.  I will not come back again. It's our 2nd time here.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: PROBABLY THE BEST RESTAURANT WE HAVE VISITED IN SAN DIEGO...AND WE HAVE VISITED QUITE A FEW.  FOOD WAS JUST OUTSTANDING!  WOULD LIKE IT EVEN BETTER IF IT WAS A BIT LESS EXPENSIVE.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: I really think the food is way too salty. Too saucy, drenched in sauce, to be honest.If you claim to use great ingredients, let the flavor shine through.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: This is one the few restaurants in San Diego that we go to if we want a special treat.  We partook of the SD Restaurant Week menu and it was outstanding, beautifully plated and wonderful flavors.  No skimping on quality.  The waiter was respectful and knowledgeable.  Highly recommend.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We were impressed by the way you creat each dish- subtle but colorful balance of the well chosen ingredients! Particularly blue cheese soufflé. Only one disappointment was the beef for the main- it was a little too salty and was the sauce, too. Other than that all great and we will come back in future.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Über Jahre hinweg konsistent bestes Restaurant in San Diego. Wir wurden noch nie enttäuscht. Immer innovativ, wunderbare Zutaten und wunderbaren Kreationen. Service regelmäßig ausgezeichnet. Großes Restaurant mit vielen Gästen und trotzdem logistisch perfekt organisiert.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Dinner for 4 during restaurant week.  Arrived a bit early waited at the bar and were seated promptly at the reservation time.  The dining room is set up nicely and (kudos) for once no stupid tables.  The place was busy but the noise level moderate!!  Food overall was excellent - an interesting take on a tuna tartar,  excellent corn soup with smoked port.  Entrées were trout, duck and beef tenderloin - all very well prepared - portions very adequate.  Desserts yummy.  Attentive, efficient and polite service!!!!Bar selection OK - not really great and along with the wine list insanely overpriced.  A clear indication that they are catering to the Rancho Santa Fe crowd. In all a very enjoyable evening and will visit again when in the area

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We really enjoyed the food and the service was excellent. We will return for next restaurant week.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Ate off the restaurant menu with wine pairing.  Great food, and our waiter was outstanding.  Expensive, but still great value.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Always love Market and this was no exception. Delicious.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Amazing food and service, as always at this gem of a restaurant!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Have eaten here many times... thought the food was heavy on the salt as did everyone else.  Two meals were fish, two were beef.  This has never occurred before.  We were disappointed as the the food has always been perfectly seasoned...the desserts and wine pairings were wonderful.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Our favorite restaurant in San Diego! The food was and is always amazing. Service is top notch!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Loved the atmosphere , food, service. They’re truly professional . Enough waiters so you don’t feel left out. My favorite 😄👍

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Simple put, there is no other restaurant like Market. The food is always delicious and unique. Its our favorite place to dine.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Restaurant week and date night. All was amazing but the tenderloin was too salty. The wine pairing was great. The green apple sorbet and berry dessert were amazing. The pear salad was to die for!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We dined during Restaurant Week and had a great experience.  Nice selection of starters, entrees and deserts.  Our waiter was terrific.  The wine pairings were not quite as well paired as in the past, but were still interesting.  Of course, we'll keep coming back to this marvelous restaurant.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Perfect and delicious

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Birthday - was wonderful!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Best restaurant in the San Diego area. The freshest ingredients, exquisite on the palate, awesome wines.....Market has it all!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Went to the Market for my wife’s birthday - overall an enjoyable evening.  We started with the corn soup (great) and burrata cheese & peach salad (good) - we then shared the forest mushroom ravioli (good but incredibly rich & salty) and the grilled beef tenderloin/lobster combo - the tenderloin was again much too salty.  Both my wife and I left with a lingering salty aftertaste and told the waiter as much.  The waiter was very attentive & we appreciated the birthday dessert - just cut back on the copious amounts of salt.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Great staff and food!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: great neighborhood favorite. we order the market salad (off the menu).the fig salad was very good.duck special was excellent.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Good service and staffs, Amazing cuisine!

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: We had a delicious meal.  Party of four and we each ordered a different app and entree so that we could try a variety of menu items.  Everything was wonderful. Best meal we’ve had in a long time.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: Food here is ALWAYS amazing!!!We did not love our server this visit though... she was below par the others we have had in past visits.We will absolutely return... just hope to have a different server that’s a true representation of this fine dining establishment.

Name: Market Restaurant and Bar
Comment: My favorite restaurant..Recommend it to all my friends

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Always a great place to dine.We always leave there feeling grand.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: The food is always delicious!!!  The tuna tartare and the lamb chops are outstanding!!!  It is also so nice to always be greeted by Raul he is the best!!!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: The restaurant was amazing per usual! The staff was wonderful and the food was excellent. The steak tartar is to die for and the the chocolate soufflÃ© is the best soufflÃ© Iâ€™ve ever had!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: This restaurant took huge precautions during COVID-19 by ensuring lots of space between tables and the staff completely covered in protective gear. The food is always excellent and we very much appreciated their efforts.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: This was our first dine out since being quarantined for Covid. Such a great experience. Missed it so much!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Great food, great service.Observing all the necessary precautions.You can dine here with complete confidence.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Very good experience overall. The service was great in spite of the social distancing requirements, the food was outstanding for every one of the four people in the party. Would highly recommend this establishment

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: As always, it was such a great experience. ðŸ¥°

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Food is always excellent and love the flour less chocolate cake

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Limited menu upon just opening up but most favorites there, including tuna tartare

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Always a pleasure to dine at Mistral! Soooo glad they're open again!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: I like the French atmosphere. The food is good.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: First let me start by saying itâ€™s my wifeâ€™s favorite restaurant. She was so excited for our sat evening reservation, being that itâ€™s so hard to get in there. service was slow and we had an issue with both lamb chops and steak. Came out in a pool of oil. Was really bad. They did take it right back and off the the check as they should off but nothing else was done and I ended up paying 120$ for soup salad and bottle of wine. Very disappointed. Evening was ruined. Hope they can make up for it

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Food was astounding. Warm goat cheese salad, beautiful fish, juicy pork tenderloin. Great wine. It was a delightful dining experience.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: We love Mistral!!   All our special occasions are celebrated there!!!  Staff and food over the top!!!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Best restaurant in L.A.  Very romantic. Outstanding food and service. A neighborhood gem.  Highly recommended.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: waiters are most attentive and made our evening dining experience very comfortable.  food was delicious.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Best tuna tartar ever, especially with special of added lump meat crab. Bronzino with crust skin delicious. John Dory great too.  Terrific french fries  with their mustard and not ketchup.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: We went for a birthday celebration and had a wonderful experience.I had already had lunch here and enjoyed it but this was my first time dining.The food is exquisite, the staff attentive and knowledgeable. We had a fantastic time and will be repeat customers.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Great as always!  Our neighborhood favorite.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Always feels like being on vacation in a French cafe! Warm and welcoming owner & staff and food never dissapoints

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Friendâ€™s birthday dinner

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: We have been there before and had an amazing dinner, however....This night, everything just seemed off! The food was mediocre, the menu was different and the noise level was so loud we couldn't hear ourselves talk when this was supposed to be a romantic dinner.  For the price, I would have expected much more. We were very disappointed

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: All around excellent!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Always a treat.   I've never been disappointed with dining here.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Mistral is the best! Everything about this restaurant is first class!Always coming back.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Great service, awesome food. Will definitely return!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Always a special treat going to Mistral's the food and service are ALWAYS

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: I have loved Mistral since it opened. I go back 30+ years. I had my 40th birthday dinner and countless others there. Unfortunately, the expense has made it a special occasion place for me now. Even still, on those occasions, I always enjoy being there. The food, its quality, the service and decor all make Mistral one of the best restaurants to which I have been. I recommend it without hesitation.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: From the service to the food, excellent..I had the lamb chops which were delicious.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Too too loud and table too close.  Not for the price.  Food was delicious and good service.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: My favorite place to go! Henri and Raul (and entire staff) are amazing! Food is delicious!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Great cooking, top-notch ingredients, attentive, fast and helpful service, very friendly staff. Excellent bar and ample and expertly selected wine list.  Street and valet parking.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Our favorite place for date night or out with friends. Absolutely love Mistral --Excellent People, Food, Service and Bar. Thank you Raul, Henry, Frank & Dana!

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Celebrating my dear friend birthday

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: As always, food, drinks & service was excellent. Love this restaurant.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: I love this restaurant. Mistral has the best French cuisine and excellent service in a pretty setting.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: Excellent restaurant with superb food and service. I go there regularly for special occasions or not.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
Comment: It was dine L.A. however, we'd been several times when not dine l.a.   Everything is done beautifully - every morsel delicious (no skimping on portions), excellent service.  definitely French.  Valet. Bar.

Name: Mistral - Sherman Oaks
