Comment: polo lounge is a must for anyone staying in Beverly Hills, super historic and lots of rich heritage, very knowledgeable staff.

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Vacation visit...

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Went to just have a small snack and some drinks. The environment felt very pretentious and the staff seemed to care more about high end guests vs people just wanting to experience the Beverly Hills hotel. I made reservations serval weeks in advance and then felt a little uncomfortable where they sat us. Also waiter forgot to bring our appetizer which ended up being the only thing we ordered because we were tired of waiting. It’s a beautiful place but I’ve been to many many high end restaurants and I’ve never felt more uncomfortable. I was even dressed well and carried a designer bag just to try and fit in more but that didn’t seem to make a difference. I don’t need to go back. Ps the chips and salsa and guacamole are awful. Don’t order it. Besides that it was a beautiful hotel and their waiters seem very well trained. Overall I’d give it 4 stars.

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Excellent and I look forward to my next lunch meeting at the Polo Lounge.

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: David was a fantastic waiter and the ambiance can’t be beat! They surprised all us birthday girls with candles and cake. Such a marvelous afternoon

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: The Polo Lounge is always a treat

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Amazing as always!

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: The service was impeccable and the food was amazing. What a special night!

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Amazing! If I lived in the area I would be here everyday!

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Burnt burger

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Got there about 45 min early than our reservation time to have a drink at the bar. Checked in with hostess. At reservation time, had to check in with her again as she kept seating multiple two tops before calling us over. Had to stand at hostess stand and wait...Absolutely awful service. Waiter was present only at the table 3 times. Water never filled. Had to ask about specials. Pre ordered soufflé and never asked about coffee or tea. Shocked at how bad the service was.

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Top of the Top. Quality service, quality food. Extraordinary experience. Worth it!

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Hi - I made a reservation for my daughters' bday, but the server forgot the cake! I reached out to the restaurant and they got back to me IMMEDIATELY with an apology and an offer to have a special bday dessert on them - we can't wait to go back!

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Service was excellent. Food was average when it should have been exceptional for the high price. Ambiance was nice although my seat was by the waiters’ station which was a little uncomfortable and there were plenty of empty seats. If you want to experience it go but be willing to pay a high price for average food. Hotel security yelled at us for taking a photo of the iconic building. We were doing so respectfully and there was no sign preventing this.

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Perfect as always.  One of our favorites.  Tried the McCarthy Salad this time - Delicious!

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: As a part of a yearly Christmas tradition, my husband and I have spent the last few years at the Polo Lounge. It is something we’ve always looked forward to and it pains me to say that I do not think we’ll be back after the disappointing service. Our reservation was at 3pm and while I do have knowledge of break time and transition from lunch to dinner service, it does not justify the lack of follow up, service, or attention that we had on Wednesday. The server had forgotten a beverage, never to return after. We had to reach out to a backwaiter to get the bill and subsequently left after as we were barely tended to for over 20 minutes.Sad to say that it our tradition has ended at your beautiful restaurant.

Name: Polo Lounge @ The Beverly Hills Hotel
Comment: Arguably one of the most iconic dining experiences in LA. The food never disappoints and the drinks are delicious. Highly recommend for your dates and special occasions.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Wonderful meal. Perfect portion sizes. They forgot the bread we ordered but we got a tour of the wine cellar at the end. That madeUp for it! And they comped the bread. Although I wasn’t a fan of the bread. Lol. The truffle fries were too salty for me.  But we got a few freebies. Overall I would go back. The service was great!

Name: PRESS
Comment: Jodie the sommelier was very helpful and gave us a lovely suggestion. Food was average. The steak needed seasoning.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Nice restaurant and atmosphere, good service, and great wine list, but the most important part - the food - was mediocre at best.  Tried a variety of different things and settled on the bacon wrapped filet mignon for dinner.  It was cooked as asked but I can make better steaks at home on my Weber grill.  We wanted to try this restaurant for a while and were disappointed at the output when we finally did go.  There's just too many other fantastic restaurants in the Valley to settle for so-so food, especially considering the price point.  Unfortunately this is a one and done restaurant for us.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Thank You Press from the bottom of my heart. You made our first wedding anniversary so special. The staff was so professional and all were wearing masks. We felt very safe. After having a horrible experience with Auberge who last minute cancelled my reservation 4 days before our anniversary. I was freaking out Thursday night. I looked on open table saw press had room for us. I booked it fast. Friday I called just to confirm with them didn’t want another Auberge situation. Not only did the young lady confirm she also saw that one of us had a food  allergy. No lies I cried. I was so thankful that she acknowledged my food  allergy. Dinner was amazing. They even surprised us with a pastry and a candle. Again Thank You So Much to everyone at Press.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Birthday party with friends!

Name: PRESS
Comment: Just incredible!  The steak tare tare had the perfect spice! The steak and frites was amazing.  The wine list is out of this world!

Name: PRESS
Comment: Service was terrific but felt very rushed, I suspect staffing is difficult in today's environment. The Filet was far smaller that I recall, but cooker perfectly. Also thank you for offering to omit the corkage if we also bought a bottle of wine, a nice approach since there were four of us, it worked well. Overall we had a great time, thanks for allowing us to dine!

Name: PRESS
Comment: Our dinners could not have been better. Rudd wines were incredible as usual. We will eat here twice every annual trip to wine country.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Server Eric was excellent, Chef DeCuisine Darryl came out and was a pleasure to talk with & the food was delicious, exceptionally prepared and Sommelier Jody took our likes and dislikes and turned them into 2 delicious, memorable bottles of wine. Great experience overall!!

Name: PRESS
Comment: Food was well-cooked but lacking much flavor. Cocktails tasted watered down and were also lacking flavor. Staff was very friendly and attentive.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Nice dinner during our vacation!

Name: PRESS
Comment: The service was poor, particularly for a "high end" restaurant.  We asked for an outside table but could not be accommodated even though it looked like there was space. The waiter did not take our drink order, so we just drank water the whole meal.  We waited one hour for our food.  The waiter never came by to explain the delay.  The food was decent. But when you order an $80 steak, you expect top quality.  It was not that.  Very overpriced for what you get. We won't be going back.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Amazing  as always

Name: PRESS
Comment: It’s pricey, but great food, vibe. Service was a tad slow, but don’t want to be rushed either! Would recommend for special occasion!!!

Name: PRESS
Comment: Second time dining at Press and couldn’t be happier. Lovely dinner, food was amazing and service was spectacular. Tables well distanced due to covid. Looking forward to going back.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Father’s Day

Name: PRESS
Comment: Always made comfortable by the reception of everyone working here. Great service / food.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Only issue was the outdoor patio could be much nicer

Name: PRESS
Comment: Small portions, high prices for good but not excellent food. There are numerous places in Napa which are both better values and have tastier food.

Name: PRESS
Comment: My appreciation to the staff for moving my wife and I inside, after that, dinner was up to Press standard of excellence.  Note to the restaurant, eliminate the horrendous outside seating, between the flies, the greenhouse type heat and the thrown together seating, it is not enjoyable and totally detracts from your reputation.  Also, you might want to consider normal size steak portions on your short menu.  Beyond that, our anniversary dinner was great (after moving inside).

Name: PRESS
Comment: Fine dinning experience

Name: PRESS
Comment: Thanks for a great dining experience.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Always a good time at Press. A favorite!

Name: PRESS
Comment: The restaurant, we knew would have amazing food and an incredible aesthetic, which it did. We also assumed the the staff and waiter would be solid, but our waiter was above and beyond amazing. It saddens me that I don’t know his name, feels almost disrespectful, but he treated us so well, and was a huge part in creating a memory that my new wife and I will always remember. Please continue finding staff members like that, because they set you apart in terms of having high quality meals. Sorry this is long, and I do hope someone reads this, because my honeymoon with my wife will always hold this memory, although a simple matter, was so incredible. Thank you for a wonderful experience. We will be back and we will recommend this restaurant.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Super excellent!

Name: PRESS
Comment: It was great to enjoy PRESS at lunch time. Same great food and service.

Name: PRESS
Comment: We had dinner tonight at Press and we were looking forward to an excellent dinner. Our server was very nice and we Were seated promptly. The restaurant was not very busy and we looked over the menu and list of wines by the glass as well as an iPad loaded with 60 pages of wines. We ordered an appetizer and it was ok but bland. We then had a glass of cab and a Chardonnay that were recommended and they were awful. The cab tatted tainted and the Chardonnay from Mayacamas was really odd tasting. We ordered some fish and a steak and they were not very good. The halibut was tasteless and served cold. The sauce was even worse. The steak was served medium rare after asking for medium well. The flavor was not good either and it was served sliced. At this point we decided to leave. This is our third poor experience at Press over the past 18 months. It was our favorite spot in Napa but sadly this was our last visit. We can no longer recommend Press.

Name: PRESS
Comment: The food was amazing. The wine list extensive and very reasonable.  The Somm was super helpful and friendly.  Only issue was it felt like our server didn't want to be there.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Incredible restaurant. Somehow it keeps it’s amazing personal experience and first-rate service through the COVID-19 restrictions. Bravo!

Name: PRESS
Comment: Everything we had was fantastic.   The Press Gin and Tonic is the best.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Overpriced

Name: PRESS
Comment: Underwhelmed for the money. All the courses, felt contrived and overly complicated.

Name: PRESS
Comment: My husband and I had dinner at Press for the first time on a Saturday.  It was such a great and amazing experience. The staff were all wearing mask. Mask are required to walk to your table, and if you leave your table. We did not have to wear a mask while seated at our table. Our server was so nice, helpful, and attentive to our needs.  I really enjoyed his down to earth personality.  My filet mignon was cooked to perfection, it literally melted in my mouth.  My husband's dinner was the special of the night and he was very pleased with his dinner.  I have to say Press has the best Coke I've ever had lol! I highly recommend Press.

Name: PRESS
Comment: A delightful evening - superb food, great service, very personable staff. A well worthwhile visit.  Thank you.

Name: PRESS
Comment: So glad to see this restaurant reopen. New menu under the talented hand of Philip Tessier and Darryl Bell is so good with an emphasis on seasonal and local. Wine list as always full of great choices including rare older vintages making it fun for special occasions. The rice pudding currently on the dessert menu is the best I’ve ever had. ❤️❤️❤️

Name: PRESS
Comment: Great experience here. Sat outside and were allowed our pup with us which was sweet.Food was dope, unexpected flavours and interesting takes on classic dishes. Will come back for sure.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Among our favorite 2 or 3 restaurants anywhere.  No other restaurant compares to the service at Press, and their food is innovative and delicious.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Chef Philip Tessier has been an incredible addition.   We have always loved Press but his new and  improved menu is terrific.   Incredible attention to the food on the plate.  Great flavor and balance- and beautiful.

Name: PRESS
Comment: Omg! We loved it everything was perfect!!! The food was exquisite and the service was phenomenal! We came to celebrate our anniversary and they made it extra special!!! Thank you ❤️ we will definitely be back!

Name: PRESS
Comment: I was very excited to return to the restaurant. I mentioned that this reservation was special because of an anniversary and a 60th Birthday. We looked at the menus online ahead of time and read all special do’s for reopening like wear a mask etc before arriving. The host had no clue it was our anniversary..., they didn’t call us to let us know of the restricted menus. I had it all plan from their website and open table. I didn’t get the Chateaubriant  that I had planned to eat. The sommelier came at our table but didn’t pour our wine. She just made a comment that it was a great bottle and amazing vintage. Our server was great, we made him relax . Overall the vibes we weird, a bit tense.

Name: Quince
Comment: The food was interesting/intriguing, certainly more suited to a tasting menu.  The wine pairings were also good, but heavily weighted to whites; I would have enjoyed tasting 2 or 3 more reds.  The service could not have been better.

Name: Quince
Comment: Wonderful food and great service. Hope we come back soon.

Name: Quince
Comment: Wonderful non pretentious  meal and service at Quince. We enjoyed the experience.

Name: Quince
Comment: It was amazing! We had a perfect dinner and the wine pairing was exceptional. They even surprised my wife with a special dining opportunity in the kitchen, which made her birthday even more special.

Name: Quince
Comment: This was the best dining experience we have ever had...and we have been to the French Laundry.  The service was perfect, there when you need it and not there when you don't.  The food was exquisite and beautifully presented.   The noise level was low and the room had high ceilings and was softly lit.  It was awesome.  Our wait person was Kyra and she was a perfect delight.  Very attentive and knowledgeable about the cuisine and wines.  She was awesome.   This restaurant is a high recommend for foodies and/or a romantic celebration.

Name: Quince
Comment: An absolute dream. Every detail on point. A very memorable dinning experience.

Name: Quince
Comment: Overall fantastic experience

Name: Quince
Comment: Whole evening was excellent. Food, service n silverwares to wine glasses n cocktail glasses.Thank you for the special menu with my wife’s name which made a little more memorable.  3 ⭐️However, black napkins can replace the white would for black clothes.Need grab bars in wash room for handicap people.  I am.Lastly just a note to Mike. Betsy would like to have her Tupperware back.  Its bern too long.  😊🤙 Mahalo.Chris and Paul......Betsy

Name: Quince
Comment: Very memorable meal for all of us.

Name: Quince
Comment: Very disappointing,The service and food quality goes downhill compared with last year !!!!!!!!!

Name: Quince
Comment: An exquisite dining experience where every detail is carefully chosen for its flavor,color and artistic intent. A meal worth savoring and sharing with someone you love. Expensive but a bargain considering the labor, discipline and passion put in by Chef Tusk and his staff.

Name: Quince
Comment: Ten delicious courses.   Tried foods I normally would pass on and was so happy with the flavors.

Name: Quince
Comment: The experience was incredible, the service impeccable, the food is from another world to experience the mixture of flavors that explode on your palate and transport in a dream place, a thousand congratulations to the chef is magnificent

Name: Quince
Comment: Quince lives up to its reputation.  Expensive?  Yes.  Worth the price?  I have to say Yes, again.  We went in the middle of the week, so not crowded.  Service was wonderful.  At first, I was concerned that there were too many different servers and wine masters attending to us.  But each had a specialty, and a story to tell.  Juan, in particular, provided insight to and history behind the cutlery and china.  Robert paced us through and described each course expertly.  And the food--well, there was nothing that was not perfect.  Oysters in a cream and nettle sauce.  White asparagus prepared two ways.  Wagyu beef--both American and Japanese bred.  Additional treats besides what is listed on the day's menu.  By the time we arrived at the beautiful dessert trolly, I could hardly eat another thing.  Definitely take your time.  We were there for well over 4 hours, and enjoyed every minute.

Name: Quince
Comment: We have been enjoying a few 3 star Michelin restaurants in the past, and we really enjoyed Quince. The service was remarkable, the food was consistently great throughout the tasting menu and the wine paring was very very well selected. I am not your typical desert lover, but I was blown away with those as well, and the praline cart at the end was an amazing finale! Thank you - you exceeded our expectations with leaps and bounds.

Name: Quince
Comment: We have now been to 8 Michelin 3 star restaurants and the consensus of our group is that Quince is the best.

Name: Quince
Comment: Amazing food and great service. Recommend for Birthday and Anniversary!

Name: Quince
Comment: Really nice

Name: Quince
Comment: Too many sweets after main courses. Unfortunately I got sick later in the evening.

Name: Quince
Comment: Extraordinario todo  nunca había proba una carne como la de aqui, todos los platillos perfectamente balanceados los postres son una delicia comprendo porque tiene *** Michelin

Name: Quince
Comment: A special place and meal, wonderful staff!  Maybe a few more options on the main course entree such as a seafood.

Name: Quince
Comment: In a word: Overrated.  The service was a good but way over the top and made us feel uncomfortable due feeling like our every move and word was being monitored.  The food was good but for the price? Nah. Out of 10 courses, we loved 2 or 3 of them and the rest were good but not worth the money and prestige imho.

Name: Quince
Comment: Legendary. From greetings upon arrival, to the chocolate to go when leaving. Extreme attention to detail. Exquisite flavors. Unique experience. A must-go

Name: Quince
Comment: Total ripoff , For 2 ppl was charged 950 for tasting menu i really wasn’t impressed on.Never come back again.

Name: Quince
Comment: A lovely evening. Fantastic meal. Outstanding service. So many deserts! Was so satisfied and happy!

Name: Quince
Comment: super attentive staffs, wonderful atmosphere

Name: Quince
Comment: From the moment you walk in and are greeted by the dynamite staff to when you leave with a warm cup of hot chocolate waiting for you at the door for you walk outside, Quince just leaves you with the best culinary experience to remember for years to come.

Name: Quince
Comment: Excellent restaurant with great service, however, very pricey.  Buyer beware.

Name: Quince
Comment: Best dining experience of my life. We will be back!

Name: Quince
Comment: Excellent food and services. We were even invited to visit the kitchen, had one course there, and took picture with the chef.  Great experience!

Name: Quince
Comment: Good food but not one of the best, well trained staff offering a well rehearsed service, but not genuine, way overpriced for the experience. There are as good restaurant around for a third of the cost.

Name: Quince
Comment: Excellent service from the beginning to the end

Name: Quince
Comment: Disappointing.  After second course, there was a forty Minute wait for next course.  After that the timing of service was spotty.  Wine selections were spotty and main courses did not wow.

Name: Quince
Comment: Exceptional in every aspect! Amazing experience! Worth every penny! ~Thank you, Chef Musk! Well deserved three-star Michelin!!!

Name: Quince
Comment: Birthday family dinner

Name: Quince
Comment: The food and service are simply exquisite. They were incredibly accommodating. The courses are well paced but you should definitely plan on coming with an empty stomach. Most elegant restaurant in the bay area.

Name: Quince
Comment: The best Michelin 3 star restaurant in the world

Name: Quince
Comment: Elaborate dining with prefix menu

Name: Quince
Comment: Best dining experience in San Fran. Highly recommended.

Name: Quince
Comment: Awesome experience The eating in kitchen was very special!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Very "hip" place - loud, crowded, bar packed.  Food and service were both good.  Couldn't hear across the table, so don't go to have a conversation with your dinner partner.  Started annoyed with 6 texts, 2 phone calls, and 1 e-mail asking me to confirm reservation.  Each one answered.  Over-hyped place - won't go back

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Partner enjoyed the food, then the bar with quite great  characters and conversation which made the night complete.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Fantastic as usual!  Raouls consistently delivers an amazing food and ambiance experience.  I’d recommend it to anyone and everyone!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Ever mouthful was perfection!! Love this place it’s So consistent for great food quality and service!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: This cozy but very loud restaurant is home to perhaps the most outstanding Steak au Poivre I have ever had. The cut of meat was excellent, cooked to a perfect medium and crusted in just the right amount and consistency of pepper... served with a perfectly seasoned sauce of exactly the right consistency... and of course accompanied by a basket of crispy Frites! It doesn’t get much better than this! Exactly what I would expect from an Alsace heritage which, arguably produces the best chefs in all of Europe!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Food was delicious, overall great experience

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Food and cocktails were fantastic.  Steak au Poivre was amazing.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: This was an amazing find on this past trip. It had an old school feel given all its history in the city. My son LOVED the burger. This is a kid who doesn’t like sauce or much adornment on his burgers so the meat has to be spot on - this burger didn’t disappoint AND the pepper sauce was so good, he ATE ALL OF IT!!  All the food was divine and definitely a staple for our yearly visits toNYC from now on!!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: One of my NYC favorites!!!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Loved everything

Name: Raoul's
Comment: The food and lively atmosphere is always fantastic!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Great evening to enjoy my nieces birthday!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: All  Loved ❤️

Name: Raoul's
Comment: 日本人の私にとって、メニューの英語がとても分かりにくく、さらにレストラン内が薄暗く読むのに大変苦労した。でも、店員さんの親切な対応で頼んだ料理どれも素晴らしかった。値段の方はというと、一番安いもので10ドルから高いものだと50ドルくらいなので、ニューヨークであの立地と考えるとめちゃめちゃ高くはないと思う。なのでもしこれを読んだ日本人の方がいるなら、ニューヨークへ行く際全然是非寄ってみて欲しい。

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Always a great time at this legendary place

Name: Raoul's
Comment: My favorite place in the city!!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Fabulous burger -- worth the hype! The fries were also a pleasant surprise too.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Overpriced but not remarkable.  The waitstaff was curt. I would not go back.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Exceptional service and food at this well known restaurant. Really enjoyed our evening.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Good food, Poor service; table not ready, then after being directed to the bar were told we couldn’t transfer the bar bill to our table. Waiter was slow and inattentive, didn’t provide plates for the bread, didn’t once check in on the food, had to be asked three times for a drinks refill and provided dessert menus but didn’t come to take an order for 15 minutes....

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Great service and food! If you note a birthday celebration in open table they remember and add a candle to your desert which is great.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Fantastic night at this iconic new york restaurant.  The steak au poivre was perfectly cooked and delicious.  The choice of sides was great and the grilled broccoli was really tasty.  A huge wine list was also good with a massive selection of french as well as us wines.  Would definitely go again next time in NYC.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Great service. Nice wine menu. Delicious food. A true neighborhood gem. Can’t wait to go back again.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: YOU WILL BE CHARGED $100 to cancel reservations. Still a great place!!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Wonderful old school French brassiere with classic French cuisine done extremely well.  From the steak au pouvrie to the pomme  frites to the profiteroles you can’t go wrong.  Excellent service, as well.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Sexy crowd and the best steak au poivre in town. My go-to spot for a fun night out.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: 80th Birthday

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Beautiful space with interesting artwork. The food and wine were great and the ambiance was lovely. Service was the best.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Raoul's will always be our favorite place. The staff and food (especially the burger) are the absolute best.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Great burgers. My neighborhood favorite!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: I LOVE RAOUL'S!  My husband and I meet for late dinners here and always roll home full, tipsy and elated.  The service is really always outstanding.  Everything from the bar/ host staff's greeting to the experience at the table makes us feel so well cared for; I find the interpersonal style of the team to be very direct, professional, and effective, but also always warm.  This place is such a New York institution; it's an absolute privilege to enjoy it from time to time.  Thanks to the whole damn team!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Wonderful meal from beginning to end

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Never disappoints!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Amazing classic French style restaurant.The food is exquisite and the atmosphere fantastic. It’s not for those looking for a quiet night out as noise levels are high but I wouldn’t have it any other way. Efficient staff, eclectic artwork and food so delicious that my mouth waters at the mere thought of it! Go!! It should be illegal not to!

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Raoul’s is the best. It’s our regular go-to because while the food is really great (get the frisbee salad no matter what else you do)- the people are incredible and make you feel so welcome and at home. Plenty of celebrities come to this old school restaurant that has stayed popular for over 40 years but they treat  everyone wonderfully and care more how you behave than who you are

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Best steak au poivre ever, great Cosmo, fab music, cool scene. I will definitely return. Sometimes I look so hard for something new.... so glad I chose a classic to celebrate my husband’s 50th.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Tremendous spot.  A+ food, service. Traditional and current. Love it. Rivals the best.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: Great food, ambiance, service.  Hands down our favorite restaurant in NYC.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: One of the best burgers in town.

Name: Raoul's
Comment: The food is great and good value. I like the ambiance a lot. Dark with a European feel. Waitstaff are all competent but there are big inconsistencies in servers.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Excellent meal & service. Best Indian food I've ever had.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Very tasty, though there are other trendy, high end restaurants where I do feel like you get more bang for your buck than here.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Excellent in every way. Amazing food, service, room, noise level. Only knock for me personally was dessert, but that is more my tastes than their execution.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Great modern take on Indian food.  Looking forward to my next visit.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Once again, we all had great meals and great service. Rasika is the best indian food in town.

Name: Rasika
Comment: The food is delicious. I would recommend the restaurant to others.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Nice place. Good food. Always on our list for when we are in the mood for Indian food.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Outstanding food and service each time I visited.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Exceptional food and service!Outstanding experience.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Creative food, great vibe and service. Liked trying Indian beer.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Nice restaurant, food was good, not great. Didn’t understand what all the hype is about, but will give it another shot in the future.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Never been disappointed. Just fantastic Indian food with a modern flair.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Amazing delicious food! Great fun for a night of fine dining!

Name: Rasika
Comment: The food here is amazing.  Particularly the fish dishes (cod and bass).  I would eat it daily if I could.

Name: Rasika
Comment: A must-try if you love Indian food when you're in DC.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Dining at Rasika is an every-year holiday event. The service, ambiance, and food are spectacular. I always order the black cod and I'm never disappointed.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Fabulous food- and I mean everything we've ever eaten here.Great service and the decor!!

Name: Rasika
Comment: Absolutely delicious food!  Great service and lovely ambiance. A DC must!!

Name: Rasika
Comment: Excellent service and amazing food. Consistent great quality.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Delicious food options, albeit pricey. Nice for a date

Name: Rasika
Comment: Rasika is by far one of the best Indian restaurants in the DC region.  You will not be disappointed.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Best Indian restaurant in the dc area.  Sometimes hard to get in so reserve well ahead.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Hands down the best Indian food I've ever had.  Never fails to impress.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Alway a great place to eat -- you cannot go wrong.

Name: Rasika
Comment: This is one of the best Indian restaurants in all my experiences with Indian restaurants.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Loved the everything on the tasting menu. Nice ambiance.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Great tapas sized servings good for sharing a lot of dishes

Name: Rasika
Comment: I loved the Palaak Chaat. Food was great. Would recommend for a slow dining experience.

Name: Rasika
Comment: I love this restaurant. The flavors are bold and delicious. The service is outstanding every time I go ( I have been to Rasika 3 times now). I highly recommend this restaurant for lunch or dinner in DC (either location is great).

Name: Rasika
Comment: Service was great, food was good but portions were so small and none of the dishes come with rice... you need to order rice and pay for it.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Food was mildly spiced and excellent.  They handled a large party of 20 or so very well.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Many good dishes; however, my experience here, with its modest portion sizes and sometimes too subtle flavors, left me missing the experience I get at a good, traditional, American-Indian buffet.

Name: Rasika
Comment: This is my favorite Indian restaurant. Love, love, love.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Good. Hidden gem. Food was good and so was service. Beautiful place. Not expected.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Delicious! Great service and ambiance. Would recommend for a special evening out.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Excellent, unique, Indian food and lovely ambiance.

Name: Rasika
Comment: A little pricey but the food and service are consistently fantastic

Name: Rasika
Comment: Great meal! Tried the tasting menu so explored many dishes.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Excellent food and service.  An authentic dining experience.

Name: Rasika
Comment: Great ambiance, food selection, and variety. Great service by wait staff and managers. Attentive but not helicopter-ish. Great for intimate groups (4-8).

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: What a fabulous experience. From the moment we're greeted at the door we feel like royalty visiting somewhere else. What an atmosphere in the dining room. Expert wait staff, and the absolute finest food in Cincinnati - and that's a high bar given the alternatives available. Go with the the 3 (or 2) course menu and wine pairings for an unbelievable taste experience.  Not something we can afford very frequently but we get there for the big events.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Excellent food and service. Duck and lamb were excellent!

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Always great. The Rabbit is phenomenal. Service and ambiance can't be beat.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Jean-Robert defines elegant dining in his several venues across town. Restaurant's impeccable service is utterly unobtrusive and the servers are well-informed. We have dined there on several occasions, both in the restaurant and in the bar, and have come away pleased. This time we opted for the 2-course dinner with pairings, and while the food itself was well-prepared it was not the perfection we had come to known. The wine pairings, though, were superb, as were the selection of in-house pastries for dessert.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Great slow dining experience to appreciate delicious food and wine.  For those that appreciate fine dining, classy atmosphere and are willing to pay for it.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Wonderful! Menu gourmand was exceptional ! Decor and ambience perfection. Can not say enough good things. A must

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Best restaurant in Cincinnati with beautiful ambiance, diverse menu beautifully presented food offering good value ( bargain compared to large cities) impeccable service,  No one does fine dining better than owners Richard Brown & Jean Rober

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: An awesome menu. Perfect setting. Brilliant presentation. Great tasting dinner. Fabulous wait staff. And...all of that plus Jean Robert de Cavel in the kitchen. I could not ask for more, but I did...all of this in a very friendly. "non-stuffy" atmosphere. PERFECT!Put this winner on your restaurant "bucket list" for sure!

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Simply the most elegant restaurant in Cincinnati.  Best food between New York and Chicago.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Amazing food!

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Everything was wonderful from staff to food. Nice ambiance.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: L has an attention to detail that is unmatched in the tri-state area.  Outside of NYC, there are few places that I've seen that can execute to this level of perfection.  Every detail of the dinning experience, from the grand bar and service, to the entry of the magnificent dinning room, to dinning service - all done with grace and flawless delivery.  No detail in the dinning experience is trivialized.  The thoughtfulness is seen throughout a perfectly choreographed experience.  Their attention to GF was outstanding.  I'm grateful to have this set of amazing restaurateurs in Cincinnati that can have this level of execution.Thank you, team L for another wonderful experience.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Having had superb dining experiences in the past, there is not much more to say except it is still superb. Service, food, and ambiance continue to be in the top tier in Cincinnati. For a very special evening at, by the quality standard of the restaurant, a very reasonable price, one could not find a better place to dine.We will go back often.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Everything was delightful....music agreeable, but a tad too loud...

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Restaurant L is a very special destination and we had a wonderful evening!  Be prepared to spend time there, enjoy the atmosphere and excellent service, as well as the exquisite cuisine.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: An experience! The ambiance is outstanding and the food is delicious. Service and taste were at a level I've never experienced before.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Just a wonderful experience. This is why it is one of the very best restaurants in Cincinnati. Expensive but worth it. Service was great!!!

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Wow!  Tremendous service and food!  The chef was amazing and greeted our group a couple times to explain the menu.  He was fantastic!!

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: L is my wife's favorite " special occasion" restaurant.   The gourmand menu was superb as well as the service.  Thank you Max and Richard.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: This is our favorite restaurant for special occasions.  It was great to see chef greeting guests.  Everything was superb and outstanding.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: First time there, met a friend for lunch.Was offered the Friday express lunch in the lounge so we decided on that. First course was soup or salad and second course was a Pho burger or chicken crepes for $12.Delicious!! Will go back again for dinner.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: What a gem in red neck Cincinnati, the place is somptuous, the service perfect although a bit too fast, they wanted to close early, with just three tables that evening. The show is the inventive food of the French chef, at the level of a  star Michelin if the inspectors knew where Cincinnati was! A bemol to this otherwise perfect evening: the wine pairing done with perfectly low quality boring wines. Not acceptable for such gorgeous food.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Love the restaurant.  When I want a casual night out with friends, I go to the bar area.  Couldn't be better.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: A wonderful experience from start to finish!

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Everything was delicious. Ambience was great and the staff was fantastic.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Everything was perfect, as expected.  One table of six got a little loud periodically.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Exactly what should come with fine French dining....great cuisine, great wine, attentive and gracious service.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Outstanding preparation and service.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Every visit to Restaurant L is a wonderful experience. The food, service and staff make this a visit to be enjoyed and savored. The presentation is wonderful and the food is excellent. Love the wine pairing option. This enhances the flavor of each course. The room is beautiful and the ambiance special.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: AAAAMMMMMAAAZZZZIINNGG!   It was a perfect date night the food was fabulous!  The staff was great and informative!  We had the Gourmand menu and it’s was wonderful from start to finish.  The dining room ambiance was great

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: The service was exceptional as usual. Only one error, a colleague asked for more bread which never came. Food was amazing.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: This was a wonderful dining experience ! The food was excellent and the service was outstanding !

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: We each got the 3 course Prix Fixe menu. What a great way to try multiple delicious food.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Beautiful and delicious, a great experience

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: What a great choice to celebrate my wife's birthday.  We have always enjoyed the Orchids but it has not met our expectations in  quality of food and service.  We decided to try Restaurant L this year and were pleasantly surprised.  There were many mixed reviews regarding L, but nothing but raves from us.  The room was beautiful and the service was superb.  The food and presentation outstanding.  We chose the three course dinner with the wine pairings  WOW for both. The flavors of each course were wonderful and the venison hit the jackpot.  The wines worked very well with the food and certainly enhanced the flavors of the evening.  We certainly look forward to return visits.  In our book it is the best restaurant in Cincinnati.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: 3 course prix fixe with wine pairing. 5 star Euro experience from start to finish Chef came to  each table to greet and check in. Staff knowledgeable and very open and personable. Richard Brown is wonderful historian of restaurant industry in Cincinnati as well as NYC and Europe.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: Nothing can beat their Friday express linch in the bar.  2 courses for $12.  Of course we included a bottle of wine and desserts too.  The soups here are always heavenly and no one does salmon like this place.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: We went to L's to celebrate my sister-in-law's retirement.  We had great quiet evening where the staff continued to excel in everything they did.  The drinks were outstanding and the menu was better than expected.  I'm looking forward to my next visit to L's, to see what's new on the menu.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: While we enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere and felt no rush, some of the service did lag a bit.  However, we were greatly accommodated and we are happy to recommend Restaurant L to others.

Name: Restaurant L
Comment: My wife and I had a wonderful Christmas lunch. The 4 course tasting menu was superb! Always a wonderful time at L. It is a very special place.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Excellent! Great neighborhood spot - we will be back!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Wonderful service, great patio. Will definitely be back!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Dinner outside with two friends, service was top notch with very attendance waiter and food/ wine was fantastic ! We were part of the uncovered patio and when it started raining our server moved us under the umbrella with all new silverware, which was greatly appreciated. Highly recommend this spot for great Italian, nice portions and a wonderful ambiance !

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Absolutely fantastic!   Sat outside and we were covered by the passing rain shower.   The food was delicious and service top notch.   So happy we found this restaurant!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: We had a 9 p.m. reservation Friday evening and it was so nice to be able to dine at Riccardo Enoteca again! We felt the table distancing and precautions were excellent. The service and food were exceptional, as usual!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Amazing experience overall! Fantastic service and fantastic experience.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Old reliable. The most consistently good restaurant in Chicago.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: They have a decent wine collection. Good service too.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: The service was amazing. The entire staff was extremely friendly and attentive. The food was delicious. Loved it and will definitely return.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: This is a very cozy neighborhood restaurant that has a terrific menu to please a variety of tastes. The help is exceptional--friendly, helpful and efficient. I have dined here many times and will continue to do so! It is a bit pricey but worth the $$ since the dishes are so delicious.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Perfect neighborhood spot worth leaving your own neighborhood to visit! Delicious food, great ambience, professional and friendly service.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Very accommodating, will custom prepare a dish if necessary.  Authentic cooking and great neighborhood atmosphere .

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Best Italian restaurant in the city!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Everything was so good; the wine, the complementary bruschetta, arugula salad, prosciutto pizza, and surprise birthday tiramisu. Friend was late for our reservation, no problem. We  shared a pizza, no judgement. Very friendly, genuine service -  attentive and unobtrusive. Genuine Italian fresh, quality food full of flavor- the cooks have the gift! Welcoming, soothing, and lively atmosphere. A real gem. Highly recommended.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Lovely spot with so many great food choices it was hard to pick!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Excellent everything! Would recommend for any event or just dinner. Value is excellent, great wine selection and the food was best I’ve had since leaving NJ. Will definitely be back.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Always such a great meal and outstanding service.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Always love Riccardo's.  Friendly staff and delicious food.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Absolutely love this place. Classic italian, delicious food, low key setting.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: I am always amazed at the quality of the food and the excellence of the service.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: This is one of our favorite restaurants of all time.  We live a five minute walk away and always ask ourselves why we don't eat here more often.  The service is helpful and friendly.  The food is outstanding.  Never had a bad time here.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Food is wonderful and the service was exceptional. Made us feel special.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Excellent neighborhood restaurant. Exceptional food and super personable and professional staff.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Food and service were excellent. We came on a VERY cold night and were seated just in front of the door and asked if we'd be frozen out in that location. We were offered a 20-30 minute wait for another table but they said we'd be OK. The restaurant has a long entry between the outside door and the inside door. There is a sign asking people to make sure that the outside door is closed before opening the inside door. A member of the restaurant staff spent much of his time by the inside door to make sure that guests observed the request.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Great pizza, good wine selection and friendly neighborhood spot.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: This is one of my favorite restaurants in Lincoln Park. Cesar, JP, Juan and all of the chefs and staff are top notch — friendly, courteous and always provide great recommendations, superior service and delicious meals. I cannot say enough about how much we adore Cesar! Riccardo should be very proud of him and all who make this restaurant so great! And Riccardo himself is the best of the best of all chefs in Chicago and a lovely, kind, intelligent, amazing person too! I do not know many who have his passion, kind heart and amazing talent!!!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Food and ambiance was of the highest quality.  Highly recommend this place.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: A neighborhood gem. We come often for the authentic food and excellent service. I’m from New York City; the size and vibe remind me of home.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Wonderful and quiet New Year’s Eve dinner. Simply delicious.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Best small venue Italian in Chicago!!!  The food is always great and the service is even better.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Birthday celebration. Great place to enjoy w friends. Great food and service.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: We love Riccardo Enoteca. Really really love it. Special occasion, every day. We always have a reason to go.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: One of a few restaurants open on Christmas Eve, we had a great meal here.  The Milanese style pizza was revelatory with its crisp, light crust.  The lasagna and the lobster fettuccine were fantastic, as were the scallops.  Excellent wine list, too.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: The food is always delicious and inventive. And the staff, charming. Our favorite neighborhood spot.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Great local italian with exceptional service. Staff are so welcoming and attentive.  Nice wine list!  A place you can return to again and again knowing you will have a wonderful evening.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: The bolognese was out of this world! Can't wait to return

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: The staff was amazing, the atmosphere is Welcoming, but the food stole the show. DELICIOUS!!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Service was excellent.  We had the Napoletana and Vegetarians pizzas, bean soup, and gnocchi. Delicious!   Spectacular wine list.   And very nice ambience.

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Great food, great wine list and service. Adorable little restaurant. Great evening out with the family!

Name: Riccardo Enoteca
Comment: Riccardo Enoteca is always a delicious meal! It’s a wonderful restaurant in Linvoln Park!

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Fantastic restaurant with innovative food.  Packed every night.  Tip - go and wait at 5.30pm when they just open and you can sit at the bar!

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Incredible food, incredible service. Would go back in a heartbeat but very difficult to get a reservation.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Another amazing place....excellent food and experience.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Always a solid choice.  Creative menu, smart wait staff.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Absolutely loved the place.  Our waiter was very nice and helped us make good menu selections for it being our first time visiting.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Top notch culinary experience, yet you may come away hungry

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Fabulous.  Great for foodies, anniversaries, theatre.  Just great food and wine

Name: Rich Table
Comment: the food is delicious. ideally located and tolerable noise level

Name: Rich Table
Comment: We rolled in at 5pm without a reservation and sat right away at the bar. We shared a tomato bone marrow butter toast and also split a pasta dish and a chimichurri rib eye as well. It was all delicious. The bartender was friendly and attentive. Try Pep in your Step for a drink, it was outstanding

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Outstanding service and meal.  Always a treat to come here.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: great food small neighborhood rest. need reservation

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Nice hearty food in nice ambiance. we get takeout all the time. try the roasted broccoli !

Name: Rich Table
Comment: GREAT.  Attentive, delicious, innovative.  Save up your $$$ and colories for this one.  Its absolutely worth it.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: This place is worth every penny.  Its creative visually and stimulates the taste buds beyond belief.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Creative dishes, fresh ingredients, service was absolutely fantastic!  The tasting menu was a fun experience, wine paring was a nice compliment.  My partner and I shared the pairing which worked out nicely.  Will definitely return!

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Waitress who had a bad attitude from inception It made the dining experience very uncomfortable

Name: Rich Table
Comment: This place is phenomenal. My only complaint is that maybe the seating could be a little more comfortable but the food and wine pairings are so good that it doesn't really matter.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: The food was very good, the service was outstanding and he atmosphere rustic and enjoyable.  I will return.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Glad we went! The Staff was very friendly and energetic and always helpful. Rich Table is a "must try".

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Husband 40 birthday

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Our server, Dana, was fantastic! When I told her that I brought a “big wine “ to share with our friends, she immediately offered to decant the bottle. We had a symphony performance after dinner, and she made sure that we were able to leave the restaurant in time to make our curtain. Dana was friendly, efficient and knowledgeable regarding the menu.  She made our evening more enjoyable. The food was top rate. We shared appetizers and each had an entree. We especially liked the porcini donuts, rock cod, and rib eye steak covered with onion rings. Looking forward to returning in the future.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: We’ve come here for Anniversary a few times now. We always have a good meal. Excellent food. Always tasty. One of our favorites in SF.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Very Imaginative cooking, served very "warmly" professionally, totally non-pretentious totality. Quite enjoyable and special.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Excelllent food and a highly trained staff who know the menu and knows even better how to make you feel at ease.  A fantastic experience from start to finish. We will be back - if we can get a reservation, that is!

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Bday, great atmosphere and vibe

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Yes, this is a great restaurant. We had the tasting menu with the pairings. There were three of us and we basically got the entire menu and each dish was fantastic. The pairings suited every dish and the best part was each of us had a different dish with a different pairing and it was a true in depth and varied tour of mostly local wines and beers and ciders. A very fun evening. Hope to return!

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Loved it! Delicious food, attentive staff, what more does one ask for.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Great night and food at Rich table. Per ballet meal. All dishes were exceptionally good from the signature donuts, to the soft shell crab and the various pastas. The lasagna was unusual and good, the bucatini with peas and mint a nice blend with cheese topping.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: My wife and I were passing by San Francisco, heard great review about this place. The food were amazing, we will definitely come again.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Great night and food at Rich table. Per ballet meal.  All dishes were exceptionally good from the signature donuts, to the soft shell crab and the various pastas.  The lasagna was unusual and good, the bucatini with peas and mint a nice blend with cheese topping.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: First time to RT — we were not disappointed! The buccatini was our favorite pasta dish. Highly recommend. We ordered the hush puppies and perrogies as well, both of which were excellent. Most people around us got the porcini doughnuts though, probably should’ve had those as they seemed popular. 10/10!

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Great food, but overpriced, and wine list is crazy. Starts at $60, and wine wasn't even that nice. Also charged for bread and butter, which is always annoying. Great menu, but you really need a large group to do it justice by sharing. There are too many courses for two to enjoy.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: This was one of the best experiences I have ever had.  There are a lot of wonderful, unique restaurants in San Francisco.....but this one is particularly special.  I recommend doing the chef's tasting menu.  Also, the Rich Table cookbook is a lot of fun.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Our dinner and dessert with Tiffany and her associates was phenomenal - can’t wait to go back!  Thanks so much, everyone.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: a little bit salty. The ingredients are all fresh and special.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Food and drinks were amazing and service was wonderful.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: You guys are the best!!! Keep doing it!!!! Thanks!

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Amazing funky food. “Fit for foodies”If you’re from out of town, don’t miss this spot

Name: Rich Table
Comment: The food was delicious and the service warm and helpful. The server’s suggestions were perfect in terms of portions and dishes.

Name: Rich Table
Comment: Anniversary

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Fantastic!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Eager for the full menu to come back.  Awesome place.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Excellent dining experience.  All the proper steps were taken to ensure a safe dining experience in the pandemic era.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Consistently great service and food. One of my favorite Chicago restaurants.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Just reopened from corona and you would never know it. Great food, ambiance and service!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Fabulous ambience, delicious food, lively staff with a cozy intimate setting.Outstanding wine, champagne, cocktail selection.  A Chicago staple!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Great way to spend a Saturday afternoon.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Amazing! So good to be back.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Always amazing! Exquisite food and outstanding service. We love visiting Dani. He makes the most delicious cocktails. Can’t wait to go back! Thank you!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Outstanding!!!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Excellent food and service, and the bagpipes were an exceptional treat!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Service and food are always great.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: This is my favourite Chicago restaurant.  Great service, food, beverages, and ambiance.  Tonight I had the sea bass special--extraordinary.  And I never miss the brussels sprouts, with lardons!!  Yummy.  White tablecloth, sophisticated service.  Makes you feel good.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Always a great experience and quality meal.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Good overall experience. The crabcake was a little weird with the crispy strands around it but was ok. Burger excellent.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Never thought I would dine at an RL restaurant and feel like my group was a burden.  From the moment we walked in the door we were met with an attitude.   We are in Chicago for 3 nights and wish we hadn’t wasted one of them at your restaurant.  Hopefully you can learn from this.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: My absolute favorite ladies lunch spot.  Took my 88 year old mom and our waiter made her feel so special.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Everything went well. Missed Joseph but Seamus and Henry did a great job of filling in. We were well pleased.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: We love dining here! Best, most accommodating staff in the city, in an incredibly beautiful room. Oh yeah and the foods awesome!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: A great time was had by all!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Great waiter, excellent service.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: This was our first time at the RL Restaurant and it was fantastic! The service was impeccable, the food was absolutely delicious, and the ambiance in the restaurant is perfect. They even took notice of my ID and realized my birthday was in a few days, and I got a birthday dessert! This is a restaurant where you truly feel taken care of from the moment you walk in the door until the moment you walk out. I can’t wait to go back!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Repeat visit for me. Love the ambience, location right off the Mag Mile and the burger! Came with a few people after a work cocktail party looking for some real food. Not quite a fancy occasion, and the host was great about finding us a table in the bar area. The service is great, not too stuffy but attentive. Great wine by the glass list, and always love this delish RL burger.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Great vibe, excellent service!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Great ‘Old Fashioned’ cocktails followed by delicious food serviced by a very friendly team. The ambiance is unique making this one of our favourite places in Chicago.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Both Jose Vazquez and Jaaffar Sabbar were superior.Jaaffar Sabbar connected us to the food and to the RL brand.  He went well out of his way to provide exceptional service. We’ll definitely return and ask for Jaaffar.A perfect evening.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Extensive menu & high quality service

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: The hostesses and Flavia were terrific. Tom and assistants did a great job and ensured all was wonderful from start to finish. It is so nice for us to have backup for Joseph The Hreat. Tom and Aramis are great backups so we always have a delightful dining experience!!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Second time coming. First time was magical and second time around did not disappoint. Still love their lobster bisque.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Loved every sip/bite. I ordered the espresso martini, shrimp cocktail and roasted vegetable pappardelle. Delish!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Excellent as always.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: This is our favorite restaurant in the US! We love going to RL on any occasion. Highly recommend you go. the service the food and everything about RL is wonderful!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: it's perfect, every time.  thank you!  AMAZING crab and avocado salad too.

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: From the time you enter, until the time you leave satisfied, you feel the Ralph Lauren magic! The decor makes you feel you have arrived. The service makes you feel special. The food makes you feel like a king or queen! You won’t be disappointed!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Great atmosphere very chic place to dine anytime

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Cozy throw back to the 1970 feel of warmth and cozy restaurant.. sort of wraps it’s arms around you!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Siempre un gran lugar!!!! La decoración y el ambiente con sensación de refinamiento. Accesible de precio y servicio excelente!!!!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Loved my table. Loved the always pro and delightful service. Loved the Bollinger Grande Année (though I definitely didn’t need a champagne 101. got that covered ;)). LOVED that mushroom and kale salad. Made two more lunch reservations for next week!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Excellent wine and beer list!  Today enjoyed Moody Tongue Carmelized Chocolate Churro Baltic Porter brewed in Chicago!  Delicious!  Enjoyed the Clam Chowder!  And Chicken Salad!

Name: RL Restaurant
Comment: Something has changed- not sure what.Fries were really terrible - better available in McDonalds.Steak and fish were excellent.Did somebody change the chocolate cake?

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: For obvious reasons we could not make it to the reservation but we did order RPM thorugh Doordash and it was still very good.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Service was great. Food was delicious. We loved everything about the experience.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Very exquisite food and very good quality! Sometimes it’s nice to splurge once in a while, especially in one of my favorite cities. Side note: when you reserve for big groups, I would suggest two people in the group reserving and then coming in person the night before or a few hours before the reservation to see if there’s a possibility to sit together. The hostesses were very accommodating. Thank you!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: This was my second time going to this location and was an attempt to change my initial poor decision. Service was very attentive and friendly. We started with the focaccia and meatballs. The focaccia was delicious and the meatballs were just not my taste consistency-wise. For dinner we shared the gnocchi and wild mushroom risotto which were both delicious. I would recommend this as a stop for a good meal and beautiful ambience.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: One of the best dining experiences I have ever had. The food and drinks were absolutely amazing and there was a wide selection. Our verbal was extremely educated, attentive and outgoing. The pricing is also extremely affordable and reasonable. Hope to be back soon! Thank you RPM and staff!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Good food and great ambiance!!!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Very nice experience, food is excellent.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Birthday celebration

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Dre, was amazing. Best service ever. Everyone ask for him. The food is always dependably great.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: We had a very fun experience at RPM Italian. The dishes were very good. Some of our favorites were the Mediterranean Octopus, Brussels sprouts, meatball appetizer, and swordfish. The cocktails were also very well crafted with a long list of bourbons, ryes, whiskeys.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: It was great!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Outstanding food! This was some of the best tartare we've ever had & the homemade pastas & ricotta were delicious. We will definitely return next time we're in town.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: We were there celebrating a very special birthday and RPM Italian is the guest of honor's favorite restaurant and he goes here all the time. The girl that seated us had an attitude and had a look on her face that she would literally rather be anywhere else in the world to the point where one of my guests had to ask her if she was ok, I'm not sure if she was having a bad day but it was very visible on her face and she acted annoyed when we asked if we could have another table but there was a woman that I wish i got her name because she was amazing and she found out that maybe we wanted a round table and she moved us to the round table. She also brought us a variety of readers when our waitress only brought one pair that were too strong for someone that needed it so I appreciated her so much because I would not have been happy with our experience at all if it wasn't for her. You could tell she cared about our experience which I really appreciated. Also there was a misunderstanding with our waitress on the salads and who was splitting what so we had to order another salad because the way it was split up (which I appreciated that they split them for us), there was a person that was left out and was not brought out a salad. Other than that, the food was outstanding but maybe it was just a bad night but I think service needs to be taken up a notch because that is also a very important part of the dining experience.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: What an amazing restaurant! The wine list was spectacular and the sommelier was very knowledgeable and directed us to an excellent Tuscan red. I am vegan and there were plenty of options!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Great food! Great experience and service was excellent!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: The server was very rude and the food was cold.  She would rush back and forth by our table and never stop to ask how our meal was.  I have dined here many times and have always enjoyed the experience but was highly disappointed by our server.  Not polite or accommodating and rushed us.  Sommelier was excellent and took great care.I had guests from out of town that I have been raving about the restaurant and was embarrassed about the experience.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Pasta was too al dente, but sauce was great and service outstanding

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Wonderful!  Great food.  Matthew was our server.  He was so great.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: The staff was outstanding despite the presence of two badly inebriated guests in our party. They couldn't have been more helpful and generous as the pair eventually left dinner

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: This was my second time there and RPM did not disappoint. The wagyu tartar was amazing. The artichokes were flaky and the sauce with it was a marriage made in heaven. The pastas were outstanding.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Great time and awesome experience. It is sad that we couldn't use our points because that is why we went there. We had never been told.before hand and it should be explained before hand. Bad customer experience.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Had dinner with two little kids, felt welcomed. Food is delicious, small portion but good quality.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Our waiter was phenomenal.   He truly was the best waiter/server I have ever had and I travel for work so that is a lot of people I am comparing him to.   He needs a raise and promotion to a manager.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Good time. Great ambiance!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Seated us 30 mins after our reservation with no apology.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Our server was amazing!! She told us all about the specials and how to order the beat way in order to enjoy your meal. She really knew her stuff!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: It was my daughter’s birthday they treated us like royalty, and the food was amazing!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Ambiance and overall experience was good. Food was ok. Definitely not the best Italian I've ever had, but not bad. I wish they didn't grill the focaccia and left it soft... And the cheesecake definitely need some citrus to cut the sweetness. The texture of the pastas was great, but the sauces are in desperate need of flavor. The gnocchi needed a creamier sauce in our opinion... For a cheese and pepper (cacio e pepe) sauce, it was very oily.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Had a great waitress and loved the overall ambiance of the space. Great food with well executed ingredients. Loved how special all our desserts were as well.

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Always excellent, but our server was particularly fantastic!!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Disappointing both in food and service. You really wouldn’t know RPM Italian and RPM Steak were run and owned by the same people. I had very high hopes for Italian considering how amazing Steak is....totally disappointed.Staff was rude, not very friendly (like at all) and maybe even snobby. Food was so bland and lackluster. Wish I chose a different restaurant for our short trip...

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: It was wonderful!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Superb on every way!!!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Fabuloso, el servicio muy bueno, la comida excelente, el ambiente increíble

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Very good! Loved the ambiance and cozy booths no to mention the fantastic food, especially the truffle garlic bread, gnocchi, chicken parm and desserts.  Will come back!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: We had the best time! Robert, our server was amazing! He was so kind and lovely and fun! Dan, the somm helped us pick the most amazing wine for our meal and I can’t stop thinking about it. And the bar manager was also awesome for his brief time stopping by! Food was awesome we got the prosciutto service, beef carpaccio, bone in ribeye, gnocchi, & sides! So good! For being pretty corporate & making the servers wear white which I think is mean considering how much I would spill on those, it felt personal and everyone gave the perfect amount of attention. I can’t wait to go back

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Excellent food and service! The pastas were delicious, the desserts are outta this world

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Incredible!!!!! We were treated like royalty!!!!  Food and service, ambiance, hosts, everything was perfection!  I have not been this impressed with every aspect of a dining experience in a very, very long time.  Cheers RPM, you rocked it!!!!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: We celebrated my mom’s 70th birthday.  We were seated right away at a great table.  Outlet waiter was very attentive & our meal was amazing.  Such a well run restaurant!  Will be heading back for sure!

Name: RPM Restaurants - Multiple Locations
Comment: Always amazing. Meatballs, warm ricotta toast, chicken parm and carbonara every time.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Great food and service.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: As we walked into Rudy and Paco, i immediately knew that the restaurant  exceeded my expectations. The upscale, but comfortable and almost historical feel of the place assured us that we made a good choice. Our experience only got better from there. We were greeted my Paco himself before we were taken to our table by a very friendly hostess. Shortly thereafter our waitress introduced herself and brought us a lovely plate of ribboned plantains with chimichurri sauce and “Paco Pico” sauce. The light and crunchy plantains successfully served to whet our appetite for the rest of our highly-anticipated meal. My husband and I shared a plate of escargot. The delightfully soft and warm bread that accompanied the dish was quite pleasing. As we were there to celebrate our anniversary, we ordered a Prosecco cocktail that was enhanced by hibiscus syrup with candied Hibiscus at the bottom of our glasses. It was a great Segway into our main course. My favorite thing about Galveston seafood restaurants is that they know how to prepare gulf coast seafood- Rudy and Paco’s treatment of the red snapper that I ordered was painstakingly good! It was cooked to perfection and adorned (not overdressed) by avocado, Paco Pico, and lump crab meat...good stuff!  My husband wasn’t too fond of the scallops dish he ordered stating that they were “cold and not very flavorful.” Aside from that, the wine selection was ample, and my tres leches dessert was heavenly! It was swimming in the milks that flavored each drenched and spongy bite! My only critique, if I have to list one, is that the sides are lacking. Although I am a purist, and I like my veggies plain and lightly steamed which they executed successfully, I feel that a restaurant of their caliber should step up their sides game. I loved the brocolini, but I would have appreciated a wider range of sides from which to choose such as a lively beet salad to compliment that beautiful piece of fish. I would, and will definitely return!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: What a great experience! I spilled some of the sauce on my dress shirt and Paco was over in an instant with club soda to wash it out.  He is attentive and a great restauranteur.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Always my favorite place to eat for a nice dinner on the island.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Great service and great staff.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: The grouper special was delicious!!!  Our server was attentive. Nice wine selection

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Great food and owner was very friendly and engaging. Will definitely come back.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Paco makes everyone feel welcome and the food is always perfectly done.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: As usual, everything about my experience at Rudy & Paco’s was phenomenal.   The quality of the food is unsurpassed.  The server, Franco Perez, was the ultimate professional.  The attention to detail and unique, delectable dishes paired with an upscale, elegant atmosphere makes Rudy & Paco’s one of the most absolutely delightful places to dine anywhere.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Delicious food Perfect service Nice atmosphere not noisy Overall fantastic Wish there was a Paco and Rudy’s in Houston

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: The grilled snapper with creole sauce was excellent and I will order it again.  The bourbon selection was very good with some hard to find bottles.  We enjoyed the dinner very much and will return soon.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar is a great place to relax and dine.  The service is outstanding as is the food.  Paco introduced himself and was gracious and friendly.  If you are looking for a nice, quiet, relaxing place to enjoy a meal with friends this is a great choice.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Good food, good service, high priced for what you receive.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Still a good choice for better food and atmosphere over 99.9% of island.  I have to say I am disappointed the last few times in as long as I've been going (practically since it opened).  I am greeted by owner as feeling forced (like he HAS to say hi as I'm there next to my husband) but warmly greets my husband like it's a male thing. It may seem petty to some but as a long time customer (I'd not go anymore bcuz of it but my husband loves it),  I feel unwelcomed and unease.  I do not know why as it was not always the case. One wants to feel welcome and comfortable when dining out. It is my only real gripe as food and service are mostly on point.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Always the best. We had the grouper special last night!  So fresh and tasty. Always count on Paco for great fresh fish with daily specials. You need to make reservations and remind your guests of the no shorts policy. You won’t regret your visit to Rudy and Paco’s.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Food was amazing.  Service was stellar.  Would highly recommend!!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Alex was a great server!!!!!!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: You expect a quality experience at Rudy & Paco's and you always get it.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Excellent as always

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Always a pleasant experience!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: This is an amazing restaurant with amazing food and top notch service. It's not inexpensive but it's worth every penny.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Fabulous! We had the best time! Great food and great service!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Impeccable service with amazing food!  Good variety of cocktails that were hand crafted and perfectly balanced.  Seafood was fresh and not overwhelmed by sauce and/or cooking method.  Dessert was perfect!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: This is our favorite restaurant to visit when we are in the Galveston area.  The staff, ambiance, and food are always excellent, without exception.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Four friends reunion that Rudy and Paco Restaurant made so very special!!!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: We really had a good time with our dining experience last Saturday. The person attending the table was very professional, nice and helpful. The food was great. Overall was an excellent dinner.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Attention to detail was magnificent! The servers bringing everything out together along with drinks even! Outstanding! We even met Paco!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
