Comment: Classic restaurant with delicious food and attentive service.  Great for special occasion, date night and celebration.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Rudy and Paco Restaurant is one of our favorite restaurants any where and our favorite Galveston restaurant. Our trips to Galveston are never complete without a couple of Rudy and Paco meals. Our waiter Alex, always works hard to give us the best possible experience. I had the grouper with lump crab and it was delicious.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Awesome food, service, wine selection.  Owner came to tables to inquire about how we liked everything.  Great food selection.  We will definitely return when in Galveston.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Paco and his crew NEVER disappoint!Thanks again for a wonderful evening!Erin and Bill Alexander

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Wonderful service, friendly staff and excellent meal had by all. I had the scallops which were  prepared to perfection. My wife had the redfish topped with crab meat - absolutely wonderful. Highly recommended and can't wait to return to Rudy and Paco for a fine dinning experience.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Love this place!  Fantastic empanadas, shrimp and pasta was so fresh and grilled gulf red snapper with cilantro cream sauce, yummm.  They have the best bread pudding (outside of my own). I have been coming here for years and have never been disappointed.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Hands down one of the best experiences for dinner. Food was fantastic!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Went for a lunch date. Several selections to choose from, all very good. The setting was quiet and the service was excellent.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: This is the first time the food was very disappointing. The rib eye wasn't just fatty (which I love). It was stringy. Definitely not a high quality steak. And tough. Broccolini was undercooked. The lump crab accomoanying the steak was, well, lump crab. For the money, we would have paid well for a high cut of beef and Alaskan king crab legs. I seriously have to think whether I would ever come back.  The swrvice, however, was great. Rebecca was attentive and kind.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: One of the best experiences we have ever had. Our server,  Valeria, was perfect. The owner, Paco, visited our table several times and even took us on a personal tour of his other restaurant, Vargas, across the street.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: This is a superlative restaurant.  If you have the opportunity to eat here, do so.

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Birthday dinner! Food was fabulous !!

Name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Great service from our waiter, friendly and easy to talk withHost was great .. he was able to accommodate us at the last minute

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: I eat here often. Wifes steak was a little overdone but replaced very quickly. Alan is a fantastic server. Bar was a little loud but hey it is the bar.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: This restaurant continue to be on of the hardest reservations to get in the city.  The food is very consistent.  I would love to see them invest money back into the restaurant to improve the ambiance.  It feels like you are stuck in the 80s

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Delicious as always. These guys never disappoint. Love eating here.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Great service as usual 👍👍

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Took my wife for her birthday. Been here quite a few times and hands down best service and steak around.  Will visit many more times

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Delicious! Awesome!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Awesome dinner

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Great place . Nice set up . Good food . Great customer service . Allan and Brent specifically were great .

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Our meal at Ruth's Chris was excellent. I have never had a bad meal there and the service was fantastic. We were never rushed and our server always came around at the right time. I look forward to my next visit.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Excellent as always!!!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Great meal! Always lives up to our excitement. Steak is always unreal. Completely convinced Lobster Mac n cheese and rose from here will solve all of life’s problems.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Literally the best place to eat in Baton Rouge 🙌🏼

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: We really enjoyed our dinner.  We needed a break to relax.  We have been dealing with family death and illness and caring for family members.   Not a vacation but a nice dinner.  We were surrounded by nice people.  The waiter was very nice and heard our need to have a break and a nice dinner.  God bless him.  He’s a great person.Thank youKathy LewisGod bless

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Always top notch!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Always fantastic!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Great as always!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge is a GREAT Restaurant to Celebrate a Special Occasion or just to spend some quality time with your Wife of 59 Years.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Had a wonderful meal as always !! Great service !

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Our server was knowledgeable and helpful. He had a great personality. When we came in, everyone (hostesses) told us happy anniversary.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Our first visit to Ruth’s Chris Baton Rouge was nothing less than stellar.  Our server Christine was 5-star herself.  She was friendly, knowledgeable, helpful, and had a great personality. She really helped make our evening extra special.The food was exactly what we expected from Ruth’s Chris.....Amazing!  The manager Brent was extremely friendly, professional, and courteous.  We will definitely return to indulge in 5-star service, ambiance, and of course, the food.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Awesome food great service as always.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Best dinner experience in the city, love Ruth’s and will continue to come back!!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Great experience.  Our server was named Kelly and she did a super job!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Another superb evening at Ruth’s Chris. This being a true flagship in the franchise. The first built after Ruth’s success in New Orleans. The model the rest followed. Now helmed by Chris the owner with passion to detail and quality that is just the best. Not a misstep anywhere. Great cocktails and food and wine. Superb service. A personal favorite.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Excellent food and service!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Every time we dine at Ruth Chris’- it is an outstanding experience. We will continue to go back! Excellent every single time!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: I have never been to Ruth’s Chris I was pretty excited to go I have always heard how great the steaks were, and to be honest I was not impressed with the steak at all! When the calamari appetizer was better than the steak in a steak house that is an issue. Unless the dinner steak is seasoned or cooked different than a steak at lunch I do not see myself returning to Ruth’s Chris ever.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: The BEST STEAK EVER AND ALWAYS CONSISTENT!!! Highly recommend!!!!we LOVE IT !!!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Amazing! Great service great food they did not disappoint

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Everything was Excellent

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Excellent service and reliable cuisine.   Always tasty!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Our waiter Victor was awesomeness. Very attentive

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: I’d eat at BR Ruth’s Chris everyday if my wife would let me, lol.  The food is always fabulous, the staff always courteous and the atmosphere is always inviting.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Best steak in town! Bone in filet is amazing!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Chris’s never disappoints.   Best steak house in Baton Rouge.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Ruth's Chris Steak House in BR never disappoints us.  Consistent quality and excellent steaks. Service is excellent and not too disturbing.  Enjoyed the evening.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Best Restaurant in Louisiana.  Everyting from service, to atomsphere, to food is the best you can experience.  This is the best Ruths in this state and all the states we have visited.  Thank you Chris for being the most awesome owner and manager ever..  We love you guys!!!!!

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: Best restaurant in Baton Rouge!  Pricy but worth it for special occasion. Service is outstanding. Noise level on Valentines night a little loud in a small side room with a group that was having a good time and a few too many spirits for a valentines night, but they were having fun and that’s what is all about.

Name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Baton Rouge
Comment: It’s Ruth’s Chris. ‘Nuf said. Always great food and service. Alan, Jessie and Stephanie are always excellent in their service, even when Alan mixes up our scotch and bourbon orders- LOL!  (That’s a running inside joke)

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Such a wonderful meal. Love this restaurant

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: We had gone to the Saddle River Inn a few times back during the reign of owner and master chef Hans Egg. Therefore, we were somewhat sceptical of what new owners Jamie Knott and Peter Lioia would do in order to sustain the immense tradition of this fine establishment.Well, skeptics no more. The new owners have masterfully sustained legacy dishes (read: Maribar) and interlaced new and creative dinners and appetizers alike.This is to say nothing of their par excellence dining room staff. The wait staff, host, support, and coat check are all extremely professional, lively, and not the least bit pretentious or robotic.Lastly, we always end our visit with a walk around the wonderful grounds and adjacent areas. The pictures additionally prove the resounding point that this legendary spot remains strong.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: This was our second visit under the new ownership.  First class all around from the service, food and surroundings.  Menu prices are reasonable given the food quality.  However, the specials were priced high.  A Dover Sole was $68.  Seems a little steep.  Our main courses ranged from lamb and pork to halibut and shrimp risotto.  All were excellent.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: My husband and I had a lovey dinner.   The food and the staff were superb.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Fantastic ambient, romantic setting. We love how cozy and rustic the place. We are 100% coming back

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Excellent food and service

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Always a wonderful meal and experience. Cannot say enough. Wish I could get reservations more often

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: We were celebrating my husband’s birthday.  He enjoyed it immensely

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Always an outstanding dinner. Only problem is getting a reservation at the Saddle River Inn. We like to have dinner there about every 2 months, but availability is limited.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Saddle river inn never disappoints. Food was outstanding. Cheese plate finish. Amazing. Great place for special moments

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: It was good to return for our anniversary. It had been many years. Nice “elegantly rustic” setting. My veal chop special and my wife’s fish were excellently prepared. Service was efficient and attentive. Kale Caesar was different and tasty. Nice citrusy merengue dessert. Pricey, but very good food and a nice special occasion place.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: This was our 2nd dinner at the Saddle River Inn; we like to go for a special occasion and it is definitely worth it.  The food, service and ambiance are outstanding

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Always the best.Two terrific sirloin steaks with all the trimmings. The ladies both had fish dishes. Great service and ambiance.Nice relaxing non rushed dining experience.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: This place is amazing. Great service. Great food. Very nice setting. Can’t wait to go back again!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Best place anywhere, we go as often as possible and would choose to go here more than any other restaurant. Reservations are challenging at times but what great restaurants aren’t.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Anniversary

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: This could be the best restaurant I have ever been to service and food was outstanding. The only thing missing is a liquor license

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: This restaurant never disappoints. Nick was our server. He was friendly, knowledgeable and attentive. It was a great meal.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Hands down the best place in NJ for any occasion!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: All around lovely and delicious. A bit of a wait in the small waiting area was awkward, but besides that it was fantastic.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: I’m not one to have a broad pallet for food. I mostly stick to the things I know.  I figured since this was a special occasion I’d try the 5 course tasting menu.  What set me even further out of my comfort zone, considering it’s a blind tasting.  Well , I couldn’t have been more pleased with my choice. Since we both got the tasting we each got a different plate at each course. We decided to split each course and the food was absolutely amazing. I got to eat many foods I’ve never tried before and i can’t speak more highly of the chef’s talents. Crab, Scallops, lobster, lamb, carpaccio, halibut, BLT, duck, everything was amazing. I will definitely be returning and highly recommend. All the research my girlfriend did to assure this was the place to eat, did not disappoint.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: best NJ restaurant I've been to, romantic ambience, excellent service,  top notch ingredients and food preparation,  super professional staff, yet friendly

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Excellent food. Tye is great server.  Only wish we could get in on a Saturday

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Excellent service. Food is consistently well prepared and inventive. I appreciate that we are always promptly seated.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: A superb meal in every way. The best duck breast I’ve ever had.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: The Saddle River Inn is still one of the top restaurants in Northern New Jersey. The food is incredible. I had the duck breast and it was perhaps the best duck I ever had. My wife had the Salmon special and it was just as good. The service is impeccable. Although the prices are higher than most restaurants it is BYOB so the value is still very good.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Delicious! We had the special of the night, bone-in ribeye steak for two, and it was better than any steakhouse I have been to.  For appetizer, I had the squash capriccio and it was delicious and gourmet.  My wife had the Sichuan noodles  and loved it.  This is a special place perfect for romantic dinner!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Always flawless in food and service. I think they can do a little more with upstairs decor.  The mirror looks dirty & dingy. Love the downstairs more. Our favorite restaurant. Anthony is very welcoming!!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Great service and excellent food! Very accommodating to my gluten allergy!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: We had a truly perfect dinner here on Valentine's Day. Very comfortable seating tables not too close together. Service was very good and food was delicious. We shared the octopus starter and both had steak, the Kansas City special and the filet. Very nice ambiance, got dressed for the occasion and we weren't the only ones. Nice to see people making dinner a special night out again. Would highly recommend.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Excellent as always.  Never disappoints!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Place is the best everything always amazing

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: The best restaurant in New Jersey and possibly the tri-state area. The food is superb and the service attentive and professional.  Worth the cost and wait for a reservation!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: I love going to this restaurant. This was our 4 year in a row that my husband has taken me to The Saddle River Inn for my birthday. He know it is my favorite. Just by my ratings, you know how I feel about this restaurant.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: We love the Saddle River Inn.  Came here for an early  Valentines Day celebration. Ty was our server.  Service was professional and attentive but not pushy. Our meals were excellent. Atmosphere perfect. We will be back.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Always the best.  We’ve been going for many years!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: This place never disappoints.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Saddle River Inn never misses. Absolutely my favorite place for a special occassion.

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: Great place, service, food ! We will come over and over again! Haven!

Name: The Saddle River Inn
Comment: The food lives up to the hype. Such a great place for a special occasion.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Wonderful food. Staff did a great job, even with the mask requirement. Tables well-spaced. Great place for a quiet birthday celebration. One of our favorite restaurants. So glad they are open for business!!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Authentic French cuisine done well.  Look forward to our next dinner.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Food was awesome, staff all wore masks and gloves.  Love this place.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Dining at St. Jacques is always an exceptional culinary experience!  The amazing flavors, excellent service, and lovely atmosphere come together to create a memorable evening every time!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Great restaurant for sure. The prices unfortunately make it a little less of a regular venue, but you definitely get everything you would want and then some. Currently I rate it the best restaurant in the area, and if not certainly top 5.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: It is a great restaurant. The food was great and the service very attentive. We really enjoyed it

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Our waiter mispronounced French food on the menu, was inattentive and showed poor manners. For example, both my husband and I ordered aperitifs. Our waiter asked my husband if he wanted a refill, but failed to ask me, when my glass was also empty. He presented the desert menu to my husband rather than me, cleared my husband’s plate before mine, apparently not aware of proper protocol to attend to the lady first. To summarize, our waiter acted as if I did not exist. Disappointed in the service.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: As always, everything was perfect. The food, the service, the atmosphere

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Just excellent.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Amazing food!!! Best restaurant in Raleigh. This is a hidden gem

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Pretend to be FrenchShould be closed completely Folks should be doing something else

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Very disappointing evening. The food was still good, but not worth the money. Service was noticeably poor, while outstanding service has long been a hallmark of St. Jacques '.We had ordered a special dessert, as has been our habit. Clearly the new chef had no idea what he was supposed to do, yet the order was taken and I was not called about it ahead of time. We will most likely not return.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Lovely!Server was perfectly attentive & professional. Food was divine!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: French food is not my usual go to but Saint Jacques is definitely the place to go for a special evening, whatever it may be.  The french wine and seafood dishes we ordered were excellent.  My friend ordered the pitterfoiles which she said were devine.  Our server was fabulously informative, friendly, and attentive.  A perfect evening!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Late lunch with my niece. The great food added wonderfully to the flow and spontaneity of our conversation. Thanks. Katharine

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Dessert was awful. Server was going to take it off of the price but I said no. Should've reconsidered.Dan

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: It was a wonderful experience.  Service, food and presentation was superb

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Service at Saint Jacques is excellent.  Food is delicious.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Excellent service, almost all the food was excellent except for the beer tenderloin.  My husband asked for it medium rare and it definitely came out well done.  We opted to not send it back as to not ruin the evening plus the overall taste was excellent.  Just expected better for a steak that costs that much.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: I’ve eaten here before..... best French Restaraunt in area ..... was here for Valentines Day.... prefixed menu.... I knew it wasn’t going to be the quality of the normal menu, but did expect it to still exceed other restaurants.   I was very disappointed.  Clearly focused on profiting on a special occasions by sacrificing the quality of their product.  I’m sure the chef knows since they taste what goes out of their kitchen.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: We've dined here for over 10 years and have never been disappointed.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Sweetbreads were overcooked. Potato au gratin with lamb was watery and had to be sent back.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Cocktails, appetizers, desserts & presentation were outstanding. Entree which was a puff pastry with seafood tasted like the chef made a mistake with the black pepper. I questioned the taste but the server did not offer to check on the sauce. Of course, this was the priciest portion of the meal. Expect to pay about $100 + each for the meal.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Celebrated my daughter’s birthday there and we had a wonderful time. We lived in France for many years and my daughter was born in Paris so a French themed birthday felt appropriate. The atmosphere was comfortable, noise level was good so we could hear ourselves talk. Not a big place but the tables were spaced well so we didn’t feel like we were on top of anyone.Food was delicious, service was friendly and attentive. We all agreed that it was an enjoyable experience

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: We celebrated my husbands birthday here and it was fantastic. Service was prompt and everything was delicious. We will definitely be back and will be recommending to friends.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: We have LOVED Saint Jacques in the past, but I had a bad dining experience over lunch last week. What I was hoping for as an indulgent treat turned into a virtual nightmare. Ambiance: There were three VERY chatty and loud women in the restaurant, to the point where I could hardly hear myself think. I discreetly asked about their meal status (wrapping up, etc.), and the lovely waitress shared that they had finished - not so. I had to endure their political and gossipy conversation for an hour - could not wait to leave. Food: Again, we typically love this restaurant, but my seafood soup was gritty and the entree very rich. My posting is not so much as a warning about their food, but a heads-up to check out how loud the restaurant might be during your dining experience.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Lovely lunch and Birthday celebration!  Quiet restaurant with delicious array of baked bread, nice wine choices, delicious mussels and on the Birthday girl’s dessert plate- chef had written joyeaux Anniversaire in chocolate- a nice touch!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: My husband and I celebrated his birthday there and very much enjoyed every aspect of the experience. Highly recommend the lamb and scallops.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: We enjoyed our dinner very much.  We read about the restaurant in Walter magazine.  It was refreshing to find an authentic French restaurant in a strip mall.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Decided to try this place based on other reviews. We were not disappointed.  It is quaint, although located in a strip mall, they have done  good job of making the inside feel warm and inviting.  The attention to detail was nice.  Things like seating us apart from other diners when the restaurant was not yet full (we were there at 5:30) and offering dark linen because we were wearing black were appreciated. Aso,asking about allergies before beginning service, and waiting for our complete order so that the plating of all courses could be expertly timed.   Our favorite was the coquilles st jacques appetizer.  The beef bourguignon was hearty and delicious and my filet was actually medium rare which almost never happens. ( I do wish i had felt more adventurous and ordered maybe the fish special, because I decided I do prefer a good amount of char on a grilled steak, but that is personal preference. ) The butter cookies to take home were a lovely touch.  Overall a wonderful experience and we really appreciated a quiet spot for  conversation at the end of a busy week.  Perfect for a date night.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: As always, food and atmosphere were fabulous!  This is  our restaurant of choice for special occasions!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: It had been 20+ years since we had been to Saint Jacques. Obviously new owners, chef, etc. Still the best French food in Raleigh. Delicious!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: I was very surprised to find such a lovely French restaurant in a strip mall! Service was excellent, food was beautifully presented and tasted great.  All around a great execution!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: First time visit for my wife and I recently.  Delightful first experience.  Delicious food and outstanding service.  It's definitely not just another restaurant.  I'd highly recommend it!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Salmon was exquisiteBeef bourguignon excellentEscargot top shelfService great

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Amazing food and great drinks! It was our first time and it will definitely not be our last!

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Excellent food and service.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Had dinner on Saturday night, service was slow.  Only two beers for selection. Out of menu items and restaurant was only half full. To top it off after two hours our lamb was served ice cold! Extremely disappointing.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Amazing service, the food was spectacular, not a huge beer menu but I didn’t really expect one. Everything was great otherwise can’t even take a star off because it was so unimportant when we got everything else.

Name: Saint Jacques French Cuisine
Comment: Excellent food and service, with a friendly atmosphere.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Amazing food, solid service, but a dark and loud ambience!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: We took our niece and her mom (my sister in law) to celebrate her graduation. We had a great table upstairs that was nicely spaced from other groups and not very loud up there. Everything we ordered came out quickly and beautifully and was delicious- truly we ate every bite. Our server was perfect.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Service and food were both great.  The table we had for 4 was large and we felt socially distant enough from the other two tables in the room.  Hand sanitizer on the table was a nice touch.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Always delicious and such a fun environment! Don't skip the oysters!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: My absolute favorite sushi restaurant in Dallas -- well above all the others if you love lots of flavors, menu variety, and fresh fish.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Outstanding food and atmosphere. Exactly what we were expecting based on their website. Will repeatedly go back as well as recommend.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Absolutely the best sushi in Dallas, incredible service, and great ambience. Also, the way they have taken steps to keep the patrons safe is noticeable ... and certainly appreciated.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: My friend had never been to Shin Sei. When I used to live in the area I would go 2-3 times a week.  First time I sat in the lounge/waiting area by the front door and had dinner. Everything was great!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Always one of my favorite restaurants in Dallas.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Our Saturday evening dinner experience was great. From the convenience of valet parking, to the cozy atmosphere, to the friendly and  efficient wait staff and finally to a deliciously prepared meal, all our expectations were met or exceeded. We will be back soon.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Food was great and I enjoyed the ambiance and decor, wish the portions were larger but you can certainly taste the quality

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Great time

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Don’t sit couples in the bar

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Favorite spot. Think food wAs not as great as usually is. But I’ll be back again for sure

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: We took our family for my daughter’s 12th birthday. GreAt to get out again and Shinsei was lovely!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: The food was outstanding, but the service was slow. The ambiance - horrible. Too loud and seems cheap. For the same money you can get equally good sushi (or better) at several other shushing places nearby with much better ambiance and service.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: The restaurant was spotless and we were greeted by all of the friendly staff.Tammy guided us through the changes  in menu.Mike enjoyed the swordfish.   I had (seriously) the freshest best tasting soft shell crab. That was a delightful surprise.We enjoyed our evening.Jan

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Excellent food and service!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Always a favorite. This place is doing everything right with extra precautions to keep you safe and comfortable.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Awsome foodThursday Duck Night is our favorite Very safe and clean everyone wears masks and glovesWe really appreciate their service

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: This was our first visit to Shinsei and our first post pandemic foray to a dine in restaurant.  We were celebrating our 30th anniversary and I didn’t want to cook. The food was delicious!  We tried several different things and shared everything.  Of what we tried, our favorites were the pork buns, miso black cod, and Alfred roll but everything was wonderful.  The challenge will be deciding what to order and what to reorder on our next visit.  The staff was very conscientious about wearing masks and gloves and cleaning between customers.  We felt totally safe.  I highly recommend Shinsei!  Please support them during this weird time!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: It was great! In a time of necessary social distancing and extra measures to make people feel safe/comfortable, they did a good job. The food was delicious!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Great food and great service! I really love sitting at the bar! The bar tenders are fun and friendly.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: As usual the quality of food was stellar and the staff was extremely friendly and knowledgeable.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Great food and wonderful service.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Celebrating getting out of quarantine

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: First time out since Covid began, and we stayed for close to 3 hours! Food was fabulous (our two favorites are the fried rice and dragon lady pressed sushi) and service was great.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Everything was amazing.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Food was amazing and the service was great!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Excellent experience. They did a wonderful job keeping everyone  at least 6 ft apart (social distancing), most employees had their masks on properly (not all, some had their noses uncovered and delivered food or water). The shishito peppers were disappointing, we ordered blistered but they were only cooked until soft, there was no blistering. Everything else was delicious. Love the presses sushi!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Great stuff for first day open again

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Great place in the neighborhood to eat early in a time of anxiety.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Always amazing.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Our server was wonderful! We had a large party with a few small children and he could not have been nicer to them. The food was delicious!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: My husband and I always love this place! Because their food is always consistently delicious, I took a leap of faith and tried sashimi here for the first time. I loved it. We love to order a bunch of little plates and share to get a variety of flavors and plates.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Brought my fiancé’s vendor from Arizona here. He is a world traveler and foodie. Shinsei is always one of my go-to’s. I love sharing it with friends. Always spot on!

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: I needed quality time w friends after my Dad passed away, so our dinner turned into a few hours of me crying and being indecisive. Our server was so patient and kind. Food was amazing as always. Loved seeing Casey back and visiting w Elvis. Shinsei will always be one of my top three go-to places.

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: This place is awesome - the food is amazing... the atmosphere is great... we stuffed ourselves on dumplings, brussel sprouts, and steamed buns- be sure to order the Thai fried rice... just go easy on the Vespers-

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Amazing food with an amazing atmosphere. You can’t go wrong with the Shinsei Sashimi, Crispy Rock Shrimp, or the Short Rib Potstickers. For dessert, we wanted a taste of everything so we had the cotton candy, pumpkin bread pudding, and the chocolate cake spring rolls (must try!)

Name: Shinsei Restaurant
Comment: Fresh, delicious food, impeccable service, and a fun atmosphere. We’ll be back.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Very good sushi

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: This is neighborhood gem.    Quality is always super high.  Staff is extremely friendly and helpful.    Ask them for help. Daily specials menu is critical.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Shu never disappoints!  The food is fresh and delicious and the staff is really friendly.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Delicious as always!! My favorite sushi restaurant!!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Great food, great service! Very cute location, highly recommend Shu

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Love Shu - the staff, sushi chefs, everyone is so chill & nice for a busy, really great/ solid sushi house. Love all the options and every dish is so yummy - love their dressings on the fish, so complimentary, fresh & flavorful

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: The best sushi in LA! Everyone we came across were hospitable, respectful and kind. We will definitely return in the near future!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Always good black cod. Small portions and need to order side soup and rice for the price it is pricey.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Great location!  Good quality of the fish.  Just the tables are too close to each other.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Better than serviceable. I'd give it 3-1/2 stars. The tempura appetizer was first rate, the spicy tuna was fine, the soft shell crabs were below par (fishy and not delicate).Beware of Saturday parking. There is a free valet but the parking can be a mess. Part of a decent set of restaurants halfway between west side and the valley.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Very small, tables are uncomfortably crammed next to each other. Sushi however is the best.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Consistently great fish and always wonderful, warm service. A classic spot.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: We dined this past NYE 2019.Sushi omakase-style was spot on!Server was excellent!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Best Shusi in. LA AT ANY PRICE

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Overall, foods were overpriced Very noisy and crowded.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: The fish is excellent. Items other than sushi are best saved for another spot. You will certainly pay for what you get but you're getting some of the best sushi around.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Service was exceptionalSushi fresh and great

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Best sushi! Fresh and great quality. All the dishes are unique and delicious. The service is amazing and the staff is so nice. We dine here once a week!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Always wonderful sushi. Fresh and delicious. Solid service. Fun place.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Iâ€™ve had this waiter before and he is just horrible. Itâ€™s a young Asian man, and he always forgets everything! Forgets to let us know they are out of certain dishes, forgets to put in to go orders, forgets what we ordered.  The food in general is great and I always leave a good review for this restaurant, but this waiter is just terrible!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Quality, neighborhood, and service outstanding

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Birthday dinner for boyfriend. The brought us a alive, yes I mean alive lobster on a plate that almost landed on my boyfriends lap. A little too much! But we appreciate the innovation

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Best experience!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Chidori is the best!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: We love coming to Shu sushi! Best time

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Great food, lots of choices, wonderful neighborhood gem. Never disappoints. ðŸ˜Š

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Excellent service and the food is fresh and prepared to perfection!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Terrific, as always!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Iâ€™ve never had a bad experience at Shu. The food and service are consistently good.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Love this sushi restaurant!High quality fish. Unique dishes. Amazing and attentive staff.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Noisy and expensive but delicious and fun.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: We have been coming Shu for years, ever since the Drago Group took over.I can honestly say it has to be among the 4 or 5 best in all of LA.Reservations are a must!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Wonderful sushi.  The salmon was incredible.  Very fresh.  The server was attentive and helpful.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Always the ABSOLUTE best and gold standard of sushi and setting in LA!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Love this place.  The food is excellent, the service is first rate and personal.  The ambiance is relaxed and friendly.  Always an enjoyable experience.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Amazing sushi. My new favorite sushi bar.

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Always a great experience

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Excellent food and service

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Great service and amazing food!!!

Name: SHU - Sushi House Unico - Bel Air
Comment: Great food!!!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Exceptional as always, Hillary may be the best server I have ever had anywhere! Food execution is always perfect and everything we ate was delicious. Hillary’s knowledge of the menu and ab Uluru to pair your likes perfectly with the menu is amazing. Thanks for going above and beyond with the crostatas, be back soon!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Excellent experience as always. Social distancing and very well trained staff made the difference. We love Sotto, but miss a few items from the old menu. A menu refresh would be welcomed.

Name: Sotto
Comment: We celebrated our engagement at Sotto and it was nothing short of absolutely wonderful! We had a great dinner with excellent service and knowledgeable employees who elevated our experience as they explained more about the reasoning behind wine and menu items. Didn't disappoint, as usual!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Sotto is a Cincinnati treasure. This is our most favorite place, we come here to celebrate the things that matter in our life.We have also come “just because”, and we have never been let down. Everything about the place is first class - food, wine and staff.We had been waiting anxiously to get back, and plan to return again soon(before anything else happens)!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Amazing food & service every single time!!!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Justin is a great waiter! Took really good care of us! Had a super Tuscan bottle of wine. Yummy! The branzino delish & the cappellacci excellent! Have never had a bad meal. I drive in from Detroit every 3 months and make it point to eat there every time. ❤️

Name: Sotto
Comment: We'd heard great things about this place so, when we came into town (from Chicago), we got a chance to try it ourselves and found it excellent. Great food, beautiful ambiance and top rate service. The prices were very reasonable as well. We had appetizers, entrees and desserts with drinks for a family of three for under a hundred bucks. And for this level of restaurant it's hard to find that. We'll definitely be back whenever we're in town.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Outstanding service and food was excellent!

Name: Sotto
Comment: 3 words - order the octopus.  If you've never had it, or just thought "eww", then you are missing out.  Have a couple drinks (a new favorite of mine is the "murder hornet"), get past the "eww" and try it.  It isn't what you think, and it is absolutely delicious and tender.   If you've had it, then you know what I'm talking about.  As far as the rest of the food goes, I've never had anything there I didn't like.  A recent stand-out was the spring pea tortellini.  I think I could just sit and eat several bowls of that, and nothing else, it was so good.  The quail is delicious, as is the branzino, and the short rib.  In fact it's all good, and the pastas are outstanding.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Excellent. Great service and amazing food!

Name: Sotto
Comment: This is our anniversary dinner every year. In my opinion, Sotto’s always has been and continues to be the most knowledgeable staff of any restaurant that I have ever been. Even in the current environment (COVID), the staff remained warm and welcoming, and multiple team members stopped and wished us a happy anniversary. I write a glowing review every year, and each year it is well deserved.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Great COVID dining experience! Super friendly staff, all wearing masks, mindful of health restrictions while delivering the Sotto quality service and delicious dining experience. Our lovely server brought out a chocolate dessert with a candle at the end of our meal. The music was a bit loud but there were fewer people in the restaurant to absorb the sound. I would highly recommend SOTTO! Go eat there.  Let's keep them in business.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Everything about our dinner was wonderful our server Robert was outstanding.

Name: Sotto
Comment: One of the best restaurants in the city top to bottom.

Name: Sotto
Comment: My wife and I chose Sotto to celebrate our 4th wedding anniversary.  Our experience from start to finish was top notch.  We started with the goat cheese and hazelnut honey bread, which was outstanding.  We then had the asparagus pasta and black kale salad as an appetizer, both were equally delicious.  Our entrees consisted of the breaded pork loin and short rib ravioli.  The breaded pork loin was the best pork I’ve ever had, the crisp was absolutely perfect, and the lemon butter sauce mouth-watering.  The short rib ravioli was soft and decadent.  We then finished off with the ricotta doughnuts, which were a great ending to the night. Our server, Mark,  was very knowledgeable and passionate about the food and explaining the menu.  He took great care of us the entire night, as well as the supporting staff.  We will certainly be back!

Name: Sotto
Comment: The service here was amazing. Our first time here, Robert went through the whole menu and gave us recommendations on food and wine. The food was phenomenal. Want to go back tonight. Short rib pasta was out of this world, as were the ricotta doughnuts.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Perfect on all account as expected. We will be back.

Name: Sotto
Comment: The food portions are small, the menu options were limited and the quality of the food doesn't reflect the high price tag.  I don't see a reason to come back here ever again

Name: Sotto
Comment: It’s was amazing

Name: Sotto
Comment: Brian did a fantastic job taking care of us. He was knowledgeable and attentive to our needs. The staff that assisted in bringing out the various courses did well.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Service was great as always!  Read the table well, we enjoyed the personality.  Brazino was amazing!  As was the Tortolini

Name: Sotto
Comment: It was absolutely incredible as always!!! We love everything about Sotto!!!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Definitely made our anniversary memorable with their amazing food and top notch service. You can tell that the service is not because they want bigger tip but because they enjoy what they do and they help each other out. Did I say the food taste so good? Yes, it is that good.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Always 5 stars. Social distancing and thoughtful precautions. Sotto always does it right.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Gorgeous meal at Sotto, our first since Covid. Fantastic service and didn't mind that it wasn't as noisy as usual with reduced seating. Food was excellent, could tell the chefs were excited to be cooking again!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Phenomenal service and quality—live the local produce!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Nicole was wonderful—offered suggestions which were delicious!!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Amazing as always! Sotto is consistently delicious and my go to spot for a date night!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Rachel was wonderful!  We went for Father’s Day/my husband’s birthday and she made it very special.  She was also very knowledgeable about the bourbon selection.

Name: Sotto
Comment: We went for our monthly date night (new parents) and it was perfect. Highly recommended!

Name: Sotto
Comment: A great gem! Best food and best atmosphere in cincy. Highly recommend!!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Food was amazing, and our waiter was great also! A must to eat.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Sotto is my favorite restaurant in Cincinnati. The food is so fresh and favorable, my taste buds awake from slumber at Sotto!

Name: Sotto
Comment: Truly one of the absolute best restaurants in Cincinnati. Sotto delivers a sensational experience every single time. I really can't speak highly enough of this restaurant.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Nichole was made our experience excellent

Name: Sotto
Comment: The music was extremely loud.  I was there with a party of 7 people and could not hear 80% of the conversation due to the music.  Other than that, everything else was absolutely perfect, good food, good service and beautiful setting.

Name: Sotto
Comment: They are really doing well. Felt spaced and spread out but still with the same ambiance.  The food was as good as ever.

Name: Sotto
Comment: Glad you all are back open. Great food and service

Name: Sotto
Comment: Hands-down some of the best food in Cincinnati. No joke. Get the donuts… Even if you’re stuffed, it’ll be totally worth it.

Name: Sotto
Comment: We celebrated my husband‘s birthday dinner here and the food and service were amazing.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Charming restaurant with Piedmontese wines, condensed menu with well-executed and delicious food, as well as warm friendly and sincere service.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: The family style meal was a fantastic way to spend an evening with friends. The staff was also attentive and friendly. Will definitely do  again... and again.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: It was for my bf’s birthday. The food was so amazing that we were both blown away. Def a good choice for any type of celebration.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: excellent, as always!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Absolutely exceptional! We did the tasting menu with the wine pairing and were in heaven. It was more food than we could finish but we took everything extra to go so we could enjoy the amazing leftovers the next day. Ambiance was cozy, service was superb and the wine paired perfectly with the food. Highly recommend!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Amazing! Some of the best service I've had, ever! Beautiful romantic ambience, amazing food, great wine selection. Highly recommend this spot :)

Name: Spinasse
Comment: The tasting menu was an outstanding choice for our table of four.  We got to indulge in all of the offerings family style and were not disappointed by the variety and flavors.  The amber negroni cocktail and barolo red wine were memorable as well!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: This was our second time dining at Spinasse and it did not disappoint. The pastas were as delicate and delicious as we remember. The service is always top notch and they really went above and beyond this time. The first time we dined, there was a bit of a mix-up with our credit card but it really was no big deal to us. Spinasse provided us with a free appetizer during our dining experience this time which really showed their genuine care for their customers and patrons. By the way, the complimentary poached egg appetizer was AMAZING.All in all, a delicious meal and definitely reinforced our decision to keep coming back!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Thank you for the best meal yet - complete with wonderfully kind service. Always feels like home.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Great ambience, food, and service. The pasta is amazing. Excellent wine selection but a little pricey. It can be noisy.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: We have had dinner at Spinasse 4 or 5 times now and we love it every time. Incredible food that is different from your normal/typical Italian food. They feature "Piedmont" style Italian and it is unlike any other restaurant with top quality. Simple recipes that are executed to perfection.When you go, you MUST have the butter sage pasta. It is worth the trip by itself!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Our server was attentive and courteous. Food was excellent! Will definitely come back.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Great food, great service and ambiance. Never disappoints!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Stunningly good pasta.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Great Piedmont cuisine and wine. Be treated by staff that knows the menu and cares.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: My first time here.  Very impressed.  One of the best restaurants in Seattle.  Inventive menu, great atmosphere and good value.  Definitely will be back.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Food was amazing and service perfect. A little disappointed that hot tea was not available, but hostess was happy to provide hot water to sip after a full meal. Honestly, some of the best Italian pasta on the west coast.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: There are many Italian restaurants in Seattle and I have eaten at many of them, but Spinass's agnolotti (the evening's special) were squisito...tiny, tasty and just plain perfect!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Very good place for a intimate experience, good food and ambience. I recommend their antipasti sampler and the porkchops.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: As always, an excellent meal and service.  Thank you for making our friend's birthday special.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: As good as always. Great food, service and wine. One of our go to spots in Seattle.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Lovely atmosphere and fantastic linguine. Would venture to say the best Tiramisu that I've come across. Will most definitely be back as soon as possible!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Spinasse is by far the best restaurant in Seattle. The food is phenomenal and the service is unmatched. Love coming here!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Remembered my last experience here several years ago as an excellent meal. This time, was not as impressed. Although I very much enjoyed to antipasta dishes- stuffed pearl onions and a well-plated beet salad, my partner's entree pork chop was fatty and rare. And I was hoping to a flavorful pasta that could be a vegetarian entree but it seemed to need more seasoning. Still enjoyed the ambiance and service, but hoping next time I'll enjoy the dinner options more.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Everything was exceptional. The host could have had more of a personality but that’s just a personal opinion. The server was great - very friendly, helpful, and efficient. The food was all flavorful and well presented. If you’re visiting Seattle this restaurant is a must.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Small portions of food which did not taste good.  My hubs and I each had a cocktail, and they both tasted like mouth wash.  Dessert was delicious, and the service was excellent.  It had a nice atmosphere, but we were a little too close to our fellow diners.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: It was good. One of my favorite restaurant for date night.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: We had the best experience as Spinasse, I would highly recommend to anyone in the Seattle area. We got a last minute reservation, the food was the best pasta I've ever had. Our server was also incredible, so kind and friendly. He let us test wine's and gave us a complimentary dish. Highly recommend.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Exceptional!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Absolutely delicious food! Excellent service!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: This is one of our favorite places we've been!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Went for the best pasta in town and was disappointed . Pasta was glued by excessive amount of parmesan and slightly overcooked... definitely not aldente ...

Name: Spinasse
Comment: It's is a bit expensive and if you are vegan/ non-egg vegetarian there isnt many options.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: The food was absolutely FANTASTIC!  Our server recommended a great combination of dishes which we did.  The pasta just melted in our mouth, and the pork chop was so tender!  Our server was very attentive, we so appreciated her service!  Thank you - we'll be back!!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Year after year, meal after meal, Spinasse continues to demonstrate why they are in the top Italian restaurants in Seattle.   David brings his special touch to every dish leaving the kitchen.  A way wonderful neighborhood restaurant with global reach.   Every trip to Seattle must include a stop at this gem

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Great restaurant with great food, service, and wine list.  Angela, the wine manager is exceptional, and provided a great wine recommendation.

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Always consistently good! Lots of new dishes, but a lot of the classics too. Great wine list!

Name: Spinasse
Comment: Very nice ambiance perfect for a date night. On the  overpriced side. The appetizers were much better than the actual meal (we got the sample of all 4 and it was excellent.) Both pastas we feel like we could have made at home pretty easy- they were nothing special. They were still good though

Name: Spinasse
Comment: The food is always so amazing and good, veggie and gluten free options too

Name: Spinasse
Comment: awesome,  great night for our anniversary.  will be coming back soon.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Wonderful as always. The new chef is amazing!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Outstanding wine and food pairings. A great experience.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Delicious food and wine pairing. Always a special treat and always excellent.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Had missed the food and wine pairing during Covid stay at home orders. Went yesterday with smaller well placed grouping. With a new chef the menu was outstanding-the usual 5 course offering was plentiful and beautifully prepared and the wines continue to more than satisfy.Especially loved the scallop presentation and the duck.Can’t wait to return in the fall!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: I recommend this wine and food pairing experience to everyone.  Good food, good wine, great presentation and nice staff.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Great social distancing and safety with food handling and serving.  Highly recommended !

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Both the food and the wine were OIALEs.  (once in a lifetime experiences).   Proper safety quidelines were enforced without interfering with the beauty of the experience.  We enjoyed a beautiful view of Hood Mountain while we enjoyed some of the best food and wine of our lives.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: We have been wine club members at St. Francis for many years and look forward to the annual complimentary food and wine pairing. The food is thoughtfully paired with wine ending the meal with port and a tasty dessert.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: We do this every year for our anniversary and it never disappoints. Perfect pairing of  wines to moan-worthy dishes. Made even more notable this year as we were the last seating before the Corona Virus shutdown. Thank you to all the staff that made this special. Our hearts go out to you. We'll be back as soon as you reopen!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: This wine and food pairing experience is a must if you are coming to wine country!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: If you are in Sonoma and able to get a reservation, do it! The food was incredible, the wine impeccable, the hosts were funny and knowledgeable. It was one of our favorite things we did during our visit. You won't regret it!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: One of the best lunches I have ever had. There were only 16 places at the two horseshoe tables, so intimate and participative. Wine and food pairings were spot on. We completely enjoyed it.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Best experience we had in Napa or Sonoma in combining wine and food.  Can't wait to go back again.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Even though the food was supposed to take a backseat to the wine, the food itself rivals that of many Michelin starred restaurants albeit without a lot of choices.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: The wine and food pairing was fantastic.  Don’t miss if in the area but schedule in advance as it is very popular.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Outstanding in every way. Excellent food and very knowledgable staff. Makes learning about wine fun. Gorgeous setting. Our guests were so impressed on this their first visit that they joined the WineClub.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Fantastic food, wine and staff. I would highly recommend a visit.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Celebrating our Anniversary and had to make this one of our stops. Love it here. Food  and wine pairing is just perfect. So enjoy the small venue because you really get to know the other guest for the seating. Every time we come it’s special. Great value and delicious!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: This is always a new and exciting culinary and viticultural experience.  I highly recommend this experience to everyone, the team is amazing! The food is lovely and so filling! I only wish they were closer to my home, I'd go weekly as it's such a value.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Fabulous food paired with amazing wines, beautifully presented in a most entertaining and engaging way.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Third time and never disappointed.   Food pairings were perfect.  Hosts were helpful, perhaps a little more about the wine and a little less shtick. Could have taken a little more time.  All in all still the best experience in town.  Hope you take the suggestions as opportunities, not criticisms.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: We booked the wine and food pairing and it was the highlight of our trip to the Sonoma Valley. The food was amazing, the wine was amazing, and the staff made the event educational and fun without any wine snobbery. Can’t wait to go back!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Mother-Daughter trip

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: This is what a wine and food pairing should be!  More than just a bit of meat or a bit of cheese, these were chef creations that really allowed one to appreciate the wine being tasted.  On top of that Tamara and Andrea were superb hosts that really added to the experience.  We will assuredly do this again!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: This is a great way to enjoy St Francis' wine.  The food is amazing and service always enjoyable!  This was trip number 3 and I can't wait to go back again.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: FABULOUS ❤️

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: I’ve been to alot of food and wine pairing, but by far this is the best one. Big portions with lots of flavor. Both hosts were very knowledgeable and so polite. I will be back!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Have been several times.  Never disappointed.  Jonna Schafer.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Our annual visit for delicious food and wine.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: The food and wine tasting at St. Francis Winery was amazing! I highly recommend it, everything was delicious and the service was exceptional.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: The wine and food pairings were perfect! It's a very intimate setting, with only 16 people participating at a time. The hosts are very knowledgeable, funny, and attentive. I would definitely do this again!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Wonderful wine and food pairing!  Every course was perfectly paired and quite delicious.  We highly recommend the St. Francis wine and food pairing.  They never disappoint!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Could not been nicer event to take a friend for her birthday.  Food, wine, hostesses could not have been better!  The winery is itself is intimate and inviting.  Only pleasant memories on all count!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Delicious food and wine with a fun atmosphere!

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Just fabulous!! The girls were so knowledgeable, the food was out of this world, and the wines were fantastic!! A vert enjoyable experience.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: We drove two hours to go to this pairing and it was well worth it.  The wine and food were so good and the pairings just took it to the next level.  Combined with the relaxed, friendly and informative service, plus the beautiful welcome center overlooking the vines and hills well... let’s just say we plan on coming back.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: Excellent wine and food pairing coupled with good explanation by the friendly staffs. Speaking as a one who is experiencing this for the first time, I had an enjoyable time and would definitely recommend St. Francis Winery & Vineyards. In fact, I would visit again if I am back.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: We were very pleasantly surprised by the January 31menu, which was different from that posted on line and which we had enjoyed the last time we were there in November.   Apparently, St. Francis is searching for a new chef, but we would never have known this was the case, had we not asked about the menu changes.  The sous chefs did an outstanding job.  There was no indication that the executive chef was not there.  We have enjoyed this food and wine pairing for years, take all of our out-of-town company there, and recommend it to the people we meet at various other wineries and events, both in Sonoma and Napa. In our opinion, this is the best experience for the money in either Sonoma or Napa.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: An intimate setting of about 12 guests. Excellent food, outstanding wine. The 2 presenters were both very good. Great value, 5 course lunch paired with wine.

Name: St. Francis Winery & Vineyards
Comment: The staff was very attentive, knew their wine, and kept things interesting. The food was excellent and, of course, paired perfectly! I recommend going at this time of year. It isn’t as crowded and you can actually visit with staff. Loved it!!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: This is our go to restaurant for the best food and atmosphere. Always the best!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: This was my first visit to your restaurant. I ordered the filet and added the crab imperial to my steak for the additional $14 (?) I ate less than half my Steak, 1 or 2 bites of the lump crab. Our waiter was good but busy so another server asked if he could box up my dinner. #1. The box was given to one of the other guests at my table , fortunately they came back to my home for coffee and dessert and we were able to make the switch #2 when I opened my box to put the leftovers in a plastic container my crab imperial was NOT included with my leftovers and that really angered me because I purposely saved my crab to be enjoyed Sunday! And the extra that I paid for was waisted! I immediately called your restaurant but of course got voicemail and so  I left a message about my experience. Of course I did not hear back from anyone. Honestly, I didn’t expect to hear back ! I had heard so many good things about your establishment and was happy that we were able to FINALLY GET A TABLE! But my experience left me disappointed.Sincerely , Sandra Morlino

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Why didn't I get points for this reservation?The food was great and was matched by the same great service.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Went here to try out their AC restaurant week menu. We had Joanne as a server and she was outstanding! She was super friendly & courteous. We will definitely be dining there again soon!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: No comment at this time. It was a nice time for us

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Always a great time at Steve and Cookies. From the hardworking, friendly, and knowledgeable staff to the amazing food and ambience. Had a wonderful experience.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: It was an enjoyable experience the wait staff was very informative and very very helpful.  Oscar was the best.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Very nice meal, service a little slow.  Took about 3 hours in all.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Everything was great! The pineapple martini was to die for!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: We didn’t even realize that it was Restaurant Week in AC and was pleasantly surprised with the options.  Every single thing was delicious!!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: We had dinner on during restaurant week. As always the food was delicious and the service was spectacular. This is one of our places to dine for dinner on the Jersey shore.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Stephanie, our server was excellent, very friendly and attentive.  She couldn’t have been more accommodating.  Food was also excellent. Would definitely go back.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Food and service are excellent.  Unfortunately the noise level is barely tolerable. The Restaurant Week offerings, though not inventive, were really tasty. We will return, in the off season of course.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: If you like a restaurant with great food, service, and atmosphere, this is the place for you!  If you like white tablecloths this is the place for you!  What makes it interesting is the fact that each room has its own ambiance.  I cannot say anything negative....

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: as always the experience at Steve and Cookies was excellent.  the food was excellent as usual. that is why we go there and encourage others to do so. other than Smithville Inn  too many other restaurants in Atlantic County are consistently inconsistent

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: The food was delicious and our server was excellent.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Always fantastic!  Get the pork chops!  They are the best I have ever had.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Food and service were great! best meal my friends and I have had in awhile, will definitely be back!!!!!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Everything was delicious! The drinks are pricey and the parking lot is too small but the food was perfection.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Great food and service.   Love the peanut butter pie for desert

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Fantastic, as expected. Love, love , love this restaurant. Everything was great, food and service. They have the best lobster mac and cheese ever. Would dine here on regular basis if it weren't an hour drive.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: The service was excellent as was the food.  The room was packed but the noise level was very low.   They know what they are doing here.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Food was excellent as always!  Service staff was prompt, knowledgeable, and friendly. My husband said the grilled romaine salad with fried oysters was the best salad he has ever had!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Surprising!  Much more of a dining experience than simply not wanting to cook & going out.  Piano music set the tone for an unique night out.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: The food was good, the ambiance was quiet.. but we went on a Monday. We look forward to trying it again in the summer. The restaurant itself was beautiful!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Great food, service and atmosphere. Perfect for a date night or special occasion!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: We went for Atlantic City Restaurant Week and every course was outstanding!!! Every course was the normal size and the service was also on par. We can’t wait to go back!! Our new favorite restaurant!!!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Best restaurant I the state! You can't get a bad meal here, service, food and ambiance is excellent.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: We are restaurant week groupies, Sunday is usually Steve and Cookies. It never disappoints. I am always amazed not only at the quality of the food but also the attentiveness of the wait staff, because they are BUSY.  It is a joy to dine here.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: The pork chops melted in your mouth, excellent meal with friendly good paced service throughout the meal.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Consistently great food.  Well presented.  Great service.  Warm and friendly staff and ambience.  Can’t go wrong!!!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Once again going to Steve and Cookies was a great experience, window seat for 4, nice view, quiet spot and the food as always was excellent, can't say enough about the stuffed Pork Chops! The service was right there and helpful, I will be coming back again.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: The server was great n attentive and made suggestions on the menu for restaurant week. I would definitely go back just to eat there, because the food was great n the atmosphere.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Went for restaurant week and had Lobster Mac and Cheese, the Pan-Seared Salmon, and the Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie. All delicious, and the ambience made for a perfect date with my fiancee!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: We enjoyed our delicious dinner and desserts.  We appreciated the birthday treat, too! Our service was excellent - courteous, knowledgeable, engaging, efficient, considerate!

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Food was fantastic

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: We went to our family’s favorite restaurant toCelebrate our Son and Daughter’s birthdays.  Although we try to go to Steve and Cookies as often as possible every time we go it is outstanding.  This meal was six of us, and everybody enjoyed everything.  The food and service, as always were outstanding.  The pace was relaxing and enjoyable.  The consistent excellence is the reason it has been our favorite restaurant for many years.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: Food was great but the prices are outrageous! It was $90 per person and we had middle of the road priced entrees, a glass of wine and one cocktail total and two appetizers.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: The theory of rural inflation is proven once again. This is a very good restaurant serving very good food but it can’t possibly be one of the best 100 restaurants in the United States. I have eaten in and reviewed fine restaurants around the world and there is no way that this falls into the top class. What keeps Steve and Cookies by the bay from being a five star restaurant? 1) Presentation. It is barely above the dreaded “food on a plate” category, it is far short of artful. 2) Attire of assistant waiters who all wear printed black tee shirts, fine at the shore but it is not the dress of a 5 star restaurant. 3) Blatant racism in work expectations. Waiters almost all seem to be white work at a good pace and take the time to be pleasant, assistants in black tee shirts work at a frenzied pace of a car wash as if expecting to be fired at any second. Almost all of the sub class appear to be Hispanic. This just isn’t seen anymore. Very good meals and very good service in a rather plain atmosphere, solid 4 star stuff.

Name: Steve & Cookie's By the Bay
Comment: My favorite restaurant!  Does not disappoint!  Excellent all around.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Great experience, beautiful facility, terrific food, fabulous service. Would like to see some fresher and more creative menu items but everything we got was delicious.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: My partner and I celebrated my birthday on a comfortably enclosed patio, near a heater.  Our meals were beautifully presented, delicious, and the atmosphere was magical. Standout dishes were the halibut and the duck. Frankly, everything tasted great. Dessert was a wonderfully minty chocolate chip ice cream, apparently made on site. The service was quick and amiable.  My partner and I both agree we had a memorable evening and plan to return.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Fantastic dinner!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: This was the perfect place to stay and eat for our wedding anniversary.  Not sure I’ll ever find a more beautiful place to share with my wife.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Phenomenal setting with exceptional service, and great food. Very romantic lunch for my husband’s birthday. Would recommend to anyone. Very personable waiter who stopped at nothing to make us happy and welcomed. Highly recommended

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Outstanding environment for a special dinner with family, a mate, etc.  Great food, great service.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: ONLY comment, but important!!!! We were in the inside room......SOOOO dark!!!Waiters had to shine a flashlight on EVERY food presentation, that is rather crazy!!!So as you are eating, you are literally guessing what you are picking up on your fork.This is NOT romantic........candlelight of soft lighting would be preferable.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: nice lil place in the hood, cozy and off the beaten path

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: $50 for corkage for a bootle of wine, we think it’s a little bit too high, I think. And the fact that they put us in the cellar instead of the main restaurant when we made a reservation almost 3 weeks before was t what we expected. Maybe because we were just a 2 people party. All the rest  was great

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Beautiful place with very friendly staff! Food is great but need to pay attention to different menu’s if you choose to sit indoors or outdoors.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Service, as always, was top notch. Our party was very pleased with the food but I wasn't thrilled with the halibut.  I found it overcooked and the asparagus cold. The chicken, the chestnut soup, the drinks and the desserts were fantastic. I asked at the time of my online reservation to be seated in the courtyard (we are frequent guests) and a little disappointed that it seemed to be ignored as it looked like there would have been seating available. Nonetheless, the ambience of the terrace was wonderful.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Outstanding service, food and atmosphere!Wait staff was awesome and attentive.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Fantastic food and staff.  Service was very nice.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: A magical place to celebrate my birthday. Staff, ambience and food were wonderful.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
