Comment: Breathtakingly beautiful buildings, grounds and views. Food was mediocre, service a bit slow considering there were very few patrons at that hour. Unfortunately, we were seated next to a very boisterous couple that spoiled some of the ambience.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Anniversary dinner!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Mike provided extraordinary service and made our special dinner very special. His assistant, Al was also wonderful!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Everything, from the greeting at the entrance, to the table itself, to the level of service, to the absolute perfection of the meal...I will be thinking of this for a long time to come.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: My fiancé and I decided to join San Ysidro Ranch’s Stonehouse for an early Valentine’s Day celebration. We had an absolutely spectacular evening. The dinner, the service and the ambience was truly stunning. Many of our dishes were prepared right in front of us. The entire dinner was a culinary masterpiece. Afterwards we walked the beautiful gardens and we’re memorized by the truly magnificent property. We will certainly be back as soon as possible to enjoy the rest of the menu.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: We went here for the night after our wedding. It was extremely good food and very romantic. 5 stars!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Great meal and service as usual. Busy Saturday evening with well dressed diners enjoying a beautiful night under the stars of Montecito. The scallops and halibut were delicious paired with the Brussels sprouts and the squash. Goats milk cheesecake for dessert with coffee. Wonderful time.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Fine dining at its best. Very attentive staff. Great ambience. A very enjoyable experience.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Amazing location, food, service, atmosphere. Great experience and a magical setting.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Wanted to order caviar, out of caviar.  Please put one steak on the menu.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: This is best restaurant ever  great service

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: We had a beautiful night with impeccable service and delicious food.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Marvelous!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: The atmosphere is outstanding, but we go down from there.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Excellent, attentive service in a beautiful outdoor setting.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: We went for our anniversary and had a magical experience. We arrived early, ordered some wine and then walked around the grounds, climbing the hill to watch the fiery sunset. The grounds were covered with beautiful flowers and emitted intoxicating smells. There were lights in the trees and people strolling causally and enjoying the sights. From there we went to dinner where we were escorted onto an enchanting patio with a view of the ocean. The service was amazing and our food was some of the best we have ever tasted. We had Brussel sprouts, a nice salad, halibut and filet mignon. We ended up with chocolate soufflé and the homemade mint ice cream. Both were so yummy. We both agreed that the entire experience was one we will always remember.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: We celebrated an anniversary...the staff were wonderful!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: This is our second time to this restaurant, and both times have been fabulous!  We would come back to Santa Barbara just for this experience :-)

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Beautiful, location, romantic, with incredible food and great service. Recommend getting the classic steak Diane, which is flambeed tableside. Exquisite!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: We love this restaurant, but thought the brunch offerings were just okay for the prix fixe.   Lobster Cobb was good, not great.  Chicken and waffles looked really good, but couldn’t fathom paying $75 (includes, champagne, appetizer and dessert).  Will definitely be back when it’s a la carte!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Oh my!  What a beautiful night at Stonehouse. The service and the food was outstanding!

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: I proposed to my girlfriend earlier in the day, and we came here to celebrate our first dinner as fiances. It is an incredible restaurant for a variety of reasons: the food is incredibly supple and delightful, the service is European and professional, and the location is unbeatable. To any considering a post-engagement dinner, this is the spot.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: Perhaps most unusual, our guests arrived early and went downstairs to the bar area (Plow & ??). They asked if we had arrived yet and were told no. In fact, we had arrived early and checked in upstairs. As a result, we didn't connect with each other until almost 30 minutes past our reservation. They said they asked at least once and were told we hadn't arrived. Other than that, everything was wonderful.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: It's amazing how what started out as an excellent evening with great service by the waiter Michael and the lobster bisque being delicious, could turn so quickly into a completely negative evening with poorly cooked main course and an argumentative situation with the manager.  Of course he and the chef were right and I as the customer was wrong.

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: We came up for a weekend at the Rosewood Miramar and always enjoy dining at the SYR

Name: Stonehouse at San Ysidro Ranch
Comment: On a clear, warm day eating at Stonehouse is tremendous.  The view of the valley and ocean, the food and service, along with an excellent wine list, one could not find a better place for lunch.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Great service, even better food. The best sushi in New York easily, if not America. Try it at least once and it will change your perspective on food entirely.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: After watching Jiro dreams of sushi and the fact that Nakazawa now has a star, my expectations going into this meal we’re very high. While many pieces were tasty, for the price there are better omakase experiences in the city. Exceptional attention to detail is lacking. Moths flying around the bar and Ikea cabinetry take away from what should be a refined experience. The publicly in the press seems to draw tourists rather than local regulars.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Best sushi of my life. Cried when it was over

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Took my girlfriend here for her birthday and it was fantastic.  Everything from the food to the ambiance was fantastic.  Can’t recommend Sushi Nakazawa enough.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Great food and great experience

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Such a great experience. Service was friendly, attentive, and thorough. The sushi was some of the best I've had. Will definitely come back again.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Melt in your mouth sushi! First class service. Bar seating is a must for full details of all you are eating. Awesome experience. Perfect sushi lover birthday dinner.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Extraordinary

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Lasciate da parte tutto per un paio di ore e concedetevi questa straordinaria esperienza. Il conto è alto ma laQualità non è da meno. Se volete un vero ristorante happiness andateci

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Fabulous in every way. You must love sushi and respect the artist at work.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: it doesn’t worth for the price paid, the omakase had no surprise , just ordinary sushi to me & too rush the time！

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Our 50th bdays celebration was well noted. We got some extra uní and bday candles in our lychee sorbet! Missed Nakazawa San, but didn’t expect to see him on a Monday. A great special occasion place that spoils sushi eating anywhere else.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Lugar excepcional . uno de los mejores Susi que he comido

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Food itself is high quality and sake also very tasty. Delicious. But somehow doesn’t match my expectation. Chef seems not pay attention enough.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Another super high end experience

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: La miglior cena a base di sushi della mia vita, una delle migliori cene in assoluto.Dimenticate i pur buoni uramaki fusion e colorati di alcune rinomate catene milanesi.Qui c'è la più pura tradizione del sushi in forma di nighiri. Non dovete scegliere nulla, solo sedervi al bancone (possibilmente, perché è certamente più interessante di una cena al tavolo), guardare i  maestri al lavoro, ascoltare il nome del piatto in giapponese, prontamente tradotto in inglese dalla cameriera alle vostre spalle e poi gustare ad occhi chiusi.OK, non è cheap, ma non è neanche un ristorante qualsiasi. Il servizio è di alto livello e la qualità eccezionale. Nessun serata al giapponese sarà più la stessa, dopo questa esperienza!

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: The sushi bar was a fantastic experience. Every piece of sushi was unbelievable, the sake carefully selected and the service was impeccable. I was worried it might be a bit stuffy but everyone was so kind and welcoming. It was truly memorable.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Exquisite omakase experience, the food & service is excellent and the attention to every detail is truly impressive.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Terrific and unique experience to sit at the bar and enjoy a curated 20-course dinner.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: EVERY SINGLE TIME we come here, we are transported, healed, fed and showered with the best attention.This is food as art in its highest form.We are extra grateful to Chef for remembering us and welcoming us and to Anthony Arvin for the spectacular wine journey on Monday night. THANK YOU THANK YOU! We cannot wait to come back.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Incredible experience! It was delicious. Must visit for Japanese food lovers. The best sushi me and my friend ever had. Will back definitely.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Wonderful. Best sushi experience ever

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Great sushi with acceptable omakase pricing.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Outstanding in every sense of the word ! Felt transported  to some exotic place in some far corner of the world , yes Tokyo!  The sushi was simply delicious, I could go on forever , service beyond stellar , a fabulous evening , will definitely go back

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Could not love the experience more - despite the fact that

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Their food wasnt good, not even compare to other more price friendly restaurant.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Best tasting sushi I’ve ever had in my life.  It was Semi mind blowing

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Fantastic Sushi experience! Highly recommend this if you want a five star omakase experience from an experienced staff! We've been here many times and every single time is an amazing experience!  Wish we could post the entire course but definitely get any and all add-ons if you only plan on going here once!

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: As a huge Sushi Nakazawa fan, I was more than excited to take my brother to lunch at the sushi bar for his birthday. I was lucky to eat here last year and had an absolutely fantastic experience - which made me even more dissapointed in my most recent experience. My brother has celiac disease, which can be an issue at other restaurants, but Sushi Nakazawa reassured us that accommodating his dietary restrictions would not be an issue - we made sure to call ahead of time, remind the host, and checked with our waiter twice. But unfortunately, within an hour after eating, my brother was extremely sick. We had the same exact meal and I was completely fine. When you're paying the prices that you do at Sushi Nakazawa, and have been reassured that they can handle customers with celiac, it's quite frustrating when they fail to do so. The next day I called the restaurant to let them know what happened and the host kindly said they would have management follow-up, but 2 weeks have passed and I haven't heard anything - not even an apology. Shocking when you expect high quality customer service from a restaurant of this quality. This truly is an amazing sushi restaurant, but if you have dietary restrictions, eat at your own risk.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: As close to Japan as you will find in New York.  Innovative touches on fabulous traditional sushi.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Mind blowing and Amazing Perfection in every bite, expensive but well worth it.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: I had 7pm dinner at the bar with my husband for our anniversary. Our dinner experience was first and foremost time well spent together, made sweeter by the cozy ambiance, tasty omakase, delightful tea, and thoughtful service. We enjoyed watching the chefs at work and our exchanges with the staff were brief. If this is the kind of thing your after, go for it. Looking forward to our next meal at Sushi Nakazawa!

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Food was great!

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Nakazawa was everything we expected.  Could not have asked for a better experience.  Will be back again and again.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Really exceptional!

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Really delicious

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: This was the best meal that I've ever had. The salmon was out of this world.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Arguably the best Sushi Restaurant in NYC. Delicious from start to finish!

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: My favorite place in the world. It’s a religious experience.

Name: Sushi Nakazawa - Sushi Bar
Comment: Late Valentine’s Day celebration. Wonderful food and atmosphere and knowledgeable staff.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: I am sure if we had gone, it would have been extraordinary. Great food, wine and service. Looking forward to dining w Carl after the virus is gone.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Jesse was wonderful as usual. Kitchen staff rocks. Love this place

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Just the single best restaurant experience in the Boston/Cambridge area. If you can get a reservation, gab it. You will be happy

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: This is our third visit and it is our #1 restaurant in all of BOSTON. As soon as the menu changes we will go back. We always take fancy restaurant afficiados and they are blown away by the food.Staff is wonderful and knowledgeable about every morsel served. Same with wine.And for what you get the price is reasonable, unlike most high end restaurants today.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Thank you to our server Olivia and our host Jesse. Thanks for the birthday candle. Sorry we missed Chef Carl. Congratulations on the Beard nomination

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Such an amazing email, every single course was perfectly made, interesting, and delicious. Our service was top notch. We chose to do the wine pairing, I highly recommend! There's some amazing food being created at this restaurant, if you're looking for something truly special you should come here!

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: One of the best new places we've eaten in Boston area! Outstanding service, very knowledgable about al wines...truly excellent!!! Bravo!

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Wonderful 5-course fixe price dinner with paired wines.  Each course elegant with food combinations most interesting.  Great service too.  Expensive, but worth it.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: We had a lovely time at The Table -- the food was inventive and delicious, and the atmosphere was friendly and casual.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Top notch experience from walking in the door to leaving. Service was impeccable and attentive.  All dishes that came out were beautifully presented and a full work out on our taste buds. I can’t wait to return with friends that haven’t yet enjoyed The Table.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Loved this very special restaurant. Not only was the food creative and delicious--it was served by the most well informed, pleasant group of people...Very happy you are part of the restaurant scene here!!

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Excellent food. Several of our dishes were exceptional. The coursing/timing was off sometimes, but they have a small service staff and they are preparing everything fresh so that's to be expected. Otherwise, we thought it was really wonderful. The people were very nice, the setting was intimate and the food was fantastic.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: This restaurant is a gem. On our fifth visit it has never failed to amaze us with inventive and polished dishes which taste wonderful and are excellently paired with wines.  The time spent developing and perfecting each dish is evident in the flavor and presentation. Kudos to Carl and his staff all of which are delightful.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Chef Carl does a great job showcasing high quality ingredients!

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Amazing as always

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Outstanding food and hospitality! Jesse was not only a stupendous host but shared some wonderful wine and knowledge with us during the meal. Max and the kitchen team served up course after course of delicate, ambitious and just extraordinary flavors. I can’t say enough good things about the entire experience. Thank you to the entire team and enjoy the night shift tonight!! Cheers!! Your good friend, George

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: This is the best restaurant in Boston. Chef Carl is a genius and Mary makes some of the most creative and delicious desserts I have ever tasted.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Apps and dessert were very good.  Lots of extra 'goodies'.  Entree - both the scallops and the steak, were fairly mediocre for a place charging top-end.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: The Table is a wonderful restaurant for special occasion dinners. The prix fixe menu rotates every six weeks and reflects an eclectic set of courses employing ingredients and techniques from around the world. There are two dishes offered for each of the four courses, so go with a loved one and taste every offering. I've gone twice so far and each of the eight dishes I've tried has been creative and excellent. The noise level is low enough to talk comfortably but the tables are separate enough to keep conversations private. You can tell that the staff team is tight knit and enjoys working together. They are supremely knowledgeable and engaged with each other and the patrons, and with little separation between the kitchen and the tables, you can see the food prepared with care. All in all, an ideal restaurant experience. I will go as often as I can.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Delicious, creative, delicate, but spicy. Interesting takes on fine dining in a relaxed, friendly and comfortable atmosphere. Really special.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Always great food with a new menu every 6 weeks.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Wonderful all around experience. Highly recommended for foodies.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Fantastic food and service. Always have a great evening here, can't be happier this is in our neighborhood!!

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Great for date nights. I wouldn't recommend for parties over 2 since you only get 2 choices on each course but food is GREAT!  Very small place so reservation is a must. The team is very knowledgeable, which is always a bonus.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Excellent menu and wine flight- a delightful dining experience

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Amazing in every way.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: We wanted a fabulous meal to celebrate a special occasion and The Table was totally up to the task!

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Really great experience hard to get in, expensive nice for special occasion

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Awesome food and servicePleasant seating arrangements, good wine listMore food than we expected !

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Cute little place, no cocktails, small menu, venison was good, service was average.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Amazing food and amazing service! The staff was very knowledgeable and it made every dish that much more intriguing.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: As always an amazing meal.  Each course surpasses the previous and the wine pairings were sublime.  The desserts blew us away....they have always been good but this time was by far the best.  Already booking our next reservation.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Attention to detail, unique flavors and textures, may be the best food in boston overall.  Very knowledgable wait staff.  Nice extras for a hospitable touch- like amuse buche, and take home granola bar.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Unfortunately a mixed bag here.  The food was very well prepared but the menu is extremely limited -- just two choices.   If you didn't like tripe or skate wing (and we didn't), you were out of luck.  However, the real problem was the truly horrible music and the volume at which it was played.  I like everything from Metallica to Bill Evans.  This was just loud noise with a heavy bass.  My guess is that it was there primarily for the chefs in the open kitchen, but it was blaring throughout the tiny dining room.  It was the kind of loud noise the CIA would use to extract a confession.  It ruined the experience completely.  The value proposition is poor at best at $150 a person with beer, no wine.  The chair are hard, no table cloths, and the decor was essentially nonexistent.  A few plastic flowers.  Overall, a huge disappointment.  Excellent bread and butter though.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Wonderful composition of textures and flavors! Superb!

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Overall excellent although our table was underwhelmed by the marinated mackerel and I thought the skate-sauerkraut combination didn't work particularly well (although each element was very good separately).  The wine pairings were tremendous and the service was excellent.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: This was a repeat visit and we enjoyed the dinner. The chicken that was served was very tasty but was not elevated to a fine dining experience.  Serving chicken as part of a fine dining menu is risky and this time it did not really paid off. My preference is that the restaurant stick to higher quality meats.  Also, I love bubbly wine with my meal and the only choice by the glass started at $17/glass.  I would like to find also quality sparkling wine choices in the $11-12/glass range too so I can have a couple without breaking the bank.  We will keep coming back always hope for a better experience.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: We had ordered vegetarian dishes.  They were all very flavorful and delicious.  We will be coming back soon.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Came here for my birthday with my girlfriend. Parking was a little difficult, since we had to find it on the street. The restaurant is a small, and well furnished place. The wall decorations were appropriate and added to the experience. The open kitchen was fun to watch as well. The food was what we expected. It was fantastic, and the reputation of the restaurant is deserved. However, there was an intangible missing from the food that kept the meal from entering the upper echelon of meals I’ve had. That said, I’ll gladly return when there is a special occasion that calls for a meal to match.

Name: The Table at Season To Taste
Comment: Tee Table at Season to Taste offers a 4 course fixed menu with complementary wine pairings for an additional charge. As a couple we like to order one of everything on the menu and as each course arrives each have half of the 2 dishes. This means we get to taste everything - and believe me, you don't want to miss anything. The food is different every time we go and the wines are always interesting. The waitstaff can tell you the details of each one and why it goes with the particular dish. It's not overbearing wine-speak it's genuinely interesting information. It is not inexpensive - but it is worth every cent. You leave with a complimentary, home-made granola bar in your pocket feeling replete and well cared for.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Great service and great food. We sat outside in the garden and the staff all wore masks.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Talula’s has been my annual birthday dinner place for the last ten years. Every time we go, the food is fantastic, the service is wonderful, and the overall ambiance of the garden is magical. I was so pleased that COVID hasn’t impacted that whatsoever. My fiancé and I felt safe and very well taken care of during our dining experience.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Loved it! Everything was perfect. I’d definitely go again.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: First time dining out since early March.   We were impressed with Talula’s Garden’s attention to customer comfort and safety.  Outdoor dining only, tables more than 6 feet apart.   Staff masked and gloved, tables thoroughly sanitized between seatings, disposable menus and individual hand wipes at each place setting.Additionally, the hospitality was bar none.   Service excellent, ambient atmosphere, welcoming staff, and each course was delicious.  Did I say, “delicious?”  Yes, delicious! We will be back!!!!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: I miss the amuse buoche from pre-coronavirus days. I understand current times put constraints on things. I will look forward to when quarantine is over and everything goes back to normal. But overall it was an excellent dinner !

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Great, staff and service they were willing to accommodate our special evening.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Great food (particularly the fried chicken), great cocktails (we loved the Winemaker sangria), and we had lovely weather in the outdoor garden seating. Our server was friendly, helpful, and not over-attentive. Will definitely return!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Overall, great experience, which was unfortunately punctuated by an oddly unfriendly and ungracious manager. Everyone else was simply delightful. Food was delicious. And the garden is enchanting. Truly. He left a really bad taste.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Lovely setting and all of our food was excellent. Service was also excellent and well paced. Plan to return sometime soon for another special occasion!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: It was great experience as usual from the service to the food . As usual ! So glad it’s opened for outdoor dining!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Food was amazing as usual and service was just as good. Conner was very attentive and polite. We had everything we needed without even asking.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: The food was delicious and service was amazing! I had the scallops and my fiancé ordered the fried chicken. It’s a tad pricy but was definitely worth it after not going out to eat for 3 months!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Our waitress Tatiana was wonderful! The food was phenomenal, particularly the mushroom risotto and tuna crudo. And the patio at sunset is simply magical and whimsical. Will absolutely be dining again :)

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Came to see daughter in Philly.  Perfect meal, service and atmosphere.  They have social distancing down as well.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: This was one of several vistits  to Talulas, but all that more special as it opened following Coronavirus. The food was as great as always and our service was perfect. Sitting outside off Washington Square, eating amazing food, and relaxing in the atmosphere of this beautiful garden made the past three months of social distancing disappear. You can never go wrong at Talulas but tonight was exceptional

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Post COVID19, this was my boyfriend and I’s first true date night out. Luckily, we were able to celebrate our 6 month anniversary together in the outdoor garden of Talula’s 6/15! Although our reservation was delayed/late by 30 minutes, the staff was super friendly, very apologetic, and professional. As a nice gesture, the beverage manager gave us each a glass of Prosecco on the house. We were extremely appreciative and understood the longer wait time given new social distance guidelines. As an aside, this restaurant frequently surprises you with beverages, desserts, etc on special occasions (I have had this happen on 2 prior special occasion dinners). Talula’s food, service, and ambience (as per usual) was off the chart! Thank you for being an amazing date spot and being one of my favorite restaurants in the city! Heavily recommend this gem in Center City

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: It was so nice to eat out again!  Beautiful outdoor setting with plenty of social distancing. Almost felt normal...

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: I’ve heard of Talula’s Garden many times as one of the MUST dine places in the city... I had even seen photos and was delighted at the opportunity to go for my birthday. I think that some of my expectations were let down, as it’s as pretty but I think I expected a lot more ambiance from “the garden” than it offered in design. It was also much TOO dark. We were in the most lit area (right next to the light wall) and we had trouble seeing. Just to exit the restaurant my one friend had to use a flashlight. It’s definitely not disability friendly at all. The staff was nice, the food was great. Overall it was a lovely beautiful night, and the food was very satisfying. We ordered the beef short ribs (4.5 ⭐️), scallops (3.5 ⭐️) and beets (4 ⭐️). I’ll say the one uncomfortable moment was when waiting for the check to sign, I noticed a manager or higher up kept staring us down as if we were over staying out welcome. This kept on after we signed. It was a party of 4 at 9:30 at night, and we had barely stayed 65 minutes at that point with a 8:15p reservation. It was extremely uncomfortable, and honestly made me wonder if it was racial possibly with us being probably the only or one of the only tables of POC. Hopefully not related but who knows.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Best place in Philly!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Our dinner at Talula’s was absolutely amazing. The ambiance is beautiful and the food is 10/10. Definitely recommend the cheeseboard and delicious garden salad!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: I went to Talulas’s with a group of ladies for the first night out and open on Friday June 12, 2020 and everything was perfect! From the servers attentiveness, patience, spirit and knowledge on the menu by which she offered us great recommendations to the manager who ensured that everything went perfectly and tasted great to the food and drinks also being incredibly delicious. Everything was perfect from service to manager to food and even ambience and it really contributed to our first night back out after being in quarantine for so long. We are even thinking about making Talula’s a every other Friday group dinner things because we had such a great first experience here. Thank you Talula’s team for taking care of us and we will be back!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: So great to experience outdoor dining where the food and environment were both great!  Service was thoughtful and accommodating.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: This place is one of the best in Philadelphia.   They are being careful, so we felt completely safe - and as usual service and food were excellent.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Dined Sunday for  brunch as we wanted to go out and support the hospitality industry during this very difficult time. Service and  food were both excellent. The staff was kind enough to send out complimentary dessert to our table as well.  Thank you to the Talula’s team.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Visited our daughter who is a student at Temple. Took her here for a birthday brunch. Everything was fabulous! We will definitely be back!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Food amazing, service outstanding. Went for brunch had a wonderful experience.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Best food and service in the city . Anna was a phenomenal server and my wife and I had a great time

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: So it was Friday the 13th of March but we were feeling so lucky! Weather was cooperative and we were able to dine at one of the last patio tables under a heat lamp. Everything from the ambiance, service, timing, food and drink was superb! Highly recommend and feeling grateful we took the chance for a wonderful date night after work.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Wonderful as always.  The team there takes great care of my husband and me.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: The food was amazing. The atmosphere was cozy and aesthetic.  Our server (Connor)was highly informed and helpful. Aimee Olexy stopped by to check if every was fine. It was truly a perfect evening.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: One of my favorite places.  The cheeses are excellent.   The side vegetable dishes, al dente.  We licked every plate clean.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: The food was exquisitely prepared and presented.  The service was very attentive and our server couldn't have been nicer.  They brought out a little something extra for dessert for my mother's retirement with a congratulatory note penned in chocolate.  Thanks so much for a very nice time that topped off our day!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: I’ll be back

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Service great.  Food, not nearly as good as last time.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Phenomenal menu & food. The drinks were tasty as well. We definitely will be back in the future!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Food is delicious and very fresh. Overall great vibes with a fun but cozy atmosphere. Can’t wait to come back and enjoy a meal outside in the garden. Will definitely be back!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Sat us in a corner of the bar at a table next to the server station and walk up. Im very tall and people were tripping all over my leg the entire night.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: We sat at the bar and enjoyed everything about our dining experience!  Highly recommend and will ho back in warmer weather and sit outside in the garden!

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: Birthday dinner for a special young lady in my life...my daughter. Chef tasting meal was delicious. Will return to try some items from the main menu in the warmer weather and sit out in the beautiful courtyard.

Name: Talula’s Garden
Comment: The food was fantastic; the service from Elijah even better.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: I have been eating at the Metro for years and have never had a bad meal. The service is impeccable as the quality of the food. It is my favorite place to eat and take friends.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Truly enjoyed the meal!  Metro is always has great food.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: One of our favorite restaurants in OKC! Service is great and food is outstanding.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Everything was great!!  Trevar is an awesome server!  This is by far the nicest Restaurant in OKC!!  We will be back!!

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Great food, outstanding service! Can’t go wrong with the Metro!

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Always great food and ambiance!

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: One of our favorite places. Always great food and service. Never disappoints.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Definitely a nice little spot to grab some dinner and a drink! Service was excellent and the bartender was quite proficient. Ordered charcuterie, soup, and salmon; all were very tasty. Would definitely go again! Dinner for two, with appetizer, glass of wine, and two cocktails was $120+tip.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Food is delicious and service outstanding.  Very impressed with safety precautions taken.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Excellent as always.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Always an excellent choice, when you’re in the OKC area. Great food and service, in a nice quiet setting. Old school in a good way.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Everything was great as usual! We always look forward to a quiet dinner with excellent food. It’s one of the few places we can go and always know the service and food will be above and beyond.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: One of our favorite restaurants in the city.  It has been consistently good since the day they opened.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Another fantastic meal at the Metro, great food and service!TG

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Elegant dinning experience.  Great service, excellent food, love wine selection.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: The filet was different. It didn’t taste bad but it didn’t have any flavor. I’m not sure it was cooked on a grill? I’m not sure it came from a cow? Had grill lines but no flavor, No juices. It was 8 ounces but only 1” tall. Nothing like normal filet photos and for $50??? Everything else was fine but left with NO taste in our mouths. Probably won’t return.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Wonderful dinner. Wonderful service. Perfect evening.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: I can say that I’m never disappointed when I eat at the metro, it definitely was quieter this time most likely because there were less tables in the restaurant but that didn’t change the quality of the food. It is by far One of my first choices because I know the quality will always be there. The wait staff goes out of their way to make your dining experience pleasurable with the Appropriate amount of attention.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Always good service and delicious food in a quiet and pleasant atmosphere.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Excellent Service Trevor waited on us and he was very responsive and knowledgeable.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: This is a great restaurant and the good is always delicious.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Me and my husband were celebrating our anniversary and everything was perfect!

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Excellent food & service. Favorite restaurant in town.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Love the Metro!  Great food and wine. Always comfortable visiting at the table. From rolls through dessert you will have exceptional dining at Metro

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Still without a doubt best dining experience ever.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Perfect. So very happy to be back at the Metro! OKC’s best.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: The Metro is truly one of okc’s best dining experiences. The relaxing atmosphere is truly a throwback to the elegant dining of the past mixed with everything you like about present day eateries. PS; you don’t need to cash in a bond to eat there.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: As usual.  Food was superb!   Oliver our waitress was as all the stall at the metro excellent!   On the spot service and professional etiquette !   This is our special night dinner place !

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: As always - an excellent experience. Owners  are very hospitable !

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Had our anniversary dinner there and everything was wonderful. We had the filet with red wine sauce and it was perfect. Love the ambiance of The Metro...it never disappoints!

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: The Metro consistently offers a wonderful place to eat and celebrate a special occasion.   The service, quality and food selections are top notch.  So glad they are back open.  I have really missed you!

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Anniversary!

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: As usual, the food and attentive service - superb.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: It was there first night to be open since the shutdown. Everything was wonderful 💕

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Good service good food attentive owners best restaurant in Oklahoma City.  Glad they are back.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Great food and service

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Exceptional service and cuisine in a refined, tasteful setting.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: A standby in the OKC dining scene.  We wanted to support local restaurants and this was a great choice. Although we asked waitstaff to allow us time to enjoy our wine before food came, we should have just waited and ordered 15 minutes later.  I know restaurants love to turn tables, my friends could have used a little longer drinks time.  Otherwise-  splendid food and a delicious white Bordeaux.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: Our evening at the Metro was positively wonderful. My wife and I did not get a chance to celebrate Valentine's Day together this year, but the month long wait was entirely worth it! Every aspect of the experience was so well done, that we can't seem to stop talking about it. We were visiting from out of state and found them online quite by accident. After seeing the marvelous reviews, we made our reservations and were so pleasantly surprised. The food and beverages were superbly crafted and served. The servers were well informed of all the menu items as well as the specials. The service was prompt but subtle - never intrusive. We do hope to return again.

Name: The Metro Wine Bar & Bistro
Comment: It was just time for a wonderful, delicious, dining-experience at our favorite place, The Metro. It did not disappoint.

Name: Toscana
Comment: I reserved and expected Toscana not Toscana BarVery disappointed

Name: Toscana
Comment: Went to this classic American Italian spot. Since they will be closed for two months to do renovation their food options were a bit more limited. All food was very good.

Name: Toscana
Comment: We had a wonderful Holiday lunch with our son, Jonathan visiting from Madison.He frequented Toscana before he was born, when I had lunch with friends and business related.He loved the Cotaletta Milanese. I make the Austrian version "Schnitzel" for him.

Name: Toscana
Comment: Food was mixed, some dishes very good, other not so goodExtremely noisy, too small to have an open kitchenThe the place is clean but when I entered I could some kind of odor, sort of musty

Name: Toscana
Comment: Grwat, as always

Name: Toscana
Comment: A classy dinner with delicious food. The black truffle and burrata pizza is to die for!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Great, always consistent and delicious

Name: Toscana
Comment: Best restaurant in LA!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Toscana is the Best. Top quality.  Food, wine, service, everything

Name: Toscana
Comment: My pasta while tasty was barely warm. At these prices they need to do better. Otherwise I enjoyed my time there.

Name: Toscana
Comment: Always outstanding food & ambiance! The Maitre D' greets you at the door with a warm genuine smile making you feel like so welcome. We were celebrating our sons 26th Birthday and our waiter Mark went out of his way to make our night special. A 10 every time!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Even though our reservation was a bit delayed because people were not leaving the restaurant, the hostess was very nice and did her best to accomodate us. Food was amazing and very nice service.

Name: Toscana
Comment: Service was impeccable and the food is so delicious!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Amazing as always!

Name: Toscana
Comment: As always, a terrific experience.

Name: Toscana
Comment: Lovely branzino. Good wine, but quite overpriced. The veal was magnificent, though very very expensive.

Name: Toscana
Comment: Arrived early for our reservation, and was greeted warmly. Only waited a couple of minutes before the table was available. The staff were all great, and the atmosphere was fun and comfortable.  The food was delicious!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Efficient and tasty.

Name: Toscana
Comment: One of our faves!!!

Name: Toscana
Comment: We went to Tuscano’s today for lunch. We had great service from the minute we walked in. Our server told us the specials, my husband opted for the seafood pasta which she said was excellent ,I had the orchestra which is small pasta shells with Broccoli, sun-dried tomatoes and garlic. We both enjoyed our pastas& We can’t wait to go back!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Wonderful as always! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Name: Toscana
Comment: Everything excellent but noise level too high.  Can't do anything about it but it is distracting

Name: Toscana
Comment: Great food and service.

Name: Toscana
Comment: A new wine list includes man regional wines  in the $50 to $100 range, considerably less expensive than the Brunellos and Barolos, that are exciting and satisfying.  The food was excellent.  I always include a small bowl of spaghetti, with butter and Parmesan, not on the menu which arrives just right, not too large a portion and al dents.

Name: Toscana
Comment: This restaurant is always outstanding!  The artichoke salad is next level, pasta are insane & the dishes all feel clean & light.

Name: Toscana
Comment: One of the best Italian food in town

Name: Toscana
Comment: Love the food! Service was excellent... can't wait to go back!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Toscana has been our favorite lunch place for 28 years.

Name: Toscana
Comment: loved it. Fabulous food and the wine selection was very nice. Great service!

Name: Toscana
Comment: One gets used to the off hand manner of the maitre d if one has been away for a while. We were put at a table smack on the middle of the room. The waiter was charming. Food was good as always.

Name: Toscana
Comment: Good food and great service. What else do you want.

Name: Toscana
Comment: As always, OUTSTANDING. Best Italian food in the west coast.

Name: Toscana
Comment: We felt very rushed and unattended to. We were told certain tables by the windows were reserved, when in fact I witnessed a walk-in seated there. They brought out appetizer at the same time as the entree. I had dined here some time ago, but now I see no reason to return again

Name: Toscana
Comment: Awesome food and service.  As always Toscana lives up to expectations.  Highly recommend!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Delicious food, wonderful service, gracious always

Name: Toscana
Comment: Excellent waiter. Great food. Best table! Loved it

Name: Toscana
Comment: The best!!

Name: Toscana
Comment: Upscale twists on homestyle Italian food. Very friendly and welcoming service

Name: Toscana
Comment: Great food and service.

Name: Toscana
Comment: Welcoming, friendly service, perfectly seasoned and prepared food.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Excellent in the new location. So much closer ! Very young chic clientele !

Name: Townsend
Comment: An excellent dinner. Loved it

Name: Townsend
Comment: Everything was superb. Quiet night with the coronavirus causing folks to stay away from public places, but come on out and eat! Nice wine list, friendly staff. So glad to have Townsend in Rittenhouse neighborhood.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Lovely dinner and wonderful drinks. The staff is delightfully helpful and respectful.  Overall, a great dining experience.

Name: Townsend
Comment: We really enjoyed our recent visit to Townsend.  We both ordered the chef's tasting menu and staff was very accomodating about changing out one of the dishes that was something we don't eat.  Each course was delicious.  We also enjoyed the wine pairings with each course.  A great choice for a special occasion meal.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Wonderful restaurant at a new location, food in top shelf and service is pretty good. A little louder and less intimate then it used to be but still great all around

Name: Townsend
Comment: Wonderful food and service as on Passyunk!  We had a beautifully timed dinner to celebrate and the best temperance cocktail in Philadelphia so far.  Miss the old charming ambiance a bit, but will definitely be back.

Name: Townsend
Comment: We were greeted promptly and seated.  There was a table of 5 men and 1 woman that was very noise.  The men kept trying to talk over each other and getting louder.  We complained to the server about the noise.  She agreed they were way out of bounds but there was nothing she could do.  There was a dying poinsettia in the window sill next to our table; it almost spring.  We had to signal to order cocktails.  The food was very good and the wine was very good.  The variety of food was excellent and they prepared a salad course for my wife which was not on the menu.  It was very good.  Pricing was good.  I would recommend that they spend more training on customer service and attention to details.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Wonderful dinner!

Name: Townsend
Comment: The food was just OK. The Bronzino was soggy indicating it had been frozen too long .The gnocchi was overcooked although I thought the sauce was good.

Name: Townsend
Comment: We ate upstairs on a Tuesday night. We were able to talk and hear each other! A remarkable and delightful surprise in a restaurant these days.We four foodies agreed this was one if the best food we'd ever ate. The experience was further enhanced by our excellent waiter, Harry.All in all, a wonderful evening.

Name: Townsend
Comment: It was lovely and we definitely will return. Delicious!! Excellent service!!

Name: Townsend
Comment: Glad we arrived early on a Saturday, seated right away. After that it went down hill. Waiter not very professional, no offer of fix menu, had to refill water ourselves. Too casual about everything.Overall good was good, not overly salty, cooked correctly. Just not a wow taste anywhere. We had escargot, gnocchi,duck and halibut. Had hoped service improved since opening reviews, once it's was full restaurant we waited for most everything.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Great tasting menu!  The halibut was incredible, the filet mignon cooked perfect, and the soup tasty.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Everything we ordered was wonderful. No complaints, want to go back soon.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Amazing spot, excellent service, food was phenomenal and  truly a dining experience. Can’t wait to go back. Chef Todd acknowledged my request to meet him and talk about the restaurant.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Special event dinner for 2 birthdays and my son passing his CPA exam. Great food, delicious wine list, very knowledgeable and friendly service. Pricey and totally worth it.

Name: Townsend
Comment: The whole meal was wonderful. The oysters simply melted in your mouth, cooked to perfection, simply lovely!  Cannot wait to dine there again!

Name: Townsend
Comment: Average compared to the many fine restaurants in the neighborhood.

Name: Townsend
Comment: It was delicious BUT VERY loud.  The acoustiscs need improving as everything else is wonderful !!!

Name: Townsend
Comment: Quality experience on all levels- food, service and ambiance

Name: Townsend
Comment: Simply one of the best meals I've eaten in years and the cocktails were exquisite. The only downsides to the experience is that the ambience isn't great. The food and drink far makes up for that fact . This place absolutely needs to be experienced at least once

Name: Townsend
Comment: Pleasant surroundings if a little stark, quiet and comfortable.  Service very good.Best dishes were the squash soup and the scallops. The foie gras was unevenly cooked, one portion just right, the other  undercooked. Both had an off taste in the sear.  The sweetbreads were very well prepared. The duck was well prepared, nothing unusual but good nonetheless. Overall a good experience . More likely to return to Bibou.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Great ambiance but the portions were to large!  We were told they were portioned for each individual to order each course but by the time the main course came we were half stuffed.

Name: Townsend
Comment: We eat at the bar about once a week, but on Saturday night, we took my mother for dinner, and she liked it so much that we switched her upcoming birthday party to Townsend. Great food on a menu that's always kept fresh. (I had Broiled Oysters, Rabbit Gnocchi, Halibut)   Great service. Great drinks (Manhattans! - thanks Mike and Kevin).

Name: Townsend
Comment: Excellent on all counts. Will definitely return to explore more of the menu.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Everything about our dinner was outstanding. Our server, Amy, was knowledgeable about everything on the menu and steered us In the right direction for each course we ordered. Every person who came to our table to serve us something were also knowledgeable about everything! We loved it and can’t wait to come back. Beautiful restaurant!

Name: Townsend
Comment: Fantastic food!

Name: Townsend
Comment: The food was good, but consistent not warm.We felt awckward to send it back to be re-heated, and again it was reallt tasteful, jut not  hot.

Name: Townsend
Comment: This may be a great spot-  but only after they fix some startup problems.Our table was not ready at our reservation time but there is under zero space to wait - except at the overcrowded bar (with others waiting to be seated) so we hung out in a window area. We had a wonderful server who took our order for a nice bottle of wine (from a moderately interesting list). A runner then brought us the obligatory bread basket along with an amuse-bouche of vinegared beets, one of which he  overturned onto the table linens - but made no offer to even cover the large and expanding beet red amoeba shaped stain with a napkin.Our first courses - a nice potato potage and baked oysters with (I recall) Pernod were quite well prepared. Our mains, a duck breast and a fish with a leek and other vegetable purée were both well prepared - but suffered from an obvious many too many minutes late delay in getting from the kitchen to the table. We passed on desert as nothing on the limited selection spoke to us.This is a work in progress. Most of the “rough edges” we felt were managed around by a wonderful and obviously experienced server (who we well tipped) but it’s hard to not get the feeling that the front and back of the house need some more time working together.Last - it’s a fine dining restaurant.  It needs some acoustic treatment as the noise level was close to that of a sports bar until later in the evening when the number of patrons was at a minimum.We will give it a few months and return.

Name: Townsend
Comment: First time at the new location (but several times at the old)- so my advice now is - ask for a table against the wall or upstairs.  The window tables are very cold in winter and the one nearest to the service station is distracting. The food - well, I just don't get the hype!  It's good but not spectacular in any form.  Sweetbreads were overly large and thus contained significant cartilage.  Tuna nicoise was grainy... in general the entire meal was overly salted.  Maybe I'm being picky but for a top place it was disappointing and all this was reflected in prior visits.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Seating was swift when we arrived with our reservation (which we made 15 mins prior); the food was all fantastic - from the amuse-bouche to the sophisticated dessert. Everything was so fresh and extremely well executed. It's a masterclass in French cuisine.

Name: Townsend
Comment: I have never left a poor review. We were really looking forward to trying Townsend as we have heard great things. However, the food was extremely mediocre - some lukewarm, some so hot as if out of a microwave. It lacked any real flavor. The foie gras mousse was gummy like glue and the duck was questionably duck. The only thing actually worth eating were the oysters. Our meal was so disappointing we immediately walked to Friday, Saturday, Sunday where we know we can get a top-notch, perfectly executed meal with staff that don’t seem like robots. Just having a reputation for good food won’t do much unless you only serve people who would be happy eating at Applebee’s every night. We won’t be returning.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Everything about my evening was outstanding! The food was incredible, the service was spectacular...best meal I've had in a long time!

Name: Townsend
Comment: Outstanding meal and cocktails were divine! It was restaurant week and that can be hit or miss in some restaurants. Townsend was better than expectations! We have eaten at Townsend when the restaurant was located in South Philly and thought this meal was even better. The ambience, the complex yet clean flavorful dishes and creative cocktails should not be missed. We live in the city and have become foodie snobs frequenting many restaurants that have had the 'hype' and were disappointed.   Townsend did not disappoint- we will be back!

Name: Townsend
Comment: We really enjoyed restaurant week menu and portions were generous unlike many French restaurants.  Very nice wine list.  Excellent service and good ambiance.

Name: Townsend
Comment: My new favorite Center City restaurant! Great for any occasion.

Name: Townsend
Comment: Went for restaurant week and both got short rib both were overcooked/tough but one was significantly more overcooked and dry. Wasn’t worth sending back cause than not eating at same time. Everything else was good

Name: Townsend
Comment: The food was delicious and the service was fast.  I will be going back to Townsend restaurant in the near future.  Highly recommend.

Name: Townsend
Comment: With reservation I would recommend but also realize this was RW.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: True Food was a great way to social distance and eat outside. They took care to keep tables at least 6 feet apart and had hand sanitizer readily available. The salads are always tasty and unusual.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great alfresco spot with seating off the sidewalk.  Service was attentive and personal. Good and healthy food!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Very good food, on the healty side but with options for every taste to choose.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Food is always healthy and fresh. Staff are always friendly too!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: The quinoa Teriyaki dish hardly has any quinoa.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great vegan options... Delicious flavors

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Always love the food and ambiance. Fresh healthy choices but pretty overpriced for the meat add ons. I feel like you go for the chill vibes with some healthy tasty options. Expect to spend though.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: The service is great and the seasonal drinks were delicious. We only had apps. The flat bread was amazing but the edamame guacamole was not the best.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: We are regulars at true food. My daughter and I both commented we didn’t know if there was a new shop or something had changed with the cooking. We order the new appetizer the lettuce wrap made with jackfruit. It was very salty.I ordered the shrimp tacos in a lettuce wrap. There were two small tacos and nothing really on the side  except a small side of lettuce. A far change from their fish taco that used to be on the menu. I feel like the prices have gone up the portions have gone down and so has the quality of the food. The concept of the restaurant is amazing and it used to be one of our favorite spots for lunch or a quick dinner.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Really good and healthy options. Great for Vegan and gluten free options!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: I love true food but this time was not their best effort. We asked for gluten-free pitas and we’re given regular pita chips. After we asked multiple times the waiter finally came back and said that he did accidentally give us regular. Could’ve been a big issue had we eating them without questioning him. Our bill was incorrect, our pizza was not cut all the way through. Lots of issues and I’m hoping they work through this challenging time because it’s one of my favorite restaurants.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Samantha, our server, was extremely professional and  aware of our needs while maintaining new standards.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great service, very clean, social distance guidelines in place

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great ”re-opening” experience. Everything was excellent. Food, service, spacing of the tables. We felt very comfortable.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great place

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Always great and attentive service ...drinks and food fresh and tasty. Outdoor option is such a treat.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Unfortunately, the lettuce in my lunch salad was wilted and even slimy in spots. Not appetizing at all. Outdoor seating could have been better with the addition of flowering plants in the planters next to the tables, and street noise made conversation difficult. Overall, not the experience I used to enjoy at TFK.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Food was good.  Servers and other employees were nice.  Only issue was that hostess had her mask pulled down below her nose at all times and sometimes below her mouth, too.  This is not acceptable during COVID times and especially not when all customers need to wear mask (I am happy to do this) but you are speaking with and seated by someone who doesn't have their mask on properly.  Hopefully mgmt. will correct this.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Food was excellent... We thoroughly enjoyed the charred cauliflower, then the winter immunity bowl with chicken... The food is so good, clean & awesome taste... Service was perfect... Thank you True Food Kitchen you guys are truly awesome... I wish you were in mu hometown - I'd be their everyday!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Food is delicious.  The ancient grain bowl was my favorite.  Specialty cocktail list also really good.  Love the vibe/decoration in the restaurant, it is thoughtfully designed.  Tenny took care of us and is a wonderful person.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great preparation. Greatbtaste

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great spot. Super food and wonderful wait staff.  Would go again!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great food and ambience. Service was excellent. Will come again!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Great time with a friend I haven’t seen in a while. Always love coming to this lovely restaurant.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: This is one of my favorite spots in the city.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: We had fantastic service from a trainee called Steven, who was attentive to our hungers and thirsts but had a light touch for checking in. Food great too.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Really enjoyed this restaurant! Have been once before but went back this time with my family who is visiting. Service was great and everyone seemed to like their food!Only complaint might be the dessert (flourless cake), which seemed a little dry, but other than that it was a great experience!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Service was terrific.  Really good, healthy fare.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Lunch with a friend. We enjoyed the 2 appetizers we ordered, flat bread and cauliflower. I enjoyed my 1/2 bowl ancient grain with salmon. My friend had the beet burger and was not wowed by it. Service was slow but realize they were having a shift change. All were very gracious and helpful.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: We experienced extremely long wait times for our food when we had guests in town last month, but decided to come back to meet a local friend for lunch who lived nearby. After writing a review after the last experience, True Food Kitchen's Assistant GM reached out to personally apologize for the experience and encouraged us to contact him if we dined there again. We did and the GM, Brian, made sure to stop by during our most recent visit. Our experience was great and Brian made sure to take care of our party. It's very refreshing to see an organization do everything they could to turn around a less than stellar experience. Mistakes and off days certainly happen, so we appreciate when a group can recover and make sure to create a good experience going forward. Food was great and service was great also including for our young son.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: I am Vegan and was joined by a Carnivore.  I had the Winter Immunity bowl and he had the Beet burger.  Both of us loved our meals!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Ratings for food and overall would have been 5 stars if the food had been served hot.  My soup base bowl and the tomato soup for my dining partner were both dissatisfying lukewarm.  Both were delicious but soup should be hot, not lukewarm, especially on a cold winter day.  Our server was friendly and helpful when answering our questions about menu items.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: This was my 4th time there 6 weeks. The food was delicious - as always!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: This place is excellent in all respects, we really enjoyed the delicious food and they have so many options. Easily satisfied my vegan wife and the seafood lover in me, all of it was amazing. The service was also fantastic, very fun and attentive but not overly so. Highly recommend!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: This was my first time dining here and was food was delicious. I will definitely return and recommend to others. The guacamole is a winner!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Excellent food and serviceWell locatedI would highly recommend this restaurant

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Amazing food!!Get the bowl!

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Food was great, service was great (my waiter wasn't the best, he wasn't bad, but was just okay), everyone else gave great service. Music was nice.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: Absolutely amazing!! Always delicious!! Valentine’s menu was GREAT!!!! Can’t wait for the Spring menu to come out.

Name: True Food Kitchen - Chicago
Comment: We had out of town guests that we brought to True Food Kitchen because of dietary needs (plant based diet), and they enjoyed the food tremendously. However, we also had two children in our party, and the wait to receive our food, even a couple of items we ordered right away to feed to the youngest child, took an extremely long time to come out. Our server assured us, after a long delay once he took our order, that we were the next ticket up, but from that point it was even 20 min before our food arrived at our table. In all, we waited about 45-50 minutes to get our food from the time we placed our orders.Personally, being local to Chicago, I don't know that my family and I would dine here again soon because of that experience, but we may consider bringing guests if they had dietary considerations. The food was excellent, though.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Our Server Mallory was amazing (and so was the rest of the staff)! The food was perfect! Perfect date spot!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Absolutely outstanding food and service. Ask for Mallory if you can, she was amazing!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Amazing as usual. Never let us down!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Love the place -- just ready for a full restaurant after Covid.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Awesome food!!! They never disappoint. Great not good service. Perfect timing and unobtrusive service. Highly recommended!!!!!!!!!!!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Always the best and an unforgettable experience for my sister’s birthday. Love you guys!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Uchi never fails to deliver. The Service, food, drinks and overall environment are always top notch.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Service was excellent! Travis explained the whole menu and how things worked since it was our first time there. Once the food started coming out, nothing was disappointing. I really recommend this place for special occasions as the bill can rack up quickly but it's so worth it for the quality of the food you are getting and the service.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: We LOVED Uchi! We went at happy hour.  When we got there we just asked our waitress to bring us whatever she suggested. She asked what our budget was and went from there. Every course was 1-2 bites a person. We left very full! We ended up having about 11 courses, and 2 desserts. It was roughly $75 per person including tip. It was worth every penny!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: We were outside and the manager, so very graciously, made room for us inside. Meghan was the most attentive server, she is knowledgeable and made fantastic recommendations . We are bringing our out of town guests there soon😆

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Happened to get reservation during happy hour. What a deal!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: We had a great anniversary dinner and loved the outside patio setting. Food was great, our server Sam was wonderful and it was nice to eat out again after so long. Everyone was wearing a mask and they had everything very clean. :)

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: This restaurant not only has some of the best unique and quality sushi I have ever tried but the service was outstanding.  Uchi has taken the time and paid attention to the importance of social distancing, wearing masks, and cleanliness while continuing to provide an amazing dining experience.  All of the staff are well-trained, knowledgeable and were a pleasure to converse with.  Thank you for the experience it was truly memorable and we will be back again.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: First time dining at Uchi Dallas, It was good to be able to enjoy a restaurant but I believe the safety precautions made a higher-end dining experience not so inviting.   Soy Sauce, ginger, and wasabi in packets made the experience and price of service not worthy to dine during these times.  The Happy Hour Menu for drinks was below expectations.  The food tasted good with many flavor combinations. Hama Chili flavorfulHamachi kama was slightly over burned around the edges and still served to us. Wagyu beef Hot Stone was a great experience with good flavorEdamame was good/ some pieces were burnt walu walu was goodBiendo could be rolled tighter but was very tastefulPork Rib/ Salty Coconut Tapioca Fantastic

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Great service. Quality food. Server did a good job of crafting a custom menu based on preferences.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Uchi is one of three restaurants in Dallas that are consistently perfect. Food, service, ambiance, is always impeccable! It is very rare that after 15 years of restaurant management I am able to have a dining experience where there isn’t at least some mental coaching or managing going on, but at Uchi, I truly get to enjoy my experience as a guest. It’s a rare thing for me to say, but my Uchi is consistently flawless!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: We love this place and we try to visit once every two months or so , we drive two hours to visit Uchi but is worth it , it never disappoints.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: We loves this place but got a waiter that lacked on service skills but the food is always great. They are doing everything to keep you safe during COVID

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Excellent omakase and service. Will definitely return.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Food was great, but we felt rushed due to the fast timing the food was brought out.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Uchi is the best restaurant in Texas hands down. The staff is amazing and the food is unforgettable.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Best service and food in Dallas. This is the only place I missed during quarantine.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Everything we tried was fresh and amazing! Cannot wait to go back!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Fantastic experience.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Stellar food.   Stellar staff.     We just moved from Miami and are so happy to have found this place.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Exceptional in every sense of the word. From the food to the service, just exceptional.  Our waiter remembered our previous orders and every person that approached our table wished us happy birthday.  Chef Rhonda is a mad culinary genius!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Johnny Helped me with my reservation to celebrate my son's 30th Birthday This is his favorite place!!! Johnny was amazing My son and his girlfriend had a fantastic dinnerThanks for making it so specialJohnny your the best!!!!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: It is always pleasure coming to Uchi and seeing the friendly faces and great smiles amongst the entire staff. The food is amazing and definitely worth every penny, they have my favorite staff amongst any restaurant I’ve ever gone too and I always get excellent customer service. I had the pleasure of having James as my server and would like to thank him for great service and recommendations on drinks and dishes. Thank you to everyone at Uchi!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: My brother was visiting from Chicago and we had the Chef’s tasting menu. Absolutely EVERYTHING was incredible. Service was impeccable and food was creative and inspiring. It’s nice to feel a little bit of Dallas again. Please thank the entire team for a memorable evening.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: A wonderful dining experience!! Service was great.. food was delicious loved all the suggestions and your guiding through the menu. Laura was our server and the other team members made it a overall great night out !!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Times are weird and unpredictable right now. Didn’t feel that way at all, at Uchi. It was still an awesome experience with all the special care taken for the guests and staff.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: This is my favorite restaurant in all of Dallas! Thank you, Uchi!!!!!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Very quick and efficient service. Very high quality sushi. Good wine list too!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: It was my wife's birthday and I've heard nothing but great things about Uchi.  Unfortunately, with the Pandemic, we were not able to go inside, so I made a reservation for pick up.  It was well worth it!  This was literally The. Best. Sushi. We've. Ever. Had!!  We can not wait to dine inside when available.  Service wise, the staff greeted my car and had the food at the scheduled time as reserved.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: We missed dining in

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: The food was fantastic! Thank you Uchi for staying open and continuing to creat delicious meals during this quarantine. Especially loved the Sakana Mushi. We’ll be back soon!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Over the top and more in this pandemic we are in. I’m very thankful that I could get the best sushi and sake tonight. I just closed the sale of my house and wanted to celebrate properly and I just don’t have the option to belly up to a table to throw down. Ordering and pickup to go was so smooth and easy. Can’t wait to be able to sit and enjoy Uchi in Uchi.

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: Quarantine Uchi is just as good as in restaurant Uchi!!! it was perfect and we will definitely have another fancy night at home soon!

Name: Uchi - Dallas
Comment: I love Uchi, and I was happy to be able to support them during this time. Their system for takeout is easy and efficient. Can't wait to come back when restrictions are lifted.

Name: UMI
Comment: Great place! Even better interior design!i would definitely recommend!

Name: UMI
Comment: Our waitress was great! She was very on top of refilling our drinks and checking on us regularly! Typically the servers at UMI take forever to refill your drinks.. so she was outstanding.

Name: UMI
Comment: Umi never disappoints. The food and service was amazing as always and the art installation to help social distance was a fun touch. Can’t wait to go back!

Name: UMI
Comment: Fantastic as always! Love their creativity with the art brought in for social distancing too! Best sushi in the city hands down- always consistent! And excellent service as well!

Name: UMI
Comment: Best sushi I have had in Atlanta (not cheap, though).

Name: UMI
Comment: Unparalleled service, sushi, & ambience.  There’s no spot that can compare in all of Atlanta.

Name: UMI
Comment: Michele is the best!!

Name: UMI
Comment: Second time at Umi and it was phenomenal. Umi staff did an exceptional job of creating an enjoyable environment with the current social distancing guidelines. All food and drinks were top notch. Thanks for the fantastic experience, highly recommend and will be returning.

Name: UMI
Comment: The food is always excellent and of the highest quality. But tonight was unusually special as management had thought of the unique idea of placing mannequins at the tables and bar seats that could not be used because of the Coronavirus. Very clever indeed and the evening that much more enjoyable!

Name: UMI
Comment: Incredible as always!

Name: UMI
Comment: The best place in Atlanta.

Name: UMI
Comment: Never fails to be the best dining experience in Atlanta, and of course the best sushi I’ve ever had.

Name: UMI
Comment: Birthday dinner

Name: UMI
Comment: Everything was amazing as always. The food was spectacular and the service was exceptional.  Really dig the art

Name: UMI
Comment: As usual..an excellent meal

Name: UMI
Comment: Every time I go to Umi I fall in love all over again! Michelle is the best service person EVER!!! We never use a menu, just tell Michelle to bring food...and it’s always amazing!

Name: UMI
Comment: Favorite place to eat in Atlanta.  Jon and Hector are the absolute best.  Amazing food and drinks but the staff is the reason we keep coming back

Name: UMI
Comment: Umi was great!!

Name: UMI
Comment: Incredible dinner. Umi never disappoints.

Name: UMI
Comment: Everything was wonderful and they were very accommodating to our situation.

Name: UMI
Comment: AMAZING. I wish I could come here everyday. Best sushi I have ever had. Great service and atmosphere. Will be back!

Name: UMI
Comment: Great food!

Name: UMI
Comment: From food to service everything was excellent.

Name: UMI
Comment: Excellent service and food. Thanks

Name: UMI
Comment: Love Umi...food, vibe, and service are excellent!

Name: UMI
