Comment: Michelle our waitress is always so welcoming and cheerful! She always knows exactly what we want! WE LOVE it at UMI!

Name: UMI
Comment: Food was so great - service was great as well. A bit loud but the food makes up for it. I’ll be coming back here for sure!

Name: UMI
Comment: Great, fresh and incredible sushi !!The customer service was amazing and UMI is a 100% recommendation for me👏

Name: UMI
Comment: Great place to go; a must do if you like sushi.  The lobster toban-Yaki was scrumptious as was the sashimi, fois Gras, and seared wagyu sushi.

Name: UMI
Comment: 5th Wedding Anniversary was one to remember. We both love Sushi and Umi more than delivered! A date we’ll always remember.

Name: UMI
Comment: Great client dinner

Name: UMI
Comment: I’ve had the opertunity to eat sushi all over the US . This place is the best . The food is unapologeticly expensive but amazing and worth it

Name: UMI
Comment: We had to wait almost 30 minutes to get the table

Name: UMI
Comment: By far the best sushi in Atlanta!! Worth every dollar. We frequent this place for our special occasions.

Name: UMI
Comment: The best sushi I’ve had in Atlanta. Impeccable service. The toro is next level!

Name: UMI
Comment: It was completely amazing!  The food was incredible and the service was over the top.  There is no other place we will go for amazing Sushi in Atlanta!  We will be back soon!  Thank you for another great evening!

Name: UMI
Comment: It was perfect! As usual. Best sushi!

Name: UMI
Comment: We had to wait about 20 minutes after we arrived for our reservation, but once we were sitting, everything was delightful. Recommend the chef’s selection nigiri, its a small portion but the best sushi I have ever had. Kind and attentive waitstaff

Name: UMI
Comment: Been here several times, one of the best in town.

Name: UMI
Comment: Food was off the charts!    The staff was super knowledgeable and helpful!   We will definitely be going back for special occasions!

Name: Upland
Comment: We totally enjoyed our dinner at Upland.  The entire evening was perfect.  The food was outstanding.  My husband never likes the menu when we go out and he loved everything we ordered.  We shared a salad, pizza, pasta and chicken.  Our waiter, Sam, was fabulous and the manger, Jennifer, came over and she was delightful.thank you for a wonderful evening.Susan & Alan Fishman

Name: Upland
Comment: Overrated! Burger ok, pasta came cold... very poor service!!!

Name: Upland
Comment: Great food, great atmosphere. Shame they ran out of the hen of the woods mushrooms!

Name: Upland
Comment: Eh--underwhelming.  Was super excited to dine here but the the menu was just OK.  Not a lot of interesting options.  We had also called ahead to make sure they had vegan offerings.  They enthusiastically said yes.  Their vegan option at brunch?  Potatoes.  Just potatoes.  Many better brunch options in the city.

Name: Upland
Comment: This is a wonderful restaurant!  The food is fantastic and the atmosphere very cozy and friendly.  The staff are responsive and efficient and helpful.  Their is a nice price range.  I had the salmon entree and my husband had the pork -- both were delicious!  Cocktails were perfect.  Upland, to me, seems to have something for everyone.

Name: Upland
Comment: Disappointing.....  barely any lamb in the lamb dish, a ridiculous amount of lettuce basically covered the plate.....  very little seafood in the ceviche.....

Name: Upland
Comment: Excellent food. We had a slight issue with the service - the salmon needed to be cooked through more, and the served acted like we were asking her to summit Mt. Everest - but it got fixed in the end. A good place for a business lunch (which is why we were there).

Name: Upland
Comment: We were there for Sunday Brunch to celebrate my daughters birthday. Upland had great ambiance and good service but all 4 meals (pasta, quiche, eggs) came out room temperature. Flavors were great but no excuse for food not coming to the table hot at this restaurant.

Name: Upland
Comment: The couple next to us was extremely annoying and ruined the experience basically. It would have been just okay otherwise. I probably would not return. It was nothing special.

Name: Upland
Comment: Everything was wonderful except the shrimp and rice dish. It seemed to consist mostly of shrimp shells (creepy) and not much shrimp meat at all.

Name: Upland
Comment: I visit New York around 4-6 times a year.  I am always looking for new places to eat and saw Uplands on a list of brunch spots to try.  This was my first visit to Uplands.  It was in a great location and the restaurant itself is spacious and beautiful - not typical for many restaurants in the city.  Food was very good - we went with the server's recommendations and were not disappointed.  My husband had the fried chicken sandwich and I had the Egg and Tortilla.  I asked for scrambled eggs instead of fried egg and it was no problem.  We had mimosas and Bloody Marys and then finished with the Donuts. We wouldn't normally do that but the donuts were recommended.  Enjoyed the experience from start to finish - we will definitely be back.

Name: Upland
Comment: Loved everything about it. Food service and decor were all absolutely perfect.

Name: Upland
Comment: I went early with a friend.  We ordered a few appetizers and some wine.  Nice sized portions and very fresh food.  Excellent service.  Will definitely come back

Name: Upland
Comment: I have been coming to Upland since it first opened and it has been a consistently good experience in terms of both food and service.  Unfortunately on my last visit our server was SO RUDE and put us on edge for the entire dinner because we were nervous of being barked at!  She tried to take our appetisers away when we were half way though and when we said we weren’t finished yet, she decided she would change our plates for some unknown reason...then a minute later our mains arrived so we ended up not actually being able to enjoy the rest of our appetisers!  It was quite embarrassing because I had a guest in from out of town and got them to cancel their reservation at L’Artusi to come to Upland instead!  I really hope it was a one off be side I really do enjoy Upland, but next time I will think twice before returning since New York is full of great restaurants with great service.

Name: Upland
Comment: Expensive. Noisy.  Pizza was burnt.  My friend asked for a slight modification in her meal (a vegetable instead of the rice) and the waiter didn't even try to accommodate.  Highly overrated.

Name: Upland
Comment: The service was truly terribly. Our server was very stuck up and almost acted like it was a burden to serve us. The food was also overly salty. My favourite thing was the caesar salad.

Name: Upland
Comment: Our server was grumpy and I was surprised because I have usually had really lovely service.   It kind of bummed me out.  I loved our meal despite him but it bothered me a lot, I have been in food service and I know when someone is over it, it shows.   Otherwise Jennifer made it right by coming over to check on us!

Name: Upland
Comment: We agreed that this is our favorite NYC restaurant, hands-down.  Impeccable food and service, both enjoyed in a beautiful and quiet room. We will keep returning.

Name: Upland
Comment: Wonderful brunch, great drinks and very professional staff.

Name: Upland
Comment: We went to Upland for a celebratory engagement dinner with both sets of parents.  This place is incredible.  Every dish is well thought out and you don't need to spend an arm & a leg for a truly great meal like other places in NYC.  Highly recommend the hen of the wood, tomato soup & caesar salad

Name: Upland
Comment: Such a fantastic meal with fantastic service!!

Name: Upland
Comment: Great vibe and great food. Loved that you could have a conversation

Name: Upland
Comment: This is usually a fave but was quite disappointing.  Our waitress tried to rush us and my main dish (salmon) had strange sides.

Name: Upland
Comment: Pizzas and salads are great.  I had the feta spinach omelet, but it did not have much feta or spinach in it.  The slice of bread given the side was truly hard as a rock, so could not break or bite.  Otherwise it is a great place.  Service, ambiance and staff are great.  Will skip the omlette next time.

Name: Upland
Comment: I love this restaurant. The atmosphere is clean and crisp and appeases anyone's taste/style. The wait staff was incredibly kind and my server was specifically awesome. I took two friends and I would highly suggest this as a restaurant to take someone who is in town for the weekend. We shared an order of donuts at the beginning and the jelly donut was the best I have ever had - huge shout-out to the pastry chef :) All three of our meals were pretty stellar - my one and only hesitation is that it can get quite costly but with that being said, the portions are quite large and we all three had food to-go for later. Thank you!!!

Name: Upland
Comment: Such a treat. The food is inventive and great. And a fun vibe.

Name: Upland
Comment: Food and service were great. Two outstanding pastas. Beautiful space with a great vibe. Great meal always consistent

Name: Upland
Comment: Would never go back because of noise level tho good excellent

Name: Upland
Comment: The food is unique and delicious... the cocktail drink menu was very good!

Name: Upland
Comment: There's a reason Upland is always one of my favorite restaurants in the city - they always deliver great food and experience

Name: Upland
Comment: We had a great evening here. Great food and service , and a really lively buzzy ambience. All you want from a restaurant !

Name: Upland
Comment: Great food! Great location! Energetic noise level!

Name: Upland
Comment: We went for a casual meal. The service was great. I spilt my espresso martini and they made me a new one straight away

Name: Upland
Comment: Great dining experience! Will visit again!

Name: Upland
Comment: Great food! Love the decor!

Name: Upland
Comment: Staff was great but the burger was terrible.

Name: Upland
Comment: This was my second time here and both times, I really enjoyed it. I came for my birthday brunch and we were a party of 4. The first table we were seated at wasn't great, but they let us have a booth and it was much better. The hostesses were very kind and accommodating. Service was good - I always had water in my glass. The atmosphere is so lovely and comfortable! The food was excellent. The sausage and kale pizza is phenomenal. Usually I don't like thicker pizzas but this one managed to be thick without being too heavy or soggy. The crust was crispy and the flavor was out of this world. We also enjoyed the burger very much. The fried chicken sandwich was a bit on the small side but very tasty. Overall, great experience and would go back.

Name: Upland
Comment: Enjoyed brunch at Upland this last weekend! Food and service was fantastic!

Name: Upland
Comment: Always the best!

Name: Upland
Comment: We had a great dinner --our usual favorites: the 'nduja pizza, the skirt steak, the little gem salad ... all fantastic.  Also an amazing wine list. Fabulous.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: What a gem of a restaurant!  Truly a fabulous meal.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: I love this place, if it weren't so difficult to get a reservation, I'd go more often.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Food is amazing - difficult to get a reservation or seat at the bar.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: One of the few restaurants that actually gets better with age.  Each service person, from the water boy to the manager, glides around attentively to serve patrons.  The wine list is small but select.  pours are very large.  I loved my duck breast, which is always served medium rare (perfect).  Staff is very attentive, with one staff dedicated to just polishing wine glasses.  All details combine to make this a 5 star restaurant.  Others agree, which is why at 5:15 pm on Thursday it was jammed with couples.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Great local spot, excellent cocktails, vibrant energy and location.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: This was my second visit here and everything was great! I am adding to my list of favorite Philly restaurants. My favorite thing I ordered was the crispy artichokes.  Delicious!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: 25th anniversary I the food was delicious

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Vernick never disappoints!  Everything from the appetizers, to entrees, to wine was outstanding.  One my favorite restaurants in Philadelphia!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: As always, dining at Vernick is a wonderful experience. Very good food, drinks and pleasant ambiance. Looking forward to returning for another dinner

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Loved sitting at the Chefs counter. Awesome experience!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Everything was delicious! The foie gras was probably our favorite of all the small plates we got. The menu was excellent it was hard to make choices because we wanted everything! The cocktails were really good too; strong and refreshing. Can’t wait to go back!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Vernick was incredible. Service was outstanding! We had a variety of dishes and were not disappointed by any of them, and some were down right amazing. Definitely worth the wait for a reservation.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Outstanding original menu creations each with their own x-factor. The white truffle tagliatelle special is indeed very special.  Well thought out wine selections by glass or bottle compliment the plates.  Servus is first rate - attentive, comprehensive, but not overbearing.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Everything was incredible food and service Can’t wait to go back

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: fantastic service, food, and drinks.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Was just okay. Don’t get all the hype.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Amazing experience. Well worth the wait!  Outstanding execution. Terrific service.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: One of the best Restaurants in Philadelphia and absolutely wonderful fare.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Britten was exceptional again.. everything was spectacular top to bottom

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: We just locked the food. If you have mobility issues ask to sit downstairs

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: The pumpkin toast, roasted cabbage, and curry shrimp were spectacular. The ravioli was good but it was weird that it was just one giant one, also for the price it wasn’t much. The mushroom toast was good but I think it would have been more enjoyable if it was warm and not served cold. My friend enjoyed the oysters. The service was great! I went to dinner with a friend I haven’t seen in a year and is in town for Thanksgiving and it was nice that they recommended that we take our time ordering and that there would be 15-20 min between each plate, so we could really enjoy our chatting over the sparkling wine (which I never heard about until dinner tonight!). Definitely will return to Vernick with my husband as I think he’d enjoy it.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Outstanding restaurant from the moment we walked in until we left. The staff was exceptional, our server was on point, and the food was even better than I could have hoped for: inventive, exciting, and most importantly, delicious! Well done!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: This is the best restaurant in Philly. The most creative and fresh ideas i've seen. I'm a vegetarian, and there are many options!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Anniversary

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Service was amazing. Food was delicious although I felt a few of the dishes were on the salty side (the mushroom soup amuse bouche, sea urchin with scrambled eggs, gratin that came with the sea bass)

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Dinner was excellent, as always!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Loved everything!!! Omg the best!!Can’t wait to go back.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: One of our favorite restaurants anywhere! We dine here whenever we come to Philadelphia (we live in NYC) and have even talked about hopping on the train just to dine here!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: The food was very good admittedly a bit pricey for what it was. I did find the food was extremely rich.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Gorgeous menu, beautiful presentation, great wait staff, noisy but worth it!  We’ll go again!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Fantastic service and incredible food. I can’t wait to go back!

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Unbelievable experience, food was exceptional and service was too. I've been trying to get in here on previous trips to Philly and it did not disappoint. One of the better meal experiences ive had in awhile

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: This is an AMAZING restaurant.  If you consider yourself a foodie then you MUST go here.  Everything we ordered and everything that was complementary was absolutely delicious and wonderful.  I wanted to keep eating and ordering dish after dish.  I went to philly for a few days and was doing research to find the best place to dine and Vernick is the place!  I live in NJ and eat in NYC all the time and I would definitely go back to Philly just to eat at Vernick (I revisited yesterday and it was delicious). I ate at the chef counter a second time and would recommend eating there just to see the chefs work like a well oiled machine with everyone moving with precision and dedicated passion.I went a second time and this place is AMAZING.  The chefs are rock stars and had another amazing enjoyable dinner.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Awesome all around experience! My wife and I are huge foodies and haven’t been so satisfied since dining at California Grill, Victoria and Alberts, and Flying Fish. Everything was spot on and perfect. Thank you for a wonderful experience.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: First time visit - enjoyed ourselves very much. Highly recommend.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Excellent service and wonderful tastes! Entrees lacked the luster that I had hoped to continue after our toasts and small plates.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: One would be hard pressed to find a more delicious meal, it was superb! There is always room for improvement so if I could improve anything... well... the service could be a tad warmer.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Been here many times amd have never been disappointed.   Looking forward to our next visit.

Name: Vernick Food & Drink
Comment: Everything was fantastic. The service,the food and the atmosphere.A true  5 star experience

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Everything about Vetri was wonderful. From the service to the granola goody bag—we couldn’t have celebrated a 21st birthday any better.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: I was there to celebrate my son and his wife having gotten him through graduation with a Doctorate in Physical Therapy from Arcadia University.  We were all very much impressed with Vetri Cucina.  The food was outstanding (and ample), the service was impeccable, and it was an altogether outstanding experience.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: An amazing evening from start to finish. The staff were so warm and welcoming. The meal was a modified prefix menu. By modified,  I mean that specific foods of interest were included while foods noted to be of lesser interest were not included. The beginning was with a creatively tasty aperitivo, served with fois gras pastrami on a slice of brioche, high temperature baked and charred cauliflower, smoked duck breast and crudities with a balsamic mayonnaise. Then the serious food started.... hamachi crudo with a creative use of citrus to give it sparkle, onion crepe, with perfectly caramelized onion that took 2 days to make. We tried six different pastas, all delicious; however, for me the ricotta ravioli were incredible.... light as a feather, creamy, and, again, set off with a creative use of citrus In keeping with the season. The real showstopper were three perfectly cooked and sauced Nantucket scallops, topped with a generous serving of ostera caviar and tiny house-made potato chips. So good I felt we should eat this dish on our knees. Entrees hadn't even been started at this point. Spit-roasted goat... tender, juicy with crunchy skin and a salt-baked bronzino were secondi. Desserts were equally amazing. We ended up eating on and taking the others home for the next day. Bravo to Vetri Cucina!!!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Seriously delicious eclectic cuisine... we shared many unique courses and wine pairings that we loved! If you love food and unique experiences this is the place

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: I had high expectations for my birthday dinner. I was so not disappointed. From the moment we arrived we were greeted and felt welcome. The food, oh it was sooo very good. I got to try things like froe gras and white truffles. I have eaten at many fine restaurants, but this has to be number one. Yes it is very expensive, the most expensive of any restaurant I have ever visited... but oh so very worth the experience.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Vetri never disappoints!  And their Friday lunch is a treat and a bargain!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Once again, a memorable dining experience.Some of the best dishes I have ever had.Grazie

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: From start, and I mean very start with a personal phone call right after I booked thanking me for my reservation, and throughout the evening, every aspect of the dinner was superb, without any air of snootiness one comes to experiences 5 star restaurants. Very special, yet comfortable and accommodating.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Great service and excellent job with wine pairings. Food was not great. Sauces were all very similar (brown butter based). Also, concept of wait staff picking our menu choices sounds fun in concept, but my wife and I agreed that our experience would have been better had we got to pick our own food. Glad we had the experience, but wouldn’t hurry back anytime soon

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Always great! We love bill!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: I'm not sure which was better: the food or the service.  The entirety of the meal was the best I can remember.  Being greater with a drink and snacks.  Amazing service and presentation.  And the quality and execution of the meals was second to none.  Hope to be back soon.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Best lunch experience - always.  Worth taking a Friday off.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: From start to finish our evening at Vetri was exceptional. Of course the food was delicious and beautifully plated but our wait staff made the experience that much nicer. They were attentive without being intrusive and we were impressed by the knowledge of our dietary restrictions. All agreed that this was our best meal in Philadelphia.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: The best dining experience in the city.  Unique flavors, perfect service.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: When people hear about the cost of my meal, they cringe and obviously do not understand "value". When a product or experience is extraordinary, then there is no concern about cost and that makes a great value. This was a dining experience without compare. The food was fantastic from start to finish, and the wine was a perfect compliment. The service was fabulous and the servers absolutely helped to make the experience special. It was my 25th wedding anniversary and my wife and I shared it with my 3 daughters.  I hit a grand slam with my choice of Vetri Cucina! Thank you all for making it a very memorable, lovely and satisfying evening!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Best food in the city, state and maybe northeast!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: This restaurant was a great experience for foodies looking for a fancy night out. It is a great way to try new things and the homemade pasta was perfect!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Excellent experience. Outstanding, detailed, creative, delicious food with an Italian focus.  It also is a home-y unpretentious setting which is perfect. The desserts were the best we've ever tasted. Would consider again for a very special occasion.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Delicious meal, service so over the top that it was a bit much or uncomfortable at times, felt a little robotic/insincere, but it is a very formal place. Great experience, something to try once and the food was phenomenal. Price tag a bit extreme. For dinner for two and bottle of wine on the less expensive side of their offerings, bill was $440 not including tip. When comparing to the nicer, expensive places like some of the Steven starr and steakhouses in the city, it’s more expensive.. but again, an experience! And despite the tasting sizes, they sprinkle in lots of extras and you leave stuffed!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: The most fantastic food in Philly, but if you do the tasting menu, be prepared to consume a LOT of food! So unexpected, we are big eaters and have never been beaten by a meal! We surrendered before the last savory course, and before cheeses and dessert....these were not large portions, but there were many courses. I suggest getting up and having a brief walk outside at the 5th or 6th course! If you can afford an expensive meal, this is worth it.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: once again, this is my favorite restaurant in the world! the food is so good you can't believe it. everything about this place is top notch. of course you pay for it but why not live a little. I highly recommend this for any occation.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Food was amazing. Waiter let us try wine by the glass before selecting. Plus his service and attention were top notch. Each course both of us got a different selection chosen by the chef which let us try a majority if the dishes. Cannot wait to go back.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Superb in every way!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: How was my meal?  What more can I say then the BEST Italian restaurant in the entire Phila area. Including ACNJ.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: My friend and I enjoyed our lunch.The food was great, service attentive.- - but still rather pricey.The place could use a good cleaning.  But , overall, a lovely meal with happy (holiday) vibe.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Vetri Cucina delivers perfection in dining. Atmosphere, food and service just perfect. The decor is casual elegance. The service is highly professional never affected. The staff are attentive without being over bearing. The sense is they want you to have a wonderful dining experience. The food is inventive but never pretentious. Flavor reigns via superb ingredients in well conceived dishes. This is truly a world class restaurant.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: My wife and I dined here as part of an anniversary celebration. The restaurant is warm and quiet-a great place to have conversation and enjoy the meal. We were served a lovely cocktail-an Italian spritz-while the staff asked us about likes, dislikes, allergies, etc. We were given the option of choosing from their tasting menu or to be surprised. We opted for the surprise-but did not do the optional wine pairing (too much alcohol for a couple of light-weights!). My wife has very distinct food dislikes and I am very adventurous and chef was marvelous at meeting both our preferences! The portions were small and manageable, the food was gorgeous and delicious. The service was gracious, friendly and attentive but not cloying. Definitely worth going for a special occasion!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Great special occasion but will tip a hole in the wallet!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Amazing! I've never been so full but I just couldn't stop eating. Expensive, but well worth it.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Love Love Love! Best Birthday Dinner ever. Thank for the amazing food, wine, and above all care to everything!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Bill, our waiter, was fantastic!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: One of the best meals I’ve had! If you’re in Philly, definitely eat here.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Superb attention to detail by The Culinary staff and front-of-the-house staff was marvelously accommodating.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: One of the best dining experiences you'll have.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Always an outstanding culinary and service experience with a mix of old favorites, new dishes and wonderful wine pairings!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: I have eaten recently recently at L'ambroisie, Le clarence, garance, Tour d'Argent, Restaurant du Palais Royal, Le Gabriel, Gabriel Kreuther. vetri is an old favorite of mine. I have eaten here 10 times. The food was mixed. Within the tasting menu format, 3 or 4 dishes were brilliant. A few very ordinary.The service was also very mixed. Our main server was really good, but the others were poor. Compared to lunch at "Restaurant du Palais Royal", vetri was inferior, and poor value.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: An incredible meal! The food and wine pairing was SO good! The service was phenomenal as well. And it was really cool that Mark Vetri took the time to make the rounds and spend a couple minutes talking to us. Fantastic overall meal, a must if you are in the area! Cheers!!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Very good, not great.  This is due to the temperature of the pastas and the main courses.  Without exception, every dish came to the table lukewarm, like they were sitting around in the kitchen and not made to order.  For the price, I would have expected better.

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: My favorite part of this whole experience was constructing the tasting menu. Our server, Tara, came to our table and announced we were to have a discussion regarding what we enjoy eating and what we do not. Was there anything we felt we absolutely needed to try? Any ingredients of which we are particularly fond? I wish every restaurant with an unset tasting menu did this, it's brilliant. Ultimately, we did not choose any particular courses, so it was a surprise, but a surprise built around our tastes. There were six main courses, 3 bread courses, an amuse-bouche, and a couple mignardises. Every other main course had an additional entree we shared. Our tasting menus were completely different from one another, so we were able to try each other's entrees as well. Overall, we tried a little over 20 dishes. All of them were exquisite and definitely on the richer side. I was pretty full about two-thirds of the way through.What made the experience amazing, food aside, was our brilliant server. Tara is an absolute food genius, emotionally intelligent, and easy to understand. Her knowledge is vast and gave an immediate answers to every question without missing a single beat. Playful and understanding, she intuitively knew when to give us space as well as when to swoop in with another brilliant display. Truly a magical night and reunion with my father, made special by Tara. P.S. I'm sorry for tripping you, I still feel guilty!

Name: Vetri Cucina
Comment: Excellent culinary experience. Superb staff and support.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: My favorite boston restaurant.  Great atmosphere, food, service, and value.  Highly recommend.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Yvonne’s is my new favorite Boston restaurant. The space is unique and comfortable but with a wow factor. The small plates menu is very well balanced with meat, cheese, vegan options. Our party of four ordered 10 plates and each was uniquely seasoned, spectacular in taste and presentation. “Holly” our waitress was a fount of knowledge about the menu but also Locke Ober, the men’s club previously in the space for a very long time. We all enjoyed learning about the interiors and renovations. Don’t change a thing!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Jessica needs to time down her attitude. Awful customer service.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: We have been wanting to go to Yvonne’s for a while and it just never seems to happen.   I have to say it was worth the wait. The menu has lots of short plates and we had many.  Every single item we had was delicious.  Don’t miss the fritters!   Just an incredible experience.  Our server wasn’t the best but she has lots of other staff helping and they were all great.  For the “feast” we had the brisket which was totally worth the wait.   Can’t wait to go back and try the few dishes we didn’t eat.  Can’t say enough great things about this place

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Special place, amazing ambience, incredible bar, delicious food

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: There is no better place to have a special holiday dinner.... this has become a tradition for four of us ... the food is spectacular  in taste and presentation and everyone from entering the restaurant to wait staff is super nice.... unpretentious and great people... thank you !

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: One bartender let my wife sit there for 7-8 mins without asking her if she wanted anything... Paige the other bartender was good and we’re glad she was there. Our service at the table was very good, would just avoid that one bartender (sorry, didn’t get a name)

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: We're big fans of Yvonne's, and while we don't go as often as we'd like, when we go our experience is excellent.We went because it was our anniversary, and our server helped make it even more special.  He recommended drinks and other menu items, took pictures for us, let my wife try a drink to be sure it was what she expected.  Great service!Our reservation was early, so it wasn't super busy, and relatively quiet.  Seemed like a good time to go if you wanted a reasonable noice level.  Dinner on a Thursday - Saturday can be quite noisy.For new visitors, think of it as mostly small plates for sharing.  Well seasoned, good quality.  We loved the lamb, the beef tartar, and potato snacks (the menu name escapes me).  The desserts didn't measure up to the rest of the menu, and were just ok.We spent about $100pp and felt like it was good value for a special occasion.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: I came here with my boyfriend for our anniversary dinner. Yvonne’s really went above and beyond! I had indicated that it was our anniversary on opentable and take gave us some complimentary champagne to start off the night. The food and drinks were amazing and the service was great as well!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Very romantic. The food was superb and the service was excellent. Prices were good as well.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: I have only been to Yvonne's once and I tried to return just a week later but they were already booked! The food has a lot of flavors and came out as it was ready -- I highly recommend the hummus and shrimp!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Really cool vibe and great food.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Definitely recommended for cocktails, but could get better food for the same price elsewhere.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: We were really enjoying our evening at the bar, the drinks were great and the ambiance was perfect. But once we were brought to our dinner table the night changed. Our host escorted us past several open tables in the main dining area through a clandestine passageway into a completely different part of the Yvonne's that I was not expecting. Although intrigued at first by the completely different decor, the dark space and thumping techno music just wasn't for me. It was too loud and too club-like for what we had in mind. Given how different the two sections are, I wish the host, the website or someone gave us a choice of seating space in advance. The food was great. Not rushing to go back.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: We have been making Yvonne's a tradition to begin our evening's prior to the opening night at the Boston Ballet and have to say that the menu changes are wonderful - always great to change things up! The food is, as always, creative and delicious! The cocktails are fabulous and the wine list is excellent! We love Yvonne's and look forward to our next evening there!!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Such a great place, dishes were delicious and well thought out. Hit all the right taste buds and drinks were top notch!Recommend the steak tartare toast, lamb ribs, tater tot squares.Josephine baker was a delicious drink to end the meal!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Awesome spot for a Friday night! Our server was the best, had great recommendations for both food and drinks. Will definitely be going back soon!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: The food was way over priced and very over spiced.  Too hot and too salty!!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Very accommodating of our vegan diner; great food, service. Will definitely return

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: The food and atmosphere was great.  The service was just ok, not slow, just felt like we were putting them out with our order....

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Food and Ambiance good.  Service amongst the worst I have ever experienced

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: I love the food and ambiance at Yvonne's, which is why I keep coming back!  I know they get busy on weekends, but I wish the waiters wouldn't rush the food out quite so fast.  It can feel like quick table turnover is being prioritized over dining experience.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Very cool ambience.  Fabulous cocktails and wine.  Outstanding service.  Will definitely be back next time I visit Boston!  Highly recommend!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Yvonne’s is such a great. AMAZING ambience, tasty food and delicious drinks. Perfect for a special night out!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Consistently good meal.  Usually quite bustling but nice and quiet on this Sunday night.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Amazing meal at Yvonnes! We had our first date here over a year ago and on this visit they somehow  managed to seat us at the same table. Yvonnes remains one of our favorite restaurants in Boston. Incredible food and ambiance.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: BAMM!  Another great meal and dining experience... the staff is A-plus as is the food.  Viper CHOP..yummy.  Tater tots... so good and a reminder of childhood.  Just a great time all around ... if I had to change one thing it would be the new martini glasses (get back to traditional)...

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Matt was a great server,  enjoyed the experience, and sharing the small plates

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: We loved it.  The decor and overall ambiance were perfect.  We had an early dinner before a concert at the Orpheum Theater but it didn't feel early.  We sat at a good sized table in the library among the books and cool artwork.  The lighting is dim and comfortable and plenty of room at the table.  Atmosphere was loud but not too loud--I felt like we could talk without being overheard and vice versa.  They offer some really fun drinks.  I ordered one that was spiced up for the holidays.  Delicious, a little pricey, but justified for a night out in Boston.  We ordered several small plates and snacks.  Everything was delicious.  Easy walk to the concert afterward.  Highly recommend!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: The room is elaborately decorated and evokes a speakeasy vibe. Service was attentive and friendly. That's it. The food was assertively mediocre. Not going back for food, but perhaps for drinks.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Wonderful meal. Inventive. Bustling atmosphere!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: AMAZING SPOT!!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Food was fantastic at Yvonne’s but the ambiance was sub-par.  Very noisy Restuarant, more like a club than a place for a romantic dinner.  Food was outstanding.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Great food, and  service.... INSANE noise level for a Wednesday at 6:30pm.    Great for friends dinner, but not for a business or casual-catch-up-over- dinner.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: We loved Yvonne’s 😊👍🏻

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: The ambiance was excellent and the food wonderful! Loved the tuna. The only complaint I have is the slow service that night. No menus, no water and no attention until we had to (friendly) ask for attention three times until one of the waitresses actually attended to our table.

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: We went here for my birthday on a busy Saturday night and Michael our waiter was outstanding! He was friendly, super helpful, and attentive. If we could request him again next time we would! As always, the food, drinks, and atmosphere were perfect!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: The food was amazing and the staff was very professional. Defiantly good for a special occasion or a date. Defiantly going to be recommending this place to my friends!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: Everything was wonderful. Specialty cocktail presentation was awesome!

Name: Yvonne's
Comment: First time at Yvonne’s for a date. Great experience overall, we grabbed drinks at the bar and were seated per reservation once the time came. The service was good and the drinks and food were outstanding. Will come back!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Amazing food. the lamb was cooked to perfection

Name: Zahav
Comment: We absolutely love coming to Zahav! Our only complaint is the wait time for a reservation but it is for good reason, this is THE place to eat in Philly! My husband and I have been several times and most recently took our parents to enjoy the experience. If you are looking for true Israeli cuisine, this is the place for you! The food is beyond delicious, authentic and the overall vibe of the restaurant is fun and fresh. You won't be disappointed!

Name: Zahav
Comment: One of the best meals you’ll have (possibly ever) hands down. It’s worth it for the food alone but the service is impeccable.

Name: Zahav
Comment: I'm not sure if we were there on an off service night but from when we arrived to when we left our experience was less than stellar.  You arrive & its quite chaotic, table wasn't ready upon arrival for our reservation for us & many others waiting in front of us.  Our server was the highlight of the night, she was great throughout our experience.  One of the items we came for was the famous Slow Cooked Lamb Shoulder.  When asked about it for the tasting menu, we were told they were out already, for a 7:30 reservation which is ridiculous when you can get bar seating without reservations earlier & can order it.  Our experience continued downhill from there.  Drinks took forever to come out & our food was coming out under cooked, over cooked & cold as we watched the table next to us who sat down 15 minutes after us & took forever to place their order get their food before us having also ordered the tasting menu.  Our steak looked well done while theirs came out right after ours looking as if it was just pulled off the grill.  They left & paid before us.  The "pusher" responsible for reviewing & releasing the food wasn't doing a great job.  We watched tables around us get food at completely random times with long waits, short wait & no cadence.  The food was rather forgetabble. We have an Israeli restuarant in Chicago that across the board all their dishes were better especially for the price.  The hot hummus was the best part of the meal.  Reservations are so hard to get & the fact you don't get asked during your reservation if you are interested in their signature dish would make one assume you can't request ahead of time but first come first serve.  There is no information regarding any of this on their website.  If you are going for that dish, get a bar seat or make 5pm reservations.  We are fortunate to travel all over the world & try all types of local food but for us a place with so much hype we would not recommend to our friends based on our overall experience.

Name: Zahav
Comment: There is not enough text space in this dialog box to fully explain the horrendous experience. The service is the main root of the problem. This was one of the worst experiences I have ever had in my adult life whilst eating at out at a restaurant.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Great food, but slow service. Your food will come before your drinks. There is an overall attitude problem here. The waitstaff should take it down a peg or two. The food is the star here, not you. No excuses.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Our favorite restaurant in the city for the past 7 years! Unique, delicious food and top notch staff.

Name: Zahav
Comment: A little off this time. We were served burnt bread and the waiter did not return back to check on our first course.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Really good and interesting food . The tasting menu is almost too much food and we were given an extra vegetable serving, an extra small plate and an extra dessert. The wine pairing was also very good. The next time we go, we will order the hummus and several small plates.

Name: Zahav
Comment: We had a wonderful dinner celebrating our wedding anniversary. The staff wished us congratulations and we had specially printed menus just for us.  The food is terrific. Their hummus is the best anywhere The lamb with the pomegranate molasses glaze was heavenly. My only complaint is that the music was a little loud at times. What a memorable dinner.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Excellent food and service.  My son is gluten free and they had the menu already adjusted for his dietary needs upon arrival.  Wait staff very attentive .  Interesting, highly flavorful food!  Tasting menu allows you to try many different things!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Exceptional? Nah, this was an otherworldly meal. I’ve been talking about it since I first tasted the hummus. Without exaggerating this was one of the best meals I’ve ever had.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Awesome restaurant!!!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Easily one of the top 3 best meals I’ve ever had. They made my birthday so special with a specialized menu and complimentary rosé.

Name: Zahav
Comment: We chose chef's selection and it was fantastic. We loved the element of surprise and each choice was perfectly selected for us. Definitely recommend this option especially if you are open for a food adventure.

Name: Zahav
Comment: The meal and service are impeccable. Found a really nice (and reasonable) Lebanese red wine to go with the tasting menu (which is really the only way to go). Table location was ideal (not in the more crowded set of tables). Just a tad warm--although it was a super hot day. Already have the next reservation for next month. Combo of quality, inventiveness, price and service can't really be beat.

Name: Zahav
Comment: I've dined at Zahav numerous times. We made a reservation this past time for my birthday. I have a few food allergies and they curated a menu specifically for me based on this knowledge. It was very thoughtful and really put a smile on my face. Two of the dishes out of many ordered were over-salted to our taste buds and this was never an issue in the past. Overall, I love Zahav and would definitely recommend!

Name: Zahav
Comment: This our second time at Zahav.  The food is simple but outstanding.  Great interpretations of Israeli classics.  At $48 per person, the tasting menu is a great value.  More than enough food, plenty of choices, and dessert is included.  The wait staff is friendly and helpful.  They know the food and how to explain it.  I highly recommend Zahav.

Name: Zahav
Comment: The restaurant was amazing! The food was incredible! We enjoyed celebrating our anniversary there as they made it really special!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Amazing experience. The food was out of this world!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Birthday with wifeFirst timeVery good experience Best hummus everExcellent service

Name: Zahav
Comment: Our party of four ordered the tasting menu. The meal was excellent. We loved the great variety of dishes and interesting flavors. The servers were extremely friendly and attentive. The space is attractive, too. Also, I appreciated the personalized birthday message on the menu for my daughter and the birthday greetings from the waitstaff. There was only one problem which detracted significantly from our experience: the noise level. The music was so loud (and not particularly interesting or cool) that we couldn’t hear ourselves talk. We couldn’t even hear the servers trying to carefully explain the contents of each dish, which was a real bummer. I asked a few times for them to repeat what they said, but then I just gave up. We were very interested in knowing about each dish and chatting about that at dinner. That is kind of the point of a tasting menu. Having a crazy loud space doesn’t make it more happening, in my opinion.

Name: Zahav
Comment: LOVED EVERYTHING!!!

Name: Zahav
Comment: We loved the tasting menu! We could not believe how many different dishes we were able to sample. And they were all delicious!  The only draw back is how hard it is to get a reservation.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Excellent food, beverages, and service, as ever! Thank you!

Name: Zahav
Comment: The Hummus is to DIE for. Would come back just for that. Everything else was also very good. The service was amazing. Very attentive. I can see why Zahav was names best restaurant in the country! Definitely a must try

Name: Zahav
Comment: A little disappointed.  Food was very salty.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Thank You!

Name: Zahav
Comment: The food was amazing and the service was top notch.  The price wasn't bad at all. For $48 per person you can try nearly everything on the menu with 2 people.

Name: Zahav
Comment: The hanger steak was a great second option since they were out of the lamb shoulder (sad face) Everything was so delicious and the wait staff was friendly and efficient!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Superb! Always a treat to eat there; incredible food and top notch service. Best of all, as busy as they are, you're not rushed through a meal in order to turn a table; in other words, leisurely dining!

Name: Zahav
Comment: We went here with my parents because they wanted to try Zahav. My husband and parents beat me there (since I had to work). I was happy that they were able to be seated prior to my arrival. The staff was super friendly and knowledgeable. The food was amazing and they had a good amount of vegetarian options. The drinks were super tasty as well! They offer small plates and they are pretty filling. The hummus is a must get. My dad hates hummus and he even said that this was the only hummus he’s ever had that actually tasted good. If we weren’t so stuffed, I definitely would’ve tried the dessert, but maybe next time!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Been here like 10 times. Always amazing!!!

Name: Zahav
Comment: How could you describe this restaurant as anything but amazing. From the Turkish hummus (a must order!!) to the desserts, we had some of the best food I’ve ever eaten. The only miss was the Lamb tartar which was significantly over salted. Put this restaurant on your list to try, and you will not regret it!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Superb food, exceptional service!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Always a great experience! Excellent food and excellent service!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Everything was fantastic, highly recommended

Name: Zahav
Comment: Everyone must try this restaurant! It is just simply one of the best dining experiences out there. The only tiny downside is just how busy and loud it is but this is understandable! Everyone wants to be there for good reason!

Name: Zahav
Comment: Amazing flavors! Take the tasting menu with the wine pairing.

Name: Zahav
Comment: Worth the hype. Great food and atmosphere. Service was impeccable

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Though we thought expensive, the execution of food and service was superb creating value appropriate for the price.  Server food knowledge and descriptions excellent.  Wine paring thoughtful, delicious.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We loved the food at Zero and the outdoor setting was lovely. I would have given 5 stars except for the fact that it was all a little precious. And why is the 4-course $65 menu not presented?  We knew about it from going online but then no sight of it. Then we’re told it’s a pre-theater menu. Pre-theater in Charleston???  Just how many theaters are there in Charleston? (We’re from NY.). That said, the food we had was delicious.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We were able to do their Saturday evening tasting menu.  It was amazing.  The chef was a wizard with the flavors and the pairings were excellent.  This is a must-do for foodies visiting Charleston.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: This is a very special restaurant, unlike any we've experienced in Charleston. They have a multi-course tasting menu - only - so there's not a menu with a plethora of choices. But everything we were served was phenomenal; dreamed up and prepared by a true culinary genius. The service was some of the best we've experienced anywhere.  Every service person was 100% professional and accommodating, while also being engaging and warm. There is no other place like this in Charleston. With high-end food and service, physical comfort and delightful ambiance, it has quickly moved into the #1 slot of our "Favorite restaurants in Charleston" list! The only caveat I might mention is that each course is tiny. We left very satisfied but were hungry about three hours later. Even so, we can't wait to go back!

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Our last night in Charleston was an incredible dinner at Zero George.... from the drinks... to the service...to the setting... To the AMAZING Dinner... Highly recommend.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We had an excellent experience at Zero Restaurant.  The food was immaculate, but it was the service that really stood out to me.  Everyone from the hostess to the bartender to the waiters was friendly, knowledgeable, accommodating, and pleasant.  It is not easy to find a restaurant where the caliber of food and service match.  I look forward to returning to Zero and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to a friend.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: This is an outstanding restaurant. The food, service and charming atmosphere add up to a wonderful evening. We make a point to dine there whenever we are  in Charleston. I am not an "adventurous" eater, but I eat everything from the chef's menu and it never fails to wow me.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Wonderful experience all the way around!! Very Romantic setting and a culinary adventure

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Excellent food excellent service very pricey Their website doesn’t disclose they are an exclusive price fixe menu that part is disappointingAll staff are very knowledgeable about the food and wine Cozy

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: The food was exceptional as always and I have ranted and ravedAfter each experience here.  However, it was a bit unnerving to have a very loud and inconsiderate table of 4 (clearly not locals...as determined by their accent and lack of dining room etiquette) in the middle of the very intimate and not-sound-proofed dining area.I know we are all there for the ambiance and the food, and despite anyones “occasion”...if we are having a meal and  spending upwards of 400$ for a dinner for 2, I would expect that a manager would politely request a loud and noisy group to tone it down. I enjoy a good time and can get loud but this is not the place.Regards and see you soon

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: It was very very good. Lovely. Would love to stay there sometime too. We were a little surprised by the price at the end, but overall a very memorable experience.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Did not appreciate the car salesmen up sell on the wine option.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We were there on. Monday night and the restaurant was not crowded.  I felt like the service was rushed because the staff wanted to get us out of there due to it being a Monday night.  The food was incredible and the obeisance was great.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We quite enjoyed the event,a little more than what we normally spend.But were pleased,service was excellent.Food well presented,tasty and healthy

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Amazing food and great experience overall.  It’s pretty pricey though so save it for a special occasion.  Worth every penny!!

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Amazing... spectular ..food ..service ..wine our 4th time at Zero George in  the last 3 years.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: I believe this is the  greatest dining experience in Charleston. Classy, delicious, and elegantly prepared dishes. Both elevated and standard wines paired perfectly. Wish they were in Cali too.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We came to Zero Restaurant to celebrate my birthday dinner his last weekend and loved every aspect of our meal, service and overall experience. We have visited several times before and absolutely love this restaurant and staff so much. I highly recommend visisting and dining here, if you appreciate innovative and exciting food this will quickly become your favorite restaurant. It is decadent and sophisticated...yet still approachable.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Went here with some friends and it was phenomenal!  Drinks were awesome and the food was extraordinary!  The design and decor is inviting and when you walk in - you know you’re in a special place. This is a very eclectic and wonderful place to eat. If you’re looking for something special that’s intimate - this is it!  It’ll set you back a few bucks but you won’t be dissapointed!

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: The ambiance is great and the staff was very friendly and competent.  The food was very interesting but I was disappointed that the only option presented was a tasting menu.  We didn’t have adequate time before the show to fully experience multiple courses. They were gracious and allowed us to come back for coffee after our performance.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: The food was so delicious and fresh; I'm vegetarian, and they accommodated me beautifully.  A very special and unique restaurant.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We were shown only the five course meal and we had to ask for the 3 course.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: The small dining room is an intimate, tasteful setting.  The food is extraordinarily creative - delicious, but also fun to explore new flavor combinations.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Of Nordic heritage and a lover of the Nordic style of fine dining, I thoroughly enjoyed Zero. The tasting menu in itself and the relaxed pace with which the meal took place was something I was looking for. The food is very good; too much happening at times for a Nordic taste, but still above the default. Really fine wine pairing. The one thing to note is the out-of-step timing btw the food and the wine on several occasions.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Last vacation day in Charleston

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: The food and wine pairing was outstanding! The proportions were perfect since they were so many courses. Prior to dinner we had a drink at the bar. The cosmopolitan was perfect and pink! I loved the culinary experience!

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: The food was different than usual cuisine, however it was the best food I have ever eaten. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants to eat the best food the south has to offer.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Zero Restaurant + Bar is such a unique dining experience that it’s difficult to even describe. Just buckle and prepare for a crazy ride. From the initial snacks that include a potted plant, to a red cabbage and chicken liver dish that will make you always want to eat your veggies, to the most unique interpretation you’ve ever seen on “shrimp and grits”, to the perfectly cooked Beef Wellington with foie gras, this tasting menu is one to not miss. The ambiance is romantic and relaxed at the same time. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. The chef is quick to make any needed adjustments to make the experience more enjoyable for his guests. Do not miss this hidden gem on your next trip to Charleston.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: I think I could just as easily communicate how I feel by posting the “drool” emoji. Amazing food. Amazing service. We’ll be back. You should go.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Truly memorable meal. Long but delicious. All dishes were great, wine pairings terrific too.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: We’ve gone to Zero George several times and it is always a special experience.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Alvin Ailey at gaillard

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Exquisite service and food, PERIOD. Wine parings for the different entrees were perfect. Portions perfect. Food amazing. What a wonderful dinning experience. For me, the price was worth it food the food and service. Top Notch!

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Visiting Charleston

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: One of the most amazing meals I have ever had. Dinner will set you back but the whole experience was top notch start to finish. Staff was friendly and accommodating, service was amazing and knowledgeable about their food and drinks. Food was incredible and innovative. The way fine dining should be.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: The food presentation was nice but some servings were missing the flavor.  The potted plant was intriguing and fun but was quite bland.  Koji cured hamachi was good but surrounded by very acidic sauce.  We were hoping for a true wow factor but didn't quite get that.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: College of Charleston roommate reunion

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Zero restaurant is beautiful and has cozy ambiance in what felt like a historic southern home. The service was amazing and their sommelier was very knowledgeable. Chef made accommodations based on my boyfriend's eating limitations and was thoughtful about it. However, I would not recommend this restaurant mainly based on value.  For what we paid, we expected to be completely blown away. If the price had been lower, we would've been much more impressed, but given how expensive it was, this should have been an unforgettable meal. However, during our weekend in Charleston, we had two much better dining experiences that were much better value. All of the dishes at Zero were very much style over substance. Unique and artsy plating could not make up for how ordinary all of the food was at a place that tries very hard to be extraordinary.

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Truly exceptional. The food and wine pairings were perfect and the staff knowledge really helped magnify the experience. One of the best meals we’ve eaten anywhere

Name: Zero Restaurant + Bar
Comment: Outstanding experience. Unique and surprising courses, with perfect pairings. Only complaint is that we had to often ask the waiter to repeat himself because he spoke to fast when describing the courses.
